English: Running Tal'on Translation Key < Talon.lex > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 > Tal'on Translation 99% Accurate @w3 Forwarding translation to HUD and Audio Input/Output @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Wait a second...@w5 This console only seems to have a database of Tal'on controlled planets, foods, dances and other culture-related stuff.@w2 While this is probably what the chief wanted me to read, it's no use to us.@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, this console appears to contain information about the Tal'on as a people.@w4 Personally, I find it fascinating, Commander. Can you enable the upload connection on the console so I can store these files for the UCH Database?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You, IDA? Find something 'fascinating'?@w4 That's the most expression i've heard out of you so far, IDA.@p9 [ IDA ] One of my parameters is to investigate and document first contact with any alien species, Commander.@w4 I am predisposed to fascination of alien creatures and cultures.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Does that mean you're 'investigating' those big-ass spiders we've been running into as well?@p9 [ IDA ] Of course, Commander.@w3 If you would like to know more about the creatures we've encountered, you can review the Ecological Database in your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 正在运行 泰隆 翻译密钥 < Talon.lex > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 > 泰隆翻译准确度 99% @w3 将翻译转发到 HUD 和音频输入/输出 @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 等一下...@w5 这个控制台似乎只有一个关于泰隆控制的行星、食物、舞蹈和其他与文化相关的东西的数据库.@w2 虽然这可能也是酋长想让我读一读的，但对我们并没有什么用.@p9 [ IDA ] 没错，这个控制台是关于泰隆民族的信息.@w4 个人感觉，这东西非常有吸引力，指挥官. 您能否在控制台上启用上传连接，好让我我可以为 UCH 数据库存储这些文件?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 就你，IDA? 觉得这东西 '有吸引力'?@w4 这是我目前为止听过你最有感情的一句话，IDA.@p9 [ IDA ] 我的一个参数设定就是调查和记录与任何外来物种的首次接触，指挥官.@w4 换句话说我生来就热衷于外星生物和文化.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这是否意味着你也在“调查”我们遇到的那些超他妈大的蜘蛛?@p9 [ IDA ] 那是当然，指挥官.@w3 如果您想了解更多关于我们遇到的生物的事情，可以在 PDA 中查看生态数据库.

English: <color=#0088ff>I'll uhh... i'll pass on that. Thanks, IDA.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我会呃... 先跳过吧. 谢了，IDA.</color>

English: [ IDA ] I'm sorry to interrupt, Commander. But I have detected heat signatures moving in on the tower in formation.@w1 I was able to trace them back to a transport half a kilometer away, that landed outside my focus.@w2 I apologise for not detecting them sooner, Commander.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] How many hostiles are we talking about here?@p8 [ IDA ] There are only 3, Commander.@w3 They appear to have taken flanking positions. One at the top of the tower to prevent your escape and two preparing to breach.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 很抱歉打断你，指挥官. 但是我侦测到了成队形向塔进发的多个热信号.@w1 我能够将它们追溯到半公里外的运输工具，它降落在我的聚焦范围之外.@w2 我很抱歉没能尽快发现它们，指挥官.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我们现在会遇到多少敌人?@p8 [ IDA ] 只有三个，指挥官.@w3 他们明显是要绕侧. 一个在塔顶防止你逃跑，两个准备突破.

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ]\nI see you have returned, Traveller.@w1 I hope your journey was... enlightening.
Chinese (simplified): [ 纳图克酋长 ]\n我看到你回来了，旅行者.@w1 我希望你的旅程…能让你有所启发.

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got some bad news you, Chief.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>酋长，我有一些坏消息要告诉你.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Wait a sec! You can speak Trade Standard?</color>

[ Chief Na'tuk ] You read the tales of the past, did you not, Traveller?@w2 The machine-mind that communicates with you was able to read our language to you.@w1 So why do you look as though you've fallen into a Wraithworm nest?@p9 [ IDA ] He knows about me.@w3 That is unexpected.@p5 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I take it something unexpected happened to you.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你看过我们过去的故事了对吗，旅行者?@w2 与你交流的机魂能够让你读懂我们的语言.@w1 所以说为什么你看起来好像掉进了外星臭虫的巢穴一样?@p9 [ IDA ] 他知道我的存在.@w3 有点出乎意料.@p5 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我猜你肯定没想到吧.

English: <color=#2eafff>A zirax strike team had been sent to the tower ahead of time</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>一支兹瑞克斯突击队已经提前被派往了塔楼</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>You set me up! A zirax ambush was waiting for me!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>你陷害我!一群兹瑞克斯埋伏在等着我!</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] Of course I do! @w1 How else would I purchase supplies and sell ingredients to the traders of the trading station?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Then why send me on this wild goose chase to learn your language and history?@w1 Couldn't you have just told me what I wanted to know when I first came in here?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I could have.@w2 But then you would have both learned nothing for yourself and proved nothing to me.@w3 I am now confident that you are neither a zirax spy or an enemy of the clan.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] By the way, what is a 'goose'?@w1 Some kind of animal?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] No, it's an animal, a bird, from my homeworld.@w1 But that's beside the point...
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我当然会! @w1 不然我怎么怎么与贸易站的商人买卖?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那为什么要派我去这场白费力气旅行来学习你的语言和历史?@w1 你就不能在我 一开始 来的时候直接跟我说呢?@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我是可以.@w2 但那样的话，你们自己什么都学不到，也没有向我证明自己.@w3 我现在确信你既不是兹瑞克斯间谍也不是氏族的敌人.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 顺便问一下，'鹅'是个什么东西?@w1 某种动物吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 不，确实是种动物，一种鸟类，来自我的家乡地球.@w1 但不是你想的那个意思...

English: <color=#0088ff>I was attacked by zirax right after reaching the tower!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我刚到塔就被兹瑞克斯袭击了!</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>You sent the zirax to attack me as soon as I reached the tower!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我一到塔上，你就派兹瑞克斯来攻击我!</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] How dare you! I sent you to learn our language and ways to prove that you are not a zirax spy!@w2 I had hoped you'd have at least learned some manners, but your kind are all alike!@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Just as a cycle ago when your crashing ships set our lands ablaze and we lost many settlements to the fire!@w4 And while we were trying to aid your people and put out the fires your kind panicked, mistook us for the Zirax and killed several of our people!
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你 怎么敢 这么说! 我派你去学习我们的语言和方法就是为了证明你不是兹瑞克斯间谍!@w2 我还希望你至少学会了一些礼仪，但你们这种族全都一个尿性!@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 就在一年前，当你们的船坠毁在我们的土地之上，我们在大火中失去了了那么多定居点!@w4 当我们试图帮助你们的人并扑灭大火时，你们的同类惊慌失措，把我们误认为是兹瑞克斯并杀死了我们的几个人!

English: Zirax attacked me right after I reached your tower, Chief. Explain that!
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯在我到达你的塔后就攻击了我，酋长. 解释 这一切!

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] What?!@w1 That tower contains a record of our history, much as the zirax would like to refute it. They would never intentionally destroy such a repository of knowledge as it may still be of use if war resumes again.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What can I tell you, Chief?@w3 They blew in a wall to get in and took out one of the consoles and everything behind it. The red one, I think...@w8 By the time i'd reached the tower, they'd already landed a safe distance and were making their way on foot to the tower.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] That knowledge is backed up, so as long as the other consoles are undamaged then it can be repaired...@w8 I can tell what you're thinking.@w3 That someone here told the zirax patrols where to find you, aren't you?
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 什么?!@w1 那座塔记录了我们的历史，很多像兹瑞克斯之类的都想要否认它的存在. 他们永远不会故意破坏这样的知识库，因为如果战争再次爆发，它可能仍然有用.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我还能说什么，酋长?@w3 他们在墙上炸了个大洞，顺带也毁掉了一个控制台以及里面所有的数据.就是红色的那个，如果我没记错的话...@w8 当我到达塔楼时，他们已经在安全距离降落了，然后步行前往塔楼了.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 那份知识是有备份的，只要其他控制台还完好就可以修复...@w8 我知道你在想什么.@w3 你在想这里有人和兹瑞克斯巡逻队报告了你的行踪，不是吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>Not to put too fine a point on it, Chief. But yes.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不想说得太仔细，酋长. 不过没错.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] I assure you, I have not betrayed you!@w3 Do not throw around such accusations lightly, stranger.@w4 Coming to the aid of your people after their ships crashed into our lands cost many of my clansmen@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Not only were our homes burned by the fires started by flaming wreckage, but we lost many lives to your soldiers afterwards mistaking our assistance as an attack and opening fire on unarmed civilians. Many of the youngsters lost friends and relatives that night and...@w3 unfortunate as it is, I believe they may have been the ones to inform the zirax.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] As soon as you had left, a number of young hunters approached me and demanded that I offer you no assistance.@w3 That I call our 'jailers' and trade your location for supplies or weapons.@w4 Naturally, I refused.@w3 I would be a poor leader to lend any assistance to the zirax who enforce these conditions upon us.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我向你保证，我绝对 没有 背叛你!@w3 不要轻易放出这样的指责，陌生人.@w4 在船只坠毁在我们的土地上后我们的族人向你们的人伸出援手，这让他们付出了巨大的代价@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 燃烧残骸引发的大火不仅烧毁了我们的家园，他们还把我们的援助误认为是攻击并向手无寸铁的平民开火，许多人都失去了性命. 许多年轻人在那天晚上失去了最亲近的人，...@w3 而且不幸的是，我觉得他们可能才是通知兹瑞克斯的人.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你一走，一些年轻的猎人就到我这来，要求我不向你提供任何帮助.@w3 还让我用你的位置向我们的“看管者”交换武器和补给.@w4 我自然是拒绝了.@w3 我要是帮了那些让我们变成这样的兹瑞克斯，我也就不配当这酋长了.

English: These Conditions? I never did find out how the Tal'ohn ended up this way.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这些条件?我从来没有真的理解泰隆是怎么变成这样的.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] It shames me to admit that you are probably right, Traveller.@w2 I can even understand why they did it.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You see, a year ago when the ships of your people crashed onto this planet. Several villagers were caught in the fires caused by the flaming debris that rained down across the planet.@w6 I ordered my people to go and put out the fires of our settlement and those of our neighbors, then to aid any survivors from your people's ships.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] To my sorrow, when we tried to help your people they mistook us for the zirax, and our aid for an attack.@w4 We lost many people that night.@w3 Several of the young hunters lost friends and family members and have held a grudge since then.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] After i'd sent you to the tower to learn our ways and language to prove you were not an enemy, several of the hunters came to me and demanded that I render you no aid.@w3 That instead, I should contact our zirax jailers and trade the information for supplies or weapons.@w8 Naturally, I refused.@w3 I would be a poor leader to lend any assistance to the zirax who enforce these conditions upon us.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Unfortunately, it seems the youngsters did not like my answer to their demands.@w3 Now, it seems that they may have done something unforgivable...
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 很羞愧地说，我必须承认你可能是对的，旅行者.@w2 我甚至知道他们为什么这么做.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你看，一年前当你们的人的船坠毁在这个星球上时.几名村民陷入了由燃烧的碎片引发的大火中.@w6 我命令我的人民去扑灭我们定居点和邻居的火灾，然后去救助一切你们船上的幸存者.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 令我痛心的是，当我们试图帮助你们的人民时，他们误认为我们是兹瑞克斯，而我们的援助则被误认为是进攻.@w4 那天晚上我们失去了很多人.@w3 几个年轻的猎人失去了朋友和家人，从那时起一直怀恨在心.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 在我把你送到塔楼学习我们的生活方式和语言以证明你不是敌人之后，几个猎人来找我，要求我不要帮助你.@w3 不仅如此，还让我用你的位置向我们的兹瑞克斯看管者交换武器和补给.@w8 我自然是拒绝了.@w3 我要是帮了那些让我们变成这样的兹瑞克斯，我也就不配当这酋长了.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 不幸的是，年轻人似乎不喜欢我对他们要求的回应.@w3 现在看来，他们可能做了不可原谅的事...

English: These Conditions? I never did find out how the Tal'ohn ended up this way.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>在这种情况下?我从来没有发现泰隆是怎么变成这样的.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>What will happen to the hunters now?</color>

[ Chief Na'tuk ] Ah, yes...@w2 That.@w5 It's not a terribly long story and happened long before my time, but if you're willing to listen to an old chieftain prattle on about the past, I'll be glad to indulge you.@w5 If only the youngsters had the patience to learn their history@w3 maybe this tragic situation wouldn't have happened?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Following the defeat of the Legacy and their forced dormancy; The Zirax who suffered the greatest, or possibly only losses in the war.@w4 We Tal'on were centralized with not much desire for expansion and left that to those of the assembly who desired freedom.@w2 So we were all far from the frontlines, were seen as cowards not fit to rule...@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Suspicions and discrimination escalated. Wild theories of us orchestrating the Zirax's demise at the hands of the Legacy became common and xenophobia reigned supreme until it all came to a head.@w4 The houses of zirax united behind a single ruler, an Emperor, and forcibly and violently ended the Tal'on-Zirax Assembly.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] The survivors from the purge were herded onto hundreds of planets across the galaxy.@w3 Some to work as slaves, others forced into primitive conditions like us, kept from technological proficiency by an iron rule enforced by our watchers.@w4 That's...@w2 really all there is.@w4 Look around you, and you will see the truth of the tale, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 啊，没错...@w2 那个.@w5 这不是一个非常长的故事，而且发生在我出生之前之前很久，但如果你愿意听一位老酋长谈论过去，我很乐意讲给你听.@w5 要是年轻人都有耐心去了解他们的历史就好了@w3 也许就不会有现在这种悲惨境地了?@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 在 遗留者 战败并被迫休眠之后; 遭受了最严重甚至是唯一损失的兹瑞克斯.@w4 我们泰隆居住的比较集中，没有太多扩张的愿望，把它留给那些渴望自由的群体.@w2 因此我们远离前线，被视为不适合统治的懦夫...@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 怀疑和歧视逐渐升级.关于我们策划让兹瑞克斯亡于遗留者之手的的阴谋论变得普遍，仇外心理占据了至高无上的地位，直到一切都达到了顶点.@w4 兹瑞克斯的家族团结在一个统治者的背后，也就是他们的皇帝，并以暴力方式强行结束了泰隆-兹瑞克斯联盟.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 大清洗的幸存者被赶到整个星系的数百个行星上.@w3 有些人像奴隶一样工作，有些人像我们一样被迫在原始的条件下生活，任何技术发展被我们的监视者的铁律严格禁止.@w4 那就是...@w2 全部的真相了.@w4 环顾四周，你会看到故事的真相，旅行者.

English: <color=#0088ff>That's terrible! Why have you not fought back?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那太糟糕了!你为什么不反击?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>So what will happen with the hunters?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以说那些捕猎者会怎么样?</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] Fighting is a young man's game.@w1 I'm too old to fight and couldn't bear to order my people to their death.@w1 And it would be to their deaths.@w1 There's no way a bow and arrows can stand against heavy machine guns.@w1 We are few, and we are weak.@w1 As much as it pains me to admit it, we can only endure.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Sooner or later, Chief, Your people will need to stand up and fight, or one day they won't remember the past as you do and they will have nothing to fight for.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I thank you for your opinion, Traveller. But this business is our own.@w3 Things will resolve themselves one way or the other.@w5 Shall we get back to the matter at hand then?
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 战斗是年轻人的手段.@w1 我太老了，无法战斗，也不能忍受命令我的人去死.@w1 而这 正是 命令他们去送死.@w1 弓箭怎么也无法抵挡重机枪.@w1 我们不仅寡不敌众，力量也薄弱.@w1 尽管承认现状会令人很痛苦，但我们只能忍受.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 总有一天酋长，你的人民 会 需要站起来反抗，不然有一天他们没能像你一样记得过去，他们将失去斗争的动力.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 虽然很感谢你的想法，旅行者. 但这是我们自己的事.@w3 事情总会以这样或那样的方式解决.@w5 我们还是先回到眼下的问题吧?

English: <color=#0088ff>Yes, what's going to happen with the young hunters?</color>

[ Chief Na'tuk ] The youngsters will be apprehended and brought before a tribal council to determine their guilt.@w2 Selling out an ally to the zirax is the highest crime we have. If found guilty...@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I understand.@w2 Is there some way I can help?@p6 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I believe you may meet opposition.@w2 On the other hand, I believe some of the other hunters may also refuse the order to bring in the youngsters.@w4 I would ask you, if you are willing, to speak to the head of the hunters and tell him to call in the hunters at my request.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 这些年轻人将被逮捕并让部落委员会来决定他们的罪行.@w2 将盟友出卖给兹瑞克斯是最严重的罪行. 一旦定罪...@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我都明白.@w2 我能帮上忙吗?@p6 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我想你肯定会遇到阻碍.@w2 另一方面，我相信其他的那些猎人也肯定拒绝逮捕那些年轻人的命令.@w4 如果你愿意的话，我想请你和猎人的负责人谈谈，让他应我要求把猎人叫来.

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] So you are the Terran that the Chief has vouched for?@w2 I'm not impressed.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm not here to impress you.@w3 I'm here because the chief asked me to tell you to bring in the young hunters that are suspected of selling me out to the zirax.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] No member of MY hunters would dare sell out anyone to those treacherous zirax thugs!@w4 You dare accuse my kinsmen of making deals with their kind?!
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 所以你就是酋长所担保的人族?@w2 我没有印象.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我不是来给你印象的.@w3 我在这里是因为酋长让我来告诉你， 把那些被怀疑向兹瑞克斯出卖我的年轻猎人带进来.@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 没有一个猎人敢把任何人出卖给那些奸诈的兹瑞克斯暴徒!@w4 你敢指责我的亲戚与他们的种类的交易?!

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not accusing anyone. I'm here to make sure you call in the Hunters instead of warning them.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我没有指责任何人。我是来确保你把猎人们叫来而不是警告他们.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] My people have no reason to flee your false accusations, Terran.@w5 I have already sent out a messenger to bring in the hunting parties an hour ago.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] And are they back yet?@p5 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Well...@w3 No.@w5 They should've returned some time ago. @w3 This does NOT mean they are guilty of anything, just that something has delayed them. They might be in trouble.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 我的人民没有理由逃避你的错误指控，人族.@w5 我一小时前就派人去把狩猎队带来了.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 他们回来了吗?@p5 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 好吧...@w3 No.@w5 他们早该回来了. @w3 这并不意味着他们有什么过错，只是有什么耽搁了他们。他们可能有麻烦了.

English: <color=#0088ff>Then I will go out and bring them in myself!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那我就出去亲自把他们带进来!</color>

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] No you will not, Terran!@w3 I will go out and you will accompany me to ensure that there is no deception on anyone's part but your own.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I can live with that.@w4 So where are we going?@p6 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Young Ki'eve is the closest. @w3 He should be near the stone monument at this time of day.@w4 I will meet you at the top of the tower if I cannot find him.@w2 He will likely be near the tower and visible from the top.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 不，你不能，人类!@w3 我会出去，你会和我一起，确保除了你自己没有欺骗任何人.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我可以接受.@w4 所以我们要去哪里?@p6 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 年轻的Ki'eve是最近的. @w3 这个时候他应该在石碑附近.@w4 如果我找不到他，我会在塔顶等你。@w2 他可能会在塔附近，从塔顶就能看到他.

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] I see you have returned, Traveller.@w2 But it is without the missing hunter, Ki'eve.@w5 No...@w4 You do not need to explain.@w4 One of our hunters already saw you gun down Ki'eve on top of the monument tower.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] It saddens me that you would work to gain my trust only to kill my clansmen in cold blood.@w4 What do you have to say for yourself now, Terran?
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你回来了，旅行者.@w2 但是你没带着失踪的猎人Ki'eve一起.@w5 不...@w4 你不必解释.@w4 我们的一个猎人已经看到你在纪念碑塔顶上用枪击倒了Ki'eve.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 令我难过的是，你为了获得我的信任而努力，却冷血地杀死了我的族人.@w4 你现在有什么要为自己辩护的，地球人?

English: <color=#0088ff>I was only defending myself after he attacked me</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>他攻击我在先，我只是在自卫</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>It wasn't me. I never even found Ki'eve.</color>

Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>兹瑞克斯人杀的 Ki'eve. 不是我.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] We Tal'on are not a violent people.@w3 We never initiate and attack, but we will respond if attacked.@w4 In this case, we have already received word that Ki'eve's body was found alone, at the base of the monument with several holes in his body matching your weapon.@w5 There are no other bodies.@w2 Your guilt is clear, Terran.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I had hoped you would become a friend of the clan, Traveller.@w4 We are so lacking in allies in these trying times that it seems that I pinned my hopes that we could mend the gap between our two peoples...
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我们泰隆是反对暴力的种族.@w3 我们从不挑起战斗或是主动攻击，但我们如果被攻击就 一定 会加以回敬.@w4 在这种情况下，我们已经收到消息说Ki'eve的尸体是单独被发现的，就在纪念碑的底部，他的尸体上有几个符合 你们 武器的洞.@w5 没有其他的尸体.@w2 你的罪行非常明确，地球人.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我曾希望你能成为氏族之友，旅行者.@w4 在这些艰难的时期，我们如此缺乏盟友，以至于我似乎寄希望于我们二人能够弥合两国人民之间的鸿沟...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not lying. The bodies were removed after I left to return here!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不撒谎。尸体是在我离开回到这里后被移走的!</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] Enough!@p4 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] No, chief.@w4 What the Terran says is true. I saw it with my own eyes.@w6 Ki'eve is a traitor...@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Huntmaster...@w3 You who lost so many of your hunters to the Terrans...@w3 You would truly vouch for this one?@w4 You, who cried loudest for vengeance against the terran interlopers?@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Yes, Chief.@w5 I watched Ki'eve lead a party of four zirax soldiers to the monument and initiate an attack on the Terran who I sent to the monument to wait for me to bring Ki'eve peacefully.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 够了!@p4 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 不，酋长.@w4 地球人说的句句属实. 我亲眼看到的.@w6 Ki'eve 就是个叛徒...@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 猎人大师...@w3 你把因为地球人而失去了这么多猎人...@w3 你真的要为这个人担保吗?@w4 之前为了向人族的闯入者叫的最厉害同样也是你吧?@p8 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 没错，酋长.@w5 我亲眼看着 Ki'eve 率领一队共四名兹瑞克斯士兵来到纪念碑，对我派到纪念碑那里等我一起和平带回Ki'eve的地球人发起攻击.
<color=#0088ff><i>我没有看到4个兹瑞克斯士兵.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] I am the head of the hunters for a reason, Terran.@w2 I know my way around a knife...@w2 and zirax bodyarmor.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] What I want to know is how you know the bodies were removed when I never saw you return to the scene.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I am a Commander of the UCH for a reason, Hunter.@w2 I have my ways...@p4 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You had that machine-mind watch the area, did you not?@p4 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Ha ha ha haaa!@w3 If you think you can pull the fur over my chief's eyes, friend. You need to try harder!@p5 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Does your machine-mind know who took away the bodies?@w1 They are surely in league with Ki'eve's schemes and need to be caught before they cause anymore harm.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] With no way to identify them, all I can tell you is that there's four of them.@p6 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Then I know who they are.@w3 There are only four hunters still out on patrol that did not heed the summon, chief.@w6 But that is an issue for another time, is it not?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Yes, I believe it is, Huntmaster...@w4 I am sorry, Traveller... That you had to see us in a time of weakness.@w3 I must truly be getting old if I could not see the darkness brewing within our youths...
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 我能成为猎人大师自然有它的原因，地球人.@w2 我知道怎么使用匕首...@w2 捅进兹瑞克斯的护甲.@p8 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 我想知道的是，在完全没有见到你回到现场时，你究竟是怎么知道尸体被移走了.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 我能成为UCH的指挥官自然有它的道理，猎人.@w2 我自有办法...@p4 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你让那个机魂盯着了，对吧?@p4 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 哈哈哈哈!@w3 如果你觉得你能在酋长面前遮掩盖自己的一丝一毫，我的朋友. 你还嫩着呢!@p5 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 那你的机魂知道是谁把尸体搬走了吗?@w1 他们肯定和Ki'eve的阴谋逃不了干系，必须得在他们造成更大的危害之前抓住他们.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我没办法分辨他们，我只知道一共有四个人.@p6 [ 猎人大师 Ku'reil ] 那我知道他们是谁了.@w3 只有四个猎人没有听从召唤仍在巡逻，酋长.@w6 但那是以后的事了，对吧?@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 是的，我也这么认为，猎人大师...@w4 我很抱歉，旅行者... 让你见笑了.@w3 我一定是太老了以至于看不见年轻人心中的黑暗...

English: It's not your fault, Chief. These are your people and they were wronged by mine.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这不是你的错，酋长。这些是你的人民，他们被我的人冤枉了.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] True, but the fault lies with me for not realizing how troubled my clansmen are... and also lies with them for not bringing their troubles to me before the situation worsened to what we have now.@w4 Things could've been much worse. So I am glad that a crisis was averted, even if the result isn't what anyone could call positive.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You are now welcome among my Clan, Traveller {PlayerName}.@w3 Rest here and be at ease here.@w3 If there's anything I can do to help you, please ask me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 确实，但我还是错在没有意识到我的族人有多容易出事... 还对他们说谎，让他们在情况恶化到现在的境地之前都不向我上报.@w4 事情本有可能更糟的. 所以我很欣慰我们逆转了这场危机，哪怕结果无论如何也称不上是正面.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你现在起受到我们氏族的欢迎，旅行者 {PlayerName}.@w3 请在这里安心休息.@w3 如果有什么我能帮你的，请告诉我.

English: <color=#0088ff>Where did the Terran survivors go to?</color>

[ Chief Na'tuk ] Your clansmen? Their vehicles headed to the Trade Station belonging to the Polaris Traders.@w4 I know this because I was there purchasing medical supplies when I saw them organizing transportation offworld on a Freighter.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I will give you the coordinates of the station if you need them.@w2 But i'm sure your machine-mind has already found the structure.@w7 I hope you find your people again, Traveller.@w4 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion...@w2 if not your people.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] And may the spirits guide you too, Chief.@p6 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Ah, now you're sounding like a member of the clan!
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你的人? 他们的车开往了极星商人的交易站.@w4 我正在那里购买医疗用品，正好看到他们在货轮上组织向地外运输，所以知道这一点.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 如果你需要的话，我会给你交易站的坐标.@w2 但我相信你的机魂早就找到了那座建筑.@w7 希望你能找到自己同伴，旅行者.@w4 愿神明指引你前往Empyrion...@w2 就算你的朋友们没有.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 也愿神明指引你，酋长.@p6 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 啊，现在 你听起来就像氏族的一份子!

English: <color=#0088ff>Farewell, Chief Na'tuk. I hope to see you again.</color>
Ain't seen one of you guys in here in a while.@w3\nWhatchu want?
Chinese (simplified): 有段时间没在这里看到你们了.@w3 \n想要什么?

English: <color=#0088ff>Pretty sure I saw some humans over there.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很确定我在那里看到了一些人类.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm Commander {PlayerName} and this is my favourite store on the Station.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我是指挥官 {PlayerName} 这是我在贸易站里最喜欢的商店.</color>

English:
Those guys? They ain't terrans.@w3
The bioscanner on the way in should've told you that.@w4
Aside from looks, you don't got nothin' in common with that lot.@w2 Them's Polarans...@p5
You want a drink or not?
Chinese (simplified):
那些家伙?他们不是人族.@w3 
进来的生物扫描仪应该已经告诉你了.@w4 
从长相上看，你和那些人没有任何共同点.@w2 他们是极星人……@p5 
你到底要不要喝一杯?

English: <color=#0088ff>No thanks, I'm looking for my crew.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>不用了，谢谢，我在找我的船员.</color>

English: Can't help you with that, pal.@w3\nThe last of your people got on shuttles 'bout a cycle ago and buggered off outta this dump.@w5\nIf you ain't buyin' a drink, then you can bugger off like your friends.
Chinese (simplified): 这可帮不了你，伙计.@w3 \n你的最后一批人大约在一年前上了穿梭机，离开了这个垃圾场.@w5 \n如果你不买酒喝，那你就像你的朋友一样滚吧。

English:
Look, pal.@w2
We don't do that here.@w3
This ain't the Citadel and I ain't the Admiral, so I don't give a toss if this is your favorite shithole in this dump. You ain't getting a discount.@p5
You pay full price or you leave.
What'll it be?
Chinese (simplified):
看，伙计.@w2 
我们不讲究这些.@w3 
这里不是城堡，我也不是海军上将，所以我才不管这里是不是你最喜欢的破地方。你没有折扣.@p5 
你要么付全价，要么走人.
你选哪个

English:
Hello there, valuable customer!@w3
What can I do for you today, sir?@w4 
Ammunition?@w2 Supplies? @w2 Camping gear?@w2
You look like the outdoors type, if you don't mind me saying!
Chinese (simplified):
您好，宝贵的客户!先生@w3 
今天我能为您做些什么?@w4 
弹药吗?@w2 供应吗?@w2 野营装备?@w2 
你看起来像喜欢户外活动的人，如果你不介意我这么说的话!

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm uhh... looking for my crew. Was hoping you'd seen them.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我喔…我在找我的船员。希望你见过他们.</color>

English: Afraid not, sir.@w3\nI only have a head for my business and not of the comings and goings of anyone else.@w4\nBut if you're looking for someone, I recommend this uhh... @w3 Yuu@w2 See@w2 Aytch@w2 Motorcycle!@w2 There's nothing faster!
Chinese (simplified): 恐怕不行，sir@w3 \n我只知道处理我自己的事情，而不知道别人的来来去去.@w4 \n但是如果你正在找人，我推荐这个呃…@w3 Yuu@w2 See@w2 Aytch@w2 摩托车!@w2 没有比这更快的了!

English: <color=#0088ff>A UCH Motorbike? Where'd you get that?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>一辆UCH摩托车吗?你从哪儿弄来的?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for a Zeon Mk20 Guided Rocket Launcher with a retractable sight and thermal tracking.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找一架Zeon Mk20制导火箭发射器带可伸缩瞄准具和热跟踪装置.</color>

English: I'm afraid i'm not stocking anything like that, sir. I'm terribly sorry!\nMaybe you should try InterWeap or one the uhh... 'suspicious businessmen', which I wouldn't know anything about.@w4\nI believe the gentleman you have business with can be found at Kenex-62 in orbit.@w3 Which, like I said, I know nothing about.
Chinese (simplified): 对不起，先生，我没有这种东西。非常抱歉!\n也许你应该试试InterWeap或者一个呃…“可疑的商人”，我对此一无所知@w4 \n我相信和你有生意往来的那位先生可以在轨道上的Kenex-62找到。@w3 就像我说的，我对此一无所知。

English: <color=#0088ff>Well, do you know anything about my fellow crewmembers?</color>
<color=#0088ff>Is that a UCH Motorbike you've got there?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>一辆UCH摩托车吗?你从哪儿弄来的??</color>

English:
I see you have a good eye, sir.@w2
This lovely piece of machinery was sold to me almost a year ago by a group of newcomers!@w2
If you're interested in where they got them, you should ask Station Security. They spent a lot of time with them.@p7
Now, about the... bi-cycle?@w3 How does 3,200 credits sound to you? Hmm...?
Chinese (simplified):
我看你眼光不错，先生.@w2 
这台可爱的机器差不多是一年前一群新来者卖给我的!@w2 
如果你对他们的来源感兴趣，你应该问站点保安。他们花了很多时间和他们在一起.@p7 
现在，…摩托车吗?@w3 3200信用点你觉得怎么样?嗯……?<color=#0088ff>我对 ZS-1 Assault Rifle更感兴趣? 你这有吗?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm more interested in a Zorg ZS-1 Assault Rifle? Got any of those?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我对佐格ZS-1突击步枪更感兴趣?有这些吗?</color>

English: [ Security Officer Paravel ] I see you're done hassling the station staff and have finally come to me.@w4 I was getting tired watching your bumbling around, obstructing productivity and being a general nuisance.@w6 There's no need to open your mouth, Terran. I know what you want, you want me to tell you where your 'friends' have gone.@p9 [ Security Officer Paravel ] As you can see, they're obviously not here.@w2 They left a cycle ago on a transport, which i'm sure you already know.@w4 Anything more is confidential information, only accessible to Polaris Employees. Of which, you are not.@w6 Don't even consider begging or threatening me for the information. I will have station security on you before you even unholster your weapon.
Chinese (simplified): [ 安保警官Paravel ] 我眼瞅着你把站里的人挨个骚扰了一遍现在 终于 轮到我了.@w4 我看你在这笨手笨脚地妨碍工作效率也看烦了，就像个讨厌鬼一样.@w6 你不用说话，地球人. 我知道你想要什么，你想让我告诉你你的“朋友”去哪儿了.@p9 [ 安保警官Paravel ] 用眼睛看看也知道，他们 很明显 不在这里.@w2 他们一年前就坐着运输机离开了，我想你肯定也是知道的.@w4 任何在此之上的都是机密信息，只有极星员工可以访问. 而你正好不是其中一员.@w6 乞求或者威胁我说出信息这种事情想都别想. 在你拔出武器之前我就会把安保人员叫过来.

English: <color=#0088ff>I could just keep asking around until I find someone who knows.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以就这么一直四处打听，直到找到知道的人.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>What do I need to do to get you to tell me what I need to know?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我需要做什么才能让你告诉我我想知道的?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I could just punch you in the face. Just for the fun of it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以直接梆梆给你两拳，就是图一乐.</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Indeed you could.@w2 It wouldn't help you any, though.@w4 You see... the station personnel here are all Polaris employees and know better than to reveal industrial secrets to an unknown party.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] I know about your support AI as well and Polaris has one of our own. So please stop with the attempts at system intrusion.@w2 The little flashing icon on my display is playing on my nerves...@p9 [ IDA ] I cannot breach the station's security network. I am being blocked by another AI, as he says.@w3 If I were closer to the station and had full use of my systems, I am confident that I could get in. But for now, it may be best to do as he says...@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] The vacant expression on your face tells me that your supporter is telling you that i'm right.@w4 Of course, I'm always right. @w5 So,@w2 are we ready to get down to business?
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 你当然可以这么做.@w2 虽然这么做对你不会有任何帮助.@w4 你看... 空间站里的人都是 极星 雇员 并且也知道不要向不知名的一方透露工业机密.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 我也知道你那个辅助AI的事，我们极星 自己也有一个. 所以不要白费力气进行入侵了.@w2 显示屏上闪烁的小图标让我神经紧张...@p9 [ IDA ] 我不能破解空间站的安全网络. 正如他所说，我被另一个 AI 阻止了.@w3 If I were closer to the station and had full use of my systems，I am confident that I could get in如果我离站点更近并且充分利用我的系统，我有充分的信心可以黑进去. 不过现在，最好还是照他说的做...@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 你脸上空洞的表情告诉我你的辅助系统告诉你我是对的.@w4 那是必然的，我永远是对的. @w5 所以说，@w2 我们准备好坐下来谈谈生意了吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm very tempted to punch you in the face.</color>

[ Officer Paravel ] I wouldn't recommend that. You wouldn't like the experience.@w3 Oh, i'm sure you'd enjoy the brief elation of punching me in the face, before you're shot in the head by station security.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] That would cause more problems for me. But it wouldn't be any of your concern anymore, would it?@w3 But if you still insist, go right ahead.
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 我 并不 推荐那么做. 你不会喜欢那么做的后果的.@w3 哦，我敢肯定，在你被站点保安击中头部之前，你会很享受打我脸的短暂兴奋.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 那确实会给我躁症 更多 问题. 但是就和你无关了，不是吗？?@w3 但如果你还坚持，那来啊.

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright, you've made your point. So what do you want?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好吧，你说的有道理. 所以你究竟想要什么?</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] I'm glad you see reason.@w3 I'd hate to call in the cleaners.@w4 But what I want you cannot provide. But... you are a useful step on the road to what I want.@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] Are you aware of the situation between the Polaris Megacorp and the Zirax Empire?@w5 No, of course you're not.@w3 But this is where you're needed, according to my superiors.
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 我很高兴看到你还有理智.@w3 我可不想叫清道夫来.@w4 但是我 想要的 你提供不了. 不过... 你可以是通往我想要的东西路上有用的一步.@p8 [ 警官Paravel ] 你注意到 极星巨型企业 和 兹瑞克斯帝国之间的情势了吗?@w5 并不，你当然不知道.@w3 但是根据我上级的说法，这就要用到你了.

English: <color=#0088ff>So these are orders from on top? Nothing to do with you?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以说上面有命令? 但是你什么都做不了?</color>

English: [ IDA ] Commander, I have immobilized your suit's motor functions.@w3 Please control yourself.@p7 [ Officer Paravel ] By your lack of action, It appears that you've started to see reason.@w4 For a second there, I thought you were truly stupid enough to attack me.@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] Are you aware of the situation between the Polaris Megacorp and the Zirax Empire?@w5 No, of course you're not.@w3 But this is where you're needed, according to my superiors.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 指挥官，我已经束缚了你战衣的运动功能.@w3 请控制一下自己.@p7 [ 警官Paravel ] 既然你没有动手，说明你已经明白道理了.@w4 有一瞬间，我以为你真的傻到要攻击我.@p8 [ 警官Paravel ] 你注意到 极星巨型企业 和 兹瑞克斯帝国之间的情势了吗?@w5 并不，你当然不知道.@w3 但是根据我上级的说法，这就要用到你了.

English: <color=#0088ff>So these are orders from on top? Nothing to do with you?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以说上面有命令? 但是你什么都做不了?</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] You're starting to see reason. I can work with this.@w2 As I said, the information is confidential to Polaris employees.@w4 Fortunately, I, on behalf of Polaris Megacorp have a proposition for you.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Are you aware of the current political situation between us of Polaris Megacorp and the High Command of the Zirax Empire?@w3 No, of course you're not.@w4 Even so, it seems that the powers that be have determined that you could be a useful tool.
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 你明事理就好. 我也能继续做下去了.@w2 正如我所说，这些信息对极星员工来说都是需要保密的.@w4 比较幸运的是，我可以代表极星巨型企业给你一个提议.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 你注意到极星巨型企业 和兹瑞克斯帝国最高统帅部之间的情势了嘛?@w3 并不，你当然不知道.@w4 即使是这样，似乎那些有权有势的人决定了你可以成为一件有用的工具.

English: <color=#0088ff>Powers that be? So this isn't your decision?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>有权有势的人? 所以这不是你个人的决定?</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] *sigh*@w3 No, this is not my decision, nor is this my chosen way of doing things.@w4 Either way, i'll get my promotion out of this dump and into HabSec where I don't have to deal with clowns like you.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Let me explain the situation in terms you can understand, alright?@w4 Polaris Megacorp is the greatest economic power in this galaxy, and formerly a subsidiary of the Trade Guild up until the war of silence two and a half centuries ago, when we broke away as an independent power following the War of Silence.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] The Zirax are our major consumer of raw materials, but as we've been exhausing the deposits in our own quadrants of space. The depleted zirax have failed to utilize the resources in territory that they've refused to give up rights to and can barely sustain an active presence over.@w4 Simply put: We want what they have but cannot use.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What does any of this have to do with me?@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] Let me finish explaining before you interrupt with your inane questions!@w4 You are clearly not Polaris and have no ties to the corporation or to any local faction, save your UCH navy.@w3 Those lack of connections makes you a useful tool for disrupting zirax control over certain territories and planets without any repercussions for the company.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] You are free to move in, attack the zirax, which i'm sure you don't mind doing considering what they did to your people, and leave the depopulated territory to the company to move in and set up... what would you call it?@w3 Humanitarian aid for the survivors of your vicious 'random attack'.
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] *叹气*@w3 不，这并非我的决定，也不是我选择的做事方式.@w4 不管怎样，我会因此晋升为定居点警官然后离开 这个 垃圾堆，这样我就不用和 你这种小丑打交道了.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 让我用你能理解的方式解释一下情况，行吧?@w4 极星巨型企业是本星系最大的经济势力，在两个半世纪前的沉默之战时还曾是贸易协会的一员，战争结束后，我们脱离了协会走向独立.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 兹瑞克斯是我们原材料的主要消费者，但由于我们已经耗尽了我们自己空间象限中的存款. 耗尽资源的兹瑞克斯未能有效利用他们拒绝放弃权利的领土内的资源，而同时又几乎无法维持在那些地方的统治.@w4 简单来说: 我们需要他们所有但用不上的东西.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那这和我有什么关系呢?@p8 [ 警官Paravel ] 在你用你愚蠢的问题打断之前先听我解释完!@w4 你 很明显 不是极星人而且也和我们公司 或者 任何本地派系没什么关系，当然不算你们UCH海军.@w3 这些缺乏联系使你成为了破坏在某些领土和行星上兹瑞克斯统治的有用工具，同时不会对公司产生任何影响.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 你可以随意进入他们的领地攻击兹瑞克斯，我相信在他们对你的人做了那些事以后你肯定是很乐意的，然后把人口稀少的地区留给公司来建设就行... 你看怎么样?@w3 在你恶毒的 '随机攻击'后为幸存者提供人道 救援.

English: <color=#0088ff>And what do I get out of this?</color>

[ Officer Paravel ] What you get is the next step on your journey towards your missing people.@w4 And of course, as an employee of Polaris Megacorp you are entitled to pay and some benefits:@w2 Healthcare, Dental, employee discounts... the usual.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Since you have little choice in the matter, why don't you just agree already?@w3 I've just forwarded the agreement to your support AI to sign on your behalf. Hurry and get it over with since your first assignment is time-sensitive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, did you receive the contract? Anything I should worry about?@p8 [ IDA ] I did, Commander.@w2 Aside from an attempt to slip some malware to me in the contract, it's a fairly loose contract.@w4 I've checked it against other station personnel's contracts that I was able to access on personal devices and yours is unusually free of loopholes or deception.@p9 [ IDA ] I would guess that such a loose contract would prevent them from being legally bound to defend you in the event of your capture,@w2 with as few ties as possible to Polaris.@w4 In effect, it gives them Plausible Deniability. There's likely a deeper game being played here, but nothing that would conflict with your allegiance to the UCH.
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 你 所能得到的是你失散的同伴们旅途的下一步.@w4 而且理所应当的，作为极星巨型企业的一员，你可以拿到各种权益:@w2 医保，牙医，员工折扣... 这些一般都有的东西.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 既然你在这件事上别无选择，你为什么不直接同意呢?@w3 我刚刚将协议转发给您的辅助 AI 以代表您签署. 赶快搞完，你的第一个任务可是非常紧迫的.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，你收到合约了? 我有什么需要担心的吗?@p8 [ IDA ] 我收到了，指挥官.@w2 除了试图在合同中向我传输一些恶意软件之外，这是真的是一份相当松散的合同.@w4 我已经对照其他站点工作人员的合同进行了检查，这些合同都可以从他们个人设备进行访问，而您的合同竟然异常地没有漏洞或欺诈.@p9 [ IDA ] 我猜这样一份松散的合同可以防止他们在你被俘时在法律上有义务为你辩护，@w2 毕竟你和极星的关系是如此有限.@w4 实际情况下，这份合约可以作为他们合理推诿的手段. 这里面水很深，但没有什么会与你效忠 UCH 的相冲突.

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright IDA. Do I need to actually sign anything?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>行吧IDA. 我需要在哪里签字吗?</color>

English: [ IDA ] No, Commander. I've registered it and returned a copy of the contract.@w4 I also included their own malware packet in the signature.@w2 I thought you'd like that.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Good work, IDA. I wish i'd thought of that myself.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Okay manager. Everything's been signed and sent back to you.@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] Yes, I can see that.@w8 Everything appears to be in order.@p7 [ Officer Paravel ] Welcome to the company, Commander {PlayerName}. I'm hoping you'll be a valuable asset to us.@w5 Your Employee number is #8376455466, memorize it. It is more important than your life now.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] I have a job for you already, 8376455466. It's a time-sensitive one, so I hope you have a ship ready.@w5 One of our surveyor towers has drifted over a zirax-owned ore vein and we're concerned they make take hostile action.@w7 The company wants you to secure our asset as an unaffiliated third-party.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 不用，指挥官. 我已经注册并返还了一份合同副本.@w4 我还在签名中包含了他们自己的恶意软件数据包.@w2 我想你应该会喜欢的.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 干得漂亮，IDA. 真希望我自己也能想的这么周到.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 好了管理员. 所有都已签好发回给你了.@p8 [ 警官Paravel ] 没错，我看出来了.@w8 所有东西看起来都井然有序.@p7 [ 警官Paravel ] 欢迎入职公司，指挥官 {PlayerName}. 希望你能成为我们宝贵的一部分.@w5 你的雇员编号是 #8376455466，一定要记住了. 这东西从现在开始比你的生命还要重要.@p9 [ 警官Paravel ] 我现在立刻有一份工作要给你，8376455466. 这个任务非常赶时间，希望你已经有一艘飞船了.@w5 我们的一个测量塔已经漂到了兹瑞克斯拥有的矿脉上，我们担心他们会采取敌对行动.@w7 公司希望您作为独立第三方来保护我们的资产.

English: <color=#0088ff>Hey, what about my people?! You were supposed to tell me where they went!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>嘿，那我的人怎么说?! 你应该告诉我他们去了哪里!</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] I'm not supposed to do anything.@w3 You are an employee of Polaris, a contractor, with no say in what I do.@w3 I could have you cleaning toilets if I wanted!@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] I've sent the job details to your 'secretary' AI to handle.@w5 You are to go protect Polaris assets from unwanted zirax interference as a member of the UCH.@w2 We want plausible deniability within the hour. Now GO!
Chinese (simplified): [ 警官Paravel ] 我并不 应该 做任何事.@w3 你 是极星的雇员，承包商，对于 我 该做什么你没有发言权.@w3 如果我愿意也可以让你去扫厕所!@p8 [ 警官Paravel ] 我已将工作详细信息发送给你的“秘书”AI 来处理.@w5 你要作为 UCH 的一员保护极星资产免受不必要的兹瑞克斯干扰.@w2 我们要在一小时内做出合理推诿，所以快去!

English: <color=#0088ff>You'd better have answers when I come back...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我回来的时候你最好能给我答复...</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Alright, i've done what you wanted.@w2 The Survey Tower is safe, the tower gets to stay where it is and the Zirax think it was an isolated UCH attack.@w3 Now tell me where my people are!@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Not so fast 8376455466.@w3 You're an employee of Polaris now, and we pay our employees when they complete a job satisfactorily.@w4 In fact, you did better than we expected.@w4 We didn't expect the zirax to allow our asset to remain in place.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好吧，我已经按照你的要求做了。@w2 \探测塔安全了，塔可以保持在原地，兹瑞克斯认为这是一次孤立的UCH攻击。@w3 现在告诉我我的人民在哪里！@p9 [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 别急，8376455466。@w3 你现在是北极星的员工了，我们支付员工在满意地完成工作时的报酬。@w4 事实上，你做得比我们预期的要好。@w4 我们没想到兹瑞克斯会允许我们的资产保持在原位。

English: <color=#0088ff>I don't care about the money, I want information.</color>

[ Officer Paravel ] You're an Employee of Polaris, #8376455466!@w3 We do things a very specific way,@w2 and to us there is nothing more important, more sacred than money.@w4 To act otherwise makes you a problem to the Company@w3 and a problem for me.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] I have enough problems already, so you'll take the money first.@w3 Then and only then will I explain the terms of your errant Terran brethren's contracts.@w4 And a contract they most assuredly have with Polaris.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Fine,@w2 just give me the money and get on with it.@w4 The sooner this is over, the sooner I can leave.@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] For the first, head office have already wired the money to your Polaris account. We rarely deal in 'cash' when paying for jobs.@w5 For the second, I couldn't agree more.
Chinese (simplified): [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 你是北极星的员工，编号8376455466！@w3 我们做事有非常特定的方式来做，@w2 对我们来说没有什么比钱更重要，更神圣的了。@w4 否则你就会成为公司的问题@w3 也是我的问题。@p9 [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 我的问题已经够多了，所以你先拿钱。@w3 然后 且 只有 那时我才会解释你那些迷失的地球同胞的合同条款。@w4 他们确实有 和北极星的合同。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 好的，@w2 把钱给我，继续吧。@w4 \这事越早结束，我就能越早离开。@p8 [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 首先，总部已经将钱汇入你的北极星账户。我们很少用'现金'支付工作。@w5 其次，我完全同意。

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Here's your payment, as promised.@w3 Most contract jobs will be paid directly to your account with Polaris, once you've been authenticated.@w4 I recommend depositing your payment at the machine behind you when we're done here. < Payment Received: 15,000 Credits >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What's with the obsession with money around here?@p8 [ Officer Paravel ] To Polaris and the Trade Guild, there's nothing more important, more sacred than money.@w4 It's a measure of one's value and one's achievements in life.@w4 A physical means of measuring the worth of a man can be seen in his wealth.@w6 I suppose you could think of money to us as counters in the great game of life, and we're all players. Whether we like it or not.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] A man with no wealth is either a failure, or a threat to those that do.@w3 A man who does not seek to gain wealth is a danger to everyone that does.@w4 So keep in mind {PlayerName}, 8376455466.@w2 That if you do not seek compensation at Polaris, you will be considered untrustworthy.@w6 That shouldn't be anything new to you, though.
Chinese (simplified): [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 这是你应得的报酬，如约支付。@w3 大多数合同工作会直接支付到你在北极星的账户，一旦你的身份得到验证。@w4 我建议你在我们谈完之后，将报酬存入你身后的机器。 < 收到的付款：15,000 信用点 >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这里的人为什么对钱这么着迷？@p8 [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 对北极星和贸易协会来说，没有什么比钱更重要，更神圣的了。@w4 它是衡量一个人价值和生活中成就的标准。@w4 一个人的财富可以直观地衡量他的价值。@w6 我认为你可以把我们的钱看作是生活中这场伟大游戏的计数器，我们都是参与者。不管我们喜不喜欢。@p9 [ 帕拉维尔官员 ] 一个没有财富的人要么是一个失败者，要么是对那些拥有财富的人的威胁。@w3 一个不寻求增加财富的人对那些确实如此的人是危险的。@w4 所以请记住，{PlayerName}，8376455466。@w2 如果你不在北极星寻求报酬，你将被视为不可信。@w6 这对你来说应该不是什么新鲜事。

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Your people's contracts are still classified, but i've been given permission to tell you the specifics of what they negotiated for and point you in the general direction you need to go.@w5 I am not permitted to, nor do I want to, reveal anything more.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Your Naval personnel arrived here 10 months ago and agreed to contracts with Polaris that they would loan us two teams of UCH Engineering Corps' to provide Terran equipment and manufacturing processes to Polaris Megacorp in exchange for funding, transportation and an opening dialogue to a partnership with various Polaris Megacorp subsidiaries.@p9 [ Officer Paravel ] Upon completing arrangements, the...@w2 'clients'@w2 were taken to Kenex-62 in orbit aboard a pair of large transports for medical attention and to be assigned to long-distance couriers to their chosen destinations.@w5 The Naval Engineers arrived on the station a week later and were transported offsite by a Polaris Security Fleet.
Chinese (simplified): [ 帕拉维尔军官 ] 你们的合同仍然是机密的，但我被允许告诉你他们谈判的具体内容，并指向你需要去的大致方向。@w5 我不被允许，也不想，透露更多。@p9 [ 帕拉维尔军官 ] 你的海军人员10个月前到达这里，并同意与北极星签订合同，他们将借给我们两支UCH工程兵团，以提供地球设备和制造工艺给北极星超级企业，以换取资金、运输和与北极星超级企业各个子公司建立伙伴关系的初步对话。@p9 [ 帕拉维尔军官 ] 在完成安排后，……@w2 '客户'@w2 被带到轨道上的Kenex-62，乘坐一对大型运输机接受医疗照顾，并被分配到他们选择的目的地的长途快递上。@w5 \海军工程师一周后到达空间站，并被北极星安全舰队运离现场。

English: <color=#0088ff>A Security Fleet? Isn't that a bit much?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>一支安全舰队?是不是有点多了?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Medical Attention? How many people are we talking about here?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>医疗行动?你们到底运走了多少人?</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Evidently, you don't realize how valuable your engineers are to Polaris in our current situation.@w3 We're expecting great things from them.@w4 But what that is...@w3 I can't tell you.
Chinese (simplified): [ 帕拉维尔军官 ] 显然，你没有意识到在你的工程师对极星在我们当前情况下有多有价值。@w3 我们对他们寄予厚望。@w4 但那是什么……@w3 我不能告诉你。

English: <color=#0088ff>Can you at least tell me how many of my people left here?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你能告诉我我的族人还剩下多少人吗?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>They went to Kenex-62, right? What and where is it?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>他们去了Kenex-62，对吧?它是什么?它在哪里?</color>

English: [ Officer Paravel ] I don't know and I don't care.@w4 All I know is that there was a request for medical aid for several crewmembers and enough people to transport that it required two light transports.@w5 If you want more information, speak to one of the the Pilots that took them to Kenex-62, not me.
Chinese (simplified): [ 帕拉维尔军官 ] 我不知道，我也不关心。@w4 我只知道有请求为几名船员提供医疗援助，并且有足够的人需要运输，这需要两架轻型运输机。@w5 如果你想要更多信息，请与将他们带到Kenex-62的飞行员之一交谈，而不是我。

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Kenex-62, or just 'Kenex Station' is a major transport and trading hub for Polaris in orbit above this dump of a planet.@w4 You'll need a ship or teleport clearance to reach it.@w5 One of the pilots that took your people up there can tell you how to get there.
Chinese (simplified): [ 安全官Paravel ] Kenex-62，简称“Kenex g空间站”，是极星的主要运输和贸易枢纽，位于这颗垃圾行星的轨道上方.@w4 你需要一艘飞船或传送许可才能到达它.@w5 其中一名把你的人带到那里的飞行员能告诉你如何到达那里.

English: [ Officer Paravel ] Yes, a Pilot.@w2 An idiot that flies a ship,@w2 just like you.@w4 He's sitting over there on that bench and will be more than happy to answer your inane questions!@w6 Farewell@w2 and I hope to never see you again.
Chinese (simplified): [ 安全官Paravel ] 是，一个飞行员.@w2 一个开飞船的白痴，@w2 就像你一样.@w4 他正坐在那边的长凳上，很乐意回答你那些愚蠢的问题!@w6 滚蛋吧@w2 我希望再也不要见到你.

English: [ Transport Pilot ]\nUhh... can I help you?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ]\n呃...我能帮上忙吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for a fare you picked up from this station a few months ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找你几个月前从这个站点接走的人.</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I don't know what you've heard, but I had nothing to do it!@w1 They're completely crazy!@w2 I'm a company man, through-and-through!@w1 Honest!@w3 I just did as I was told!@w2 It wasn't my fault!!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不知道你听说了什么，但我无可奉告!@w1 他们根本就是疯了!@w2 我就是个彻头彻尾的公司走狗!@w1 真的!@w3 上面说什么我做什么!@w2 那不是我的错!!

English: <color=#0088ff>I've been looking for you. You know where they are!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我找的就是你，你知道他们在哪里!</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I think you have me confused with someone else...</color>
<color=#ff0000>Talk dammit! You know what i'm here for!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>说话该死的! 你知道我是来干什么的!</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] What? Y... You mean you're not with Markos' gang?@w2 What the hell do you think you're doing, coming up to me and yelling at me like a lunatic?!@w4 I should report you to station security!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 什么? 你... 你说你不是Markos那帮人?@w2 你脑子里想的什么，跑到我面前像个疯子一样冲我大喊大叫?!@w4 我应该向站点安保报告你!

English: <color=#0088ff>Woah, dude. Cool your tits! It's just a little misunderstanding.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>哇哦，老兄. 冷静点! 只是一点小小的误会.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Is that so? Maybe the station security would like to hear about this 'Markos' character?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是吗? 也许站点保安想听听这个叫“Markos”的人?</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] My memory's a little fuzzy.@w1 That could be anyone.@w2 Care to enlighten me?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] It was an executive order from Polaris.@w3 Two transports,@w1 including you,@w1 picked up foreign naval personnel from this station and took them to a place called 'Kenex-62' in orbit.@w3 Should be pretty memorable.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] You know what? That does ring a bell. @w3 Unfortunately,@w2 the bell's a little rusty and could use a little oil,@w2 if you get my meaning?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Oh, I get your meaning.@w2 You want money...
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我的记忆有点混乱.@w1 你说的有可能的人太多了.@w2 能稍微提醒我一下?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 那是一条极星的行政命令.@w3 两艘运输船，@w1 包括你在内，@w1 从该站接走别国海军人员，并将他们带到轨道上一个名为“Kenex-62”的地方.@w3 应该很好记才对.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你知道吗? 你说的 确实 让我想起来了点什么.@w3 很不幸的是，@w2 我这脑袋有点生锈了，可能需要上点油，@w2 你懂我意思吧?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 哦，我当然懂.@w2 不就是想要钱吗...

English: <color=#0088ff>You expect me to pay you? What's to stop me from going to the Station Security?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你想让我付钱? 那你有什么理由阻止我去和保安汇报呢?</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Well, seeing that you just got paid by the boss-man over there, let's go with 80 credits.@w2 Not too bad, if I say so myself.@w3 You're new around here, so you're probably not familiar with how things work.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] You don't overcharge people for cheap information.@w2 A little grift is all it takes to move up around here.@w2 If you get too greedy, there's always someone above you that'll want his cut.@w2 So keep your side business small.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Gee... Thanks for the pointers.@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] Hey!@w2 It may sound underhanded but this kind of stuff will save your lives in the corporate game Polaris are running.@w3 The straight man who thinks he'll get anywhere with hard work and determination ain't working an angle will never move up.@w2 As long as you don't get caught, or...@w2 if you can pay off the catchers you can get anything in life.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] So what'll it be? You gonna cough up 80 credits for the info or take your business elsewhere?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这样，我刚才看到那边的老板给你发工资了，你看 80信用点如何.@w2 依我看挺划得来.@w3 你是新来的，所以可能不熟悉事情的运作方式.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 不会有人因为一点廉价的信息就向别人狮子大张口.@w2 在这里吃得开只需要略施小计就行.@w2 如果你太贪心，总有上面的人会想分一杯羹.@w2 所以不要把副业搞得太大.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 哎哟...那可太感谢您的指点了.@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 嘿!@w2 虽然听起来可能很卑鄙，但这些东西会在极星的这局大棋中救你一命.@w3 认为自己会通过努力工作和决心就能获得一切的的愣头青永远不可能往上爬.@w2 你只要不被抓到，或者...@w2 如果 你可以贿赂抓你的人，你就可以获取你这辈子需要的一切.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 所以说怎么样? 你打算排出 80信用点 大钱来换取信息或者是去别的地方继续碰运气?

English: [ Transport Pilot ] A pleasure doing business with you, pal!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] Okay, so if i'm remembering right...@w2 There was me and Bradoon taking some guys like you up to Kenex Station up in orbit back then. @w2 There's two light transports so that's...@w4 about 40 or 50 passengers between the two of us.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I heard some of them were injured.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Oh yep,@w2 about five of them weren't in good shape.@w2 Two on my ship and three on Bradoon's.@w2 Got stuck with a girl with a crushed leg and a busted head on my ship.@w2 Hammersin or something...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Emmerson...@w2 Natasha Emmerson.@w3 So she did survived the Heidelberg.@w4 So where exactly did you take them?@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Like I said,@w2 Kenex@w1 Station.@w3 I'll just transfer you the location data and access codes to the main landing pad. You can sort it out there yourself.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 很高兴和你做生意，朋友!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 好了，如果我没记错...@w2 那时候我和Bradoon带着像你这样的去了轨道上的Kenex空间站.@w2 有两艘轻型运输船也就是...@w4 我们俩一共带了40到50号人.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我听说他们中有些人受伤了.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 哦对，@w2 大概是有5个人有点不像人样了.@w2 有两个在我船上另外三个在Bradoon那边.@w2 我记得船上有个腿被压断、头被撞破的女孩.@w2 叫Hammersin之类的...@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Emmerson...@w2 Natasha Emmerson.@w3 所以她 的确 在海德堡坠机后活了下来.@w4 所以说你把它们具体是带到哪里去了?@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 就像我说的，@w2 Kenex@w1 空间站.@w3 我就直接 把位置信息和停机坪的访问码传给你把 .你自己去就知道了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] What if I beat the information out of you? What's that gonna cost?@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] You could do that.@w3 Station Security wouldn't like it any more than I would and the only thing you'll end up with is a shock stick up the ass and face full of dirt when they pitch you off the landing pad.@w5 Now that you've gotten that idea out of your head,@w2 The price is now 120 credits.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你看我直接打到你把信息交出来如何? 你觉得 那样 大概要花多少钱?@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你是可以那样做.@w3 站点保安可不会比我更喜欢你这么做，唯一会发生的事情就是你惊讶于自己怎么就灰头土脸地被从停机坪丢出去了.@w5 既然你有 那种 想法，@w2 那价格就是 120信用点了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Don't come up to random strangers and yell at them!@w2 You don't know what could be going on and it's likely to get you shot if you do it to the wrong person!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Right, sorry.@w1 I didn't mean to upset you, I just wanted to know about my crew that you picked up about a year ago for Polaris and took to some place called 'Kenex 62'.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Okay, yeah.@w2 I know what you're talking about.@w2 But the info's gonna cost you.@w4 You just got paid, yeah? So wire me 100 credits and i'll tell you what I know.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Isn't that a against Polaris policy or something?@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] You want something from anyone, you have to pay for it.@w2 That's how things work around here...@w2 as long as you don't overcharge your merchandise.@w3 If you try to take too much of the pie,@w1 there's always someone higher up who'll want his slice.@w2 If you get my meaning?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I get your meaning.@w3 So...@w2 How much are you asking for the information?@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] I would've normally sold it for 80, but since you almost gave me a heart attack...@w2 make it 100 credits. in lieu of an apology.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 别再随便碰到人就大喊大叫了!@w2 你永远不知道这么做的后果是什么，如果你正好碰上了不对的人，脑袋会开花的!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 好啦，我很抱歉.@w1 我不是有意要为难你，我只是想了一下我的船员的事，你大约一年前为极星节奏了他们并带到了一个叫 “Kenex 62”的地方.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 对，没错.@w2 我知道你说的事.@w2 但是具体信息得花点小钱.@w4 你刚刚赚了一笔，对吧? 那发给我100信用点我就会告诉你我知道的一切.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这不会违反极星的规定之类吗?@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你想从别人那里弄到些什么，你就得付出相应的代价.@w2 这就是这里一切运行的基础...@w2 只要你不对别人狮子大张口就行.@w3 如果你分了太多的蛋糕，@w1 上面自然有人会想要分一杯羹.@w2 你懂我什么意思吧?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯，我懂.@w3 那...@w2 这次的信息你要多少呢?@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 一般来说我80就够了，但是鉴于你差点把我吓出心脏病...@w2 那究 100信用点. 就当是道歉了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Your...@w2 crew?@w3 Aren't they on your ship?@w4 Wait,@w1 you're not with Markos' crew!@w2 You bastard! You'll pay for that, you goddamned psycho!@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Give me one good reason why I don't call Station Security on your ass.@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Money.@w3 I'll pay well for the information i'm after.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Damn well you will!@w3 Wire me 500 credits or i'll call security and have them beat your ass!@w2 I'll pay them if I have to!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你的...@w2 船员?@w3 他们不该在你的船上吗?@w4 等下，@w1 你不是Markos那帮人!@w2 你这混蛋! 你会付出代价的，你这天杀的神经病!@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 给我一个不上报站点保全的理由.@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 钱.@w3 只要告诉我需要的信息，我自然会大方的付钱.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你最好真的会!@w3 给我 500信用点 不然我就叫保安来把你扫地出门!@w2 如果必要的话我会给他们钱好好教训你一顿!

English: [ Transport Pilot ] What do you think I can tell you?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] You picked up a group of foreign naval types about 10 months ago, I want to know how many there were and where you took them.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] That's all you came for? All this for that?!@w4 If you'd come up to me like a normal person, I would've damn well told you!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] There was about 40 or 50 of them, split between mine and Bradoon's transport ships.@w2 A few injured that we took to the med center on the Kenex Station.@w3 I hung around for a couple of days before I got reassigned to the next sector over.@w2 They weren't there when I came back the next month, so yeah...@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] Here's the location data and access codes for the main landing pad, now go find your friends and never look at me again.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你想让我能告诉你什么?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] 你大约10个月前捡到了一批外国海军之类的人，我想知道有多少人，以及你把他们带到了哪里.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这就是你要知道的全部? 那么多钱就只需要这点?!@w4 如果你正常点过来跟我说，我就直接告诉你了!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 他们一共40到50人，分开坐在我和Bradoon的运输船上.@w2 有几个受伤的被我们送去了 Kenex Station的医务室.@w3 在我被重新分配到下一个星区之前，我闲逛了几天.@w2 第二个月我回来的时候他们已经不在那了，所以说就这些...@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 这是 位置数据和停机坪的访问码，赶快去找你的朋友吧，别来烦我了.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I had to drop the cargo pallet! There was too much heat!@w1 I had no choice!!@w3 Please, you have to believe me! There was nothing I could do!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You already said that.@w2 I want to know where the cargo pallet is now!@p6 [ Transport Pilot ] If they didn't come pick it up, then it's right where I dropped it. @w4 See!@w1 I didn't completely screw up!@w2 Please don't kill me!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I suppose thats a good enough job, considering...@w3 Let's change the subject then...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] About 10 months ago, you picked up some alien naval personnel from this station with another ship.@w2 Markos wants to know where you took them, how many there were and what was their condition.@w4 Now talk!@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] Oh, oh, yes!@w2 There was around 40 to 50 of them!@w2 We took them to Kenex Station.@w1 Some were injured and were taken to Ok'y Medical for treatment.@w2 I was transferred to the next sector over a couple of days later, so I don't know what happened to them after that, but they weren't there when I came back.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Good work, Pilot.@w2 You've told me exactly what I needed to know.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] So...@w2 I'm good now?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不得不丢掉了货物托盘! 太热了!@w1 我别无选择!!@w3 求求了，一定要相信我! 我当时什么办法都没有!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你已经说过了.@w2 我要知道托盘现在的位置!@p6 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 如果他们没来把它带走，那就在我丢掉的地方.@w4 你看!@w1 我也没有完全搞砸!@w2 所以别杀我!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想这是你做得还算行，考虑到...@w3 我们换个话题吧...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 大约 10 个月前，你用另一艘船从这个站接了一群外星海军的人.@w2 Markos想知道你把他们带到了哪里，有多少，还有状况如何.@w4 快说!@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 哦哦，对的!@w2 大概有四五十号人!@w2 我们把他们带去了Kenex Station.@w1 一些人受了伤并被送往Ok'y医疗接受治疗.@w2 几天后我被调到了另一个星区，所以我不知道他们后来怎么样了，但是我回来的时候他们都不在了@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 做的不错，驾驶员.@w2 我要的你都说了.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 所以...@w2 我没事了?

English: <color=#ff0000>Good enough, for now. I'll pass it onto Markos.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>现在来说，足够了. 我会把剩下的交给Markos.</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ]\nGlad to help, I guess.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ]\n我猜我该说，很高兴帮上忙.

English: [ IDA ] Shall I read you my logs from the fleet's departure from Apollon Station, Commander?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Please do, IDA.@w4 I have no idea where I am or even how I got here, and I need every bit of info I can get right now.@p8 [ IDA ] At 0900 hours 25.07.2473 the UCH Fleet was scheduled to leave Apollon Station in orbit around Jupiter on an expeditionary journey to Proxima Centauri utilizing a prototype Warp Field Generator mounted on the flagship of the fleet, the UCH-002 M.S. Titan.@w4 The function of the warp field was to encapsulate the entire fleet in the Titan's quantum wake and move the entire fleet as a unit.@p9 [ IDA ] Reports of weapons fire and explosions were reported from Apollon Station shortly after the fleet left and all communication was lost 9 minutes later.@w4 The fleet captains decided that the approaching rescue forces were sufficient to deal with the turmoil and opted to stay the course and continue with Operation Phoenix.@p9 [ IDA ] After exiting Jupiter's orbit, Waverider Protocol was engaged and The Titan's warp drive began generating a stable field and the fleet inserted into Hyperspace.@w3 Moments after successfully inserting into hyperspace, an anomaly was encountered:@w2 A spatial rift, where additional planes of higher dimensional space intruded on the fabric of hyperspace.@p9 [ IDA ] The Spatial Rift dragged the Warp Field containing the UCH fleet off-course by somewhere I have estimated to be between 325,000 and 500,000 light years, but may be as high as 3,000,000 light years.@w3 Distance and speed in hyperspace is relative and the effects of a spatial rift on a stable warp field are as yet unknown.@p9 [ IDA ] My logs terminate upon exit from hyperspace as that was when I.D.A Primary loaded this submind into a surveillance satellite and ejected it to gather intelligence.@w3 The initilization seems to have failed at the time and was triggered correctly by your escape pod's beacon.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 要我给你读一下舰队从阿波罗站出发的日志吗指挥官?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 好的, IDA.@w4 我不知道我在哪里，甚至不知道我是怎么到这里的，我现在需要我能得到的每一点信息.@p8 [ IDA ] 在25.07.2473 0900时，UCH舰队计划离开位于木星轨道上的阿波罗空间站，利用安装在该舰队旗舰UCH-002 M.S.泰坦上的曲能场发生器原型，进行前往比邻星的远征之旅.@w4 曲速场的作用是将整个舰队封装在泰坦的量子尾流中，并将整个舰队作为一个单位移动.@p9 [ IDA ] 舰队离开后不久，阿波罗空间站报告武器开火和爆炸，9分钟后所有通讯中断.@w4 舰队指挥官认为，附近的救援舰队足以应对混乱局面，于是选择坚持原来的路线，继续执行“凤凰”行动.@p9 [ IDA ] 离开木星轨道后，乘波号协议启动，泰坦号的曲率引擎开始产生稳定的场，舰队进入超空间.@w3 在成功进入超空间后不久, 一个空间裂谷被侦测到:@w2 这是一种空间裂缝，高维空间的附加平面侵入超空间的结构.@p9 [ IDA ] 空间裂缝将包含UCH舰队的曲速场拖离了轨道，我估计距离在32.5万到50万光年之间，但可能高达300万光年.@w3 超空间中的距离和速度是相对的，空间裂缝对稳定翘曲场的影响尚不清楚.@p9 [ IDA ] 我的日志在离开超空间后就终止了，I.D.A的核心程序被装进了一颗监视卫星然后发射出去收集情报.@w3 初始化似乎失败了，但被逃生舱的信标正确触发了.

English: <color=#0088ff>So... any clue on what I should do now, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>所以…我现在不知道该怎么做， IDA?</color>

English: [ Medical Officer ] Welcome to Ok'y Medical!@w2 Are you here to purchase supplies for your ship or are you here for medical treatment?@w2 At Ok'y Medical Kenex, we do both.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ] 欢迎来到 Ok'y 医疗!@w2 您是来这里为您的船只购买物资还是来这里就医的?@w2 来Kenex的Ok'y医疗，我们 都可以帮您办好.

English: <color=#0088ff>Can you tell me about Ensign Emmersion's condition?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你能和我说说Emmersion少尉的情况吗?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I heard a member of my crew was taken here for treatment.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我听说我有一名船员被带到这里接受治疗.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Let me see your patient medical records.</color>
[ Medical Officer ]\nI'm afraid I can't do that, sir.@w2\nThat would violate Doctor-Patient confidentiality. Which is also a violation of Polaris sanctions.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ]\n恐怕我做不到，先生.@w2 \n这将违反医患保密协议。 这也违反了极星处罚条例.

English: <color=#0088ff>What if I made it worth your while? (100 credits)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>如果说我让你觉得值得呢? (100信用点)</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>What if I made it worth your while?</color>
<color=#0088ff>I just need to know if she's alive.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我只需要知道她是否还活着.</color>

English: [ Medical Officer ] Ah, yes... Your 'treatment fee'!@w2 Let me tell you about your condition!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm glad we could come to an understanding, Doctor.@p6 [ Medical Officer ] Let's see...@w4 I believe uhh...@w2 'you' suffered from several deep lacerations, a fractured collarbone, two compound fractures of the right leg and the effects of an untreated concussion.@w3 'You' were treated over the course of two days and released to make a full recovery.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ] 啊，没错... 你的“治疗费”!@w2 请让我和你陈述一下 病情!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 很高兴我们能达成共识，医生.@p6 [ 医务人员 ] 我们看看啊...@w4 我记得呃...@w2 '你'遭受了几处深度撕裂，锁骨骨折，两处右腿复合骨折以及未及时处理的脑震荡的影响.@w3 “你”接受了两天的治疗并在完全康复后出院.

English: <color=#0088ff>Thank you Doctor, you've been very helpful.</color>
[ Medical Officer ] With what? You have nothing on you. Therefore, I must say that you are violating Polaris sanctions and I must ask you to leave immediately. Good day, sir.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ] 什么能让我觉得值得?你这不是什么都没有吗. 因此，我必须说你违反了极星的处罚条例，我要求你立即离开. 祝你生活愉快，先生.

English: <color=#0088ff>Okay, that's all I needed to know, Doc.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好的，这就是我需要知道的全部了，医生.</color>

English: [ Medical Officer ] Terran, aren't you?@w2 Yes, some members of your kind were brought in here several months ago.@w2 Your kind are particularly rare in these parts, so I know you're some relation to them and not some kind of criminal@w2... right?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] No, i'm just a little late to the party.@w2 I'm trying to find where the rest of my crew went to, but i'm running low on leads.@w5 All I know is that Ensign Emmerson was brought here.@p9 [ Medical Officer ] Well, there's nothing I can tell you about where your people went to.@w3 As for Natasha Emmerson, she came in here in bad shape.@w2 Broken collarbone, compound fractures to her right leg and an untreated concussion that was causing swelling in her brain.@p9 [ Medical Officer ] Don't look so down, sir.@w2 Such conditions were easily treated and she walked out of here two days later.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] What happened to the rest of the crew after that?@p6 [ Medical Officer ] I'm afraid that's outside my job description.@w2 Once the patient walks out those doors, they're no longer my patient.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ] 你是地球人吧?@w2 没错，几个月前有几个你们种族的人被带到这来.@w2 你们这种人在这地方特别少见，所以我知道你和他们有关系，而不是某种罪犯@w2 ... 对吧?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然不是，我只是迟到了一点.@w2 我正试图找出我其他船员的去向，但我的线索不多了.@w5 我只知道Emmersion少尉被带到了这里.@p9 [ 医务人员 ] 好吧，关于你的人的去向我真的没法告诉你.@w3 至于Natasha Emmerson，她来的时候状况很糟糕.@w2 锁骨骨折，右腿复合性骨折，未经及时处理的脑震荡导致大脑肿胀.@p9 [ 医务人员 ] 别这么沮丧，先生.@w2 这种情况很容易治疗，两天后她就离开了这里.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那之后其他船员发生了什么?@p6 [ 医务人员 ] 这怕是超出了我的工作描述范围.@w2 一旦病人走出那扇门，他们就不再是我的病人了.

English: Thank you for all your help, Doc. (Tip 50 credits cash)
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你的 这么多 的帮助，医生. (小费50信用点的现金)

English: [ Medical Officer ] I can't let you do that!@w1 No one is allowed access to the Polaris medical database except registered medical professionals!@p6 [ Medical Officer ] I'm going to have to ask you to leave now, Sir.@w4 Don't make me call Station Security.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ] 我不能让你那么做!@w1 除注册在案的医疗专业人员外，任何人不得访问极星医疗数据库!@p6 [ 医务人员 ] 我现在不得不请你离开了，先生.@w4 不要让我叫空间站安保来.

English: [ Medical Officer ]\nHave a nice day, sir.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医务人员 ]\n祝你有美好的一天，先生.

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] What can I do for you, uhh...@w2 sir?@w2 If you're here to lodge a complaint about one of the station service employees...@w2 I really wish you wouldn't.@w4 Uhh... sorry, sir.@w2 I haven't slept in days.@w2 So my mind's not all here right now.
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 我能问您做些什么，呃...@w2 先生?@w2 如果您是来投诉空间站员工的...@w2 真希望你不是来干那个的.@w4 呃... 不好意思，先生.@w2 我已经几天没睡了.@w2 所以我现在心思不是很集中.

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm not here to lodge a complaint. So this won't take long.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不是来投诉的，所以花不了你多久.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>You should get some rest then. You won't be able to get much work done if you can't concentrate.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>你该歇歇了. 如果你不能集中注意力，有很多工作你都没法处理.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>This is what you signed up for.</color>

[ Kenex Floor Manager ] Praise Empyrion.@w2 I don't think I could handle another customer complaint today.@w2 I'm already at breaking point...@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] So then... what do you want with me?@w3 Please tell me you're not trying to sell me something...
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 赞美Empyrion.@w2 我今天恐怕没法再处理更多客户投诉了.@w2 已经要濒临崩溃了...@p8 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 那么... 你找我打算做什么?@w3 请告诉我你不是来卖东西的...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for my comrades. They came to this station several months ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在寻找我的同志们. 他们几个月前来过这个空间站.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] That's probably the only nice thing anyone's said to me this whole week.@w2 Everyone here wants something from me and...@w2 i'm just not cut out for a managerial position.@w2 But I don't think I could go back to my old position without spacing myself within another week...@w2 I have no idea what to do!@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] I'm sorry. This isn't your problem.@w2 You're just the first person to show me any consideration and@w2 I just couldn't hold it in anymore.@w2 Sorry again.@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] So, is there something I can help you with?
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 这可能是这个星期有人对我说的唯一一句好话.@w2 来这的是个人都想从我这获取点什么...@w2 我真的是不适合担任管理职位.@w2 不过我不认为在这么一整周抽不开身的情况下我还能回到原来的位置上...@w2 我不知道该怎么办!@p9 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 抱歉，这又不是你的问题.@w2 只是你还是第一个为我考虑了点的人而且@w2 我真的要绷不住了.@w2 非常抱歉.@p8 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 所以，我能帮上你点什么吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for my comrades. They came to this station several months ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找我的同志们. 他们几个月前来过这个空间站.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Yes...@w2 Yes I did.@w2 I shouldn't be complaining when I worked so hard for this promotion...@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] So... if you're not here to lodge a complaint, what do you want with me?
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 没错...@w2 没错我确实如此.@w2 我之前那么努力工作想要晋升就该想到今天没资格抱怨了...@p8 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 所以说... i如果你不是来投诉的，那你找我做什么?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for some of my crew. They came to this station several months ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在找我的船员. 他们几个月之前来过这个空间站.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] I'm afraid I only manage the shopping district of the station.@w3 If they were transporting cargo, the Logistic's Manager would probably have records of them but unless there was a dispute with one of the station staff...@w3 I'm afraid I won't be much use, i'm sorry.@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] I mean,@w2 I could try and search the general records...@w2 But unless they were important, they won't have made the logs.@w4 If you want me to give it a try, I can.@w2 But i'll need the names they used on the logs.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Ensign Natasha Emmerson.@w2 She was being treated at Ok'y Medical while she was here.@w5 Lieutenant Gyasi Romilly.@w2 I believe he's a dark-skinned guy with a beard.@w2 He may have been listed as a captain now, though.@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] That should be fine.@w2 Military ranks aren't included with the names in the logs anyway.@w3 Give me a minute to find the right logs@w3 . @w3 . @w3 . @p6 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Hmm...@w3 That's odd.@w3 Your friends made it onto the general station logs.@w2 It looks like they were sent upstairs to PolSec.@w2 I'm not seeing any disturbance, criminal or disciplinary reports, so it doesn't seem to be related to them being in trouble.@w1 Not that i'm saying they did anything wrong!@w3 But this is very strange.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What's PolSec and why would they be taken there?@p6 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] PolSec, or Polaris Security is the security, 'military' if you like, division of Polaris Megacorp responsible for protecting Polaris assets from Pirates and unlawful seizure by Zirax bureaucrats, among other things.@w5 PolSec operates out of many spacestations, but their primary ports are the 77 Kenex Stations across the galaxy.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So the Polaris Military has my people?@p5 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] The logs don't say. You'd have to go upstairs to the security forces' dock and ask them.@w2 I'm afraid they won't be able tell you anything though.@w2 They certainly don't tell me anything.
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 可惜我只负责空间站的购物区.@w3 如果他们是来运货的，物流经理可能会有他们的记录，除非他们与车站工作人员闹得不愉快...@w3 恐怕我帮不上什么忙了，抱歉.@p9 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 我是说，@w2 我可以试试搜一下常规记录...@w2 但是除非说他们真的很重要，要不然一般不会留下日志.@w4 如果你要我试试的话，确实可以.@w2 但是我需要他们用于录入的名称.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Natasha Emmerson少尉.@w2 她来的时候在Ok'y医务室接受过治疗.@w5 Gyasi Romilly中尉.@w2 我记得她的皮肤是深色的而且有胡子.@w2 不过他可能现在会被列为上尉就是了.@p9 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 那倒是无所谓.@w2 军衔也不会作为名字录入日志.@w3 G等我找一下对应的日志@w3 . @w3 . @w3 . @p6 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 呣...@w3 这就怪了.@w3 你的朋友确实被写进了常规日志.@w2 看起来他们被送到楼上的 极安部门去了.@w2 我没有看到任何骚乱，犯罪或违纪报告，所以他们应该不是有什么麻烦.@w1 我没说他们做错了什么!@w3 但是真的很奇怪.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 极安是什么，为什么要把他们带去?@p6 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 极安，或者说极星安保就是这里的保安力量，你乐意的话也可以叫他们'军队'，极星巨型企业的部门之一，负责保护极星资产免受海盗和兹瑞克斯官僚的非法扣押，以及一些其他的事情.@w5 极安 在很多空间站都有驻扎，不过他们的老家就是全星系的77个Kenex空间站.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 所以说极星军队带走了我的人?@p5 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 日志上没写. 你必须上楼去安全部队的楼层去问他们.@w2 但恐怕他们什么也不能告诉你.@w2 至少他们从来不告诉 我 任何事.

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for the help. I'll be on my way now.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>感谢你的帮助. 我这就去.</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I expected you to expect a bribe like everyone else around here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我还以为你和这里的其他人一样都会想要收一笔贿赂.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Yes, bribery is quite a problem around here.@w2 We've lost a lot of valuable cargo and some confidential information has been leaked recently due to rampant bribery by pirates looking for an easy score.@w2 The higher-ups are keeping a close watch on the bank accounts of all the section managers so we can't accept any payments that would look suspicious.@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] They're probably monitoring security and shipping personnel as well, since that's where the budget is being hit the hardest.@w3 So it's best to carry cash on you if you intend on tipping the staff here.@w2
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ] 你说的没错，贿赂确实是这里的一大问题.@w2 近期海盗的贿赂非常猖獗，因而他们得以挑选合适的目标，我们也因此丢掉了许多价值不菲的货物并且泄露了很多重要信息.@w2 上级正在密切关注所有部门经理的银行账户，所以我们不能接受任何看起来可疑的付款.@p9 [ Kenex楼层经理 ] T他们可能也在监视安全和运输人员，毕竟这俩是预算受到最严重损失的地方.@w3 所以说过你真的想给点“小费”的话最好去准备点现金.@w2

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for the tips. I'll be on my way now.</color>
[ Kenex Floor Manager ]\nYou're welcome, sir.@w1\nI'm just glad to not have to deal with an angry customer for once...
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex楼层经理 ]\n不客气，先生.@w1 \n很高兴不必一次与愤怒的客户打交道...

English: [ Coms Chief ]\nHey, you can't be in here! This area is for Polaris Personnel only!
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管]\n嘿，你不能在这里!此区域仅供极星人员使用!

English: <color=#0088ff>Sorry, but i've got business with one of the operators up the stairs. I'll be back in a second.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>抱歉，我和楼上的一个操作员有生意要谈。我马上就回来.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] Hey!@w3 Ah, fine.@w3 I can see where you're going from here, so i'll be keeping an eye on you.@w2 Come right back here when you're finished.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 嘿!@w3 哎，好吧。@w3 我可以看到你从这里往哪里走，所以我会一直盯着你。@w2 你看完就回来.

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nYou're not meant to be up here.@w2\nAre you even a Polaris Employee?
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星安保 主管 67372867 ]\n你不该来这里的.@w2 \nA你是极星员工吗?

English: I think I left my ID in my other pants.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我想我把ID忘在我的其他裤子里了.</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] There's no match for that ID number.@w2 You really should remember your own ID, 8376455466.@w2 If I hadn't already been told you were coming, I'd be required to call Security on you.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 没有那个ID号码的匹配。@w2 你真的应该记住你自己的ID，8376455466。@w2 如果我没有被告知你即将到来，我会因为那个糟糕的玩笑而呼叫安全部门。

English: <color=#0088ff>Who told you I was coming? The Coms chief down there?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谁告诉你我要来的?下面的通讯主管?</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] I find it hard to believe you could lose your ID.@w1 It's genetically encoded.@w2 It's certainly nothing you can leave in your other pants, 8376455466.@p8 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] That IS you isn't it?@w2 ID 8376455466. Contractor, Lieutenant-Commander {PlayerName}.@w4 If I hadn't already been told you were coming, I'd be required to call Security on you for that lame joke.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 我很难相信你会丢失你的ID。@w1 它是基因编码的。@w2 这当然不是你可以在其他裤子里留下的东西，8376455466。@p8 [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 那是你，对吧？@w2 ID 8376455466。承包商，中校 {PlayerName}。@w4 如果我没有被告知你即将到来，我会因为那个糟糕的玩笑而呼叫安全部门。

English: <color=#0088ff>Sorry about my 'Lame Joke'. So who told you I was coming? The Coms chief down there?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>对不起，我的“蹩脚笑话”。所以谁告诉你我要来的?下面的通讯主管?</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Welcome 8376455466.@w3 Considering how new your account is, i'm surprised you were able to memorize your Polaris ID number in the amount of time you had.@w3 Fortunately, i'd been warned of your coming and asked to give you what aid I can.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 欢迎 8376455466。@w3 考虑到你的账户有多新，我很惊讶你能在这么短的时间内记住你的北极星ID号码。@w3 幸运的是，我已经得到了你即将到来的警告，并被要求尽可能地帮助你。

English: <color=#0088ff>If you knew I was coming, why bother asking me for my ID?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>如果你知道我要来，为什么还要问我要身份证?</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>Who told you I was coming? The Coms Chief back there?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谁告诉你我要来的?后面的通讯主管?</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ]\nTake a look around you.@w2 This place is as boring as possible when there's no ships docked in the PolSec Bay.@w3\nMessing with new arrivals is like...@w1 the only highlight of my day.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星安保 主管 67372867 ]\n看看你的周围.@w2 极星安保的港口湾没有船停靠的时候，这个地方会非常无聊.@w3 \n和新来的人打交道就像…@w1 我一天中唯一的亮点。

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm so glad I could be a source of entertainment. So who told you I was coming?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴我能成为娱乐的源泉。谁告诉你我要来的?</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] I got a message from Officer Paravel of Ground Station 18 to... and I quote:@w2 'lend you what aid I can manage within my security clearance'@w5 That's pretty weird, since i've heard the guy's a right ass on the fast track to a promotion to the bottom of the pile.@w2 Probably a prison Hab with the number of complaints from his security detail.@p9 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Anyway...@w2 There's no details on what you need me for, so if you'd care to fill me in?
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 我收到了来自地面空间站18的帕拉维尔军官的消息……让我引用一下：@w2 '在我安全权限范围内尽可能地帮助你'@w5 这相当奇怪，因为我听说这家伙是个即将被提升到底层的混蛋。@w2 很可能是一个监狱Hab，因为他的安全细节收到了大量的投诉。@p9 [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 无论如何……@w2 没有关于你需要我做什么的细节，所以如果你愿意告诉我？

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm looking for the destination of the Polaris Ship that took 40-50 UCH naval personnel off-station.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我在寻找搭载了40-50名UCH海军人员的极星船的目的地.</color>

English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] One moment@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 Destination is classified, sorry.@w3 It looks like the ship was headed out of the system and fitted for long-ranged warp jumps.@p8 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] There's a return log and a file of contracts for another station though.@w3 No name data though and the rest is locked to high security clearance.@w3 I shouldn't even be looking in this directory.@w2 so i'm pulling out now.@p8 [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] This job is boring as hell, but I don't think I want the kind of excitement i'd get for sticking my nose into those files.@w4 Sorry, buddy.@w2 That's as much as I can tell you.
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 稍等片刻@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 目的地是机密的，抱歉。@w3 看起来这艘船正驶出星系，并且装备了用于长距离翘曲跳跃的装置。@p8 [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 不过有一个返回日志和另一份合同文件是关于另一个空间站的。@w3 没有名字数据，其余的都被高安全权限锁定了。@w3 我甚至不应该在这个目录里查看。@w2 所以我马上退出。@p8 [ 极星通讯主管 67372867 ] 这份工作无聊透顶，但我想我并不想要那种我如果插手那些文件会得到的兴奋。@w4 抱歉，伙计。@w2 我只能告诉你这么多。

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks for sticking your neck out, i'll wire you some credits for the trouble.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谢谢你的冒险，给你添麻烦了，我会给你电汇一些钱的.</color>
