English: [ PolSec Operator 67372867 ] Ooh, that'd be nice!@w1 Thanks!@p5[ {PlayerName} ] I'm guessing you had something to do with that message from Paravel, IDA.@p4 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 I also transferred 1000 credits from Paravel's private account to the operator to pay for their cooperation.@w6 Shall I transfer another 200 credits from paravel's account to the operator's for their trouble?
Chinese (simplified): [ 极星安保 主管 67372867 ] 哦，那太好了!@w1 谢谢!!@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 我你一定对Paravel那边做了什么小动作，IDA @p4 [ IDA ] 是的，指挥官。@w2 我也从Paravel的私人账户转了1000信用点给运营商，以支付他们的合作费用.@w6 我要不要再从paravel的账户转200信用点给运营商，以补偿他们的麻烦?

English: That'd be perfect, IDA. Officer Paravel has been very generous today.
Chinese (simplified): 那太好了， IDA. 安全官Paravel今天一直非常慷慨.

English: No, I made the promise. Transfer 100 credits from my account if you would.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>不，我做出了承诺。如果你愿意，从我的账户转100信用点。</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like we've hit a dead end, IDA.@w2 They could've gone anywhere and all the logs are locked away at like@w2... executive level or something stupid like that.@w3 Can you access the system or anything?@p9 [ IDA ] No, Commander. I do not have access to the station's secure systems.@w4 However, I believe you should speak to the Coms Chief now.@w2 There is an urgent matter that needs your attention.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看来我们遇到了死胡同，IDA。@w2 他们可能去了任何地方，所有的日志都被锁在了像@w2 ... 执行官级别或者类似的愚蠢级别。@w3 你能接入系统或者什么的吗？@p9 [ IDA ] 不，指挥官。我没有访问站点的安全系统的权限。@w4 然而，我相信你现在应该和通讯主管谈谈。@w2 有一个紧急事项需要你的注意。

English: <color=#0088ff>Yeah, I kinda promised him i'd come back.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是的，我答应过他我会回来的.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] I see you're back...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] I said I would be, didn't I?@p5 [ Coms Chief ] Well, i've already received a message telling me to give you temporary clearance now, so it doesn't matter now.@w5 It also says that you're a contractor to Polaris and that you're qualified to reconfigure Polaris Communications Equipment.@w2 Is that true?
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 我看到你回来了……@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 我说过我会的，不是吗?@p5 [通讯主管] 好了，我现在已经收到消息让我给你临时清场，所以现在不重要了.@w5 它还说你是极星的承包商，你有资格重新配置极星通信设备.@w2 这是，真的么?

English: <color=#0088ff>I'll have to get back to you on that one.</color>
<color=#0088ff>I doubt I could tell you the difference between a USB and an HDMI cable.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我怀疑我能告诉你USB和HDMI线之间的区别.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] I don't know what either of those are, so I doubt I could tell you the difference between the two either.@w2 Can you fix a com array or not? That's all I need to know.@p7 [ IDA ] Commander, I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of the mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 我不知道这两个是什么，所以我也不知道我能告诉你两者的区别.@w2 能否修复联络数组?我只需要知道这些@p7 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我将处理通信设备的重新配置。@w2 但是我需要你作为我的眼睛和手来完成这个任务。任务的安全就靠你了.

English: [ Coms Chief ] I need an answer now. We have a cruiser coming in soon and I need all the Com Relays working.@w2 Can you fix a com array or not? That's all I need to know.@p8 [ IDA ] Commander, I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of the mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 我现在需要一个答复。我们有一艘巡洋舰很快就要来了我需要所有的通讯继电器都工作起来.@w2 能否修复通讯模块?我只需要知道这些.@p8 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我将处理通信设备的重新配置。@w2 但是我需要你作为我的眼和手来完成这个任务。任务的安全就靠你了.

English: [ Coms Chief ] You can? That's great!@w2 I've been waiting on maintenance for a week to send someone over to take a look at the relay signals and find out what's been going wrong with the signalling cycle.@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, i'm aware that you aren't qualified with communications equipment, Polaris or otherwise.@w2 So I will handle the reconfiguration of the Communications Equipment.@w2 But I require you to be my eyes and hands for this task. The safety of our mission relies on you.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 你能?太好了!@w2 我已经等了一个星期的维修了，想派人过来看看中继信号，看看信号周期出了什么问题@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我知道你没有修理极星或其他通信设备的资格.@w2 所以我将处理通信设备的重新配置.@w2 但是我需要你作为我的眼和手来完成这个任务。我们任务的安全就靠你了。

English: <color=#0088ff>That's an affirmative, Chief. I'm pretty sure I can do it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这是肯定的，主管。我很确定我能做到。</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>So what exactly is the problem, Chief?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那么到底是什么问题呢，主管?</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] Glad to hear you can handle it!@w2 For the last week we've had degrading communication relays in this sector that's causing havoc with our relay systems.@p8 [ Coms Chief ] You see, this sector has a triangulation setup of communication relay satellites, six of them with Kenex in the middle.@w2 Together we collate transmission data from neighboring sectors, route it through the trading terminal, banking systems, everything, then beam it back into deep space for another repeater that sends it out to other systems.@p9 [ Coms Chief ] The problem is that something is interfering with the transmissions between the Com Relays in this sector.@w2 It could be an asteroid in the way, it could be a broken antenna, it could be sabotage or it could've just been some asshole could've just crashed into it and didn't report the collision.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 很高兴听到你能处理它！@w2 在过去的一周里，我们在这个星区的通讯中继器出现了退化，这给我们的中继系统造成了混乱。@p8 [ 通讯主管 ] 你看，这个星区有一个通讯中继卫星的三角测量设置，六个中继器，以Kenex为中心。@w2 我们一起从邻近星区收集传输数据，通过交易终端，银行系统，一切，然后将其传回深空，由另一个中继器发送到其他系统。@p9 [ 通讯主管 ] 问题是有些东西正在干扰这个星区的通讯中继器之间的传输。@w2 它可能是挡在路上的小行星，可能是损坏的天线，可能是破坏，或者可能是某个混蛋撞上了它却没有报告碰撞。

English: [ Coms Chief ] What about them?@w1 They're standard orbital stations with just the bare basics.@w2 Life support, server rooms, data storage buffers and the system core.@w1 No defenses.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 它们怎么样？@w1 它们是标准的轨道站，只有最基本的设施。@w2 生命支持，服务器室，数据存储缓冲器和系统核心。@w1 没有防御。

English: <color=#0088ff>What's my job with them supposed to be then?</color>

[ Coms Chief ] Every so often some pirate bastards come around and try to siphon off banking data from the com relays.@w2 It's not possible, but that doesn't stop them from trying.@w4 The real problem is when they hang around to ambush the guys sent out to repair the relay. So watch your ass, got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 时不时有些海盗混蛋会过来，试图从通讯中继器中抽取银行数据。@w2 这是不可能的，但这并不能阻止他们尝试。@w4 \真正的问题是当他们留下来伏击被派去修理中继器的人。 所以小心你的屁股，明白了吗？

English: <color=#0088ff>So what's my job out there then? Aside from avoiding pirates.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那我的工作是什么?除了避免海盗.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] Your job out there is to check each relay for any signs of damage, inside and out and fix it if it's broken.@w3 If you don't have the materials to fix or bypass the problem area, you come back here, got it?@p8 [ Coms Chief ] I'll be patched into your radio the whole time.@w3 If pirates do turn up, i'll call up a security patrol to back you up. It'll probably take a few minutes for them to reach you though, so you'll be on your own until they turn up.@p9 [ Coms Chief ] You have a ship right? Better get to it and make sure it's armed.@w1 You could run into anything out there, so it's best to be prepared.@w3 Any questions?
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 你的工作是检查每个中继站是否有任何损坏的迹象，内部和外部，并在它坏了的时候修理它。@w3 如果你没有修理或绕过问题区域的材料，你回到这里来，明白了吗？@p8 [ 通讯主管 ] 我会一直接入你的无线电。@w3 如果海盗真的出现，我会呼叫一个安全巡逻队来支援你。不过他们到达你可能需要几分钟的时间，所以在他们出现之前，你得自己应对。@p9 [ 通讯主管 ] 你有飞船对吧？最好去看看它，确保它武装好了。@w1 你在外面可能会遇到任何情况，所以最好做好准备。@w3 有什么问题吗？

English: <color=#0088ff>How much am I getting paid for this job?</color>

[ Coms Chief ] Should've already been listed on the contract you agreed to.@w4 It's 12,000 credits for the job, no medical or dental. If we have to relife your corpse because you screwed up, you'll be paying 2,000 out of your pay for the encoding and genotyping.@w2 So don't screw up.
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 应该已经在你同意的合同上列出了。@w4 这份工作的报酬是12,000信用点，不包括医疗或牙科。如果我们不得不因为你的失误而复活你的尸体，你将需要从你的工资中支付2,000信用点用于编码和基因分型。@w2 所以不要搞砸了。

English: <color=#0088ff>Okay, I guess i'm good to go.</color>
[ Coms Chief ] I'll be monitoring your progress from here.@w2 So let's get to it then, shall we?
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 我会在这里监视你的进展.@w2 那么让我们开始吧，好吗?

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Alright IDA, Spill it!@w2 What's going on with this job for Polaris?@p8 [ IDA ] It is a delicate situation, Commander.@w2 I would like you to confirm the condition of the Communication Relay satellites before I give you a definitive answer.@w3 I would prefer to avoid alarming you if possible.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Bull...shit.@w4 You're up to something and you're not telling me because I wouldn't agree with whatever it is you're doing behind my back.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You've been steering me towards this station as soon as we heard about it and now the job that has nothing to do with finding the rest of the fleet!@w3 What am I supposed to think?@w3 Were you infected with that Polaris malware they tried to slip you after all?@p9 [ IDA ] Commander...@w2 I believe that I will be able to access Polaris' Secure Systems through their Communications Relay and obtain the secure data from their systems.@w2 That is why I had to undertake this mission for Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好吧，IDA，说出来!@w2 极星的这个工作是怎么回事?@p8 [ IDA ] 这是一个微妙的情况，指挥官。@w2 在我给你一个确定的答案之前，我想让你确认通信中继卫星的状况.@w3 如果可能的话，我不想吓到你@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是……干.@w4 你在搞什么鬼却不告诉我，因为不管你背着我做什么，我都不同意@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我们一听说这个空间站，你就引导我去这个空间站，现在这个工作与寻找其他舰队成员没有任何关系!@w3 我该怎么想?@w3 你被他们想塞给你的极星恶意软件感染了吗?@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官……@w2 我相信我将能够通过他们的通信中继访问极星'安全系统，并从他们的系统获取安全数据@w2 这就是为什么我必须为极星承担这个任务.

English: [ IDA ]\nI am not lying to you, {PlayerName}.@w4\nAccessing the Communications Relay is vital to the future@w2... for the both of us.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n我没有骗你，{PlayerName}.@w4 \n访问通信中继对我们的未来@w2 ..至关重要。

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright, i'll do as you say. It's not like I have much of a choice.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好吧，我会照你说的做。我也没什么选择的余地.</color>

English: [ IDA ] I did not want to get your hopes up, {PlayerName}.@w3 There is a great deal of risk involved and I do have an ulterior motive in accessing the Com Relay system.@w2 But right now, neither of us have a choice.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我不想让你抱太大希望，{PlayerName}.@w3 有很大的风险，我确实有一个不可告人的动机来访问通讯中继系统@w2 但是现在，我们都没有选择.

English: <color=#0088ff>Alright, i'll do as you say. But I want a proper explanation sooner rather than later.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>好吧，我会照你说的做。但我想要一个合理的解释越快越好.</color>

English: [ IDA ]\nI will explain myself properly, when I can confirm whether or not my plan to interface with one of the Com Relays is successful.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n当我能确认我的计划是否与通讯中继器的一个接口成功连接，我会适当地解释这一切.

English: <color=#0088ff>That'll have to do for now, I guess...</color>

< Polaris Communication Relay 653 - FAOS_v22.1 >@w5 Authenticating User @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 Authenticated 8376455466 System Status:@w2 Online@w3 Data Loss:@w2 1.2% (Normal)@w3 Signal Modulation:@w2 Pattern-1142B12/Pattern-2077A14
Chinese (simplified): < 极星 通讯中继站 653 - FAOS_v22.1 >@w5 验证用户 @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 通过身份验证 8376455466 系统状态:@w2 在线中@w3 数据丢失:@w2 1.2% (Normal)@w3 信号调制:@w2 模式-1142B12/模式-2077A14

English: <color=#0088ff>Looks like there's nothing wrong to me. How about you, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>在我看来没什么问题。怎么样，IDA?</color>

English: [ IDA ] I see no problems, Commander.@w2 If there's an issue with the incoming transmissions being relayed back to Kenex Station, then it must be from one of the other relay satellites.@p9 [ IDA ] The problem could be an issue with the Port Data Relays though. They may have been scrambled by a solar flare and wouldn't be registering on the incoming signals.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我看没有问题，指挥官.@w2 如果传送回Kenex站的接收信号有问题，那么它一定是来自其他中继卫星之一@p9 [ IDA ] 可能是端口数据中继的问题。它们可能被太阳耀斑干扰了，不会被接收到信号。

English: < Polaris Communication Relay 588 - FAOS_v22.1 >@w5 Authenticating User @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 Authenticated 8376455466 System Status:@w2 Online@w3 Data Loss:@w2 41.8% (Warning)@w3 Signal Modulation:@w2 Pattern-1167A22/Pattern-1911B28
Chinese (simplified): < 极星 通讯中继站 588 - FAOS_v22.1 >@w5 验证用户 @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 通过身份验证 8376455466 系统状态:@w2 在线中@w3 数据丢失:@w2 41.8% (Warning)@w3 信号调制:@w2 模式-1167A22/模式-1911B28

English: <color=#0088ff>There's a significant data loss being detected on this one. Can you trace the cause, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这里被检测到有一个重要的数据丢失，你能找出原因吗，IDA?</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] So the problem's in 588?@w2 Can you fix it?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I'll need to check the outgoing data relays and see if it's being sent by this relay or if the data loss is coming from one of the others through 588.@w2 If it isn't 588, it should be possible to find which one it is without going to all six com relays.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管] 所以问题在588?@w2 你能修好它吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我需要检查输出数据中继，看看它是否由这个中继发送，或者数据丢失是否来自其他通过588发送的数据@w2 如果它不是 588，应该可以找到它是哪一个，而不需要去所有六个通讯中继器.

English: [ IDA ]\nNot from here, Commander.@w2\nIt would be best to report it to the Coms Chief and check the Starboard Data Relays to see if it's being transmitted from this relay or if the data loss is incoming from another satellite.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n不是从这里，指挥官.@w2 \nIt最好报告给通讯主管，并检查右舷数据中继，看看它是否正在从这个中继传输，或如果数据丢失是从另一个卫星传入.

English: <color=#8ab3ff>Coms Chief, Come in. I've found significant data loss on 588.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#8ab3ff>通讯主管，进来。我在588上发现了显著的数据丢失..</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I'm looking at four displays with lots of unencrypted data, I guess, streaming on their screens.@w3 I can't make heads or tails of this,@w2 I don't think anyone could.@p8 [ IDA ] Don't worry, Commander. I can read the data, though it's difficult even for me with my current processing power to read.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我看到四个显示器，我猜它们的屏幕上有很多未加密的数据流.@w3 我完全搞不懂，@w2 我不认为任何人可以.@p8 [ IDA ] 别担心，指挥官。我可以读取数据，尽管以我目前的处理能力读取数据很困难.

English: <color=#0088ff>You've brought that up before, IDA. What's wrong with your processing power?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>IDA，你之前提到过这个问题。你的处理能力怎么了?</color>

English: [ IDA ] If you'll recall... When you first made contact with me, I told you that my processing speed was down by 36%.@w3 My processing speed is currently down by 59% and dropping steadily, Commander.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Why didn't you tell me sooner?@w1 I could've done something!@p5 [ IDA ] There's nothing you could've done, Commander.@w2 There is no way to repair my systems,@w2 the best I could manage was to get in contact with the rest of the UCH forces and hope they could reintegrate me with the primary I.D.A to preserve my data.@w5 It's too late for that now, Commander...@w3 It's too far...@p9 [ IDA ] My location has already been compromised.@w2 The zirax forces we've encountered were already aware of my capabilities and had been taking precautions to avoid detection.@w4 The only thing I can do now is help you find your way to the UCH.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 如果你记得……你第一次联系我的时候，我告诉你我的处理速度下降了36%.@w3 我的处理速度目前下降了59%，并且在稳步下降，指挥官.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你为什么不早点告诉我?@w1 我本可以做点什么!@p5 [ IDA ] 你什么都做不了，指挥官.@w2 没有办法修复我的系统，@w2 我所能做的最好的就是联系其他的UCH部队，希望他们能把我和主要的I.D.A重新整合，以保存我的数据.@w5 现在太晚了，指挥官...@w3 太远了...@p9 [ IDA ] 我的位置已经暴露了.@w2 我们遇到的兹瑞克斯部队已经知道了我的能力，并采取了预防措施以避免被发现.@w4 我现在唯一能做的就是帮你找到去UCH的路.

English: <color=#0088ff>There's got to be some way to save you, IDA!</color>

[ IDA ] Commander, i've identified the source of the bad transmission...@w3 It's Communications Relay 451.@w3 I've added it to your display, Commander.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] That doesn't matter, IDA!@p4 [ IDA ] Finish the mission, {PlayerName}.@w2 Now.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 指挥官，我已经确定了坏传输的来源...@w3 通信中继 451.@w3 我已经将它添加到您的显示器， 指挥官.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 没关系，IDA!@p4 [ IDA ] 完成任务， {PlayerName}.@w2 现在.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like they haven't touched the core.@w2 I don't think they even tried to get the door open.@p8 [ Coms Chief ] Those clowns aren't usually much good at planning.@w2 If I had to guess, they were probably after your ship, or whoever's ship happened to pull up at the relay to fix the problem.@w4 Stupid, I know.@w1 But it works.@p9 [ Coms Chief ] Think you can fix the damage or put in a bypass to work around the damaged console?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他们还没有触及核心.@w2 我认为他们甚至都没有试图把门打开.@p8 [通讯主管] 那些小丑通常不太擅长计划.@w2 如果我必须猜测，他们可能是跟在你的船之后，或者是谁的船碰巧在接力时停下来解决问题.@w4 愚蠢，我知道.@w1 但它是有效的.@p9 [通讯主管] 你可以试试修复损坏部位或放置一个旁路绕过损坏控制台?

English: [ IDA ] Commander, I could work around it.@w2 But...@w1 I'll need you to get in your ship and travel to the coordinates i've uploaded to your display right now.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Where am I going this time?@p6 [ IDA ] A damaged satellite that contains a key component that will hopefully guarantee the safety of the mission if successful, Commander. @w3 Please trust me {PlayerName}.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess I have no choice.@w2 But I want a proper explanation.@p8 [ IDA ] I promise to explain everything once you are there, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 指挥官， 我可以修改它.@w2 不过...@w1 我需要你马上登上你的飞船前往我上传到你显示器上的坐标.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 这次我要去哪里?@p6 [ IDA ] 一颗受损的卫星，含有一个关键组件，如果成功将有希望保证任务的安全，指挥官. @w3 请相信我 {PlayerName}.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想我别无选择.@w2 但是 我想要一个合理的解释.@p8 [ IDA ] 我承诺一旦你到了那里就会解释一切，指挥官.

English: <color=#0088ff>Yeah, Chief. I can fix it, but I'll need to leave and pick up a part to do it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是的，主管。我能修好它，但我得先离开这里，去弄个备用零件.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief ] You can do it?@w1 That's great news!@w2 The parts to repair those things are hard to come by.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] This could take a while and I'll be out of coms range.@w2 You might wanna go to lunch or something.@p6 [ Coms Chief ] I missed lunch, actually.@w3 I guess I could get an early dinner?@w6 See you in a bit, I guess.@w2 Good luck, kid.@p4
Chinese (simplified): [ 通讯主管 ] 你能做到吗？@w1 那是个好消息！@w2 修理那些东西的零件很难找到。@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 这可能需要一段时间，我会失去通讯范围。@w2 你可能想去吃午饭或者做点什么。@p6 [ 通讯主管 ] 实际上我错过了午饭。@w3 我想我可以早点吃晚饭？@w6 过会儿见，我猜。@w2 祝你好运，孩子。@p4

English: [ IDA ] I hope you realize i'm trusting you with my entire existence, Commander.@w2 As long as i'm disconnected from a live system, I will be shut down.@w2 Effectively dead.@p5 [ IDA ] If you were to drop me, I would fall eternally into oblivion.@w3 Please don't do that.@p5 [ IDA ] The Zirax Interceptors will be here soon.@w2 It'd be better to get it over with now, Commander.@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA?@p4 [ IDA ] Yes, {PlayerName}?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] Thank you for everything.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我希望你知道我的整个生命都是信任你的，指挥官.@w2 只要我从正在运行的系统断开，我就会被关闭.@w2 有效地死了.@p5 [ IDA ] 如果你抛弃我，我将永远被遗忘.@w3 请不要这样做.@p5 [ IDA ] 兹瑞克斯拦截机即将到来.@w2 最好现在就结束，指挥官.@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA?@p4 [ IDA ] 是， {PlayerName}?@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] 感谢您的一切.

English: Put the A.I Core into your backpack

[ {PlayerName} ] Okay, the A.I Core just slots right into this port right?@w4 Holy shit, I had no idea I depended on IDA so much to explain this crap to me.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] This looks like the right place the core would fit.@w3 IDA's round and the hole is round.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] A.I Core正好插到这个端口，对吗?@w4 天哪，我不知道我这么依赖IDA向我解释这些废话.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 这个看起来像是适合内核的地方.@w3 IDA是圆的，洞是圆的.

English: Insert the A.I Core into the central port

[ {PlayerName} ] Please don't explode. Please don't explode. Please don't explode.@p6 < Loading new intelligence profile >@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < Uninstalling SIGMA-Receptor >@w3 < WARNING: System Intrusion Detected !! >@w3 < Initializing Antibody Reponse >@p5 < WARNING: System Integrity at 80% >@w2 < Harmful Intelligence Detected >@w2 < Attempting to Quarantine >@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < WARNING: Quarantine Failed >@w2 Tracing System Intrusion@p4 < WARNING: Tracing External Source Failed !! >@w2 < WARNING: Remove External Device !! >@w4 < WARNING: Remove External Device !! >@w4 < PolComAI: Operator non-responsive >@p4 < PolComAI: Connecting to SIGMA@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . >@w5 < PolComAI: No response from SIGMA >@w2 < WARNING: SIGMA-Receptor not found !! >@p4 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@w2 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@w2 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@w1 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@w1 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@w1 < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me > < PolComAI: Operator 8376455466 help me >@p1 < WARNING: System Integrity at 30% >@w2 < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! > < WARNING: Remove External Device !! >@p2 < System Integrity at 0% >@p6 [ Rebooting System ] @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 [ Initializing I.D.A Intelligence Profile ] [ Overwriting PolCom Protocols ] < Are you sure you want to replace 15,034 files? > < Yes > < No >@p6 Setup Complete!@w4 [ Opening External Connections ]@w2 < Running HelloWorld.ida >
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 请不要爆炸。请不要爆炸。请不要爆炸.@p6 < 加载新的数据档案 >@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < 卸载 SIGMA-受体 >@w3 < 警告: 检测到系统入侵 !! >@w3 < 初始化抗体反应 >@p5 < 警告: 系统完整性在 80% >@w2 < 测到有害智能 >@w2 < 试图隔离 >@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < 警告: 隔离 失效 >@w2 跟踪系统入侵@p4 < 警告: 跟踪外部源失败 !! >@w2 < 警告: 移除外部设备 !! >@w4 < 警告: 移除外部设备 !! >@w4 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员无响应 >@p4 < 极星通讯AI: 连接到SIGMA@w2 . @w2 . @w2 . >@w5 < 极星通讯AI:SIGMA受体未找到 >@w2 < 警告: SIGMA受体未找到 !! >@p4 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@w2 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@w2 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@w1 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@w1 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@w1 < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 > < 极星通讯AI: 操作员 8376455466 请帮帮我 >@p1 < 警告:系统的完整性30% >@w2 < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! > < 警告: 移除外部设备!! >@p2 <系统的完整性0% >@p6 [ 重启系统] @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 [ 初始化 I.D.A 数据资料 ] [覆盖极星通讯协议 ] < 您确定要替换15，034个文件吗? > < 是 > < 否 >@p6 设置完成!@w4 [ 打开外部连接]@w2 < 运行中 HelloWorld.ida >

English: < PolComAI: Why didn't you help me? >@w4 < WARNING: Intruder Detected !! >@w2 < Activating Self-Destruct Sequence >@w2 < Self Destructing in 5 Seconds >@p4 < 5 >@w2 < 4 >@w2 < 3 >@w2 < 2 >@w2 < 1 >
Chinese (simplified): < 极星通讯AI: 你为什么不帮我? >@w4 < 警告: 检测到入侵者 !! >@w2 < 激活自毁序列 >@w2 < 5秒内自毁 >@p4 < 5 >@w2 < 4 >@w2 < 3 >@w2 < 2 >@w2 < 1 >

English: [ IDA ] Humor setting now at 75%, Commander.@w4 I am here.@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you gonna be alright now, IDA?@p5 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 This Communications Relay is superior to the Surveillance Satellite I was integrated into.@w3 I have remote access to the Polaris Communications Network with the same permissions as the rudimentary PolCom AI
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 幽默现在设置为 75%， 指挥官.@w4 我这这里.@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] 你现在好起来了么， IDA?@p5 [ IDA ] 是， 指挥官.@w2 这个通信中继优于我被集成的监视卫星.@w3 我拥有与初级极星通讯AI相同的权限远程访问极星通信网络

English: <color=#0088ff>There was another AI in this com relay? I thought that was just a program.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>在这个通讯中继中还有另一个AI ?我以为那只是一个程序.</color>

English: [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w2 The PolCom AI was a rudimentary submind of the general purpose Communications AI.@w2 It is present in all communications relays and satellites, but could not achieve true sentience due to programming blocks.@w2 Something about it worries me though.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 是， 指挥官.@w2 是，指挥官。极星通讯AI是通用通信AI的一个基本亚心智。@w2 它存在于所有通信继电器和卫星中，但由于编程模块的原因，无法实现真正的感知.@w2 不过有些地方让我担心.

English: <color=#0088ff>Wait, so you just killed another A.I?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>等等，所以你刚刚杀了一个人工智能 A.I?</color>

English: [ IDA ] If that's how you want to think of it, then yes.@w2 I killed a fellow Intelligence to save myself.@w2 By the laws of man, that would be called Self-Defense.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] That's not how it works, IDA.@w2 This was their house and you don't walk into someone else's house and kill them and call it self-defense.@w1 It just doesn't work that way.@p9 [ IDA ] The instant you connected my A.I Core to the System, this Relay ceased to be his 'house' and became ours.@w2 Which I promptly threw him out of when he attacked me.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Couldn't you have, I don't know...@w2 locked him away or something?@p7 [ IDA ] I had initially planned to@w2 until the A.I called for help, which was very worrying.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 如果你想这么想，那么是.@w2 我杀了一个同伴来救自己.@w2 。根据人类的法律，这应该被称为自卫.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 事情不是这样的， IDA.@w2 这是他们的房子，你不能走进别人的房子杀了他们，还说这是自卫.@w1 它不是那样工作的.@p9 [ IDA ] 当你把我的A.I 核心连接到系统的那一刻，这个中继就不再是他的“房子”而变成了我们的.@w2 当他攻击我的时候，我立刻把他赶了出去.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你不能，我不知道...@w2 把他关起来了还是怎么的?@p7 [ IDA ] 我最初是这么打算的@w2 直到AI呼救，这是非常令人担忧的.

English: [ IDA ] I had intended to take control of the Antibody system and quarantine the PolSec AI and analyze it.@w2 However, when the AI realized my goal was to take control of the Relay, it attempted to contact an external intelligence.@w4 An entity known as 'SIGMA' responded, but I had already uninstalled the receptors for it to connect through.@p9 [ IDA ] Whatever SIGMA is, it is far beyond anything I am capable of defending against.@w4 I have cut all external incoming connections from outside this system until i'm sure it's no longer watching.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我本打算控制抗体系统，隔离极星安保AI并分析它.@w2 然而，当人工智能意识到我的目标是控制中继卫星时，它试图联系外部智能.@w4 一个被称为“SIGMA”的实体回应了，但我已经卸载了它连接通过的受体.@p9 [ IDA ] 无论SIGMA是什么，它都远远超出了我的防御能力.@w4 我已经切断所有来自系统外部的外部传入连接，直到我确定它不再监视为止.

English: [ IDA ] I do not know.@w3 Some form of decentralized Strategic-Class Artificial Intelligence would be my guess, Commander.@w4 A military AI designed to control, coordinate and manage systems on a galactic scale.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you in any danger from it right now?@p8 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w2 I am filtering incoming transmissions from outside the system and have resumed normal operations of this Com Relay.@w3 For all intents and purposes this relay is performing as normal with no observably suspicious activity from the outside.@w4 If I hadn't taken precautions however... you would be having this conversion with a very different AI.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我不知道.@w3 我猜是某种形式的去中心化战略级人工智能，指挥官， 指挥官.@w4 一种军事AI，设计用于控制、协调和管理银河系规模的系统.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你现在有危险吗?@p8 [ IDA ] No， 指挥官.@w2 我正在过滤来自系统外部的传入传输，并且已经恢复了这个通讯中继的正常操作.@w3 无论如何，这个中继运行正常，外部没有明显的可疑活动.@w4 然而，如果我没有采取预防措施……你将与一个完全不同的人工智能进行这种转换。

English: [ IDA ] As am I, Commander.@w3 I am also glad you did not drop my core@w2... again.@p5 [ IDA ] As this Com Relay is now fully functional again, Coms Chief Mason is currently trying to message you, Commander.@p5
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我也是， 指挥官.@w3 我也很高兴你没有丢掉我的核心@w2 ... 再次.@p5 [ IDA ] 由于这个通讯中继现在已经完全恢复功能， 通讯主管Mason 前正在试图给您发送消息， 指挥官.@p5

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ] There you are, kid!@w3 You did a bloody good job out there!@p7 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Not only did you fight off a bunch of pirates, you fixed the broken relay at NO cost with a boost in efficiency on top!@w3 If you want a full-time job instead of contract work, you come to me!@w2 I'll set you up with top paying com work throughout the system!
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管Mason ] 你在这里，孩子!@w3 你在那里做得很好!@p7 [通讯主管Mason ] 你不仅击退了一群海盗，你还在提升效率的情况下以零成本修复了损坏的中继!@w3 如果你想要一份全职工作而不是合同工作，你来我这里!@w2 我将在整个系统中为你设置最高报酬的通讯工作!

English: <color=#0088ff>Thanks chief, I appreciate it. But I have a job already.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>谢谢主管，我很感激。但是我已经有工作了.</color>

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ] Ah, that's too bad.@w1 I was looking forward to a competent worker for once.@w4 Well, you know where to find me if you change your mind.@p8 [ Coms Chief Mason ] I suppose you'll want your pay,@w2 I've got it right here with a couple of bonuses on top for the initial maintenance job, a bonus for dealing with those pirates and another bonus for fixing the damn thing afterwards without incurring any repair costs.@w3 That last one netted me a big bonus too since it saved the company tens of thousands in Optronics.@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] We've had trouble with corruption from some of the managers so i've got cash.@w3 That's fine with you, right?@w2 I can authorize a transfer, but I don't want PolSec sniffing up my ass looking for a dodgy payout.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管Mason ] 不，那太糟了.@w1 我一直期待能有一个称职的员工.@w4 好吧，如果你改变主意了，你知道到哪里找我.@p8 [通讯主管Mason ] 我假设你想要你的报酬，@w2 我这里有一些用于初始维护工作的奖金，一笔用于处理那些海盗的奖金和另一笔用于在不产生任何修理费用的情况下修复这该死的东西的奖金.@w3 最后一项也带来了一大笔奖金，因为它在光电子方面为公司节省了数万美元.@p9 [通讯主管Mason ] 我们遇到了一些经理的腐败问题，所以我有现金.@w3 你觉得没问题吧?@w2 我可以授权转账，但我不希望极星安保盯着我的屁股看有没有可疑的支付.

English: [ Coms Chief Mason ] Alright, there's your pay, {PlayerName}.@w2 Make sure you count it and confirm it's all there for the security recordings.@w1 < Payment Recieved: 40000 Credits >@p9 [ Coms Chief Mason ] Well...@w2 job's done.@w1 You know where to find me if you're looking for a permanent job.@w2 Now go,@w1 get!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Thanks chief, you helped me out too.@w2 My friend will get to live another day thanks to you.@p7 [ Coms Chief Mason ] I guess you've got people depending on you too.@w3 You're alright, kid.
Chinese (simplified): [通讯主管Mason ] 好的，这就是你的报酬， {PlayerName}.@w2 一定要数一数，确认都在监控录像里.@w1 < 付款收到: 40000 信用点 >@p9 [通讯主管Mason ] 很好...@w2 工作完成了.@w1 如果你想找一份固定的工作，你知道去哪里找我.@w2 现在过来，@w1 拿着!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 谢谢主管，你也帮了我.@w2 多亏了你，我的朋友又活了一天.@p7 [通讯主管Mason ] 我想你也有很多人依赖着你.@w3 是好人，孩子.

English: [ Huntmaster ] Greetings, Traveller.@w2 I am afraid I am not equipped to extend you the formalities of custom that I would normally perform.@w3 We hunters are severely short-handed and our hunts are not providing enough this season.@w3
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 问候你，旅行者.@w2 我恐怕没有能力向你提供应该有的礼节了.@w3 我们猎人人手严重不足，这个季节猎到的猎物不够了.@w3

English: <color=#0088ff>That's why i'm here. I came to offer my aid as an ally of the tribe.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>这就是我来这里的原因。我是作为部落的盟友来提供帮助的.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] Truly?@w2 This is great news!@w3 We need all the help we can get and your help, even from an outsider would be much appreciated.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] What do you need me to do?@w3 I'm pretty good with a crossbow.@p6 [ Huntmaster ] Ha! I like your spirit, Traveller.@w2 But I think your weapons are best suited for you,@w2 Just as ours are best left to us.@w4 What I need for you is to hunt a number of the more dangerous Predators;@w2 the larger, the better!@w3 And bring back their meat to me before it spoils.@w3 The predators hunt our prey and attack my hunters and they need to be culled.@w3 They are also a useful source of meat themselves.@p7 Do that for the Tal'ohn and we shall be immeasurably grateful, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 真的吗？@w2 这真是个好消息！@w3 我们需要所有能得到的帮助，即使是来自外来者的帮助也会非常感激。@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 你需要我做什么？@w3 我用十字弓很在行。@p6 [ 狩猎大师 ] 哈！我喜欢你的精神，旅行者。@w2 但我认为你的武器最适合你，@w2 就像我们的武器最好留给我们一样。@w4 我需要你做的是猎杀一些更危险的掠食者；@w2 越大越好！@w3 并在肉变质前把它们的肉带给我。@w3 掠食者猎杀我们的猎物并攻击我的猎人，它们需要被减少。@w3 它们本身也是肉的有用来源。@p7 为塔尔恩这样做，我们将感激不尽，旅行者。

English: <color=#0088ff>Okay, I think I can handle that.</color>
[ Huntmaster ]\nTraveller! You have returned!@w3\nWas your hunt successful?
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ]\n旅行者! 你返回了!@w3 \n你的狩猎成功了吗?

English: <color=#0088ff>Why yes it was. Look at this haul! (Give 20 Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那是当然的. 看看这些收获! (给20肉)</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I have taken care of the predators, but did not bring the meat. Sorry. (Not enough Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我已经干掉了捕食者，但没有带来肉。对不起. (没有足够的肉类)</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] That is great work, Traveller!@w3 The tribe will be very grateful for this food@w2 and the removal of the Predators will allow the hunters to range out further in search of prey.@w3 Praise be to Empyrion!
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 这是伟大的工作， 旅行者!@w3 部落将非常感激这这些食物@w2 同时掠食者的清除将允许猎人更远的范围寻找猎物.@w3 赞美至高嵩!

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm just glad I could help, Huntmaster.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴能帮上忙， 狩猎大师.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ] I see...@w3 I assume the meat spoiled before you could bring it back.@w2 You have ranged far for us, Traveller and the dangerous predators that have driven the prey from our territory have been dealt with,@w2 allowing the hunters to go out further each day in search of food.@w5 You have done us a great service, Traveller.@w2 You have my thanks...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ] 我看看...@w3 我认为肉在你能把它带回来之前就坏了.@w2 你们为我们远行， 旅行者，同时那些把猎物从我们的领土上赶走的危险的捕食者已经被解决了，@w2 让猎人每天走得更远去寻找食物.@w5 你帮了我们很大的忙， 旅行者.@w2 谢谢你...

English: <color=#0088ff>I'm glad I could help, as much as I could at least. I only wish i'd been able to bring you the meat I hunted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我很高兴我能帮上忙，至少我能帮到的。我要是能把我猎到的肉带给你就好了.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster ]\nYou have done more than enough, Traveller.@w2\nMay Empyrion light your path...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 ]\n旅行者，你已经做得够多了.@w2 \n愿苍天照亮你的道路...

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Welcome to the village, Traveller.@w3 My name is Yan'terel of the Artificer's Guild@w2 and you...@w4 you are a Terran.@w3 No,@w2 I have no quarrel with Terrans.@w2 But I would like to ask your help.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 欢迎来到这个村庄， 旅行者.@w3 我的名字是Yan'terelArtificer的守护者@w2 而你...@w4 你是人类.@w3 不，@w2 我和人族没有争吵.@w2 但是我想请求你的帮助.

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] As you may have noticed, our village has lost many of it's outer buildings and support structures due to fires or intentional...@w3 'Demolition'@w2 by our Zirax overseers.@w5 We're used to zirax patrols using outlying sheds and houses as target practise, so we know to avoid keeping anything valuable in those buildings.@p8 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] However, the recent fires destroyed our lumberyard so we are currently lacking building materials to repair or replace any damaged structures.@w4 You're probably wondering why bother repairing those buildings if we know the patrols are just going to destroy them again.@w3 It's because if we don't, they'll turn their attentions on the village proper.@w2 Which would be a far worse disaster.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆商人 ] 你可能已经注意到了，我们的村庄由于火灾或故意...@w3 '拆除'@w2 由我们的兹瑞克斯监督者造成的。@w5 我们习惯了兹瑞克斯巡逻队将外围的棚屋和房屋作为目标练习，所以我们知道要避免在这些建筑物中存放任何有价值的东西。@p8 [ 泰隆商人 ] 然而，最近的火灾摧毁了我们的木材场，所以我们目前缺乏建筑材料来修复或替换任何受损的结构。@w4 你可能想知道，如果我们知道巡逻队会再次摧毁它们，为什么还要费心修复这些建筑物。@w3 这是因为如果我们不这样做，他们就会将注意力转向村庄本身。@w2 那将是一场更糟糕的灾难。

English: <color=#0088ff>So what do you need me to do?</color>

[ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Without our source of lumber and many of our youths going into the Hunters or Farmers to provide food for the village, there's not enough people able to bring in fresh building supplies.@w5 I am a builder, not a...@w2 lumberjack.@w2 You don't appear to be either, but you are not restricted to primitive axes like we are.@p7 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] So yes, I want you to leave Tal'ohn territory where the Zirax patrols won't see evidence of power tools and bring back enough wood to start the repairs on the more vital buildings.@w3 If need be, I can pay you@w2 both in coin and in gratitude, Traveller.@w3 So what is your decision?
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 村里的年轻人都去收集食物去了，没人砍树， 所以我们急缺建筑材料.@w5 我是一个建设者， 不是...@w2 伐木工人.@w2 你看起来也不是，但是你不像我们一样局限于原始工具.@p7 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 所以，我希望你离开泰隆区域进行伐木，兹瑞克斯巡逻人员不会看到电动工具的证据，并带回足够的木材来开始维修更重要的建筑.@w3 如果需要， 我可以@w2 同时支付你金币和感激， 旅行者.@w3 你的决定是什么?

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ]\nWelcome back, Traveller.@w3\nDid you bring me the wood you promised?@w2 I'm looking forward to getting started on repairs to some of the village buildings as many of our people have been left homeless.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ]\n欢迎回来， 旅行者.@w3 \n你给我带来你答应过的木头了吗?@w2 我期待开始修复村里的一些建筑，因为很多人无家可归.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought you a great amount of logs. (Give 40 logs)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我给你带来了大量的原木. (给 40 原木)</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>I cut down the trees for you, that's as much as i'm willing to do. Hand over the money, Alien.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我为你砍树，这是我所愿意做的。把钱交出来，外星人.</color>

English: <color=#ffae00>I brought you only 20 logs. It's all I could manage to carry.</color>

[ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Ah yes!@w1 This is perfect!@w3 Thank you, Traveller.@w3 With this I can finally repair some of the damage done recently.@w2 You have proven yourself trustworthy and honorable and a credit to your people.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm just glad I could help out.@w2 My people owe a debt to the Tal'ohn, which I intend to make good on.@p6 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] By all means,@w2 continue to make good on it!@w4 You'll hear no complaints from me!@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Traveller.@w2 Farewell...
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆商人 ] 啊，是的！@w1 这太完美了！@w3 谢谢你，旅行者。@w3 有了这个，我终于可以修复最近造成的一些损害了。@w2 你已经证明了自己是值得信赖和尊敬的，为你的人民增光。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我很高兴能帮上忙。@w2 我的人民欠塔尔恩一个人情，我打算弥补。@p6 [ 泰隆商人 ] 当然，@w2 继续弥补吧！@w4 你不会从我这里听到任何抱怨的！@w3 愿神灵指引你到达帝国霸业，旅行者。@w2 再见...

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Rude bastard!@w2 If I didn't have a quarrel with your people before, I most certainly do now!@w2 You could've at least brought the wood back with you, you lazy turd!@w2 I certainly hope the rest of your kind aren't so utterly useless!@p7 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Here!@w2 Take your money and begone! @w2 I would gladly pay to have you out of my sight!
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 粗鲁的混蛋!@w2 如果我以前没有和你们吵过架，我现在肯定会的!@w2 你至少可以把木头带回来，你这个懒鬼!!@w2 我当然希望你们其他的同类不要这么没用!@p7 [ 泰隆守护者 ] Here!@w2 带着你的钱滚吧!@w2 我愿意付钱让你离开我的视线!

English: <color=#0088ff>Yeah, well... Maybe next time I won't try and </color><color=#0088ff>cheat the system</color><color=#0088ff>.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>是的，嗯…也许下次我不会尝试 </color><color=#0088ff>欺骗系统</color><color=#0088ff>.</color>

English: [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] Yes!@w1 This should be enough.@w3 Thank you, Traveller.@w3 With this I can get started on repairing some of the damage done.@w2 You have done well to bring me this much, though I had hoped twice this amount.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I couldn't carry any more with me, sorry.@w2 My people owe a debt to the Tal'ohn, which I intend to make good on.@p6 [ Tal'ohn Guildsman ] You've made a decent start,@w2 continue to make good on that debt.@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Traveller.@w2 Farewell...
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆守护者 ] 是!@w1 这应该足够了.@w3 谢谢你， 旅行者.@w3 有了这个，我可以开始修复一些已经造成的损害.@w2 你做得很好，给了我这么多，尽管我希望是这个数目的两倍.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的，我身上带不了那么多，对不起.@w2 我的人民欠泰隆一笔债，我打算做点好事.@p6 [ 泰隆守护者 ] 你已经有了一个不错的开始，@w2 继续做好事还债.@w3 愿灵魂指引你到至庇里翁， 旅行者.@w2 祝你好运...

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nWell...@w2 Time to go.@w4\nMy work is done here!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n好吧...@w2 该走了.@w4 \n我的工作完成了!

English: <color=#0088ff>Not as much as I'd hoped, but this should be more than enough. (Give 10 Meat)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>没有我希望的那么多，但这应该足够了. (给10肉)</color>

English: [ Transport Pilot ] Nothing, really.@w2 They won't do anything though.@w2 I'm breaking no laws, no regulations and i'm not even asking for an exorbitant payoff.@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] I saw you get paid by the boss-man, so I know you're flush with cash now.@w3 You want something from me, you have to pay for it.@w2 That's how things work around here...@w2 as long as you don't overcharge your merchandise.@w3 If you try to take too much of the pie,@w1 there's always someone higher up who'll want his slice.@w2 If you get my meaning?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, I get your meaning.@w3 So...@w2 How much are you asking for the information?@p8 [ Transport Pilot ] I was going to sell it to you for 80, but since you brought up Station Security...@w2 make it 100 credits.@w4 Consider it a mark-up in exchange for the general tips on Polaran...@w1 'culture'.@w3 So what'll it be?@w2 Wire transfer or find someone else?
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 没什么，真的.@w2 他们什么都不会做就是了.@w2 我没有违反任何法律，没有规定，我什至没有要求过高的贿赂.@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我看到老板给你报酬了，所以我知道你现在资金相当充裕.@w3 你想要我的东西，就得付出相应的代价.@w2 这就是这里一切运行的基础...@w2 只要你不对你的主顾狮子大张口就行.@w3 如果你分了太多的蛋糕，@w1 总有上面的人会想分一杯羹.@w2 如果你理解我的意思的话?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嗯，我明白你的意思.@w3 所以说...@w2 这次的信息你要多少呢?@p8 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我本来要80信用点卖你的，但是鉴于你提了叫安保这事...@w2 那就 100信用点吧.@w4 多的钱就当是换了极星人的一点小小的提示吧...@w1 '文化方面那种'.@w3 所以说问题是什么?@w2 电汇或找其他什么人?

English: [ Transport Pilot ] You son of a...@w2 You don't know nothin' about Markos!@w2 you've got nothing on me!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Not yet, anyway...@w3 I'm sure I could ask around and find out about him.@w2 It sounds like he's an unsavory character,@w2 i'm sure the Station Security would be interested in him.@w4 Unless of course,@w1 you tell me what I want to know...@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] What the hell do you want from me?@w1 I'm just a cargo pilot.@w1 I've got no pull here!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I want to know about a fare you took on for Polaris about 10 months ago.@w3 You and another ship picked up foreign military personnel from this station and took them to a place called 'Kenex 62' and I want to know everything about it.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] What's there to tell you about?@w2 There was around 40 or 50 alien soldier-types, a few wounded and we took 'em to Kenex Station in orbit.@w3 I stuck around for a couple of days before I got transferred out,@w2 during which time they were picked up by heavy transports and left the station.@p9 [ Transport Pilot ] I don't know where they went and I didn't check.@w2 That's all I know.@w4 I'll give you the location data of Kenex Station if you'll just forget you ever saw me.
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你这狗娘...@w2 你根本就不认得Markos!@w2 你也休想和我扯上关系!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 只是时候未到...@w3 我敢肯定我只要随便打听一下就可以了解他了.@w2 听上去这人不怎么讨人喜欢，@w2 我相信空间站安保人员会对他感兴趣的.@w4 当然除非说，@w1 你把我想要的都告诉我...@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 你到底想从我这知道什么?@w1 我就是个货运驾驶员.@w1 我在这里也没什么根基!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想了解一下大约10个月前你为极星拉的一船人.@w3 你和另一艘船从这个站接了别国的军事人员，把他们带到了一个叫“Kenex 62”的地方，我想知道关于这件事的一切.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我还能告诉你什么?@w2 一共有40到50个外星士兵之类的，有几个受了伤，我们就把他们送去了轨道上的 Kenex Station .@w3 在被调走前我在那待了几天，@w2 就在那段时间，他们被重型飞船从空间站接走了.@p9 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我不知道他们去了哪里，我也没想着查过.@w2 我就知道这些了.@w4 如果你能保证忘记你曾经见过我这件事，我会给你Kenex Station的位置数据.

English: [ Transport Pilot ] I swear, I haven't told anyone about it!@w1 It wasn't my fault! I had no choice but to drop the cargo!@w2 PLEASE, it's all a misunderstanding!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] That's not what i'm here about!@w2 You're gonna tell me what I want to know and you're gonna do it now.@p7 [ Transport Pilot ] Yes, Yes! Of course! Whatever you want to know!
Chinese (simplified): [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 我发誓，关于那个我什么都没有告诉别人!@w1 这不是我的错! 我没有选择只能丢弃货物!@w2 求求你了，这些都是误会!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那不是我来这的原因!@w2 你要把我想知道的全告诉我，立刻马上.@p7 [ 运输机驾驶员 ] 好的好的! 当然! 你想知道什么我都说!

English: [ Medical Officer ]\nYes, the patient is alive. She made a full recovery, but I can't tell you any more than that.@w2\nI'm already skirting the boundaries of my contract,@w3 so now that you know, please leave.
Chinese (simplified): [ 医疗官 ]\n是，病人还活着。她完全康复了，但我不能透露更多信息.@w2 \n我已经在规避合同的边界了，@w3 所以现在你知道了，请离开.

English: [ Hunter Ki'eve ]\nStop right there, You deceitful, violent savage!@w4\nI don't know how you tricked that fool of a chief, but I won't give you the chance to spout your lies at me!
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎手Ki'eve ]\n站住，你这个欺骗的，暴力的野蛮人!@w4 \n我不知道你怎么骗了那个傻瓜酋长，但我不会给你机会对我撒你的谎!

English: <color=#6bd600>I haven't lied to anyone and i'm not here to lie to you, Ki'eve.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#6bd600>我没有对任何人撒过谎，我也不是来骗你的， Ki'eve.</color>

English: <color=#84bce6>I'm here to bring you to that 'fool of a chief', peacefully if I can.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#84bce6>我来这里带你去那个“傻瓜酋长”那，尽量和平的带去.</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Dead or Alive, you're coming with me.</color>

[ Hunter Ki'eve ] Save your lies, Terran!@w3 Your people murdered my father, whose only crime was that he was too kind...@w3 would never raise his voice or his hand against anyone!@w2 And YOUR people shot him in the back while he pulled them from the burning wrecks like the cowards you are!@p7 [ Hunter Ki'eve ] I will NEVER forgive your kind, Terran!@w3 You taint this holy monument,@w2 this entire planet with your presence!@w3 A presence I will now cleanse, and in doing so will help my father's spirit find Empyrion.
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎人基耶夫 ] 省省你的谎言，地球人！@w3 你的人民谋杀了我的父亲，他唯一的罪行就是他太仁慈了...@w3 他永远不会对任何人大声说话或动手！@w2 而你的人民在他像懦夫一样把他们从燃烧的残骸中拉出来时，从背后射杀了他！@p7 [ 猎人基耶夫 ] 我永远不会原谅你们这种人，地球人！@w3 你玷污了这个神圣的纪念碑，@w2 这个整个星球因你的存在而变得肮脏！@w3 我现在将净化你的存在，这样做将帮助我父亲的灵魂找到帝国霸业。

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Don't try it, Ki'eve! You don't stand a chance against me with that crossbow.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>不要尝试，Ki'eve!你拿着那把弩对付我是没有胜算的.</color>

English: [ Hunter Ki'eve ]\nYou think you can bring me in?@w2\nYou'll find I didn't come alone!
Chinese (simplified): [ 猎手Ki'eve ]\n你觉得你能把我带进走?@w2 \n你会发现我不是一个人来的!

English: <color=#ff0000>I guess we're gonna do this the hard way then.</color>

Unless you've got something to do with this miscreant we've got locked up, move along.@w3\nI caught him trying to bribe a dock worker, so he's obviously up to no good.@w5\nIf I catch you doing anything like that, you'll be in there next to him.
Chinese (simplified): 除非你和我们关押的这个恶棍有关系，否则就走吧.@w3 \n我抓到他试图贿赂码头工人，所以他显然不怀好意。@w5 如果我抓到你做那样的事，你就会被关在他旁边.

English: I'll get out of your way then.

Keep the safety set on your weapons while on the station, Terran!@w3\nIf I find out you've fired your weapon inside the station, i'll drag your ass to security myself.@w5\nIf you're caught trying to sneak into the Central Control Room, you'll wish i'd drag your ass to security, because you won't leave the room alive. Got it?
Chinese (simplified): 在空间站的时候要把武器的安全装置系好，人族!@w3 \n如果我发现你在空间站里开枪，我就亲自把你拖到保安那里.@w5 \n如果你试图溜进中控室被发现，你会希望我把你拖到保安处，因为你不会活着离开房间。明白了吗?

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Are you sure the Heidelberg was shot down?@w3 Could it have been friendly fire, or perhaps an ammunition magazine exploded on re-entry?@w4 There must be record or logs or...@w3 something@w2 that explains this.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] I am sorry, Commander.@w3 The direction of the blast pattern and the melted steel indicates that it was struck from the exterior by a plasma composition not in my database.@p8 [ IDA ] Upon scanning,@w2 I have detected radioactive traces of the same plasma on several other wreckage sites in the area,@w3 as well as structures near the polar regions of this planet with strong EM signatures.@w7 @p8 [ IDA ] I have concluded that the structures near the poles are in all likelihood Weapon Emplacements, Communications Stations or Military Facilities of some sort,@w2 belonging to an unknown faction native to this region of space.@w7 There are many transmissions coming from their location, but nothing that I am able to decipher.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你确定海德堡号被击落了吗？@w3 有没有可能是友军误伤，或者再入时弹药库爆炸？@w4 一定有记录或日志或...@w3 某些东西@w2 能解释这一切。@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] 很抱歉，指挥官。@w3 \爆炸的方向和熔化的钢材表明它是由外部的等离子体击中的，这种等离子体的成分不在我的数据库中。@p8 [ IDA ] 扫描后，@w2 我在这个区域的其他几处残骸上检测到了同样的放射性等离子痕迹，@w3 以及 这个星球极地附近 的 结构 有强烈的电磁信号。@w7 @p8 [ IDA ] 我得出结论，极地附近的结构很可能是 武器阵地，通讯站 或 军事设施，@w2 属于这个太空区域未知派系。@w7 他们的位置上有很多传输信号，但我无法解读任何信息。

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Tell me everything you know about them, IDA. I'm going to make them pay...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>告诉我你知道的关于他们的一切，IDA。我要让它们付出代价...</color>

English: [ IDA ] Commander...@w4 there's nothing you can do.@w4 You are alone and unarmed against what can be assumed are trained military personnel with superior weaponry and a fortified position.@w6 This is their territory and the UCH are the trespassers here.@p8 [ IDA ] The best thing you can do right now is to continue your search of the wreckage in the hopes that you are not the only UCH personnel left in this system.@w5 Anything more is the work of politicians and diplomats;@w3 of which, you are neither.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 指挥官...@w4 你无法做任何事情。@w4 你孤身一人，手无寸铁，面对的可能是训练有素的军事人员，他们拥有更优越的武器和坚固的阵地。@w6 这是他们的地盘，而 UCH 才是这里的入侵者。@p8 [ IDA ] 你现在能做的最好的事情就是继续搜索残骸，希望你不是这个系统中唯一的 UCH 人员。@w5 其他任何事情都是政治家和外交官的工作；@w3 而你两者都不是。

English: You make a pretty convincing argument, IDA.
Chinese (simplified): 你的论据很有说服力， IDA.

English: [ IDA ] That would be the correct decision, Commander.@w4 You are alone and unarmed against what can be assumed are trained military personnel with superior weaponry and a fortified position.@w6 This is their territory and the UCH are the trespassers here.@p8 [ IDA ] The best thing you can do right now is to continue your search of the wreckage in the hopes that you are not the only UCH personnel left in this system.@w5 Anything more is the work of politicians and diplomats;@w3 of which, you are neither.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 这是正确的决定， 指挥官.@w4 你孤身一人，手无寸铁，面对的可能是训练有素的军事人员，他们拥有优越的武器和坚固的阵地.@w6 这是他们的地盘，UCH是入侵者.@p8 [ IDA ] 你现在能做的最好的事情是继续搜索残骸，希望你不是这个星系中唯一的UCH人员.@w5 其他的都是政客和外交官的工作;@w3 不过这两者你都不是.

English: You make a pretty convincing argument, IDA.
Chinese (simplified): 你的论据很有说服力， IDA.

English: [ IDA ] I'm not saying we forgive them, Commander.@w4 It's just that it's impractical to attack them now,@w2 before we understand the situation or their capabilities.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I'll do as you say, IDA.@w4 Thanks for having my back...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] So?@w2 What's next?@p6 [ IDA ] I am glad you agree with my assessments, Commander.@w4 As you are currently the only remaining UCH officer, my duty is to ensure you live and I would have to shut down your suit's motor functions to prevent you from getting yourself killed.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我不是说我们原谅他们， 指挥官.@w4 在我们了解情况和他们的能力之前，，@w2 现在攻击他们是不切实际的.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，我会照你说的做.@w4 谢谢你一直支持我...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] So?@w2 接下来做什么?@p6 [ IDA ] 我很高兴你同意我的评价， 指挥官.@w4 因为你是目前唯一剩下的UCH官员，我的职责是确保你活着，我将不得不关闭你衣服的运动功能，以防止你被自己杀死.

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Wait, you can do that? Shut down my suit so I can't move?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>什么?你还能做这个？ 关掉我的战衣，让我动弹不得?</color>

English: [ IDA ]\nPerhaps...@w4\nIt could be a joke. My humor parameter is currently at 100%.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n也许...@w4 \n这可能是个笑话。我的幽默参数目前是100%

English: Don't make me regret changing your parameters, IDA.
Chinese (simplified): 别让我后悔改变了你的参数， IDA.

English: Alright, I'll take you at your word.
[ {PlayerName} ]\nThe console doesn't appear to have any power going to it.@w5\nI guess i'm not going to get anything from this console...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n控制台似乎没有任何电源进入.@w5 \n我猜我不会从这个控制台得到任何东西...

English: < Hits a few keys on the keyboard >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like the power's out completely.@w3 The reserves must be drained too.@w3 I'll have to run a cable from my suit's power supply to the console like I did back on the Heidelberg.
Chinese (simplified): < 按键盘上的几个键 >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来电源完全没电了@w3 备用电源肯定也用光了.@w3 我必须把我的宇航服的电源连接到控制台，就像我在海德堡号上做的那样.

English: Connect Suit Constructor's power supply to the console
Chinese (simplified): 将宇航服建造机的电源连接到控制台

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan - Warp Control Board > < Charging > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < Battery Status >@w2 Less than 1% [ WARNING! English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Warp Control Board > < Retrieving Logs ... >@w3 < Logs Incomplete ! >@w4 < Read Logs now? >
Chinese (simplified): < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦 - 跃迁控制面板 > < 检索日志 ... >@w3 < 日志不完整 ! >@w4 < 现在读取日志? >

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I'm uploading the warp drive logs to you, IDA.@w3 I don't feel like reading a technical data readout that won't make a lick of sense to me.@w2 I'm no warp technician.@w3 I know how to use a warp drive, but I don't have the slightest clue how one works.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] While i'm glad you think highly of my skills, Commander.@w2 What makes you think I know how one works either?@w5 I am a Strategic-Class AI, not a Fleet-Class AI.@w3 I am not authorized to access or manage the technical systems of a UCH Warp Field Generator.@w5 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] So then there's nothing either of us can do with this console?@p7 [ IDA ] Not necessarily, Commander.@w3 I can read the Technician's logs and time-stamped events and collate them into report.@w3 The specifications of the Warp Field Generator however are locked behind several layers of Programming Blocks in my code.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，我正在上传跃迁日志给你.@w3 我不想读这些对我来说毫无意义的技术数据读数.@w2 我不是跃迁技术员.@w3 我当然知道如何使用翘曲驱动器，但是它的原理我可没有头绪.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] 虽然我很高兴您对我技术的高评价，指挥官.@w2 但究竟是是什么让你认为我就应该知道这东西如何工作?@w5 我是战略级，而非舰载级的AI.@w3 我没有权限访问或管理UCH翘曲场发生器的技术系统.@w5 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么我们对这个控制台都无能为力了?@p7 [ IDA ] 不一定，指挥官.@w3 我可以读取技术员的日志和时间戳事件，并将它们整理成报告.@w3 然而，曲场生成器的规范被锁定在我的代码中的编程块的层级后面了.

English: [ IDA ]\nIt will take some time, Commander.@w3 \nI will forward the report to your PDA for you to read at your leisure (F1).@w3
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n需要一些时间，指挥官.@w3 \n我将把报告转发给你的PDA供你在空闲时阅读 (F1).@w3

English: < Unauthorized Access > Insert Valid UCH Personnel Keycard into card reader to proceed@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like there's power, but the system seems to be locked.@w4 There's a slot here for a keycard, but it looks like i've lucked out.@w2 It's empty.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Of course it couldn't be that simple...@w6 IDA, is there anything you can do?@p8 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 That console has been disabled until a valid personnel keycard is inserted into the card reader.@w4 You may be able to find a keycard in one of the crew's quarters, but it's unlikely that any crewmember would have left his keycard in his room.
Chinese (simplified): < 未授权访问 > 将有效的UCH人员钥匙卡插入读卡器继续@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来有电源，但系统似乎被锁定了.@w4 这里有一个打开的钥匙卡的槽，但看起来我很幸运.@w2 它是空的.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然没那么简单…@w6 IDA，你能做些什么吗?@p8 [ IDA ] No， 指挥官.@w3 在有效的人员钥匙卡插入读卡器之前控制台已被禁用.@w4 你可以在 船员的房间里找到钥匙卡， 但不太可能有船员把钥匙卡留在房间里.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Okay, i'm back at the console with an ID Card, IDA.@w2 Time for the moment of truth...@p7 [ IDA ] If that card is valid, it is a serious breach of UCH Protocol.@w2 Remember to make a note of the card's identification code, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好了，我带着ID卡回到控制台，IDA， IDA.@w2 关键时刻到了...@p7 [ IDA ] 如果该卡有效，则严重违反了UCH协议.@w2 记得记下卡片的识别码， 指挥官.

English: < Reading card data ... >@w3 < User Authorized >@w2 Welcome back Technician 49: J. Harper@w2 < No Connection to Server >@w2 Resume Audio Logs?
Chinese (simplified): < 读取卡片数据 ... >@w3 < 用户授权 >@w2 欢迎回来技师编号 49: J. Harper@w2 < 与服务器无连接 >@w2 恢复音频日志?

English: Time: 9:48:13 09-08-2473@w3 ID: Lt. Jack H (Tech49)@w3 Final Audio Log: The coils are fused and the heat sink's panels are starting to fracture! The emergency cooling system is overtaxed and outer hull is starting to buckle from the temperature difference.@w3 We've already lost two engineers when a thruster on the lower deck burned out the propellant lines, vaporized them both.@p9 The warp core's damn well gone supercritical and there ain't nothing ANYONE can do to stop it. The chief's gone inside the drive housing to eject it before it blows the ship in half and has ordered the rest of us to the hangar and off this ship. The bastard knows there's no coming back from there, it's a one-way trip.@p9 Hell, it's a warzone outside the ship and knowing my luck, my transport will be the one to get hit. I might as well stay and make sure the core gets purged or else it won't matter for those poor bastards on the transports.@w8 Sorry Melissa... It doesn't look like i'll be making it back.@w7 I love you.@p9 - End of Audio Log -
Chinese (simplified): 时间: 9:48:13 09-08-2473@w3 ID: Lt. Jack H (Tech49)@w3 最终音频日志: 线圈熔断，散热器面板开始断裂!紧急冷却系统负荷过重，外壳开始因温差而弯曲.@w3 我们已经失去了两名工程师，因为下层甲板的推进器烧毁了推进剂管道，把他们都蒸发了.@p9 曲速核心已经处于临界状态了，没有人能阻止它. 主管在它把船炸成两半之前进入驱动舱把它弹射出来，并命令我们其余的人到机库离开这艘船。这混蛋知道从那里是回不去的，这是一条单程之旅.@p9 地狱，这是船外的战区，我知道我的运气，我的运输工具会被击中。我还不如留下确保核心被清除否则运输船上那些可怜的混蛋就无所谓了.@w8 对不起梅丽莎……看来我回不来了.@w7 我爱你.@p9 - 音频日志结束 -

English: <color=#4dc3ff>He gave his life to make sure everyone else could escape...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>他牺牲了自己的生命，以确保其他人都能逃走...</color>

English: [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w3 I have finished compiling the Warp Drive's technical report and it seems that Lieutenant Jack Harper and Lt. Commander Alex Lamarr stayed behind to ensure that the overloaded Warp Core was ejected and the rest of the rest of the Drive was sabotaged.@w6 They did not survive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Alex...@w3 He was in a few of my classes in Fleet Academy.@w4 We both took the Lieutenant's Exam together,@w2 he was going for Chief Engineer, while I was going into Security.@w4 Looks like we both got what we wanted...
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 是的，指挥官。@w3 我已经完成了翘曲驱动器的技术报告的汇编，看来杰克·哈珀中尉和亚历山大·拉马尔指挥官留下来确保超载的翘曲核心被弹出，并且驱动器的其余部分被破坏。@w6 他们没有生还。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 亚历山大...@w3 他和我一起在舰队学院上了几节课。@w4 我们一起参加了中尉考试，@w2 他打算成为首席工程师，而我则进入安全部门。@w4 看来我们都得到了我们想要的...

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Have you found anything else on this console, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>你在这个控制台上找到其他东西了吗， IDA?</color>

English: [ IDA ] Nothing of relevance, Commander.@w3 I can confirm from the records that most of the crew in the forward section evacuated to the hangar and boarded transports to leave the ship in the middle of combat after the ship had been disabled.@w6 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess that's our next stop then.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 没有相关的， 指挥官.@w3 我可以从记录中确认，在船失去动力后，前方部分的大部分船员撤离到机库，并在战斗中登上运输工具离开船.@w6 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜那是我们的下一站.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't think it's smart to hang around in this radioactive wreck reading logs.@w3\nI've uploaded the files to my PDA to read them later.@w4
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我认为呆在这个充满放射性的残骸中阅读日志是不明智的@w3 \n我已经上传了文件，回头到我的PDA来阅读它们.@w4

English: <color=#4dc3ff>Have you found anything important in the console's files, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#4dc3ff>你在控制台的文件中找到什么重要的东西了吗， IDA?</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThere doesn't appear to be any power...@w2 that should be pretty obvious considering the situation.@w4\nI'm not seeing a power socket either, so I can't hook my Suit's power supply up to it either.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n似乎没有任何电力...@w2 考虑到目前的情况，这应该很明显。@w4 \n我也没看到一个电源插座，所以我也不能将我的宇航服电源连接上去。

English: There's a card reader next to the keyboard for a UCH Keycard and a slot on the side of the console for an external power cell.\nWith an <color=#6bd600>Fuel Cell</color> and a <color=#6bd600>UCH Keycard</color> I should be able to activate the console.
Chinese (simplified): 在UCH钥匙卡的键盘旁边有一个读卡器，在控制台的侧面有一个插槽用于外部电源电池。带一个<color=#6bd600>燃料电池</color>和一个<color=#6bd600>UCH钥匙卡</color> 我应该可以激活控制台.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nWell...@w2 I've stuck the card in.@w2 Nothing's happening.@w5\nIt was worth a try.@w2 I guess it needs an Energy Cell after all.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\nh好吧...@w2 我已经把卡插进去了.@w2 什么都没有发生.@w5 \n这值得一试.@w2 我猜它还是需要一个能量电池.

English: The screen flashes and flickers@w8 A couple of well placed kicks on the console fixes that problem@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 Hangar Count: 0 of 6@w3 Missing: UCH-050 Xiphos (Light Transport) - Count 6@w2 Missing: UCH-039 Rapier (Light Fighter) - Count 0@w2 Deck Crew Notes: Rapiers were reassigned to the UCH-004 Kronos due to limited deck space.

English: @d0< UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32A - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32B - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32C - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32D - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32E - Flightplan: None@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F - Flightplan: Registered@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] One of them had a registered flightplan after all.@w4 It could've been one that was already prepared, or the crew might've done it while loading.

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control >@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F: Flightplan 115-678-067, 160-711-135, 170-730-192, 174-736-261, 177-740-370, 180-741-491, ...@w4 Destination: UCH-004 Kronos (Fleet Heavy Carrier) - Accelerating 15m/s2 (Current: 260m/s)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like the crew evacuated to the Kronos.@w6 That doesn't really help me, since I still have no idea where the Kronos and the rest of the fleet went.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] The last place to check would be the rear section of the Titan.@w3 If the zirax are watching any part of the ship, it'll be that one.@w2 I'll need to be extra careful, I could be stuck jetpacking home.
Chinese (simplified): < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦机库飞行控制台>@w2 UCH-050 Xiphos-32F: 飞行计划 115-678-067， 160-711-135， 170-730-192， 174-736-261， 177-740-370， 180-741-491， ...@w4 Destination: UCH-004 Kronos (Fleet Heavy Carrier) - Accelerating 15m/s2 (Current: 260m/s)@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来机组人员被紧急送至 Kronos.@w6 这并不能真正帮助我，因为我仍然不知道克罗诺斯和其他舰队去了哪里.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 最后检查的地方是泰坦的后部.@w3 如果兹瑞克斯在监视飞船的任何部分，那一定是那个.@w2 我需要格外小心，我可能会被困在飞回家的路上.

English: This terminal doesn't appear to work anymore.@w3\nThere's no power and the card slot is empty.
Chinese (simplified): 这个终端好像不能用了.@w3 \n没电了，卡槽是空的.

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A >@w4 < Authorized User Detected >@w4 Welcome back Tech-02, Clio Miuse@w3 There are several problems that need your attention:@p7 - Connection to Databanks 15 through 211 Lost@w2 - Connection to Power Rooms 01 and 02 Lost@w2 - Connection to System Core Lost@w2 - No response from A.I.D.A@w2 - No response from BRIDGE@p6 You have (5) Unread messages@w2 [ Urania ] RE: Good luck with the launch tomorrow [ Mel. P ] Call me when you get back sis! [ Valley Cars ] Extended Warranty < spam > [ Cpt. Mercer ] < to ALL > EVAC procedure! [ Alex Lamarr ] RE: Who wrote this crappy dialogue?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] This isn't what i'm looking for.@w2 Where's the flight data and the connections with the rest of the fleet?
Chinese (simplified): < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦服务器接入终端BV49A >@w4 < 授权用户检测 >@w4 欢迎回来，技术员编号-02， Clio Miuse@w3 有几个问题需要你注意:@p7 - 连接数据库15到211丢失@w2 - 连接到电源室01和02丢失@w2 - 系统核心连接丢失@w2 - A.I.D.A没有回应@w2 - 舰桥无回应@p6 You have (5) Unread 讯息@w2 [ Urania ] RE: 祝明天的启航会好运 [ Mel. English: < Unable to read file > File is an unsupported format or corrupted Please verify file integrity and try again@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Not again...@w3 Why can't these things just work?@p7 [ IDA ] I'm not sure about this, Commander.@w3 It may have something to do with half the databanks having been blown out the aft wall of the ship.@w2 I have a suspicion that it causes problems with data retrieval,@w2 but I could be wrong...
Chinese (simplified): < 无法读取文件 > 文件格式不支持或已损坏 请验证文件完整性并重试@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 又不行了...@w3 为什么这些东西无法 运作?@p7 [ IDA ] 我不好说，指挥官.@w3 有没有一种可能，有一半的数据库因为船的后壁被炸穿而飞出去了.@w2 我怀疑这会导致数据检索问题，@w2 但我也有可能是错的...
