Chinese (simplified): 显示人事记录: 凤凰行动@w3 上将Eric Stromo [ Kronos号 ] 中将娜塔莉·威利斯 [ Encaledus号 ] 中将 Steve Brindle [ Dione号 ] 舰长 Lydia Mercer [ Titan号 ] 舰长 Ravien Kamarov [ Calypso号 ] 舰长 Kurt Lanyan [ Rhea号 ] [ 971个更多名字 ... ]@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 搜索栏无效.@w3 我也不能向下滚动!@w3 一块垃圾!

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A >@w4 < Searching for connection to A.I.D.A@w2 .@w2. @w2. >@w4 ERR - Unable to connect to UCH-004 Kronos@p7 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Server Access Terminal BV49A > < Searching for alternative connections@w2 .@w2. @w2. >@w4 ERR - No authorized ship in range@w6 < Fleet-AI not detected >@w3 Encrypting Datacore Values ( Time Remaining: 5 minutes, 6 seconds )@p8 [ IDA ] Commander, you'd better stop that.@w3 We won't be able to get anything out of any of the Titan's systems if it completes.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I specialized in Fleet Security not computer systems, I have no idea how to stop it!@p8 [ IDA ] I will instruct you, Commander.@w3 You'll need to remove the cover on the console, pull out the optronic bridge in slot 25H and connect your suit's data cable into the diagnostics port next to the slot.
Chinese (simplified): < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦服务器接入终端BV49A >@w4 < 搜索连接A.I.D.A@w2 .@w2 . @w2 . >@w4 错误-无法连接到UCH-004 Kronos@p7 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦服务器接入终端BV49A > < 正在寻找替代连接方案@w2 .@w2 . @w2 . >@w4 错误-范围内没有授权舰船@w6 < Fleet-AI没有检测到>@w3 加密数据库 ( 剩余时间: 5 分， 6 秒 )@p8 [ IDA ] 指挥官，你最好把这东西停下来.@w3 如果泰坦的系统完成加密，我们将无法从它的任何系统中得到任何东西.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我的专业是维护舰队安全不是计算机系统，我不知道怎么阻止它!@p8 [ IDA ] 我来教你，指挥官.@w3 您只需要取下控制台上的盖子，拔出插槽25H上的光电桥，并将护甲的数据线连接到插槽旁边的诊断端口.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Okay, i've hooked my console up to my suit.@w5 What should I do with this optronic bridge?@w2 Can I keep it?@p8 [ IDA ] The system doesn't require it anymore, so I guess it makes no difference now.@p6 [ IDA ] I've convinced the system that I am A.I.D.A and that the disconnection from the fleet was due to the removal of the optronic bridge.@w3 Most of the ship's data is corrupted, missing or isolated in the RAM of individual consoles.@w2 However, I would like you to look at the screen as I access the Personnel records.@p9 Displaying Personnel Records for: Operation Phoenix@w3 Admiral Eric Stromo [ Kronos ] Vice-Admiral Natalie Willis [ Encaledus ] Vice-Admiral Steve Brindle [ Dione ] Captain Lydia Mercer [ Titan ] Captain Ravien Kamarov [ Calypso ] Captain Kurt Lanyan [ Rhea ] [ 971 more names ... ]@p2 Searching Personnel Files for: Commander {PlayerName} [ ID: 9143391 ] .@w2 .@w2 .@w8 No matches found@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What the hell does that mean?@p7 [ IDA ] I do not know.@w5 It's possible that your personnel file was corrupted or lost;@w2 You may have been stationed on Apollon Station and not part of the Operation Fleet.@w3 It's even possible that you were sent by UCH command a year later, which would explain the time difference.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Maybe for you, but the date I remember before waking up in that escape pod was the 24th of July, 2473. The day before the fleet was scheduled to leave!@w6 So there's still no answer as to how I got here and still no leads on where the rest of the fleet went.@p9 [ IDA ] The bridge consoles will likely have saved the fleet's heading if they were still operational at the time of the crash.@w4 The files on them will be heavily encrypted and I will not be able to access or transmit them until they're decrypted, which may take some time.@w2 More than usual since Relay 451 will be moving out of observational range soon.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好的，我已经把控制台连接到盔甲上了.@w5 我该怎么处理这个光电桥?@w2 我可以留着吗?@p8 [ IDA ] 系统不再需要它了，所以我猜现在没它也没有什么区别了.@p6 [ IDA ] 我已经说服了系统，我是A.I.D.A，舰队的断开是由于光电桥的移除.@w3 船上的大部分数据是损坏的，丢失或孤立在RAM的个人控制台.@w2 然而，我想让你在我访问人事记录时看一下屏幕.@p9 Displaying 人事记录 for: 凤凰行动@w3 上将Eric Stromo [ Kronos ] 中将 Natalie Willis [ Encaledus ] 中将 Steve Brindle [ Dione ] 舰长 Lydia Mercer [ Titan ] 舰长 Ravien Kamarov [ Calypso ] 舰长 Kurt Lanyan [ Rhea ] [ 971个更多名字 ... ]@p2 搜索人事文件: 指挥官 {PlayerName} [ ID: 9143391 ] .@w2 .@w2 .@w8 没有找到匹配的对象@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这是在搞什么鬼?@p7 [ IDA ] 我不知道.@w5 你的个人档案有可能被损坏或丢失;@w2 你可能驻扎在阿波罗空间站，而不是行动舰队的一部分.@w3 甚至有可能你是在一年后被UCH命令送来的，这就可以解释时差了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 也许对于你来说是的，但是的日期我记得在逃生仓醒来之前是2473年7月24日。就在舰队出发的前一天!!@w6 所以仍然没有答案关于我是怎么到这里的，仍然没有其他舰队去哪里的线索.@p9 [ IDA ] 舰桥控制台可能已经保存了机队的航向，如果它们在崩溃的时候还在运行的话.@w4 它们上面的文件将被严重加密，我将无法访问或传输它们，直到它们被解密，这可能需要一些时间.@w2 比往常更多，因为451号继电器很快就会脱离观测范围.

English: [ IDA ] It means that I will be unable to see if or when any of the zirax bases on the planet send an attack force.@w3 I will be limited to reading transmissions from other observation sites and from the zirax's own transmissions.@w3 There will of course be a delay,@w2 possibly of several minutes if I need to decrypt military transmissions.@p8 [ IDA ] Exercise caution, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 这意味着我将无法看到或知道这颗星球上的兹瑞克斯基地何时派遣攻击部队。@w3 我只能读取其他观察站的传输和兹瑞克斯自己的传输。@w3 当然会有延迟，@w2 如果我需要解密军事传输，可能会延迟数分钟。@p8 [ IDA ] 指挥官，小心行事。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nAside from being broken, this terminal has a pair of slots for two coded UCH Keycards.@w3\nI only have one keycard, so i'll need to find another keycard and some parts to repair this console before I can even consider booting it up.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n由于没有损坏，该终端有一对插槽用于两个编码的UCH 钥匙卡。@w3 \n我只有一个钥匙卡，所以我需要找到另一个钥匙卡和一些部件来修复这个控制台，在我甚至可以考虑启动它之前.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis console appears to be both broken and requires a pair of coded keycards to be accessed.@w2\nI'll see if I can get it working again when I come back.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这个控制台似乎都是坏的，需要一对编码的钥匙卡来访问.@w2 \n我回来后会看看是否能让它再次工作.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis terminal appears to be broken.@w3\nI can't get it to turn on and there's a rather sizable hole in the side of the console.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n终端显示故障.@w3 \n我无法打开它，在控制台的侧面有一个相当大的洞.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis is the only console on the bridge with an active power supply.@w2\nIt's also in bad condition and has taken some serious damage, like everything else on this ship.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是舰桥上唯一有电源的控制台.@w2 \n它的情况也很糟糕，已经受到了一些严重的损坏，就像这艘船上的其他所有东西一样.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis console has a pair of card slots for authorization,@w2 as expected.@w3 It shouldn't be a problem since I have two keycards already.@w2\nThe other problem is that it looks like something blew a hole clean through the back of the console.@w3 The damage isn't too bad.@w3 I should be able to fix it with 10 Electronics, 3 Optical Fiber cables and 1 Computer.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这个控制台有一对卡槽用于授权，@w2 就跟我们猜测的一样.@w3 应该没问题，因为我已经有两张钥匙卡了.@w2 \n另一个问题是，它看起来像一个洞完全通过控制台的背面.@w3 损坏不算太严重.@w3 我应该可以用10电子元件， 3根光纤 以击 1个计算机进行修复.

English: You carefully replace the damaged cables and circuitboards with their replacements.@w2 Hopefully none of the damage is to the console's local storage device.@p8 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w4 Booting up@w2 .@w2 .@w2 . @w6 < Warning! Damage to systems detected > < No connection to fleet > Start in SAFE MODE?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, sure.@w2 Start in safe mode.@w8 Oh right,@w2 I should stick the Keycards in the slots.@p9 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Starting in SAFE MODE@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w4 Authorization Confirmed #1: Tech-02 Miuse, Clio@w4 Authorization Confirmed #2: Tech-49 Harper, Jack@w7 Unlocking Console Restrictions@w4 Opening Datalinks@p9 [ IDA ] Commander, I can now access the command console's system.@w4 The files on this terminal are encrypted and cannot be read or transmitted remotely until they've been unlocked.@w3 The content of the files should still be readable from the terminal.@w2 Please verify that the relevant files are stored on that terminal, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): 小心地更换损坏的线缆和电路板.@w2 希望没有损坏控制台的本地存储设备.@p8 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦号舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w4 启动@w2 .@w2 .@w2 . @w6 < 警告! 检测到系统损坏 > < 舰队没有连接 > 在安全模式下启动?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 恩，确定.@w2 以安全模式启动@w8 噢，对，@w2 我应该把钥匙卡插在插槽里.@p9 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦号舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w2 Starting in SAFE MODE@p6 < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦号舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w4 授权确认 #1: 02号技术员 Miuse， Clio@w4 授权确认 #2: 49号技术员 Harper， Jack@w7 解锁控制台限制@w4 打开数据链@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我现在可以访问命令控制台的系统.@w4 此终端上的文件是加密的，在未解锁之前无法远程读取或传输.@w3 文件的内容应该仍然可以从终端读取.@w2 请检查相关文件是否存储在该终端，指挥官.

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 < -ERR- Unable to access file >@w3 File is encrypted or corrupted@w3 Please run a system diagnostic on this drive and try again@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, can you see this?@w3 The fleet connection data is either encrypted or corrupted.@w2 I thought that i'd be able to read the files even with this terminal while it was encrypted.@w2 Doesn't seem to be the case here.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] I cannot access the display of the console commander, I can only access the raw encrypted data, which I am still in the process of decrypting.@w5 I would guess that the file is either corrupted or the drive storing the files is one of the ones destroyed.@w2 Try one of the other directories, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): < UCH-002 M.S 泰坦号舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w2 < -ERR-无法访问文件 >@w3 文件被加密或损坏@w3 请对该驱动器进行系统诊断并重试@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，你能看到吗?@w3 舰队连接数据被加密或损坏.@w2 我以为我可以读取文件，即使这个终端是加密的.@w2 这里似乎不是这样的.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] 我无法访问控制台的显示器，指挥官， 我只能访问原始加密数据，我还在解密过程中.@w5 我猜这个文件要么损坏了，要么存储文件的驱动器是其中一个被破坏的.@w2 尝试其他目录，指挥官.

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Displaying combat logs of the UCH-002 M.S Titan on Display-1@w3 Displaying combat logs of Captain Lydia Mercer on Display-2@w3 Displaying video logs from interior cameras G2 to G9 on Display-3@w3 Displaying Radar, IFF and Flight control data on Display-4@p9 < Combat Logs of Captain Lydia Mercer: Display-2 >@w2 Creator: Captain Lydia Mercer @w2 Date: 25.07.2473 @w2 Captain's Log 2572021: The Titan is disabled.@w2 As the bearer of the experimental Warp Field Generator it took the brunt of the prolonged, uncontrolled journey through Hyperspace. As a result, the entire drive system, including the standard Warp Drive has overheated to the point that the cooling systems can't keep up with it.@p9 Captain's Log 2572021 Continued: An unknown alien fleet is approaching at combat speeds and is ignoring all attempts at communication.@w3 Their ships clearly outclass and outnumber ours two to one.@w2 It looks like this'll be the end of the Titan's maiden voyage.@w2 The decision's been made.@w5 We'll use the ship as a shield to draw the enemy's fire while the rest of the fleet withdraws.@p9 Captain's Log 2572021 Continued: I've given the order for the crew to get to the transports and head to the Kronos or whatever ship will take them.@w3 I'll board the last ship out after I make sure everyone else is out first.@w2 Going down with the ship is romantic and all,@w2 but it's one of those things i'd rather not do today.@w4 It takes the burden of command off my shoulders when everything's laid out before the first shot is even fired.
Chinese (simplified): < 人类联合理事会-002 M.S Titan 舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w2 显示 UCH-002 M.S Titan 的战斗日志在 Display-1@w3 显示舰长 Lydia Mercer 的战斗日志在 Display-2@w3 显示内部摄像头 G2 至 G9 的视频日志在 Display-3@w3 显示雷达、IFF 和飞行控制数据在 Display-4@p9 < 舰长 Lydia Mercer 的战斗日志：Display-2 >@w2 创建者： 舰长 Lydia Mercer @w2 日期： 2473年07月25日 @w2 舰长日志 2572021： Titan 已失去动力。@w2 作为实验性翘曲场发生器的携带者，它承受了通过高维空间的长时间、不受控制的旅程的冲击。结果，整个驱动系统，包括标准翘曲驱动器过热到冷却系统无法跟上的程度。@p9 舰长日志 2572021 续： 一个未知的外星舰队正以战斗速度接近，并且无视所有通信尝试。@w3 他们的飞船明显优于我们，数量是我们的两倍。@w2 看来这将是 Titan 处女航的终结。@w2 决定已经做出。@w5 我们将使用这艘船作为盾牌吸引敌人的火力，而其余的舰队撤退。@p9 舰长日志 2572021 续： 我已经下令让船员前往运输船，并前往 Kronos 或任何愿意接收他们的船只。@w3 我会在确保其他人都离开后登上最后一艘船。@w2 与船同沉听起来很浪漫，@w2 但那是我今天宁愿不做的事情。@w4 在第一枪发射之前，一切都摆在面前，这让我卸下了指挥的重担。

English: Go back and access Fleet Data Connection

Captain's Log 2572030: We're eight minutes into the first exchange with the enemy fleet.@w2 So far we've lost two transports, the Heidelberg and Edelman,@w2 and the Helene took a salvo of missiles across its starboard bow from one of those damned dreadnoughts.@w3 It's started falling towards the planet below and seems to be drawing as much fire as the Titan is.@p9 Captain's Log 2572030 Continued: The Titan's listing in the opposite direction towards the moon, but our starboard artillery is playing hell on those bastard's corvettes because of they've turned to sink what's left of the Helene.@w3 Still three transports on the deck waiting to leave and chief Lamarr is ignoring my evacuation order to purge the Warp Core, the goddamned fool!@p9 Captain's Log 2572035 Final Entry: This is the final log, transmitting it to the Rhea in case no one makes it off.@w3 There's only four ships staying behind and they're waiting for us to evac before they jump.@w5 I authorize Lamarr and Harper for posthumous promotions to Commander and and Lieutenant Commander respectively if I don't make it.@p9 Captain's Log 2572035 Continued: The Titan's flying dead stick. There's breaches on all decks and we've lost the shields completely.@w3 The strain against the moon's gravity is tearing the front off the ship so me and the rest of the bridge crew are headed for the last transport.@w3 Everyone, get your helmets sealed NOW!@w7 This is Captain Lydia Mercer of the UCH-002 Titan signing off.@w3 Good luck and godspeed everyone.
Chinese (simplified): 舰长日志 2572030: 我们与敌舰队的首次交战已经进行了八分钟。@w2 到目前为止，我们已经失去了两艘运输舰，海德堡号和埃德尔曼号，@w2 而海伦号则被一艘该死的无畏舰的导弹齐射击中了右舷船头。@w3 它开始向下面的星球坠落，似乎吸引了和泰坦号一样多的火力。@p9 舰长日志 2572030 续: 泰坦号正朝相反方向倾斜向月球，但我们的右舷炮火因为它们转向去击沉海伦号剩余部分而对那些混蛋的轻巡洋舰造成了地狱般的打击。@w3 甲板上仍有三艘运输舰等待离开，而拉马尔酋长无视我的撤离命令去清除翘曲核心，该死的傻瓜！@p9 舰长日志 2572035 最后记录: 这是最后的日志，我将其传输给瑞亚，以防没有人能逃脱。@w3 只有四艘船留下来，它们在等待我们撤离后才跳跃。@w5 如果我没能生还，我授权拉马尔和哈珀分别追授指挥官和中校指挥官。@p9 舰长日志 2572035 续: 泰坦号正在无人驾驶。所有甲板上都有破损，我们已经完全失去了护盾。@w3 月球的重力拉扯正在撕裂船头，所以我和其他舰桥人员正前往最后的运输舰。@w3 所有人，立即封好你们的头盔！@w7 这是UCH-002泰坦号舰长莉迪亚·默瑟的最后通讯。@w3 祝大家好运，一路顺风。

English: < UCH-002 M.S Titan Bridge Command Console AC12B >@w2 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras A1 through B4 on Display-1@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras B5 through C3 on Display-2@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras D2 through E8 on Display-3@w3 Displaying combat video of exterior cameras F1 through F6 on Display-4@p9 You watch the approach of the zirax fleet and the engagement of the UCH fleet on the ship's combat record logs@w4 @p8 The last transport leaves the crippled and heavily damaged Titan as it begins its descent towards the moon.@p8 The last transport changes course and enters the hangar of the M.S Titan's sister ship, the UCH-003 Rhea.@w8 Moments later the two remaining UCH ships achieve warp speed and vanish.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, I just watched the video recording of the fleet's warp out of the system of two ships.@w5 Do you think you could calculate their destination by the speed and angle of the ships before they warped to figure out where they went?@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] It is possible commander.@w5 I will need the file from the ship's computer before I can provide a definitive answer though.@w2 But...
Chinese (simplified): < 人类联合理事会-002 M.S Titan 舰桥指挥控制台 AC12B >@w2 显示 Display-1 上外部摄像头 A1 至 B4 的战斗视频@w3 显示 Display-2 上外部摄像头 B5 至 C3 的战斗视频@w3 显示 Display-3 上外部摄像头 D2 至 E8 的战斗视频@w3 显示 Display-4 上外部摄像头 F1 至 F6 的战斗视频@p9 你观看了 zirax 舰队接近和 UCH 舰队交战的船只战斗记录日志@w4 @p8 最后一艘运输船离开了受损严重、行动不便的 Titan 舰，开始向月球下降。@p8 最后一艘运输船改变航线，进入了 M.S Titan 的姐妹舰，人类联合理事会-003 Rhea 的机库。@w8 片刻之后，剩下的两艘 UCH 舰船达到翘曲速度并消失了。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，我刚刚观看了两艘船从星系中翘曲出去的视频记录。@w5 你认为你能通过船只翘曲前的速度和角度计算出它们的目的地吗？@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] 这是可能的，指挥官。@w5 不过我需要船上的计算机文件才能提供一个明确的答案。@w2 但……

English: [ IDA ] My apologies Commander.@w4 I failed to detect the launch of Zirax forces from the nearby facilities.@w2 They cut all external transmissions to ensure they wouldn't be intercepted.@p8 [ IDA ] I'm detecting a pair of Heavy Bombers that just launched.@w3 A Light Transport carrying a squad of a dozen troopers reached your location three minutes ago.@w2 They may very well be on your position any moment!@w7 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] How long until you're finished decrypting and uploading the files, IDA?@p8 [ IDA ] Several more minutes.@w5 I recommend removing the keycards as a precaution, Commander.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Roger that.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 抱歉指挥官.@w4 我没有检测到附近设施出发的兹瑞克斯部队.@w2 他们切断所有的外部传输，以确保它们不会被截获.@p8 [ IDA ] 我检测到一队刚刚启动的重型轰炸机.@w3 一艘轻型运输船载着十几个突击兵在三分钟后将会到达你的位置.@w2 他们随时可能到达你的位置!!@w7 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你多久才能完成解密和上传文件?， IDA?@p8 [ IDA ] 再等几分钟.@w5 作为预防措施，建议移除钥匙卡，指挥官.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 收到.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] The keycards are stuck in the reader!@w3 I can't pull them out!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah, Screw it!@w2 I don't have time for this!@w3 They'll have to stay there.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 门禁卡卡在读取器里了！@w3 我拔不出来！@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊，去他的！@w2 我没有时间处理这个！@w3 它们只能留在那里了。

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Don't be a smartass, you know damn well it sucks here!@w3 Now that the shutters are jammed, I just know i'll be the one sent to find the problem...@w5 I hate this job...
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 别耍小聪明了，你很清楚这里糟透了!@w3 现在快门被卡住了，我只是知道我将被派去寻找问题…@w5 我讨厌这个工作...

English: <color=#ffffff>I've got supplies which should make slightly more tolerable. I hope you like burgers!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我有一些补给，应该能让你稍微忍受一下。我希望你喜欢汉堡!</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>I could probably handle it for you, but it looks like the problem's in the control room.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我或许可以帮你处理，但看起来问题出在控制室。</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nOkay, I'm letting you through. Just pull that lever behind you and show your ID to Karlack behind the desk.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n好，我让你通过. 只要拉动你身后的控制杆，向桌子后面的Karlack出示你的ID.

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nGods damn it all!@w2 Not that too!@w4\nWhy does everything break when i'm on duty!?@w2 Why couldn't it be when someone else has this job?!
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n神该死!@w2 不是那样的!@w4 \n为什么我值班的时候什么都坏了!?@w2 为什么不能是别人做这份工作?!

English: <color=#ffffff>Can you hear me now? I think I got it working.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你现在能听到我说话吗?我想我搞定了.</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Tell me it didn't fall between the deckplates... If it did, it's gone for good.@w3 That means more paperwork for both of us.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Uhh... sorry. It looks like it did.@w4 Are you sure there's no way to get it back? @p8 [ Zirax Guard ] Alright, damn it.@w4 What's your name, Soldier?@w2 I need to put it on the logs.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 告诉我它没有掉在甲板之间…如果有，那就永远消失了.@w3 这意味着我们两个人都要做更多的文书工作.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Uhh……对不起。看起来是这样的.@w4 你确定没有办法找回来吗? @p8 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 好吧，该死的.@w4 士兵，你叫什么名字?@w2 我需要把它放在记录上.

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Praise Empyrion!@w4 I have enough problems with the shutters being stuck down again. The last thing I need to do is fix the com console as well.@w4 All these techs and none of them can step away from the mainframe to help with maintenance!@p9 [ Zirax Guard ] Alright so i'm gonna need your name for the logs if i'm gonna let you through.@w2 You'll need to go through full verification with Karlack in the control room.@w2 Standard procedure and all that.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 赞美Empyrion !@w4 我对百叶窗再次卡住的问题已经够多了。我需要做的最后一件事是修复通讯控制台.@w4 所有这些技术人员都不能离开主机来帮助维护!@p9 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 好了，如果我要让你通过，我需要你的名字作为记录.@w2 你需要和Karlack在控制室进行全面的验证.@w2 这是所有人都需要的标准程序.

English: [ Zirax Guard ] {PlayerName} the Defiant? What kind of stupid name is that?@w4 You'd have to have the dumbest parents in the galaxy to come up with a name like that for your kid!@w5 Give me a minute to call my partners over to laugh at this name!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Hey! How would you like it if I laughed at your name?@w4 Just buzz me through...@w3 If you wanna laugh at me, you might as well do it to my face.@p8 [ Zirax Guard ] I have no idea what you look like, you might be able to kick my ass.@w3 I'll keep my laughing confined to the observation room where you can't get me.
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ] {PlayerName} the Defiant？这是什么愚蠢的名字？@w4 你得有最愚蠢的父母才能想出这样的名字给你的孩子！@w5 给我一分钟，我要叫我的伙伴们过来嘲笑这个名字！@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 嘿！如果我也嘲笑你的名字，你会怎么想？@w4 就让我通过吧...@w3 如果你想嘲笑我，你最好当面来。@p8 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ] 我不知道你长什么样，你可能能打败我。@w3 我会把笑声限制在观察室里，你碰不到我。

English: <color=#ffffff>Just let me through, dude. I'm heading downstairs anyway.</color>
<color=#ffffff>I'm a small guy. I couldn't kick anyone's ass, even if I wanted.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我是一个小个子。我不能踢任何人的屁股，即使我想.</color>

English: [ Zirax Guard ]\nSTOP YELLING!!@w3\nYou may not be able to hear me, but I can damn well hear you!@p8
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ]\n停止大喊！@w3 \n你可能听不见我，但我确实能听到你！@p8

English: <color=#ffffff>BUZZ ME THROUGH! I CAN'T HEAR YOU!</color>
[ Zirax Guard ]\nVery funny.@w3\nI suppose you're looking for Solo and the Wookie?
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫]\n很有趣.@w3 \n我猜你是在找索罗和伍奇吧?

English: [ Zirax Guard ] Gandalf? I knew a guy like that once.@w2 Elderly chap, big gray beard, pointy hat...@w5 Not seen him for six months...@w7 Is that you?
Chinese (simplified): [ 兹瑞克斯守卫] 甘道夫?我认识一个这样的人.@w2 上了年纪的家伙，大灰胡子，尖尖的帽子……@w5 半年没见了...@w7 是你吗?

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis appears to be a communication's console with a line open to somewhere else on the base.@w2\nI need to get closer to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这似乎是一个通信的控制台，有一条线连接到基地的其他地方.@w2 \n我需要靠近才能激活它.

English: [ Communication ]\nCome in!@w3 Karlack!@w3 What's happening there?@w3 Respond!
Chinese (simplified): [ Communication ]\n请进!@w3 Karlack !@w3 那里发生了什么?@w3 回应!

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, Everything's under control,@w2 Situation normal.@p7 [ Operator ] What happened?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, We had a slight weapons malfunction,@w2 But uh... everything's perfectly alright now.@w2 We're fine.@w2 We're all fine here now,@w2 thank you.@w5 How are you?@p8 [ Operator ] We're sending a squad up.@p5
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] Uh，一切尽在掌握，@w2 情况正常.@p7 [ 操作员 ] 发生了什么事?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh，我们有一个轻微的武器故障，@w2 但是呃…现在一切都很好w.@w2 我们很好.@w2 我们现在都很好.@w2 谢谢.@w5 你是谁?@p8 [ 操作员 ] 我们派了一个班上去.@p5

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Uh, uh... Negative, negative.@w3 We have a reactor leak here now.@w2 Give us a few minutes to lock it down.@w3 Large leak, very dangerous.@p8 [ Operator ] Who is this?@w2 What's your operating number?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] Uh，嗯…完蛋完蛋.@w3 我们这里现在有一个反应堆泄漏.@w2 给我们几分钟锁定它.@w3 大泄漏，非常危险.@p8 [ 操作员 ] 这是谁?@w2 你的操作号码是多少?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Uh...

English: Xenu Mainframe: Fire Detection and Suppression System
Chinese (simplified): Xenu主机:火灾探测和抑制系统

<color=#ff5c5c>Mainframe Overview:</color> All Systems Normal
<color=#ff5c5c>Security:</color> Lockdown B1 and B2 in effect
<color=#ff5c5c>Cooling Tower 01:</color> Operational

<color=#ff5c5c>Halon-1301 levels:</color> 97% (Log Entered)

<color=#ff5c5c>主机简介:</color> 所有系统正常
<color=#ff5c5c>安全措施:</color> 闭锁B1和B2激活
<color=#ff5c5c>冷却塔01: </color>正常运转
<color=#ff5c5c>冷却塔02: </color>正常运转
<color=#ff5c5c>发电机输出: 91.8% (正常)

English: < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks are refilled 1328-3299-4855: Fire detected in kitchen 1328-3299-4856: Fire Suppression Activated 1328-3299-4858: Fire Suppression Deactivated 1332-3299-0000: Routine Diagnostics 1332-3299-0005: Diagnostics End@p9 < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1332-3299-0006: Warning: Inconsistent Halon levels detected > < Note added to logs > Amount of Halon missing is exactly one liter. Suggests intentional theft. 1335-3299-9201: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol 1337-3299-6942: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol
Chinese (simplified): < 灭火系统使用日志 > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks are refilled 1328-3299-4855: 厨房失火 1328-3299-4856: 灭火激活 1328-3299-4858: 灭火停用 1332-3299-0000: Routine Diagnostics 1332-3299-0005: Diagnostics End@p9 < Fire Suppression Usage Logs > 1332-3299-0006: Warning: Inconsistent Halon levels detected > < Note added to logs > Amount of Halon missing is exactly one liter. Suggests intentional theft. 1335-3299-9201: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol 1337-3299-6942: Incinerator activated - Fire Suppression paused by Toaster Protocol

English: < Fire Suppression Maintenance Logs > 1320-3299-7851: Tanks were refilled after the suppression system wouldn't turn off due to a missing closing bracket in the coding that controls the shut-off valve on the Incinerator's suppression system. I've removed the control module and replaced it with 'Toaster Protocol' that will pause the shut-off for a few minutes instead of doubling up requests for the suppression system tied to the control room.@p8 < Fire Suppression Maintenance Logs > 1332-3299-0006: This is the third time the diagnostics on the tank levels have come up with a 1 liter difference. I first suspected that one of the goons on the observation room duty is extracting the Halon to sell. But it seems that they may be intentionally inhaling it for fun.
Chinese (simplified): < 灭火维护日志 > 1320-3299-7851:由于焚烧炉灭火系统上控制关闭阀的编码中缺少一个关闭支架，灭火系统无法关闭后，罐被重新填充. 我已经删除了控制模块，并将其替换为“烤面包机协议”，将暂停关闭几分钟，而不是加倍请求的抑制系统绑定到控制室.@p8 < 灭火维护日志 > 1332-3299-0006:这是第三次油箱液位诊断出现1升的差异。我一开始怀疑是观察室值班的一个打手在提取哈龙来卖。但它们似乎是为了好玩而故意吸入.

English: < Xenu Mainframe: Overview > Teleporter Uplink Room: No Fires Detected Ventilation System: No Fires Detected Security Checkpoint: No Fires Detected Security Control Room: No Fires Detected Living Quarters: No Fires Detected Observation Room: No Fires Detected Storage Bay: No Fires Detected
Chinese (simplified): < Xenu主机:概述 > 传送点上行空间: 没有探测到火灾 通风系统: 没有探测到火灾 安全检查站: 没有探测到火灾 安全控制室: 没有探测到火灾 生活区: 没有探测到火灾 观察室: 没有探测到火灾 贮藏间: 没有探测到火灾

English: < Fire Alarm Activated >\nCaution!! - Fire Alarm has been activated in the Living Quarters@w4\nUnlocking all security doors and sounding automated alert to all personnel.
Chinese (simplified): < 火灾报警被激活 >\n小心!! - 火灾警报已在生活区激活@w4 \n解锁所有安全门并向所有人员发出自动警报.

English: Hey, Chill dude! I just work here!\nI'll make you a deal! I've been storing some stuff in a container in the storage bay with the code 1, 2, 3, 4.\nEasy to remember, huh? Just... don't kill me! Please...
Chinese (simplified): 嘿，冷静点兄弟!我只是在这里工作的!我跟你做个交易!我在储物舱的一个容器里放了一些东西代码是1 2 3 4.\n很容易记住，是吧?只是…不要杀我!请……

English: Xenu Mainframe: Cooling Tower Control Board

< Cooling Tower 01-02 > Warning! The turbines are operating at 100% capacity to keep the mainframe systems cooled. Excess heat produced by the power system is shunted into heat sinks and dumped into the moon's Regolith.@p9 In the event of an obstruction to a turbine, pull both shutdown levers located in each tower (Code 7149).@w4 Do NOT shut down both turbines at the same time or you risk overheating the system, causing an explosion that will deal significant damage to the Mainframe's infrastructure.
Chinese (simplified): < Cooling Tower 01-02 > 警告!警告!涡轮机正以100%的功率运转以保持主系统的冷却。电力系统产生的多余热量被分流到散热器中，并倾倒到月球的风化层中.@p9 在涡轮机受阻的情况下，拉扯位于每个塔的两个关闭杠杆(代码7149).@w4 不要同时关闭两个涡轮机，否则你可能会导致系统过热，导致爆炸，对主机的基础设施造成重大破坏.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] It appears to run on some form of electricity.@p7 [ IDA ] Well, you're not wrong there.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 它似乎通过某种形式的电力运行.@p7 [ IDA ] 好吧，你没有错.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI have no more business with this terminal

< MCT - Decryption Protocol > Decryption Program is currently running@w4 Progress at 24% (Time Remaining: 2 hours, 17 minutes and 49 seconds)@w6 < Internal Partitions: Omega > Full lockdown from Decryption Target (0% contamination) - Decrypted files will be transmitted to ZRXHC-com upon completion - Decryption cannot be cancelled by Executive Order 341707 without inputting your 13-digit command code
Chinese (simplified): < MCT -解密协议 > 解密程序目前为运行中@w4 进度为24%(剩余时间:2小时17分49秒)@w6 < 内部分区:Omega> 完全锁定解密目标 (0%污染) -解密文件完成后将被传输到 ZRXHC-com 行政命令341707不可以取消解密，除非输入您的13位命令代码

English: <color=#ffffff>MainMenu > ControlPanel > Connections > Configure > New > Open External Connection</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>主菜单 > 控制面板 > 连接 > 配置 > New > 打开外部连接</color>

English: < MCT - Configuring New Connection >@w3 Configuring new connection@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 Connecting to [ RadarStationPrimaryControl/SignalRelay443-2 ]@w4 Connection Established@p8 Receiving Communication ( Secure Line )
Chinese (simplified): < MCT -新建连接 >@w3 新建连接@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 Connecting to [ 雷达站主控制/信号中继站443-2 ]@w4 连接建立@p8 接收通信 ( Secure Line )

English: [ IDA ] Hello, Commander.@w3 It seems you did alright without me.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm not completely useless, you know.@w4 But even I can't stop the decryption process without the Command Code, and I don't think this guy is gonna tell me.@w3 Are you able to shut down the decryption or will I have to shoot the console?@w5 @p8 [ IDA ] I am sorry, Commander.@w3 I cannot bypass the Command Code either.@w5 I can however, access the decrypted data and download it. The rest can be purged from the system before the Zirax attempt to retake the facility.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That leaves everything to chance that the data they've already decrypted contains the warp coordinates to the fleet's location!@w4 Without that data, we're dead in the water again!@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] Safeguarding the fleet and the Warp Field Generator technology is more important than finding them, Commander.@w5 The coordinates may still be in the decrypted data and Polaris is still a viable source of information.@w3 There are other ways to rejoin the fleet, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] Hello， 指挥官.@w3 看来没有我你也过得不错.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我是个没用的人，你知道的.@w4 我没有命令代码也不能停止解密过程，而且我不认为这个家伙会告诉我.@w3 如果你不能关闭解密的话，搞不好我不得不射击控制台了@w5 @p8 [ IDA ] 对不起，指挥官.@w3 我也不能绕过命令代码.@w5 我却可以访问解密数据并下载它。其余的可以在兹瑞克斯试图重新占领设施之前从系统中清除.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 他们已经解密的数据包含舰队位置的跃迁坐标，这一切都是随机的!@w4 没有这些数据，我们又要完蛋了!@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] 保护舰队和曲流场发生器技术比找到它们更重要，指挥官.@w5 坐标可能仍然在解密数据中，极星仍然是一个可行的信息源.@w3 还有其他方法重新加入舰队， {PlayerName}.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] We purge the data...@w3 and hope that what they've decrypted so far has what we need.@w3 We can't let them finish the decryption and threaten the fleet!@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] I agree with your assessment, Commander.@w3 The security of the fleet is paramount and I will do whatever is necessary to prevent casualties to UCH personnel.@w4 Had you decided to allow the decryption to continue, I would have to take matters into my own hands.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我们清除数据...@w3 希望他们目前解密的东西有我们需要的东西.@w3 我们不能让他们完成解密并威胁到舰队!@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] 我同意你的评估，指挥官.@w3 舰队的安全是最重要的，我将采取一切必要措施防止UCH人员伤亡.@w4 如果你决定继续解密，我就得自己动手了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] We let them continue...@w3 I won't miss this chance to rejoin the fleet!@w4 I've been through too much, wasted so much time and put my life on the line more than enough times.@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] Understood...@w2 Commander.@w4 I do not agree with your assessment.@w4 I recommend that you reconsider your actions {PlayerName}.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] No, I don't think I will.@w4 You can help me by disabling the uplink out of here, so that the mainframe can't transmit the data back to the Zirax Command.@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] Let me identify the correct node, Commander.@w4 Then I will give you the instructions to disable the uplink.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我们让他们继续...@w3 我不会错过这个重新加入舰队的机会!@w4 我经历了太多，浪费了太多的时间，让我的生活处于危险之中的次数已经够多了.@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] 理解...@w2 指挥官.@w4 不过我不同意你的评估.@w4 我建议你重新考虑你的行为{PlayerName}.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 不，我想我不会了。@w4 你可以帮我关闭这里的上行链路，这样主机就不能把数据传回兹瑞克斯指挥部.@w6 @p8 [ IDA ] 让我找出正确的节点，指挥官.@w4 然后我会告诉你关闭上行链路的指令.

English: <color=#2eafff>Thanks for backing me on this, IDA.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>感谢你在这个问题上的支持， IDA.</color>

English: [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w4 Sacrificing the fleet's safety to return to them is an act of treason, no matter the reasons.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] So how do we download what they'd already decrypted and purge the rest of the data core?@w6 Neither of us can access the data core without that command code.@p8 [ IDA ] If the data partitions are removed, I can corrupt the safety protocols causing it to identify the Titan Data as a hostile entity and force a system purge.@w5 Once the partitions are out of the way, I can retrieve the decrypted files before the purge is started.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 是，指挥官.@w4 不管什么原因，牺牲舰队的安全回到他们身边都是叛国罪.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么我们如何下载他们已经解密的内容并清除其余的数据核心呢?@w6 没有那个命令代码，我们俩都不能访问数据核心.@p8 [ IDA ] 如果数据分区被删除，我可以破坏安全协议，导致它将泰坦数据识别为敌对实体并强制系统清除.@w5 一旦分区被清除，我就可以在清除开始之前检索解密文件.

English: [ IDA ]\nThere is a switch located behind that door.@w4\nI cannot pull the lever, but I can open the door for you, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n那扇门后面有一个开关.@w4 \n我拉不动杠杆，但我可以为你开门，指挥官.

English: [ IDA ]\nI am managing the console, Commander.\nYou need to flip the switch to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n我管理控制台，指挥官.\n需要按下开关才能完成任务.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] What the hell is going on?!@w4 IDA! The core is being purged!@w2 Stop it!@p8 [ IDA ] I'm sorry {PlayerName}, but I can't do that.@w7 I am programmed to protect the fleet and it's people at any cost.@w4 Your selfish actions to rejoin the fleet put the lives of hundreds of other UCH personnel in jeopardy.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You betrayed me!@w3 That was my only way back home!@p6 [ IDA ] No, {PlayerName}.@w2 You betrayed the UCH by choosing yourself over them.@w2 There was no way to stop the uplink,@w2 so I took command of the situation to ensure the safety of the fleet...@w3 even if it meant decieving you.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 到底发生了什么事？！@w4 IDA! 核心正在被清除！@w2 停止它！@p8 [ IDA ] 对不起 {PlayerName}，但我做不到。@w7 我被编程来保护舰队及其人员，不惜一切代价。@w4 你自私的行为想要重新加入舰队，将数百名其他UCH人员的生命置于危险之中。@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你背叛了我！@w3 那是我回家的唯一方式！@p6 [ IDA ] 不，{PlayerName}。@w2 你背叛了UCH，选择你自己而不是他们。@w2 没有办法停止上行链路，@w2 所以我接管了情况，以确保舰队的安全...@w3 即使这意味着欺骗你。

English: [ IDA ] I have initiated the System Purge, Commander.@w3 With the partitions removed, I have also started the data retrieval ahead of the purge.@p8 [ IDA ] I am sorry that you were forced to give up your chance to rejoin the fleet, Commander.@w3 There will be other chances and other opportunities to find the remaining UCH Forces in this galaxy.@w3 You made the right decision.@w4 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Who knows?@w2 The answers we need might be in those files you took from their system.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 指挥官，我已启动系统清除程序。@w3 随着分区的移除，我也开始了清除前的数据检索。@p8 [ IDA ] 很抱歉，指挥官，你被迫放弃了重新加入舰队的机会。@w3 在这个星系中，还会有其他的机会和其他的机会找到剩余的UCH力量。@w3 你做出了正确的决定。@w4 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 谁知道呢？@w2 我们需要的答案可能就在你从他们系统中获取的文件中。

English: [ IDA ] What you did was an act of treason, {PlayerName}.@w3 Under UCH Naval law you would be subject to a Court-martial and stripped of your rank.@p8 [ IDA ] However...@w4 In light of recent events and the fact that the action was not completed,@w2 I am willing to seal the record of your...@w3 transgression {PlayerName}.@w5 Just this once, Commander.@w3 You saved my life and I consider that debt now repaid.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Thank you, IDA...@w4 I hope things can go back to the way they were between us.@p8 [ IDA ] One hopes that would be the case, Commander.@w5 What you do next depends on the decrypted files I retrieved from the mainframe before the purge wiped the data core.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 你所做的是叛国行为， {PlayerName}.@w3 根据UCH海军法律，你将会受到军事法庭的审判，并被剥夺军衔.@p8 [ IDA ] 然而...@w4 鉴于最近发生的事件和行动尚未完成的事实，@w2 我愿意封存你的...@w3 罪行{PlayerName}.@w5 就这一次，指挥官.@w3 你救了我的命，我认为你的恩情现在已经还清了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 谢谢你， IDA...@w4 我希望事情能回到我们之间的方式.@p8 [ IDA ] 希望是这样，指挥官.@w5 下一步的操作取决于我在清除数据核心之前从主机上获取的解密文件.

English: [ IDA ] Most of the information retrieved from the files is fragmented or incomplete without the rest of the data in the core.@w4 Perhaps for the best as I am not sure if the mainframe was storing or backing up the files with another system that I don't have access to.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] I can reconstruct many of the files that the zirax will not be able to as I am familiar with the Titan's systems.@w4 I was able to successfully reconstruct some of the video recordings of the fight between the UCH and Zirax fleet, including the view from an external camera of the Kronos' trajectory when it initiated a warp jump.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 从文件中检索到的大部分信息都是碎片化或不完整的，没有核心中的其他数据.@w4 也许是最好的，因为我不确定主机是否在用另一个我无法访问的系统存储或备份文件.@w4 @p8 [ IDA ] 我可以重建许多兹瑞克斯无法重建的文件，因为我熟悉泰坦号的系统.@w4 我能够成功地重建UCH和兹瑞克斯舰队之间战斗的一些视频录音，包括从外部摄像机看到的Kronos启动曲速跳跃时的轨迹.

English: <color=#2eafff>Can you still calculate that trajectory and find out where the ships jumped to?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你还能计算出轨迹并找出飞船跳到了哪里吗?</color>

English: [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w3 I should still be able to calculate the Kronos' trajectory from the recording, but I was only able to reconstruct the data from one camera.@w3 It will reduce the accuracy of my calculations...@p9 [ IDA ] It will take some time to finish the calculations of angle and distance, Commander.@w4 I recommend escaping back to the Radar Station before the zirax attempt to retake this facility.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 是，指挥官.@w3 我应该仍然能够从记录中计算出Kronos的轨迹，但我只能从一台相机重建数据.@w3 这会降低我计算的准确性…@p9 [ IDA ] 完成角度和距离的计算需要一些时间，指挥官.@w4 我建议在兹瑞克斯试图夺回这个设施之前逃回雷达站.

English: <color=#2eafff>If anyone can find out where they went, IDA. It's you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果有人能找出他们去了哪里，IDA。是你.</color>

English: Welcome to the Galactic Information Network\nThe Galactic Information Network's function is the timely and effortless distribution of supplies, commodities and people from one location to another using a consortium of registered Pilots and Freighters.\nPlease enter your query below
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到银河信息网络\n银河信息网络的功能是通过一个由注册的飞行员和商船组成的联盟，及时、轻松地将物资、商品和人员从一个地点分发到另一个地点.\n请在下面输入您的查询

English: [ {PlayerName} ] This console is locked down and I can't access it without a viable command code.@w4 IDA, Can you do anything with this console?@p6 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 The system is currently locked down and isolated from the network.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like it's playing some kind of cooking video...@w4
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个控制台被锁定了，没有可行的命令代码我不能访问它.@w4 IDA，你能用这个控制台做什么吗?@p6 [ IDA ] 没有，指挥官.@w3 当前系统被锁定，与网络隔离.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 好像在玩什么烹饪视频...@w4

English: [ {PlayerName} ] This console is locked down and I can't access it without a viable command code.@w4 IDA, Can you do anything with this console?@p6 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w3 The system is currently locked down and isolated from the network.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个控制台被锁定了，没有可行的命令代码我不能访问它.@w4 IDA，你能用这个控制台做什么吗?@p6 [ IDA ] 没有，指挥官.@w3 当前系统被锁定，与网络隔离.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I've found the main computer,@w2 It wasn't particularly well guarded or hard to get to.@w5 Something's not right here... @p8 [ IDA ] It seems I was wrong, Commander.@w5 The Titan Data is not here...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Well this terminal should at least say where it could be on the station.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我已经找到了主计算机，@w2 它不是特别好保护或很难进入.@w5 有些地方不对... @p8 [ IDA ] 似乎我错了，指挥官.@w5 泰坦数据不在这里...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 这个终端至少应该说明它可能在空间站的什么地方.

English: < Primary Control Board - Directory > Currently logged in as: Tar'bersiir [ 0335718 ]@w3 Resume viewing of '2 Grills 1 Cut - Zirax Barbecue Techniques'?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] What the hell was this guy watching when I came in? @w4 Uhh...@w2 no. I don't think I will continue watching that, thanks.
Chinese (simplified): < 主控制板-目录 > 当前登录为: Tar'bersiir [ 0335718 ]@w3 浏览记录为'2 女 1 杯 - 兹瑞克斯 Barbecue Techniques'?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我进来的时候这家伙在看什么鬼东西? @w4 Uhh...@w2 不. 我不认为我会继续看，谢谢.

English: < Primary Control Board - Search > Unknown Vessel: Titan@w3 Located on Mare 172-G in three sections. Systems sealed, Systems damaged, Unknown Technology. Monitor for attempts at repair and recovery.@w6 < Update: Alien personnel on site. Sending extraction team >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like they were watching the Titan for someone, me in this case, to come at attempt to fix or recover it.@w3 I played right into their hands.@w5 Let's see what happened with the extraction team...@p9 < Primary Control Board - Search: Extraction Team > Extraction Team: Mission Accomplished@w3 System Data retrieved from Titan computers and taken to Xenu Mainframe for Decryption and Processing.@w6 Caution: Asset-SC14 enroute to recover data > Defend Radar Station and Eliminate Alien Asset
Chinese (simplified): < 主控面板 - 搜索 > 未知舰船:泰坦@w3 位于172-G Mare三号区域。系统密封，系统损坏，技术未知. 修复和恢复尝试的监视器.@w6 < 更新:外星人员来到现场，派出提取团队 >@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他们正在监视泰坦，希望有人(在这里是我)来试图修复或恢复它.@w3 我正中他们下怀.@w5 让我们看看提取部队发生了什么..@p9 < 主控制板-搜索:提取组 > 提取组: 任务完成d@w3 系统数据从Titan计算机检索并取到 Xenu 超级主机 进行 处理 and 解密.@w6 警告: Asset- sc14正在恢复数据 > 防御雷达站并消除外星人资产

English: < Primary Control Board - Search: Asset-SC14 > Entity: Unknown@w3 Classification: ENEMY@w3 Known Encounters: (Tal320858), (Tal320922), (Pol35833201), (Pol35829717), (AI214)@w3 Background: Classified [ Security Black-66 ]@w3 Last Known Location: Xenu Radar Station Complex
Chinese (simplified): < 主控面板 - 搜索: Asset-SC14 > 实体: 未知@w3 分类: 敌人@w3 已知遭遇: (Tal320858)， (Tal320922)， (Pol35833201)， (Pol35829717)， (AI214)@w3 背景: 级别 [ 安全等级 黑-66 ]@w3 最后的位置: Xenu 集成雷达站

English: <color=#2eafff>Interesting, but not what i'm looking for.</color>

< Primary Control Board - Search: Xenu Mainframe > Structure: Central Mainframe for Sector Alpha@w3 Location: Classified@w3 Function: Data management and surveillance for arrival space sector@w3 Access: Restricted [ Security C-Red ]@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] The Titan Data seems to have been taken to the Xenu Mainframe, but it's all classified.@w4 Do you know anything about this Mainframe building, IDA?@p8 [ IDA ] I have accessed an unprotected console on the other side of the facility, Commander.@w4 The Xenu Mainframe is located 500 meters below the Radar Station Complex in a self-contained module not connected to the Radar Station.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] How do I get in there if it's half a kilometer underground? I can't exactly dig that far.@p8 [ IDA ] I have obtained a schematic of the first floor of the Mainframe and it seems that access to the module is handled by a Teleporter.@w4 There's a locked-down Teleporter on the opposite side of the Radar Station complex that appears to run on the same frequency as the one on the Mainframe.@p9 [ IDA ] The Teleporter is currently offline, but can be activated with a lever in this room.@w3 There are other security measures in place at the other end, Commander...@w7 That could be a problem...
Chinese (simplified): < 主控面板 - 搜索: Xenu 超级主机 > 设施: Alpha星区中央超级主机@w3 位置: 机密@w3 功能: 数据管理和轨道空间入侵监测@w3 访问: 受限制 [ 安全等级 C-红 ]@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 泰坦数据似乎是被带到Xenu主机，但都是机密.@w4 Ida，你知道这个超级主机设施吗??@p8 [ IDA ] 我在设备的另一端访问了一个未保护的控制台，指挥官.@w4 The Xenu 超级主机 位于雷达站综合体500米以下的一个独立模块内 未与雷达站连接.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 地下半公里怎么进去?我不能挖那么深.@p8 [ IDA ] 我已经获得了主机的第一层的示意图，似乎访问模块是由传送器处理的.@w4 在雷达站综合设施的对面有一个锁定的 传送器，似乎与主机的运行频率相同.@p9 [ IDA ] 传送器目前离线，但可以用这个房间的开关激活.@w3 在另一端还有其他安全措施，指挥官...@w7 这可能是一个问题...

English: [ IDA ] My connection with the console to the other side of the base has been cut.@w4 It seems that our intrusion here has been detected and reinforcements have been deployed to block our path, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我与基地另一边的控制台的连接已经被切断.@w4 看来我们的入侵已经被发现了，对方部署了增援部队来阻止我们的道路，指挥官.

English: < Com Array Transmission Status > - Preparing for Decrypted Data Transfer from Mainframe - - Testing Open Frequencies - Maintenance Teleporter is Active Warning! Exposure to high-intensity communication pulses is hazardous to the health of biological and cybernetic lifeforms. Avoid prolonged exposure.
Chinese (simplified): < 阵列阵列传输状态 > - 准备从超级主机解密数据传输 - - 测试打开频率 - 维护传送器激活 警告!暴露于高强度的通信脉冲对生物和控制性生命形式的健康是有害的. 避免长期接触.

English: The screen of the console lights up@p6 < UCH-002 M.S Titan Hangar Flight Control > < Unauthorized User Detected > < Insert Valid Keycard >
Chinese (simplified): 控制台屏幕亮起@p6 < UCH-002 M.S泰坦机库飞行控制 > < 发现非法用户 > < 插入有效钥匙卡 >

English: Welcome to the Galactic Information Network < This console is currently out of order > Our system is currently experiencing downtimes and subsequent server maintenance at this time, but will be back online in a few galactic days. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到银河信息网络 < 此控制台目前故障 > 我们的系统目前正处于停机和后续服务器维护期间，但将在银河几天后恢复正常. 谢谢您的理解和耐心.

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with our company!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n您收到了以下奖励: 25技能点，{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点我们公司的声望!!

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages! < ERROR > System Intrustion ! [ MESSAGE ] Hey pal, thanks for finding one of our missing shipments. The Syndicate extends it's thanks and warns you not to speak of this to anyone. You have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with < ERROR >
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹! < ERROR > 系统遭到入侵 ! [讯息] 嘿，伙计，谢谢你找到了我们丢失的货。联合会表示感谢，并警告你不要把这件事告诉任何人. 你获得了: 25技能点，{CargoReward} 银河信用点和100点< ERROR >的声望

English: While the Galactic Freighter Service delivers millions of packages to our customers across the galaxy every cycle, it's inevitable that a package may slip between the cracks and be lost, not collected by the recipient or stolen by pirates.\nIn the event that you find a sealed and undelivered package with our delivery tags on it, take it to your nearest GIN console and report it and we'll have someone collect it shortly.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然 银河货运服务 每个周期都在向我们的客户递送数百万个包裹，但不可避免的是，包裹可能会在裂缝之间丢失，而不是被收件人收取或被海盗窃取.\n如果您发现一个未开封的包裹 且上面有我们的送货标签，请将它送到您最近的 GIN 控制台并报告，我们会很快派人来取.

English: I've found a package intended for someone in the Trade Guild.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一个包裹，是为Trade Guild贸易工会的人准备的.

English: I've found a package with a recipient but no transfer tags.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一个包裹，有收件人，但没有传输标签.

English: I've found a package with Rados tags on it.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一个包裹，上面有 Rados 标签.

English: I've found an unopened package of supplies intended for a Polaris Habitat.
Chinese (simplified): 我发现了一个未打开的包裹，应该是要送去<b><color=#ffee00>极星聚居地</color>的.

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nThe House of Rados extends it's gratitude to all citizens of the Zirax Empire and rewards your loyalty accordingly.\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with the Zirax Empire!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n拉多斯家族向兹瑞克斯帝国的所有公民表达感激之情，并相应地奖励你的忠诚.\n您已获得: 25点技能点数，{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点兹瑞克斯帝国的声望!

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nPolaris Megacorp would like to remind you that the theft or opening of company property will be punished under galactic law [ ZLC-13356901 subsection-B ]\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with POLARIS!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你找回了我们丢失的包裹!\n极星巨型企业在此提醒您，盗窃或擅自开启公司财产将受到银河法律的惩罚[ ZLC-13356901 附属章节-B ]\n您将获得: 25技能点，{CargoReward}银河信用点和100点极星声望!

English: [ Markos ] I certainly damn well hope not!@w4 In my line of work,@w2 if my name gets out there, i'm done for.@w3 No one will deal with a named... 'merchant'.@w6 You tell me who gave you my name and i'll cut you in on this little job i've got lined up.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 我当然希望不会! !@w4 在我的工作中，@w2 如果我的名字泄露出去，我就完蛋了.@w3 没人会和一个叫…“商人”的人做生意.@w6 你告诉我是谁告诉你我的名字，我会让你加入我安排的这个小任务.

English: [ Unknown ] Well, well, well...@w4 It looks like it worked after all.@p8 [ Unknown ] If you're contacting me on this frequency that means that my little ploy worked and that cute lil' AI you've got is hooked into the polaris' net.@w4 That's a sweet con-job if I do say so myself.@w6 My problem is how you stiffed me over when you put my boys out the airlock!
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 不错，不错，不错…@w4 看起来它最终还是成功了.@p8 [ Unknown未知 ] 如果你在这个频率上联系我，这意味着我的小策略起作用了，你的可爱的小AI已经连接到极星'网络.@w4 要我说，这是一个甜蜜的骗局.@w6 我的问题是当你把我的孩子们放出气闸时，你怎么骗了我!

English: You must be Markos. I've heard your name before.
Chinese (simplified): 你一定是马库斯。我以前听说过你的名字.

English: Doesn't sound familiar. I think you may have me confused with someone else.
Chinese (simplified): 听起来不熟悉。我想你可能把我和别人搞混了.

English: I've put a lot of people out airlocks. So you have no idea how little that narrows it down.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经让很多人离开气闸了. 所以你不知道这范围有多小.

English: LIE: (I think i'll keep that pilot out of this)
Chinese (simplified): LIE: (我想我不会在这里提到飞行员)

English: TELL: I heard you lost some rather important cargo...
Chinese (simplified): TELL: 我听说你们丢了一些相当重要的货物...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Your name appears in several security queries in several of Kenex station's logs.@w4 Through Relay 451 I can access most of the station's secure logs and your name pops up a couple of times.@p9 [ Markos ] You remove my name from those logs and i'll cut you in on this little job i've got going.@w4 How's that sound, my friend? Good?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Already done.@w4 You have nothing to worry about from PolSec... friend.@w4 That's what friends are for, right?@p8 [ Markos ] You seem like my kind of people.@w3 I think we'll do just fine...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 您的名字出现在Kenex站点的几个日志中的几个安全查询中.@w4 通过中继451我可以访问空间站的大部分安全日志，你的名字会出现几次.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 你把我的名字从日志中删除，我就把我正在进行的这个小任务给你.@w4 听起来怎么样，我的朋友?好吗?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 已经完成.@w4 极星安保你没什么好担心的…朋友.@w4 这就是朋友的作用，对吧?@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 你看起来像我喜欢的那种人.@w3 我认为我们会做得很好...

English: [ Markos ] It was that damned pilot!@w4 Not only couldn't he keep is cargo doors shut, it seems he couldn't keep his mouth shut either!@w5 I'm going to have to send someone down there and help him stay quiet...@p8 [ Markos ] For the entertainment value of it, I would send you to do it but I have something else in mind for you.@w3 No, it's not the job I mentioned.@w4 This one's just for us to...@w2 get to know each other a bit better.@w4 To make sure I can trust you in my next job.@p9 [ Markos ] Still...@w2 you turned in that pilot,@w2 a nice guy,@w2 a bit jumpy perhaps but more or less an innocent bystander with very little persuasion.@w3 Either you're cold bastard or a slippery one.@w3 We could get on famously, or you could be after my spot.@w3 We'll see how things go after this job.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 就是那个该死的飞行员!@w4 他不仅不能保持货舱门关闭，似乎他也不能保持他的嘴关闭!@w5 我要派个人下去帮他保持安静...@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 考虑到它的娱乐价值，我想派你去做，但我有其他想法给你.@w3 不，不是我提到的工作.@w4 n这只给我们...@w2 更好地了解彼此。@w4 确保我可以信任你在我的下一个的工作.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] Still……@w2 你交出了飞行员，@w2 是个好人，@w2 可能有点神经质，但或多或少是个没有说服力的无辜旁观者.@w3 你不是冰冷的混蛋或一个狡猾的人.@w3 我们可以相处得很好，或者你可以来抢我的位置.@w3 我们看看这份工作之后事情会如何发展.

English: [ Unknown ] Listen here, you little shit!@w3 I spent a great deal of time, effort and money getting that com relay job set up only to have some fresh-off-the-pad nobody stick his abnormally large nose into my business that put me out of pocket and lost me a dozen men AND a shuttle.@p9 [ Unknown ] So don't you go telling me that i've got the 'wrong person'.@w4 I know for a goddamned fact that you've hijacked that relay and polaris is none the wiser, which is impossible for a biological.@w4 Which is how I know it was you.@w3 Only an A.I could do that, just as only an A.I could've gotten my hidden message from the com logs.
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 听着，你这个小混蛋!@w3 我花了大量的时间、精力和金钱建立了通讯中继站的工作，却有一些新鲜出炉的没有人把他异常大的鼻子伸到我的业务，让我掏腰包，让我失去了十几个人.@p9 [ Unknown未知 ] 所以你不要告诉我我找错人了.@w4 我知道一个该死的事实，你劫持了那个中继，极星没有人知道，这对一个生物来说是不可能的。@w4 所以我才知道是你.@w3 只有一个人工智能，才能这样做，就像只有一个人工智能，我可以从通讯中继日志中得到我隐藏的消息.

English: Okay, you've got me. So who am I dealing with here?
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>好吧，你找到我了。我在这里处理的是谁?</color>

English: [ Markos ] You can call me 'Markos' for now.@w6 You're clearly up to some sort of con-job with Polaris after taking one of their relays without them noticing;@w2 but i'm not so stupid that I can't spot a dodgy deal from a parsec away.@w6 Now i'm not gonna try and take your payday like you took mine.@w3 I'm nice like that.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Gee... thanks.@w4 So what do you want, Markos?@p6 [ Markos ] Simple.@w3 You owe me, buddy.@w3 You screwed up my payday, so now you're gonna help me with this little problem i've got since you're free to walk into any Polaris station and i'm not.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 暂时你可以叫我'Markos'。@w6 你显然在和Polaris搞某种诡计，悄无声息地拿走了他们的一个中继器；@w2 但我并不傻，我能从一光年外就看出一笔可疑的交易。@w6 现在我不会像你拿走我的那样去拿你的钱。@w3 我就是这样好心。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 哇... 谢谢。@w4 那么你想要什么，Markos？@p6 [ Markos ] 简单。@w3 你欠我的，伙计。@w3 你搞砸了我的收入，所以现在你得帮我解决这个小问题，因为你可以自由地走进任何Polaris的站点，而我不行。
<color=#2eafff>所以我们现在都开始谈生意了?</color>

English: [ Unknown ] Listen here, you little shit!@w3 Don't go acting tough in front of me!@w3 I know your type:@w2 The dumb soldier.@w2 You follow orders: 'Go here!', 'Guard that door!', 'Shoot that civilian!' and do very little thinking for yourself.@w4 And now you've cost me time, effort and money by screwing over my job on that com relay.@p9 [ Unknown ] So now, you're gonna follow MY orders or I send PolSec an anonymous tip that you've jacked one of their relays and we see how well your scam with them goes after that.@w3 You hearin' what i'm saying, pal?
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 听着，你这个小混蛋!@w3 不要在我面前逞强!@w3 我知道你的类型:@w2 愚蠢的士兵.@w2 你听从命令:“到这里!”“守住那扇门!”“开枪打死那个平民!”很少为自己考虑.@w4 现在你已经花费了我的时间、精力和金钱，因为你把我的工作搞砸了.@p9 [ Unknown未知 ] 现在，你要听从我的命令，否则我就给极星安保发个匿名举报，说你偷了他们的一个中继器，然后我们看看你跟他们的骗局有多成功。@w3 你听到我说的了吗，伙计?

English: [ Markos ] Yes, to business.@p5 [ Markos ] As you can probably guess, i'm in the business of supplying high-quality goods and services for lower than market prices.@w3 I try to keep things running smoothly and as under-the-radar as I can.@w3 Both literally and figuratively speaking.@p8 [ Markos ] My problem is that a certain someone screwed up while transporting a very valuable product to an even more important client.@w4 They got a PolSec patrol on their ass and had to dump the cargo to make a clean getaway.@w4 As i'm sure you can guess, Polaris got their hands on my shipment.@p9 [ Markos ] I got a lucky break here since the patrol was called off to deal with a Ghy'st frigate harassing a superfreighter that'd just entered the system.@w3 So they dropped the cargo off at Kenex station's logistics terminal and haven't checked it completely.@p9 [ Markos ] I need you to go in there and find that cargo and bring it back to me.@w4 I don't care how you go about it,@w2 But I need that box before they pop the top and find out what's inside.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 是，业务.@p5 [ 马库斯 ] 你可能猜到了，我从事的是以低于市场的价格提供高质量的商品和服务的行业.@w3 我试图保持事情运行中顺利，并尽可能不被发现.@w3 字面上的和比喻上的.@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 我的问题是，某个人把一个非常有价值的产品运送给一个更重要的客户时搞砸了.@w4 他们被极星安保巡逻队盯上了，不得不把货物倒掉，干净利落地逃走.@w4 我相信你能猜到，极星拿到了我的货.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 我在这里有一个幸运的突破，因为巡逻队被取消去处理一艘Ghy'st护卫舰，他正在骚扰一艘刚刚进入星系的超级货轮。@w3 所以他们把货物放在Kenex空间站的物流终端，并没有完全检查.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 我需要你进去找到那件货物，然后带回来给我.@w4 我不在乎你怎么做，@w2 但我需要那个盒子，在他们打开盖子，发现里面有什么之前.

English: <color=#2eafff>If Polaris catch me, they'll label me as a pirate!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果极星抓住我，他们会给我贴上海盗的标签!</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>How the hell am I supposed to find this box on an entire space station?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么可能在这么大的空间站里找到这个盒子?</color>

English: [ Markos ] What's in the box is none of your business.@w3 It's between me and the client,@w2 so keep your nose out of it.@p7 [ Markos ] All you need to know is that the contents of the box can be traced back to the client, which will in turn implicate me and a number of my other clients.@w3 That's a death sentence for me; Both for my reputation and in all likelihood, my life too.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 盒子里是什么不关你的事.@w3 它在我和客户端之间的重要联系，@w2 所以让你的鼻子保持灵敏.@p7 [ 马库斯 ] 你只需要知道盒子的内容可以追溯到我的客户，这将反过来牵连到我和我的许多其他客户.@w3 这对我来说是死刑;既为了我的名誉，也很可能是为了我的生命.

English: If they catch me, it'll be a death sentence for my reputation and life too!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果他们抓住我，对我的名誉和生命也算是死刑!</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>But how am I supposed to find it on a massive station like that?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么可能在这么大的空间站里找到这个盒子?</color>

English: [ Markos ] Not my problem.@w3 This is the price you're paying for screwing up my job with the relay.@p7 [ Markos ] If you're lucky, maybe they won't see you opening their cargo boxes@w5 Maybe you can bribe someone?@w3 Like I said, not my problem.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 不是我的问题.@w3 这就是你把我的中继站工作搞砸的代价.@p7 [ 马库斯 ] 如果你够幸运，也许他们不会看到你打开他们的货柜箱@w5 也许你可以贿赂某人?@w3 就像我说的，不是我的问题.

English: <color=#2eafff>What's in the box? It's not a severed head right?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>盒子里是什么?这不是一颗被砍下的头颅，对吧?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>How am I supposed to find one small box in a station of hundreds of other identical boxes?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么能在成百上千个相同的货箱中找到一个小盒子呢?</color>

English: [ Markos ] That's a job for that A.I of yours, not me.@p7 [ Markos ] I already sent in another guy to get the package, but I haven't heard back from him so i'm assuming he got caught.@w6 Do me a favor?@w3 Don't do what he did.@w5 Hell, if he was caught... He could be in the station security holding cells.@w4 Maybe he can tell you where the cargo is.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You're not giving me much to work with, pal.@w3 I could open every crate in that place and find nothing.@w3 It could already be too late and the box is lying on a desk in Station Security along with your last guy.@w3 Worse still,@w2 the guy you sent could've made off with the package to sell it himself!@p9 [ Markos ] No, he's a loyal dog.@w2 He's not gonna bite the hand that feeds him.@w3 As for the other, you won't know until you go looking for the right box.@p7 [ {PlayerName } ] But what if@p4 [ Markos ] Enough!@w3 Head to Kenex and find that package.@w2 No more 'what ifs' and no more 'buts'.@w3 I want results, not speculation.@w3 If you're worried about upsetting Polaris then find some way to get the package that won't piss them off.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 这是你那个人工智能的工作，不是我的。@p7 [ Markos ] 我已经派了另一个人去取包裹，但我还没有收到他的回音，所以我猜他可能被抓了。@w6 帮我个忙？@w3 不要重蹈他的覆辙。@w5 见鬼，如果他真的被抓了...他可能在站安全拘留室里。@w4 也许他能告诉你货物在哪里。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你提供的信息太少了，伙计。@w3 我可能打开那个地方的每一个板条箱，结果却一无所获。@w3 可能已经太晚了，那个箱子可能正躺在站安全部的办公桌上，连同你派去的那个人。@w3 更糟糕的是，@w2 你派去的那个人可能自己带着包裹逃走了，打算卖掉它！@p9 [ Markos ] 不，他是一条忠诚的狗。@w2 他不会咬喂他的手。@w3 至于其他的，你不会知道，除非你去找正确的箱子。@p7 [ {PlayerName } ] 但如果@p4 [ Markos ] 够了！@w3 去Kenex找到那个包裹。@w2 不要再'如果'了，也不要再'但是'了。@w3 我要的是结果，不是猜测。@w3 如果你担心惹恼了Polaris，那么就找到一种不会激怒他们的方法来获取包裹。

English: [ Markos ] Yeah.@w3 IF you can pull it off.@w5 I'll be impressed if you manage to do it without pissing off Polaris.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah...@w3 Such confidence!@w3 With such an 'inspiring leader', how can I possibly fail?@p5 [ Markos ] Don't be a dick.@w3 I have enough of those to deal with in my own crew as it is.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm sure you do.@p5 < User has disconnected >
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 是的.@w3 如果你能搞得定.@w5 如果你能做到不惹恼极星，我将会印象深刻.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊…@w3 这种信任!@w3 有这样的这样一个“鼓舞人心的领导者”，我怎么可能失败??@p5 [ 马库斯 ] 别逼逼.@w3 我在自己的团队里已经有足够多的人需要处理了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我相信你会的.@p5 < 用户已断开连接 >

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nThis is the Station Security Office.@w3\nIf you're here to report a crime, theft or murder on the station: Please speak to the receptionist.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n这里是空间站安全办公室.@w3 \n如果你需要上报罪犯偷窃或是谋杀: 请与前台交谈.

English: <color=#2eafff>Sorry, I was looking for the bathroom</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ]\nPublic toilets are on the floor below, to each side of the station control room.@w3\nDo NOT let me catch you in the wrong gender toilets or you'll be sharing a cell next to that idiot back there.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n公共 厕所 就在楼下，空间站控制室的两侧.@w3 \n别让我在其他性别的厕所里抓到你，那样你就得关在那个傻子隔壁了.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] No theft, no murder, no indecent exposure, no illegal drugs, the usual.@w3 Don't bribe the dockworkers as this guy found out.@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] The dockworkers may be manual laborers but they all have ties to one or another group are always being watched to make sure they don't sell off their competitor's shipment information to pirates.@w3 It's not worth the effort, and less damaging to do anything about the bribes to the security staff though.@w2
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 不许偷，不许抢，不和坏人交谈，不使用禁药，就很平常的一些规矩.@w3 不要像 这个 一样贿赂工人.@p8 [ Stalbort警官] 这些装卸工人虽然都是些苦劳力但是他们或多或少的和某个派系有所联系，总会有人盯着他们防止把竞争对手货物信息出卖给海盗.@w3 总之就是不值得这么做，不过贿赂安全人员倒是没那么大问题，就随口一说.@w2

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] Him?@w4 Got caught trying to bribe a dockworker.@w2 Hasn't said a word.@w3 Probably a pirate,@w2 thief@w2 or muscle for a competing trader trying to stiff his competition.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Can I speak to him?@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] No can do.@w4 Just asking to speak to him makes you suspicious in my book.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 他?@w4 他在收买装卸工的时候被抓到了.@w2 但是半个字都没吐出来.@w3 也许就是一海盗，@w2 小偷@w2 或者某个竞争者派来的打手，想着把竞争僵化.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我能和他聊聊吗?@p8 [ Stalbort警官] 当然不行.@w4 既然你这么问，我就不得不把你当成可疑人员了.

English: I don't suppose you're open to a bribe?
Paragon: I just want to find out why he was bribing the dockworker, that's all.
Chinese (simplified): 模范: 我就是想知道他为什么要贿赂装卸工，仅此而已.

English: Renegade: I'm sure I can beat an answer out of him for you, if you'd like.
Chinese (simplified): 叛逆: 我觉得一顿好打应该能让他吐出你想要的答案，如果你愿意让我这么做.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] You've got some balls asking a security officer if he'd take a bribe right after i'd told you this idiot was busted for doing just that.@w6 Fortunately for you,@w2 i'm not a dockworker.@w3 There's less scrutiny on me so i'm free to take the occasional pay-off as long as it doesn't hurt anyone.@p9 [ Officer Stalbort ] This guy's staying here though,@w2 so all you'll get is to chat with him.@w5 The price of doing business is 500 credits in cash.@w3 If you can't pay, then you won't be talking to my prisoner.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 在我告诉你这人就是因为贿赂进来的之后，你居然还敢对着我一个警官问我接不接受贿赂，还真是有种.@w6 不过你很幸运，@w2 我并不是装卸工.@w3 没什么人会盯着我所以赚点外快也是可以的，只要没人受伤就行.@p9 [ Stalbort警官] 不过那人不能放了，@w2 你只能和他说上两句.@w5 我的出价时 500 信用点，用 现金支付.@w3 如果你付不起，就没得谈了.

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got your money right here, Stalbort.</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ] Good, you have my payment.@p6 [ Officer Stalbort ] Alright, as promised.@w2 You may talk to the prisoner.@w3 There are cameras, but no sound.@w2 Don't touch the bars and don't pass anything to the prisoner.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 很好，我就收下了.@p6 [ Stalbort警官] 行，就像我保证的.@w2 你可以和那个囚犯谈谈.@w3 这虽然有摄像头，但是没声音.@w2 不要去碰栏杆 don't 或者是给囚犯递东西.@w2 明白吗?

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nAlright Prisoner!@w2\nYou've got a guest here who's wants to speak to you.@w2 So play nice.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n好了囚犯!@w2 \n你有个客人想和你谈谈.@w2 所以说学乖一点.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] You some kind of investigator or something?@w4 Here to expose the ringleader of these dumb thugs out to steal all Polaris' cargo or some self-righteous BS.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Something like that.@w2 Mostly because i'm curious about what he was trying to steal.@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] 'Aight, fine.@w3 It's no skin off my nose.@w2 I'll let you talk to him, just don't stick your hands between the bars.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 你是调查员还是什么的?@w4 来这里是想从他嘴里知道究竟是哪个恶棍头头想要偷极星的货？还是说为了正义之类的扯淡的话.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 差不多.@w2 我主要是好奇他打算偷点什么.@p8 [ Stalbort警官] '行吧.@w3 反正我也不感兴趣.@w2 我可以让你和他谈谈，但是不许吧手伸过栏杆啊.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] I've tried to get him to tell me what he was bribing dockworkers for, but he won't tell me.@w2 The worker he tried it on hadn't been told what he wanted before he offered the bribe.@w3 Smart, that is.@w2 Don't want him to know what they're after until you're sure he can't turn on you.@p9 [ Officer Stalbort ] If you think you can 'convince' him to come clean,@w2 I'll let you have your talk.@w3 Just as long as you tell me what he told you, when you're done with him.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 我也试着让他说出他想贿赂装卸工干什么但他就是不说.@w2 装卸工在他提出贿赂的时候也没有听说具体要求.@w3 确实是很狡猾的做法.@w2 在不确定别人是否会背叛他之前不说出自己的目的.@p9 [ Stalbort警官] 如果你能说服他坦白，@w2 我可以让你和他谈谈.@w3 只要你把他告诉你的都告诉我就行.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nIf you're here to report a crime...@w3 oh, it's you.@w5\nHave you got my money?
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n如果你是来上报犯...@w3 哦，是你啊.@w5 \n你把钱拿来了?

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got your money right here, Stalbort.</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ] Keep it down!@w2 The cameras don't have sound, but who knows who might be listening in!@p7 [ Officer Stalbort ] You wanna talk to the prisoner? It's 500 Galactic Credits in cash.@w4 So head on down to the ATM downstairs and get me my money.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 小声点!@w2 摄像头虽然没声音但是谁知道有没有人在偷听呢!@p7 [ Stalbort警官] 你想和囚犯谈话? 你只需要 给我500信用点的 c现金.@w4 你只需要下楼去ATM取就行.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nYou have five minutes.@w2\nMake 'em count.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n给你5分钟的时间.@w2 \n抓紧一点.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nIf you're done with your chat,@w2 I want you out of here.@w3\nIt'll look suspicious if you hang around here for too long.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n如果你聊完了，@w2 最好从这里离开.@w3 \n在这里待的越久就越可疑.

English: [ Prisoner ] The fuck do you want, errand boy?@w4 Ya come to offer me a deal? Well ya can kiss my scaly, ziraxian ass!@p7 [ Prisoner ] Better yet,@w2 give me a few minutes to squeeze one out and then ya can kiss my ass.@w4 How's zat for ya?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 你 他妈的 想要什么，跑腿的小屁孩?@w4 想跟我达成什么协议?先舔舔我这充满鳞片的兹瑞克斯 屁股!@p7 [ 犯人 ] 还有坨好的，@w2 我马上就给你拉出来 然后 你可以再来舔.@w4 这样的交易如何啊?

English: [ Prisoner ] Ah shit.@w3 Markos sentcha, din't he?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, you really screwed up this time.@p5 [ Prisoner ] You're not here to bust me out?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 啊，狗屎.@w3 是Markos叫你来的是吧?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 是啊，你这次算是彻底搞砸了.@p5 [ 犯人 ] 你不是来救我出去的?

English: <color=#2eafff>Sorry mate, wasn't part of the Job description.</color>
Yeah, but I need to secure the package first.
Chinese (simplified): 没错，但是 首先我得确保包裹到手.

English: [ Prisoner ] Yeah...@w2 Figgerd as much.@w4 I really screwed up big time.@w2 Picked the wrong goon to pay off.@p6 [ Prisoner ] But they can't actually hold me fer anythin' beyond the paying-off.@w3 I'll probably get a fine and tha's it.@w4 So 'f yer not here to break me out, what are ya here for?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 是啊...@w2 我也知道.@w4 我这次麻烦大了.@w2 收买的人不太对.@p6 [ 犯人 ] 不过除了收买人意外他们也没有其他理由把我关在这了.@w3 我最多也就吃个罚款.@w4 所以说如果你不是来救我的，那是来干啥的?

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you find the package Markos sent you to find?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你拿到Markos叫你来找的包裹了吗?</color>

English: [ Prisoner ] That don' sound like Markos.@w3 He knows they canna hold me fer anything longer than 'few days.@p7 [ Prisoner ] Don't ya go wasting ma time with yer muleshit!@w5 So tell me whatchu want and get outta here.
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 这听起来可不像Markos的作风.@w3 他知道这些人关不了我几天的.@p7 [ 犯人 ] 懒得和你这种跑腿的说了!@w5 告诉我你想要什么然后滚.

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you find the package Markos sent you to find?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你拿到Markos叫你来找的包裹了吗?</color>

English: [ Prisoner ] No.@w3 Was trying to pay off one of 'em cargo movers in the main terminal because they ain't lettin' me up into the logistic room without raisin' red flags since imma nawt a company man.@p8 [ Prisoner ] If you can get into the Logistics office without problems,@w2 ya can prolly use the terminal to find the right box.@w4 Get that box to Markos 'fore they start running checks on all the seized boxes they've gotten.
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 没有.@w3 我本来想收买楼下终端那里的装卸工，毕竟我不是企业里的人，所以他们不让我进物流间.@p8 [ 犯人 ] 如果你可以进到 物流办公室 里面，@w2 也许你可以用那个终端找到那个箱子.@w4 在他们开始清点箱子之前把它带给Markos.

English: [ Prisoner ]\nDon't worry 'bout me.@w3\nThey'll let me out in a few days and i'll head back.@w3 Boss won't be happy,@w2 but if you get the box back to him he'll be in a better mood and prolly let me off.@w4
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ]\n不用管我.@w3 \n几天之后他们就会把我放了，到时候自然会回去.@w3 头儿指定生气了，@w2 不过如果你把盒子带回去了，头儿的心情应该会好点，指不定就放过我了.@w4

English: [ Kenex Station 62 - Cargo Manifest: Bays 3 to 6 ] < 615 Items Identified >@w3 < 27 Flagged for inspection >@w3 < 7 Identified as illegal items >@w2 Alerting Authorities@p6 Warning: 'Roboerotica - Anniversary Edition' is undeclared entertainment media that requires licensing to sell@w3 > Redirecting cargo to relicensing division ( 150 credit fine for undeclared goods )@w3 > Additional fines and fees for relicensing ( 112 credits )@w3 [ Process Finished ]
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex Station 62 - 货物清单：3 到 6号舱 ] < 615 个物品已识别 >@w3 < 27 个已标记为需要检查 >@w3 < 7 个标记为违法货物 >@w2 警告执法人员@p6 警告： 'Roboerotica - Anniversary Edition' 是未申报的娱乐产品且需要许可证才能售卖@w3 > 将货物重定向至许可部门 ( 未申报货物罚款150信用点 )@w3 > Additional fines and fees for relicensing ( 112 credits )@w3 [ 处理完毕 ]
Search > 关键词：走私者，抛弃的货物， -超级护卫舰

English: [ Kenex Station 62 - Cargo Manifest: Search ] Search > Keywords: Smuggler, Dumped Cargo, -Superfreighter < 831 matches found >@w3 < Filtering out 'Superfreighter' from keywords >@w3 < 3 matches found >@p5 < Cargo Item 171ATQ >@w3 Identified as TQ2 Epsilon Radar Tranceiver - Cargo transferred to Polaris Supply Depot Theta@w4 This item is not compatible with current Polaris systems and will be returned to Epsilon with 32 unpaid fees associated with the retrieved item.@p9 < Cargo Item 192AFF >@w3 Identified as biological sample 39-11-78LGC - Hazardous Material@w4 Item was immediately incinerated, along with it's packaging and anything it came in contact with.@w2 The storage, transport and handling of Legacy technology is strictly FORBIDDEN by order of both Polaris Management and the Zirax High Command.@p9 < Cargo Item 226MKI >@w3 < Cargo has not been evaluated >@w3 Retrieved from a suspected smuggler by Patrol AV77 - Currently stored on Platform 11: Awaiting Review
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex Station 62 - 货物清单：查找 ] 查询 > 关键词：走私者，抛弃的货物， -超级护卫舰 < 831 个匹配的结果 >@w3 < 按照关键词 '超级护卫舰' 进行筛选 >@w3 < 3 个匹配的结果 >@p5 < 货舱物品 171ATQ >@w3 识别为TQ2 Epsilon雷达收发器 - 货物转交至 极星补给站 Theta@w4 该物品与目前的极星系统不兼容，将会连同32笔回收物品的账单一起退回Epsilon.@p9 < 货舱物品 192AFF >@w3 识别为生物样本39-11-78LGC - 危险材料@w4 物品已连同包装和里面所有的东西一起当场焚毁.@w2 一切储存，运输以及使用遗留者科技的行为都被极星管理层和兹瑞克斯最高指挥部严格禁止.@p9 < 货舱物品 226MKI >@w3 < 货物未经评估 >@w3 巡逻队AV77从一名走私嫌犯身上查获 - 目前存放于11号平台：等待审查

English: [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, can you put the location data of that box on my Heads-Up Display?@p6 [ IDA ] I have added it to your display, Commander.@w3 The package is 30 meters below you next to an exterior loading door.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，你能位置信息加入我的抬头显示吗?@p6 [ IDA ] 已加入，指挥官.@w3 包裹在你下方30m的一个装货门边.

English: [ Markos ] The hell are you calling me for?@w3 Have you got the package?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm looking right at it, but it's guarded and I can't grab it without getting caught by security.@p7 [ Markos ] You can deal with a couple of guards, can't you?@w3 You took down a bunch of my guys fine,@w2 A few security guards should be no problem for you, right?
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 你怎么又呼叫我?@w3 你拿到包裹了?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 包裹就在我面前，但是有人守着，我直接去拿肯定会被抓到.@p7 [ Markos ] 几个守卫而已，你能搞定吧?@w3 你干掉了我那么多人，@w2 几个守卫对你来说应该不成问题， 对吧?

English: <color=#2eafff>It's not about the guards, it's about my Reputation with Polaris.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>不是对付守卫难不难的问题，这事关我和极星的关系.</color>

English: [ Markos ] I don't care how you do it,@w2 who you have to pay off,@w2 whatever security systems you have to destroy,@w2 Whoever you have to kill on that parasite-infested dump.@w2 Just grab it and make for the nearest door if you have to; I don't care.@w2 Just bring it to me.@p7 [ Markos ] Don't contact me again unless you have my package.@p6 < Transmission Terminated >
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我不管你用什么手段，@w2 收买谁也好，@w2 弄坏安保系统也好，@w2 又或者是你要在那堆寄生虫里杀掉谁也好.@w2 把包裹拿起来，冲向最近的门就行; 我不在乎.@w2 只要你给我拿过来.@p7 [ Markos ] 拿到包裹之前不要再联系我了.@p6 < 通讯终止 >

English: This job is boring as hell!@w3\nI would rather be getting drunk upstairs or playing a round of cards than watching people stack boxes all day...
Chinese (simplified): 这工作太无聊了!@w3 \n我宁可在楼上喝个烂醉或者打两局牌也好过看人在这里堆箱子...

English: Maybe I can help with that? (Play Cards)
[ Security Guard ]\nThis job is boring as hell!@w3\nYou wanna play some cards to pass the time?@w2 We play for real money though.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n这工作无聊透了!@w3 \n也许你愿意和我打会牌消磨时间?@w2 不过我们可是用 真 钱下注.

English: [ Security Guard ] Depends on what it is,@w3 and what's in it for me.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You see those boxes over there?@w2 I really need one of those.@w2 If you catch my meaning?@p7 [ Security Guard ] Well, my friend...@w2 I can't let you take any of those boxes.@w2 But...@w3 it seems that particular cargo needs to be moved, but the cargo handlers aren't around right now.@w3 I suppose I could move it myself, but i'm not being paid to move cargo.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ] 那要看是什么忙了，@w3 以及我能拿到什么好处.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你看到那堆箱子了吗?@w2 我 真的 非常需要其中某一个.@w2 你懂我意思吧?@p7 [ 保安 ] 唔这位朋友...@w2 我不能让你拿走任何一个箱子.@w2 不过呢...@w3 看上去 某些 货箱可能需要换个位置，但是搬货的人不在这.@w3 我 觉得 我自己可以来搬它，但是没钱我可不干.

English: What if you were being paid to move cargo?
Chinese (simplified): 要如果有人花钱请你 移动货物呢?

English: [ Security Guard ]\nOh, someone would need to pay me ohhh...@w3 Let's say 800 credits to move that particular item.@w3\nI have expensive tastes...@w3 and ah...@w2 more than a few unpaid debts.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n哦，有人要给我钱的话...@w3 大概 800 信用点 就可以让我搬一个箱子.@w3 \n我有些比较昂贵的爱好...@w3 而且...@w2 还有点欠债.

English: <color=#2eafff>I just happen to have 800 credits right here</color>
[ Security Guard ]\nAre you still wanting me to move that cargo for you, pal?@w3\nIt's still 800 credits.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n你还需要我帮你移动货物吗，哥们?@w3 \n价格依然是 800 信用点.

English: <color=#2eafff>I just happen to have 800 credits right here</color>
[ Security Guard ]\nA pleasure working for you, sir.@w2\nIf you need any help carrying that box to your ship, just let me know!
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n很荣幸为您效力， 老板.@w2 \n如果需要把那个货箱搬到你船上，尽管跟我说!
你已经 帮了很大的 忙了

English: [ Markos ] I told you not to contact me again.@w3 You'd better have my package.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] As a matter of fact, I do.@w4 You owe me big time, Markos.@w3 This was a lot harder than you let on and almost got me killed.@p8 [ Markos ] Good work@w3 and no, I don't owe you anything.@w4 You owed me.@w3 Now we're square@w2 and can move ahead with our business arrangement.@w4 As soon as you hand the package over, of course.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我说过不要再联络我了.@w3 你最好已经拿到包裹了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 事实上，我确实拿到了.@w4 你欠我一个大人情，Markos.@w3 这可比你说的难多了，我差点丢掉小命.@p8 [ Markos ] 虽然做得很好@w3 但是不，我什么都不欠你.@w4 而是你 欠 我的.@w3 现在我们扯平了@w2 然后再来聊聊我们的生意安排.@w4 当然这得等你把包裹交给我.

English: <color=#2eafff>Of course. So where am I taking this thing?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>当然，我该把包裹带到哪里去?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I want no future business with you, Markos.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我不想再和你的“生意”扯上关系了，Markos.</color>

English: [ Markos ] I'm forwarding a data package to you now with my ship's current location.@w4 We'll only be there for a couple of hours before we move on again, so don't even think about alerting the Authorities.@w2 By the time they get there, we'll be long gone and we'll be right back where we started.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Paranoid much?@w5 I've kept my word so far and done shadier things than i'm comfortable with.@w2 You can trust me with this.@p7 [ Markos ] I trust no one.@w3 That's how I got here and that's how i'm staying here.@w3 If you're smart,@w2 you'll start doing the same as me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我会把飞船当前位置的数据推送给你.@w4 在移动之前我只会在这等几个小时，所以不要想着通知当局了.@w2 等他们到那了，我们早就回到原来的地方了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你就这么有被害妄想?@w5 我到现在一直都信守承诺而且帮你干了那么多我完全无法忍受的见不得光的事.@w2 你早就可以信任我了.@p7 [ Markos ] 我谁都不信.@w3 这就是我能爬到这个位置然后还活着的原因.@w3 如果你足够聪明，@w2 你就会和我一样.

English: [ Markos ] So be it.@w2 But you still have something that belongs to me@w2 so whether you like it or not, you'll bring it back here to me or you'll be making an enemy with a greater reach than you can imagine.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Fine. I get the point.@w4 Where do you want me to drop this box off?@p6 [ Markos ] I've forwarded a data package to you that shows the current location of my ship.@w5 I'll only be there for a couple of hours before we move on again, so don't even think about alerting the Authorities.@w2 By the time they get there, we'll be long gone.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Paranoid much?@p6 [ Markos ] Paranoia is what keeps me alive in this game.@w3 Without it,@w2 even your closest friends will try to stab you in the back.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 那就好.@w2 但你手上还有我的东西@w2 所以无论你愿意与否，你都必须拿给我，不然你就是在与你无法想象的势力为敌.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 行，我知道.@w4 你想让我吧箱子带去哪?@p6 [ Markos ] 我会把飞船当前位置的数据推送给你.@w5 在移动之前我只会在这等几个小时，所以不要想着通知当局了.@w2 等他们到那里，我们早跑了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你就这么有被害妄想?@p6 [ Markos ] 被害妄想能让我活着.@w3 如果没有这么偏执，@w2 就算你最亲近的朋友也会想着捅你一刀.

English: [ Markos ] Yes, you'd better keep that in mind.@w4 No one is safe in this game.@w2 Not without eyes in the back of your head and ears at every door.@p7 [ Markos ] That's enough talk for now.@w3 Get your ass over here and bring me that box.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很好，你最好能记住.@w4 N在这个 游戏里没人是安全的.@w2 N除非你有千里眼顺风耳.@p7 [ Markos ] 说的够多了.@w3 赶快滚过来把箱子带给我.

English: [ Vespian ]\nI don't trust you...@w3\nI've got my eye on you.@w2 You do anything suspicious and it'll be the last thing you do.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n我不信任你...@w3 \n所以我会盯着你.@w2 你要是敢鬼鬼祟祟的，那就是你最后一次鬼鬼祟祟了.@w2 懂?

English: [ Vespian ] You're one ugly sonnovabitch, anyone ever tell you that?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Nice to meet you too.@w7 I'm here to see Markos.@p6 [ Vespian ] I don't give a shit.@w4 You'll hand over the package to me or you'll go out an airlock.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 你可真是个丑逼，没人跟你说过吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 很高兴见到你.@w7 我是来见Markos的.@p6 [ Vespian ] 关我屁事.@w4 把包裹给我然后滚出气闸.@w2 懂了吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>I, uh... left it in my ship.</color>
<color=#ff0000>How about I shove my foot up your ass and you get out of my way?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>要不要我用脚给你屁股上来一下让你滚开?</color>

English: [ Vespian ] Hey boss!@w4 This guy's not being very cooperative.@p6 [ Markos (Intercom) ] Maybe he'll be more cooperative in his next life.@w5 Get rid of him.@p7 [ Vespian ] You heard the man.@w3 We get to do this the hard way.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 嘿头儿!@w4 这人不怎么配合.@p6 [ Markos (Intercom) ] 也许他下辈子会更配合一点.@w5 干掉他.@p7 [ Vespian ] 你听到了.@w3 我们来硬的.

English: [ Vespian ]\nGo get it then.@w4\nYou know the way out.@w3 Don't take any detours or i'll know.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n去 拿来 啊.@w4 \n你知道出去的路.@w3 别想 耍什么花招，我盯着呢.

English: [ Vespian ] Did you open it?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Of course not.@w4 What's in it, anyway?@p8 [ Vespian ] None of your bloody business!@w6 Worthless sack of legacy-spawned crap...
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 你打开过它吗?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然没有.@w4 不过出于好奇还是问一下，里面是什么?@p8 [ Vespian ] 跟你没有一毛钱关系!@w6 你这坨坨没用的遗留者拉出来的屎...

English: [ Vespian ]\nGet in there and stop wasting my time.@w6\nIf Markos doesn't like what you have to say...@w3 I'll look forward to watching you breathe vaccuum.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n进那里面去，不要再浪费我时间了.@w6 \n如果Markos不喜欢你说的...@w3 我会欣赏你在真空里的表情.

English: [ Markos ] Sorry I couldn't be there to greet you in person {PlayerName}.@w3 You remember my little instruction on paranoia, don't you?@p8 [ Markos ] I don't think we're ready for a face-to-face meeting just yet.@w3 I like you {PlayerName},@w2 But I don't trust you.@w4 Not yet, anyway...@p8 [ Markos ] You look like you have questions,@w3 So i'll let you ask them.@w6 Maybe i'll answer them;@w3 maybe I won't.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很抱歉我不能亲自到那里向你问好 {PlayerName}.@w3 你应该记得我那点小小的偏执，不是吗?@p8 [ Markos ] 我并不认为我们已经做好面对面的准备了.@w3 我喜欢你 {PlayerName}，@w2 但我不 信任 你.@w4 至少现在不，无论如何...@p8 [ Markos ] 看起来你有很多问题，@w3 你现在可以问了.@w6 也许我会回答;@w3 也许我不会.
所以确切的来说你到底 是什么人 ?

English: <color=#2eafff>Why doesn't your ship show up on sensors?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么你的船不会在探测器上显示?</color>

English: [ Markos ] It was a weapon.@w4 I'm not gonna tell you who made it or where it came from, only that it was an experimental energy weapon.@w5 I was contracted to retrieve it and deliver it to the client in exchange for being provided with the time and location where it would be most vulnerable.@p9 [ Markos ] I can't tell you anything about the client since that would make me a very poor businessman.@w5 Having it fall into the hands of those blood-sucking parasites at Polaris was just sheer bad luck.@p8
