It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在测试一种使用自动采矿机的新开采方法，但我们平台上没有人被波拉利斯授权购买整台自动采矿机，我们也没有建造机能够组装一台，即使我们得到了所有零件。@p9 我需要你绕过波拉利斯的控制，为我获取： x1 基础自动采矿设备 购买它或者你自己建造它，然后带给我。这是我所知道的一些探矿者在野外使用的一个小漏洞，用来绕过波拉利斯在采矿上的垄断。
我给你带来了一台自动矿机.

English: We've reached our annual maintenance cycle; which means we need need to replace most of the wiring and control systems on our rigs. We've seen what happens if we don't rewire in this kind of environment. We can't afford accidents here, so we make sure maintenance is performed on schedule.@p9 We examine and evaluate the old stuff from the last cycle and reuse the stuff that's in good condition to keep costs down. That still means we need at least: x185 Advanced Electronics x5 Computers For the parts we can't reuse. I'll leave those to you.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经达到了年度维护周期;这意味着我们需要更换钻井平台上的大部分线路和控制系统。我们已经知道在这种环境下如果我们不重新布线会发生什么. 我们这里出不起事故，所以我们要确保维修按时进行.@p9 我们检查和评估上一个周期的旧东西，再利用状态良好的东西，以降低成本. 这意味着我们至少需要: x185 先进电子元件 x5 计算机 对于我们不能重复使用的部分。我把这些留给你.
我已经带来了你要的维修材料.

English: You there! Check your seals and stay behind the radiation shields at all times! I won't be responsible for anyone getting cooked today.\nTake a look around. You're look at the infrastructure that powers the entire galaxy. Promethium mining!
Chinese (simplified): 你在那里别动! 检查你的防护服，并始终留在辐射护盾后面! 今天谁被煮了我都不负责.\n看看周围。你看到的是支撑整个星系的基础设施。 钷矿井!

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的，我们总是需要帮助在这里获取物资。在体力劳动部门并不多。如果你正在寻找工作，我们需要一个快速，便宜的快递员。\n你当然会得到报酬。如果工作做得好，我可能会额外给你奖金。但你将会在账外工作。\n这对你来说合适吗？

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料每15分钟就会卡住一次。我们已经把整个组装拆开寻找问题，但似乎找不到问题所在。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组装，这意味着我们需要： 3个采矿设备 20个电动机 400个机械组件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从波拉利斯的P-3和NLP工厂获取采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经更换了两次进料系统，但看起来我们实际上遇到的问题是由于计算机系统发出的混合信号，在提取器本应处于空闲状态时却磨损了齿轮。 现在我们的提取器坏了，需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另外组装替换以下物品： x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子设备 用于替换和重新布线进料系统，并设置一个新的控制计算机。你可以从Polaris' P-3 和 NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 High-Output Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经遇到过这个问题，但每次我们认为我们已经修复了它，它就会移动到钻机的另一个部分，破坏一些东西。我怀疑这是一些恶意人工智能的蓄意破坏. 这一次，变压器短路时运行中的打包装机电容器发生了爆炸.@p9 我们已经让人手动卸载传送带了，但他们撑不了太久，所以我们需要: x7 采矿设备 x10 高输出电容器 x20 能量调节器 让一切恢复正常运行中. 你可以从以下设施买到采矿设备极星' P-3 和 NLP 工厂. 你可能需要装备运输增强器，因为这些东西很难携带.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We have drinks here every friday night, but the last supply ship left it out of our order, so we've used up our reserves last week and have nothing for this friday...@p9 I'll need you to restock the fridges with x300 Bottles of Liquor Try either Totally Overpowered's Brewery or one of the Tal'on Breweries if you can find one. I'd recommend one of TOP's breweries, not one of their stores. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since we need it before Friday.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每周五晚上都在这里喝酒，但上一批补给船没有按订单给我们送来，所以我们上周已经用光了储备，这个星期五我们没有酒水了...@p9 我需要你重新补充冰箱，需要 300瓶烈酒 试试完全过度强化的酿酒厂或者如果你能找到一个的话，一个泰隆酿酒厂。我会推荐一个完全过度强化的酿酒厂，而不是他们的商店。 因为我们需要在周五之前得到这批酒水，我会为此订单支付双倍市场价。

English: I've finished your order and brought the beer
Chinese (simplified): 你要的菜我已经点完了，啤酒也拿来了

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Promethium in it's raw form is radioactive and toxic, so you need to keep suit seals on at all times and radiation shielding on everything on the site.@p9 We've already expanded the dig another 30 meters west, so we need more radiation shielding: x4 Spare Parts x10 Radiation Shielding The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Thermal Interactions and NLP make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 原始形态的钷有放射性和毒性，所以你需要的要一直保持防护服的密封，辐射屏蔽器要在网站上的所有东西上保持密封.@p9 我们已经向西扩大了30米的挖掘范围，所以我们需要更多辐射屏蔽器: x4 备用零件 x10 辐射屏蔽器 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 （Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司的工厂' 生产其中一个的是 Thermal Interactions 同时 NLP 生产另外一个.
我已经带来了你要的额外屏蔽装置

English: With all the promethium we need available, we can run our generators at a higher output than usual. But in order to maintain the conversion rate of fuel to energy we need regular infusions of Hydrogen to purge impurities from the reaction chambers. We don't need to do it often, so once a week we shut down to clean the feed lines.@p9 I need you to head on out to a factory like Chemmix Industrial for the chemicals and hydrogen: x20 Bottles of Chemicals x15 Bottles of Hydrogen I'd normally send someone else, but our ships are out doing a delivery.
Chinese (simplified): 有了所需的所有钷元素，我们就能让发电机比平时输出更高。但是为了保持燃料转化为能量的速度我们需要定期注入氢气来清除反应室中的杂质. 我们不需要经常这样做，所以我们每周关闭一次来清洗馈线.@p9 我需要你去一个工厂，就像 Chemmix工业 为了化学品和氢气: x20 瓶化学品 x15 瓶氢气 我通常会派别人去，但我们的船出去送货了.

English: We need a fresh supply of Graphite to sheath the storage containers in or else we risk irradiating the containers without anyone noticing. The problem is that we need people to go into the containers to do it and there's enough residue to cause serious organ damage.@p9 To meet health and safety standards, I need: x3 Radiation Boosters x500 Graphite So a crew can get in there without being in any danger and spray on a graphite mixture to block out stray gamma radiation from the cargo. That's up to you.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要一份新的石墨来包裹储存容器，否则我们可能会在没人注意到的情况下辐射容器. 问题是，我们需要有人进入容器中进行操作，而容器中的残留物足以造成严重的器官损伤.@p9 为了达到健康和安全标准，我需要: x3 辐射支持器 x500 石墨 因此，工作人员可以在没有任何危险的情况下进入那里，并喷洒石墨混合物，以阻止来自货物的伽玛辐射. 这取决于你.

English: I've brought you the shielding and boosters
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你要的屏蔽和助推器

English: Our generators run at higher yield than usual, which means an excess of heat. We want to avoid shutting them down every day, which means a surplus of Heat Exchangers to divert the heat into radiators.@p9 That shouldn't be too hard for you to do. We only need the heat exchangers and a surfacing material for the radiator fins. x40 Heat Exchangers x500 Copper Ingots Should do it. Copper's conductive enough and the heat exchangers can be bought from either Zero Horizons or Thermal Interactions' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的发电机以比平时更高的产率运行，这也意味着产生更多的热量. 我们希望避免每天都被迫关掉它，因此也就需要用额外的热交换器来把热量导入散热器中.@p9 这对你来说应该不算难.我们需要的只是热交换器和散热器翅片的表面镀层材料. x40 热交换器 x500 铜锭 就够了. 铜的导热性能应该足够而热交换器可以从 Zero Horizons 或是 Thermal Interactions' factories这些地方买到.

English: I've got the parts for your generator
Chinese (simplified): 我给你把发电机部件拿来了

English: As you can see, we deal with a toxic and highly radioactive material here. It's nowhere near as bad as dealing with Pentaxid, but we've got our fair share of problems. Not a week goes by without someone getting a Radiation Burn, so we're always in need of anti-rad meds.@p9 See if you can top up our first aid kit with: x50 Anti-Radiation Ointment x50 Anti-Radiation Pills x50 Anti-Radiation Injections Buy it or make it yourself. It doesn't matter to me, but we need to top up all supplies before next week. I'll pay double, since I hate forking over money to Ok'y Medical.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见，我们每天处理的是一种有毒的高放射性物质. 这远不如处理水晶那么糟糕，但我们也有自己的问题. 每个星期都有人得到辐射病，所以我们总是需要抗辐射药物.@p9 看看你能不能把我们的急救箱装满: x50 抗辐射药膏 x50 抗辐射药片 x50 抗辐射注射剂 你可以自己做或者去买. 这对我来说无关紧要，但是我们需要在下星期之前把所有的补给都填满. 我会付双倍的，因为我讨厌给Ok'y Medical付钱.
我已经补充了你的扛辐射药物

English: I don't want to have to ask you to do this, but the boys have been nagging my ears off about the living conditions here. What they're after are some Posters to hang up around the place. Stupid, I know. But they won't give up.@p9 They don't want just any posters, they've given me a list: Biker Poster Poster Trader New World Poster Boyband Poster I'll pay FIVE times their value if you can get them. Anything to stop their complaining! Most of them can be bought on from luxury goods shops.
Chinese (simplified): 我不想要求你做这件事，但是小伙子们一直在我耳边不停地抱怨这里的居住条件。 他们想要的是一些海报来挂在这里。我知道这很愚蠢。但他们就是不放弃。@p9 他们不想要任何海报，他们给了我一个列表： 摩托车海报 海报交易者 新世界海报 男孩乐队海报 如果你能拿到它们，我愿意支付五倍于它们的价值。任何东西 来停止他们的抱怨！它们大多数可以从奢侈品商店购买。

English: Welcome to Pentaxium Unlimited's mining operations!\nI'm sure you'd love to take a look around, but please stay the hell out of our operation. You have just walked onto the most dangerous place on this entire planet and if you're not careful, you'll die.\nGot it?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到翘曲无限采矿公司 (Unlimited's mining operations)!\n我知道你很想四处看看，但请离我们的公司远点. 你刚刚踏上了这个星球上最危险的地方如果你不小心，你会死的.\n明白了吗?

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的，我们这里总是需要帮助来获取物资。硬劳动部门倒是不需要太多。如果你在找工作，我们急需一个快速、廉价的信使。\n当然，你会得到报酬。如果你工作出色，我可能会额外给你奖金。但你将是在非正式的账本上工作。\n这对你来说合适吗？

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. We've got a problem with the extractor feed getting jammed every 15 minutes. We've taken the entire assembly apart looking for the problem but can't seem to find it.@p9 We need a completely new assembly, which means we need: x3 Mining Equipment x20 Motors x400 Mechanical Components To overhaul the old extraction system. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助。 我们的提取器进料每15分钟就会卡住一次。我们已经拆解了整个组装，寻找问题，但似乎找不到。@p9 我们需要一个全新的组装，这意味着我们需要： 3台采矿设备 20个电动机 400个机械组件 来彻底检修旧的提取系统。你可以从波拉利斯的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've replaced the feed system twice, but it looks like the problem we've actually been getting is from a mixed signal from the computer system that's been grinding off the gears on the extractor when it should be idling. Now we're down an extractor and need to replace the computers that run it.@p9 That means we need another assembly replacement of: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Computers x20 Advanced Electronics To replace and rewire the feed system and rig up a new control computer. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们两次更换了给料系统，但看起来我们真正遇到的问题是由于计算机系统发出的混合信号，导致提取器在应该空转的时候却磨损了齿轮。 现在我们的提取器坏了，需要更换运行它的计算机。@p9 这意味着我们需要另外组装替换以下部件： x5 采矿设备 x10 计算机 x20 高级电子设备 用于更换和重新布线给料系统，并设置一个新的控制计算机。你可以从宝丽丝的P-3和NLP工厂获得采矿设备。

English: We've got this problem, but every time we think we've fixed it, it moves to another part of the rig and breaks something. I'm at the point of suspecting sabotage by some malicious AI. This time, the capacitors that run the packager blew when a transformer shorted.@p9 We've got the boys unloading the conveyors manually, but they can't keep that up for long, so we need: x7 Mining Equipment x10 High-Output Capacitors x20 Energy Regulators To get things back up and running normally. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经遇到过这个问题，但每次我们认为我们已经修复了它，它就会移动到钻机的另一个部分，破坏一些东西。我怀疑这是一些恶意人工智能的蓄意破坏. 这一次，变压器短路时运行中的打包装机电容器发生了爆炸.@p9 我们已经让人手动卸载传送带了，但他们撑不了太久，所以我们需要: x7 采矿设备 x10 高输出电容器 x20 能量调节器 让一切恢复正常运行中. 你可以从以下设施买到采矿设备极星' P-3 和 NLP 工厂. 你可能需要装备运输增强器，因为这些东西很难携带.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We're working with Pentaxid here. This stuff is not only radioactive but toxic. We burn through air filters like they're coffee filters, so we need regular replacements. That's only a minor problem compared to the constant abrasions to the hazard suits the crews wear. It's one of the things no one tells you about pentaxid mining: Those crystals have razor-sharp edges.@p9 As i'm sure you can guess what I need from you: x100 Air Filters and x5 Armor Boosters To deal with the abrasions. You can get Air filters from any chemical or science factory in civilized space. Boosters you can probably get from ServantCorp.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里使用的是翘曲水晶（原料）。这种东西不仅具有放射性，而且有毒。我们消耗空气过滤器的速度就像消耗咖啡过滤器一样快，所以需要定期更换。 与矿工们穿着的危险服的持续磨损相比，这只是个小问题。没有人告诉你关于翘曲水晶（原料）采矿的一件事：那些晶体的边缘锋利如剃刀。@p9 我猜你已经知道我需要你提供什么了： x100 空气过滤器 和 x5 护甲增强剂 来处理磨损问题。 你可以在文明空间的任何化学或科学工厂获得空气过滤器。增强剂你可能可以从ServantCorp获得。

English: I've brought your filters and armor boosters
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你要的过滤器和装甲增强器

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Pentaxid mining is one of the most dangerous professions in the galaxy. We have to deal with super-critical ignitions within unstable crystals that release a shockwave of gamma radiation.@p9 We've already lost a dozen piece of equipment that were inadequately shielded. We need those things back up and running, and that's where you come in. I'll need x20 Radiation Shielding You'll definitely need a Transportation Booster to carry the stuff.@p9 I'm paying double, what any other operation will pay for that shielding. You can get them from the factory floor of eitherThermal Interactions Ltd or Non-Linear Productions. They're in high demand on reactors and starship drives, so they're pretty cheap.
Chinese (simplified): 你听到我们需要什么后可能会后悔提供帮助。 翘曲水晶采矿是银河系中最危险的职业之一。我们不得不处理不稳定晶体内超临界点火释放出的伽马射线冲击波。@p9 我们已经有十几件设备因为防护不当而丢失。我们需要让这些东西重新运行起来，这就是你介入的地方。我需要 20个辐射护盾 你绝对需要一个 运输助推器 来携带这些物资。@p9 我支付的是其他任何操作支付给那种护盾的双倍。 你可以从以下两家工厂的车间获得它们：热交互有限公司 或 非线性生产。它们在反应堆和星际飞船驱动器上需求很高，所以它们相当便宜。
我已经带来了你要的额外屏蔽装置

English: We've got a serious problem on site 3, with a very large and unstable crystal. I can't risk people pulling those things out by hand, so we use a robotic arm to pull them up. The problem? A nearby crystal flared up and cooked the control circuits in the arm and we don't have a replacement.@p9 I need you to head out to a Hostile Apparatus Robotics Factory for a replacement for the robotics and a new interface: x6 Robotics x24 Tablets I need this now, i'll pay extra since we can't do any work on site 3 until that troublemaking crystal has been safely removed..
Chinese (simplified): 我们在三号基地遇到了一个严重的问题，有一个非常大且不稳定的晶体. 我不能冒险让人用手把这些东西拉出来，所以我们用机械臂把它们拉上来. 这个问题?附近的一个晶体突然发光，烧坏了机械臂上的控制电路，我们没有替换组件.@p9 我需要你去一趟（Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司 机械设备 工厂用于机械设备的替换组件和一个新界面: x6 机械设备 x24 平板电脑 我现在就需要这个，我多付一些钱，因为除非那个捣乱的水晶被安全移走不然在3号工地我们不能工作.
我已经带来了the 替换组件 parts

English: We go through a hazard suit at least once a month, except this week when a flare up on Site 2 cooked the electronics on team-12's suit so they can't regulate temperature. We need a full replacement set with hardened electronics to boot.@p9 I can't afford the exorbitant prices ServantCorp expects for a hazard suit and they won't offer use anything similar. But I bet: x3 Heavy Armor x3 Radiation Boosters x6 Radiation Shielding would do just as well, if not better for less than half the price.@p9 I know you can get Radiation Shielding from both Thermal Interactions and Non-Linear Productions since we order from them regularly. You may have to turn to ServantCorp for the armor or boosters though. Don't worry, you'll be reimbursed.
Chinese (simplified): 我们每个月至少要穿一套危险防护服一次，除了这周，二号工地的大火让第十二组的防护服上的电子元件烧了，导致他们无法调节温度. 我们需要一个完整的替换组件设置和加固的电子元件来引导.@p9 我负担不起过高的价格ServantCorp公司预计会有危险防护服，他们不会提供类似的东西. 但我打赌: x3 重型装甲 x3 辐射支持器 x6 辐射屏蔽器 如果不到一半的价格就能得到相同的质量，这不是更好么.@p9 我知道你可以从这两个站点获得辐射屏蔽器 Thermal Interactions和Non-Linear Productions非流水线生产因为我们定期向他们订货. 你可能不得不求助ServantCorp公司在装甲或助推器方面. 别担心，会给你报销的.

English: I've brought you the shielding and boosters
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你要的屏蔽和助推器

English: Extracting the raw and unstable Pentaxid crystals is challenge enough, but storage and transport is another serious problem we face every day. If this job didn't pay more than even Zascosium mining, even we would be here.@p9 So what I need from you is: x30 Nitrogen x30 Heat Exchangers x5 Spare Parts What they're for is storage. The natural radioactive decay of the elements in the crystals output enough heat to eventually melt steel.@p9 That's obviously not good. We need to pressurize the containers with nitrogen to keep it from reacting and act as a coolant and heat exchangers to shunt the build-up of heat to heat sinks on the outside. The parts can be found each in a different factory. I'll pay you over double for this shipment since it's gonna be a lot of trouble to fulfill.
Chinese (simplified): 提取原始且不稳定的水晶晶体已经是很大的挑战，但存储和运输是我们每天面临的另一个严重问题. 就算这份工作的薪水不超过Zascosium铡采矿，我们也会在这里.@p9 所以我需要你做的是: x30 氮 x30 热交换器 x5 备用零件 它们是用来储藏的. 晶体中元素的自然放射性衰变产生的热量足以最终融化钢铁.@p9 这显然不好. 我们需要用氮气对容器加压，防止它发生反应，并像冷却剂和热交换器一样将积聚的热量分流到外部的散热器. 这些零件可以在不同的工厂找到. 这批货我多付你两倍，因为完成起来会很麻烦.

English: As you can see, we deal with a toxic and highly radioactive material here. Not a week goes by without someone getting a Radiation Burn, so we're always in need of anti-rad meds. What's worse is when the radiation dose is just too high to cure and all we can do is watch them fall apart from the inside.@p9 That's why i'm asking you to help me out by bringing me: x50 Anti-Radiation Pills x40 Radiation Immunity Shots x30 Decontamination Kits We can't fix what's already been done, but we can at least prevent it in future.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见，我们处理的是一种有毒的高放射性物质. 每个星期都有人得到辐射病，所以我们总是需要抗辐射药物. 更糟糕的是，辐射剂量太高，无法治愈，我们所能做的就是看着他们从内部瓦解.@p9 所以我要你帮我把我带来: x50 抗辐射药片 x40 辐射免疫注射剂 x30 去污医药包 我们无法修复已经发生的事情，但我们至少可以在未来阻止它.
我已经补充了你的扛辐射药物

English: Once we've extracted the Pentaxid crystals, we need to harden them against suddenly fracturing. If that happens in the wrong place and time, it's possible to trigger a spontaneous fusion reaction and wipe out an entire freighter. Sounds unlikely right? Wrong. It's happened twice in the past, so now we're extra careful.@p9 What we use here is X-05 Chemicals from Chemmix Industrial mixed with Salt that's used to remove particulates from the crystal and form a hard, non-reactive coating: x25 Chemicals x130 Salt Will do the current shipment, and i'll find someone else to handle the next one if you're not available.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦我们提取出水晶晶体，我们需要让它们变硬以防突然破裂。如果发生在错误的时间和地点，就有可能引发自发的核聚变反应摧毁整艘货船. 听起来不太可能对吗?错. 这种情况过去发生过两次，所以现在我们要格外小心.@p9 我们在这里使用的是X-05化学品来自Chemmix工业与盐混合，用来去除晶体中的微粒，形成坚硬的，不反应的涂层: x25 化学品 x130 盐 我们会处理这批货，如果你不在的话，下一批货我会找别人来处理.
我已经带来了你要的硬化混合

English: Another slow day working a Monazite rig... \nHey there, don't usually get visitors around here. Not much to see or do on a rig like this.\nI'm Berone, i'm the foreman of this rig. I handle overseeing that nothing explodes.
Chinese (simplified): 又是一个在钍矿钻井上缓慢度过的日子... \n嘿，这里通常很少有访客。像这样的钻井上也没什么好看的或可做的。\n我是贝隆，我是这个钻井的工头。我负责监督，确保这里不会发生爆炸。

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是的，我们总是需要帮助运送物资。不是特别需要体力劳动。如果你在找工作，我们需要一个快速的，便宜的快递。\n你当然会得到报酬。如果你工作做得好，我可能会额外给你奖金。但你将是在非正式记录上工作。\n这对你来说合适吗？

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I may have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我可能得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. There's not many of us on this rig, so we're always needing replacement parts since there's not enough time to repair some of the larger devices.@p9 Right now we need a new Separator that will keep the Monazite Sand and dump the rocks, grass and critters: x5 Mining Equipment x15 Computers x1 Optronics You should be able to find the parts at Polaris' P-3, Chromium-Sierra and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们在这个平台上的人不多，所以我们总是需要替换组件的零件，因为没有足够的时间来修理一些更大的设备.@p9 现在我们需要一个新的分隔设备来保存石沙，倾倒岩石，草和生物: x5 采矿设备 x15 计算机 x1 光电设备 你应该能在以下工厂找到零件极星' P-3， Chromium-Sierra和 NLP 工厂.

English: We've needed an overhaul of the drills' gearbox for about a year. The constant abrasion from sand and rocks has worn down some of the higher speed gears and ruined half the capacitors that power the motors. You're an independent, right? You can do it.@p9 What we need is: x7 Mining Equipment x21 High-Output Capacitors x35 Energy Regulator To replace and rewire the drive system so we can increase our speed back to the normal rate. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.@p9 One of the concerns of the other transports is the sheer bulk. You'll probably need at least 2 Transportation Boosters to even carry it here. Well, I leave it to you. You'll be paid well for bringing us the parts.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的一个钻头变速箱已经需要大修约一年了. 来自沙子和岩石的持续磨损磨损了一些高速齿轮，并且毁掉了马达一半的动力. 你是独立人士，对吧?你可以做到的.@p9 我们需要的是: x7 采矿设备 x21 高输出电容器 x35 能量矩阵 更换驱动系统并重新布线这样我们就能把速度提高到正常速度. 你可以从以下设施买到采矿设备极星' P-3 和 NLP 工厂.@p9 另一种运输方式的一个问题是它的体积太大了. 你可能至少需要2 运输增强器把它搬到这里. 好吧，我交给你了。给我们带来零件，你会得到不错的报酬.

English: The rig's transmitter isn't much good these days. Too much hard living, ya know? What we need is a complete refit with boosted range and gain so we can reach the ships in orbit like we used to. It's not a hard job, but will have to do a bit of travelling to find the parts we need.@p9 Lemme see... I believe we'll need: x10 Communication Equipment x10 Computers x20 Superconductors x50 Tablets x75 Advanced Electronics@p9 Like I said, it'll require a bit of travelling since the parts are made by different companies, and only sent from their factories. I'll pay double for this shipment. You'll probably need to pick up a Transportation Booster too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 这几天钻机的发射器不太好. 生活太辛苦了，你知道的? 我们需要的是一个完整的改装，增加了航程和增益，让我们可以像以前一样到达轨道上的飞船. 这不是一件困难的工作，但是为了找到我们所需要的零件，我们得走一段路.@p9 让我看看…我相信我们需要: x10 通信设备 x10 计算机 x20 超导体 x50 平板电脑 x75 先进电子元件@p9 就像我说的，这需要一段时间的旅行，因为零件是由不同的公司生产的，而且只从他们的工厂寄来。这批货我付双倍的钱. 你可能需要装备运输增强器，因为
我已经带来了你要的通信设备

English: This place is a bit on the dreary side. We don't have any personalization restrictions like other mining rigs do. We're free to customize what the interior looks like as much as we want. The problem? We have nothing to decorate with.@p9 I know, not an important job. But we can't dig up surface rock for Monazite day in and day out with nothing to keep us sane. That's why I need you to go out and bring back some luxury goods to spruce up the living quarters of this ol' tub and breathe some life back into the job.@p9 Let's see... How about? x20 Luxury Goods x4 Tribal Furnishings x1 Taking a break Poster x1 A rest Poster@p9 You can probably buy the stuff from those Luxury Trader snobs, but i'm sure you can find the stuff cheaper somewhere else. I'll pay you double market price for this order, since my sanity is on the line here and it's pretty out-of-the-way.
Chinese (simplified): 这地方有点沉闷。我们不像其他矿机那样有任何个性化的限制. 我们可以自由地定制我们想要的内部外观. 这是个问题，我们没有可以装饰的东西.@p9 我知道，不是什么重要的工作. 但我们不能在没有任何东西让我们保持清醒的情况下，日复一日地为Monazite挖掘地表岩石. 这就是为什么我需要你出去买些奢侈品，把这个老家伙的生活区装饰一新，给我的工作注入一些活力.@p9 让我们看看…如何? x20 Luxury Goods x4 部落家具 x1 休息海报 x1 一个让人放松的海报@p9 你可能可以从那些奢侈品商的势利小人那里买到这些东西，但我相信你可以在其他地方找到更便宜的东西. 我愿意付你双倍的市场价，因为我的理智在这里，这是相当偏远的.

English: Monazite is a reliable source of Neodymium as well as a variety of rare-earth elements. One of the things included in that bunch is Thorium. We sell the byproducts, and thorium sells well enough to the right market but we get more than we'd like. It's radioactive you see, and our storage bins aren't lead-lined.@p9 So what I need you to get me this time is: x5 Spare Parts x15 Radiation Shielding The problem with getting both of those is that Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories make one and Thermal Interactions and NLP make the other.
Chinese (simplified): 独居石是钕和各种稀土元素的可靠来源。其中包括钍元素. 我们出售副产品，钍在市场上卖得足够好但我们得到的比我们想要的多. 你看，这是有放射性的，而且我们的储物箱不是内衬铅的.@p9 所以这次我需要你帮我: x5 备用零件 x15 辐射屏蔽器 同时生产两种材料的厂家是极星' P-3和 （Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司的工厂' 生产其中一个的是 Thermal Interactions and NLP 生产另外一个.

English: Solar output is high this time of year, so we can cut back on generator use and switch to retractable solar panels. The only issue is that many of the panels have been chipped and scratched from sand and dust and need to be repaired.@p9 We can handle the refit with: x50 Solar Cells x25 Energy Regulators They don't ship out cells to places like this, we're too small an operation to bother with, so we need to go through a third-party like you.
Chinese (simplified): 每年这个时候的太阳能输出量都很高，所以我们可以减少发电机的使用，改用可伸缩的太阳能电池板. 唯一的问题是，许多面板已经被沙子和灰尘刮伤，需要修理.@p9 我们能用这些东西来搞定改装: x50 太阳能电池 x25 能量调节器 他们不会把能量单元运送到这样的地方，我们的组织太小了，不需要这么麻烦，所以我们需要通过向你这样的第三方.
我已经带来了替换用的电池组件

English: We're preparing a move to a new field with a higher quality of Monazite next month. The problem is that it's mixed with other minerals and at a deeper depth. We'll need an improved scanner and deeper drilling modules.@p9 I should be able to cannibalize an Autominer Core for the depth and Optronics for the scanning. That leaves only an increase in power requirements... x8 Power Coils x3 Optronics x1 Autominer Core Will hopefully work. I'll even pay 75% over market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们准备下个月搬到一个产量更高的新矿脉. 问题是它与其他矿物质混合在一起，而且在更深的深度. 我们需要一个改进的扫描仪和更深的采矿模块.@p9 我应该能够拆分自动采矿核心用于深度，部署光电设备用于扫描. 这就只剩下电力需求的增加了... x8 能源线圈 x3 光电设备 x1 自动采矿核心 希望能够起到作用。我甚至会支付市场价的75%.
我已经带来了你要的那些新计算机

English: We've got heat build-up in one of the rear generators. We're not sure what the cause is, but it's always the same generator on every Monazite rig i've worked. It must have something to do with the placement of the generator. As before, we'll need to redistribute the heat to the outer hull.@p9 What we need you to bring us here is: x100 Large Heat Sinks x75 Aluminium Foil x40 Heat Exchangers That should deal with the build-up. You can get the Heat Exchangers from either Thermal Interactions' or Zero Horizons' Factories.
Chinese (simplified): 后面的一个发电机产生了热量。我们不确定原因是什么，但我工作过的每台莫那兹特钻机都是同一个发电机. 这肯定和发电机的位置有关. 和之前一样，我们需要把热量重新分配到外层船体.@p9 我们需要你给我们弄来这些东西: x100 大型散热器 x75 铝线圈 x40 热交换器 这应该能解决积聚问题. 您可以从其中任何一个站点获得热交换器 Thermal Interactions'或者 Zero Horizons' Factories.

English: I've got the parts for the heat sink

We've been meaning to run a test on a different extraction method. We can't get the parts from Polaris since we'd be an industrial entity, but as a private citizen you can get the parts we need without Polaris' restrictions.@p9 What I need from you is: x1 Improved Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直想用另一种提取方法进行测试. 我们无法从极星获得零件，因为我们是一个工业实体， 但是作为一个普通公民，你可以不受极星的限制得到我们需要的零件.@p9 我需要你做的是: x1 自动采矿装置 (T2) 买下来或者自己做，然后带给我. 我知道这是一个小漏洞，一些勘探者利用这个漏洞来通过极星的垄断开采.
我已经带来了你要的自动采矿机.

English: You know what I could go for right now? A burger. Actually, the pantry's looking a bit bare as it is. Do you mind doing a grocery run for me?@p9 x25 Cheeseburgers x25 Rum and Coke x100 Cheese x100 Bread Yeah, i'm a cheap date.
Chinese (simplified): 你知道我现在想要什么吗?一个汉堡. 事实上，储藏室看起来有点空。你介意帮我跑跑杂货店吗?@p9 x25 芝士汉堡 x25 郎姆酒和可乐 x100 奶酪 x100 面包 我是个廉价的约会对象.

English: Ahoy there! Keep clear of the drills or you'll get fried and watch your footing. We have bore holes all over the place. \nThis operation handles the mining of Sathylite, NOT 'Satellite' from deep underground for export to a refinery to be made into starship hulls.
Chinese (simplified): 喂! !远离钻头，否则你会被炸飞，注意脚下. 到处都是钻孔. \n这个操作处理卫星矿，而不是“卫星”从地下深处出口到炼油厂，以制成星际飞船的船体.

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是啊，我们这里总是需要帮助来运送物资。在劳动部门就没这么多了。如果你在找工作，我们需要一个快速的，便宜的信使。\n你当然会得到报酬的。我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金。但你得私下工作。\n这样行吗??

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. Which if there's one thing we need, it's drill replacements. We burn through them faster than anything else here owing to the hardness of the ore. Sometimes I think we'd be better off just strapping the ore to ships as armor.@p9 What I need you to get is: x5 Mining Equipment x10 Coolant x15 Motors You should be able to find the parts at Polaris' P-3, Thermal Interactions and Chemmix Industrial Factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 如果说有什么是我们需要的，那就是备用钻头。由于矿石的硬度，钻头的消耗比这里的任何东西都要快. 有时候我觉得我们最好把矿石绑在船上当盔甲.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x5 采矿设备 x10 冷却剂 x15 马达 你应该能在以下工厂找到零件极星' P-3， Thermal Interactions 和 Chemmix工业 工厂.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We're running out of charge in our capacitors before we can crack the deposit, and once we've recharged the damned rock is cold again and so we waste half our time simply cooking stone. We can't even work at night since it loses heat twice as fast!@p9 What we need is: x7 Mining Equipment x21 High-Output Capacitors x35 Energy Regulator To hold charge longer and keep the power flow even. You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories.@p9 One of the concerns of the other transports is the sheer bulk. You'll probably need at least 2 Transportation Boosters to even carry it here. Well, I leave it to you. You'll be paid well for bringing us the parts.
Chinese (simplified): 我们运行中的电容器在我们打开沉积物之前就没电了，一旦我们重新充电，那该死的石头又变冷了，所以我们浪费了一半的时间在烹饪石头上. 我们甚至不能在晚上工作，因为它散热的速度是平时的两倍!@p9 我们需要的是: x7 采矿设备 x21 高输出电容器 x35 能量矩阵 延长充电时间，保持电量均匀. 你可以从以下设施买到采矿设备极星' P-3 和 NLP 工厂.@p9 另一种运输方式的一个问题是它的体积太大了. 你可能至少需要2 运输增强器把它搬到这里. 好吧，我交给你了。给我们带来零件，你会得到不错的报酬.

English: We've burned out another laser drill today trying to get out this one node. The bastard must have an occlusion of Platinum or something! Sathium doesn't take that kind of heat without cracking. We'll need to try something different...@p9 I'll need: x9 Mining Equipment x3 Laser Kits x12 Bottles of Xenon@p9 The first two to repair the drill, and the last one to boost the laser's effectiveness enough to bore right through the node.@p9 This will require a bit of travelling since the parts are made by different companies, and only sent from their factories. I'll pay 75% above market for this shipment. You'll probably need to pick up a pair of Transportation Boosters too, since those things will be hard to carry.
Chinese (simplified): 我们今天烧毁了另一个激光钻头，试图挖穿这个节点. 这混蛋肯定是患了白金闭塞症之类的! 钑承受不了这么大的压力. 我们需要尝试一些不同的东西...@p9 我将需要: x9 采矿设备 x3 激光武器升级包 x12 氙气瓶@p9 前两个用来修复钻头，最后一个用来提高激光的效率让激光穿透节点.@p9 这将需要一些旅行，因为零件是由不同的公司制造的， 只从他们的工厂提货. 这批货我愿付市场价的75%. 你可能需要装备一对运输增强器， 因为那些东西很难携带.
我已经带来了你要的通信设备

English: We've been running at about 70% drill output for the last few months on one of the drills. One of the techs was finally able to track down the problem as energy bleed-off from poor quality power conduits. We need a new set of cables from a reliable source and i'd rather not risk our previous supplier.@p9 Think you can handle: x35 Superconductors x10 Power Coils x10 High-Output Capacitors?@p9 You can probably find those Superconductors at Arriake Technology or Solaris-AMP's factories. They're not the kind of thing they sell at Trade Stations.
Chinese (simplified): 在过去的几个月里，我们钻头在一个站点的运行中的输出占到了所有钻头输出的70%. 其中一名技术人员最终找到了问题所在，因为能量从质量低劣的电力管道中流出. 我们需要从一个可靠的来源获得一套新的电缆，我不想我们以前的供应商那再冒一次险.@p9 我认为你能处理好: x35 超导体 x10 能源线圈 x10 高输出电容器?@p9 你可以在这些公司找到超导体Arriake Technology或者Solaris-AMP's 工厂. 它们不是贸易站卖的那种东西.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: We're in the process of testing different gas mediums for the laser drill in an attempt to get a stronger beam with less diffusion. We've exhausted a dozen gas mixes and need more raw gases for our tests.@p9 So what I need you to get me this time is: x10 Bottles of Helium x10 Bottles of Nitrogen x10 Bottles of Xenon x3 Scientific Equipment I know you can get the Equipment from Chromium-Sierra Sciences, but i'm not sure about the gases.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在为激光钻头测试不同的气体介质，试图获得更强的光束和更少的扩散。我们已经耗尽了十几种混合气体需要更多的原始气体来进行测试.@p9 所以这次我需要你帮我: x10 瓶氦气 x10 氮气瓶 x10 氙气瓶 x3 科研设备 I know you can get the Equipment from Chromium-Sierra Sciences， 但是我不确定气体的情况.

English: We get an unusual build-up of heat in the drill casing around mid-day and so far we've been unable to find the source. We're not sure if it's the sun or simply because of how long we've been running the drills. So far the only fix has been to shut down while it cools off.@p9 We need a fix, even a temporary one. So I need: x250 Zascosium Alloy x100 Graphite x20 Heat Exchangers To dump the heat into heat sinks and vent it so we'll be able to run the drills for an entire day.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在中午的时候在钻头外壳上得到了不寻常的热量积聚，到目前为止我们还没有找到源头. 我们不确定这是太阳照射还是仅仅因为我们在运行钻头的时间太久了. 到目前为止，唯一的解决办法就是在它冷却的时候关掉它.@p9 我们需要解决办法，哪怕是暂时的。所以我需要: x250 铡合金 x100 石墨 x20 热交换器 把热量倾倒到散热器里，然后排出去，这样我们就能运行钻头一整天.

English: We're already on short rations and need someone to do a food run for us before we run out of food. Our last delivery only brought half our order so we'll have to shut down while the crews go get the food themselves.@p9 We're happy to eat ration packs at this point, but something a bit nicer wouldn't hurt... x65 Dino Stew x65 Pizzas x65 Fruit Pies Since it will save time, effort and money i'll pay 75% above market price.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的口粮已经不够了，需要有人在我们用完食物之前帮我们跑腿. 我们上次送的货只送了一半，所以我们不得不停工，让工作人员自己去取食物.@p9 我们现在很高兴能吃到定量包装的食物，但吃更好的也无妨... x65 恐龙炖 x65 披萨 x65 水果派 因为这会节省时间、精力和金钱，我愿意支付高于市场价75%的价格.

English: Impurities of Sperrylite are in the latest haul of Sathylite and it's a pain in the ass to remove. It's fine when it's a large chunk of the stuff, we can crack that off and sell it. When it's tiny nodules like this, we have to use acids to remove it.@p9 What we need you to bring us here is: x250 Sulfur x20 Bottles of Chemicals You can get the chemicals from Chemmix Industrial or Chromium-Sierra Sciences. We'll mix the stuff ourselves here.
Chinese (simplified): 在最新一批的星晶石中发现了晶石的杂质去除起来很麻烦. 如果是大块的东西还没问题，我们可以把它挖出来来卖了. 当它是像这样的小结节时，我们必须用酸来去除它.@p9 我们需要你给我们弄来这些东西: x250 硫磺 x20 瓶化学品 你可以从这些工厂弄来化学品：Chemmix工业或者Chromium-Sierra Sciences. 我们会自己来搅拌.

English: We've been meaning to run a test on a different extraction method. We can't get the parts from Polaris since we'd be an industrial entity, but as a private citizen you can get the parts we need without Polaris' restrictions.@p9 What I need from you is: x1 Improved Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直想用另一种提取方法进行测试. 我们无法从极星获得零件，因为我们是一个工业实体， 但是作为一个普通公民，你可以不受极星的限制得到我们需要的零件.@p9 我需要你做的是: x1 自动采矿装置 (T2) 买下来或者自己做，然后带给我. 我知道这是一个小漏洞，一些勘探者利用这个漏洞来通过极星的垄断开采.
我已经带来了你要的自动采矿机.

English: Our system calibrations are completely off. We've been meaning to replace the control system so we can use more equipment. The last time we tried, we overloaded the CPU and it seems to have had lasting effects.@p9 What I need you to get me is: x3 Large Optronic Bridges x30 Computers And we should be able to bring the control system back up to spec.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的系统校准完全错了. 我们一直打算更换控制系统，这样我们就可以使用更多的设备. 上次我们尝试的时候，我们超载了CPU，它似乎有持久的影响.@p9 我要你帮我弄到的是: x3 大型光电桥 x30 计算机 我们应该能让控制系统恢复正常.

English: Congratulations on stepping into hell. This here is a Zascovite mine, the closest thing to hell anyone can come without being dead! \nWe are NOT responsible for loss of life or limb of any sightseers that decide to visit us.\nWhat are you even doing here?
Chinese (simplified): 恭喜踏进地狱。这里是扎斯科维特矿，任何不死的人能来到的最接近地狱的地方! \n我们不对任何决定来参观的游客的生命或肢体的损失负责.\n你来这里做什么?

English: Like i've said, this place is hell. Mining Zascovite under the bedrock is like trying to dig up a landmine with a baseball bat. It pays better than anything, and if you die, it'll probably be quick. Quicker than pulling pentax.@p9 So yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier. You'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books. Is that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 像我说的，这地方就是地狱. 在基岩下开采扎斯科维特就像用棒球棍挖地雷. 赚的比什么都多，而且如果你死了，可能很快就会死. 比拍立拍相机还快.@p9 所以，我们在这里总是需要帮助来获得补给. 在劳动部门就没这么多了. 如果你在找工作，我们需要一份快速的， 便宜的 快递员 你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作. 这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: I hope you've got Transportation Boosters on hand, because we need supplies in huge numbers and we can't risk unloading ships. What we need is mining equipment. We melt our drills daily, and unlike those civilian mining operations I don't have time to tell you where to get the parts!@p9 What I need you to get is: x16 Mining Equipment Yeah, 16 of 'em. You'll need a full set of Transportation Boosters to lug those big boys out here. But I don't skimp on pay, so it'll be worth it.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你已经装备了一台运输增强器，因为我们需要大量的补给但是我们不能冒险卸船. 我们需要的是 采矿设备. 我们每天都有钻头融化， 不像那些民用采矿作业，我没有时间告诉你在哪能找到零件!@p9 我要你弄到的是: x16 采矿设备 是啊，16个. 你需要一整套运输增强器才能把这些大块头拖到这里来. 但我从不吝啬薪水，所以这是值得的.

English: I hope you've got Transportation Boosters on hand, because we need supplies in huge numbers and we can't risk unloading ships. What we need is mining equipment. We melt our drills daily, and unlike those civilian mining operations I don't have time to tell you where to get the parts!@p9 What I need you to get is: x10 Mining Equipment x10 Spare Parts x50 Motors Doesn't matter what they're for. I just need them for repairs.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你已经装备了一台运输增强器，因为我们需要大量的补给但是我们不能冒险卸船. 我们需要的是 采矿设备. 我们每天都有钻头融化， 不像那些民用采矿作业，我没有时间告诉你在哪能找到零件!@p9 我要你弄到的是: x10 采矿设备 x10 备用零件 x50 马达 它们的用途并不重要. 我只是需要它们来修理.

English: Alright, this is a big job and a well-paying one! We run on Fusion in this place! Doesn't look it, right? Well, we do. And our Fusion Reactor's ready for a replacement but no one will ship out to this hellhole.@p9 What I need you to get is: x1 Reactor Core x15 Radiation Shielding x20 Superconductors This is a complete replacement, so you're going to be carrying the bulk of the parts. That will require FOUR Transportation Boosters on your armor.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧，这是一份大工作，也是一份高薪工作! 我们在这里靠核聚变运行! 看起来不像，对吧? 嗯，实际上是的。我们的聚变反应堆已经准备好了替换组件但没人会把我们送到这个鬼地方.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x1 核聚变核心 x15 辐射屏蔽器 x20 超导体 这是一个整套的替换组件，所以你要帮运一个超大体积的货物. 你需要装备4套的运输增强器在你的装甲上.

English: Heat's a massive problem here. We go through coolant at an insane rate and we're always looking for more efficiency in diverting the heat away from the critical systems. Think you can handle: x100 Heat Exchangers x35 Coolant?
Chinese (simplified): 这里的高温是个大问题. 我们以惊人的速度消耗冷却剂，同时我们一直在寻找更有效的方法从关键系统中分流热量。 我认为你能处理好: x100 热交换器 x35 冷却剂?
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: The work crews down here need to be armored and insulated against the high temperatures in the mine. The real problem is air supply. We go through air filters fast and suits don't withstand the wear-and-tear of a Zascovite mine particularly well.@p9 What I need you to get is: x200 Filters x3 Heavy Armor x3 Oxygen Tank Boosters Don't act tough, you'll need Transportation Boosters on your armor if you want to carry all those things.
Chinese (simplified): 面的工作人员需要穿上盔甲，抵御矿井的高温. 真正的问题是空气供应. 我们快速消耗空气过滤器，防护套装经不起Zascovite矿的磨损.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x200 过滤器 x3 重型装甲 x3 氧气管支持系统 不要硬来，你需要运输增强器在你的装甲上如果你想携带全部的东西.
我已经带来了你要的过滤器 and armors

English: We're almost at the end of the work day. I need something to reward the boys, and the rig needs a top-up of water if you can manage that too. You'll need Transportation Boosters to carry the stuff, so i'll pay extra.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x50 Water Containers x50 Ration Packs x250 Bottles of Beer
Chinese (simplified): 今天的工作快结束了. 我需要点东西来奖励这些孩子们，如果你也能做到的话，钻井平台需要加满水. 你将需要 运输增强器来搬东西， 我也会支付额外的报酬.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x50 水容器 x50 包装食品 x250 瓶啤酒

English: We've been having trouble with pirates and raiders the last few weeks. We were able to drive them off last time, but there's a good chance they'll be back with more men and more guns next time. We don't have anyone with a license to buy heavy weapons, so we need an outsider to do it for us.@p9 What we need is: x5 LS-45 Laser Rifles x5 Elite Assault Rifles x3 Guided Rocket Launchers Make sure they don't catch onto you bringing these to us or they might hit us earlier.
Chinese (simplified): 过去几周我们一直被海盗和袭击者骚扰。上次我们把他们赶走了，但下次他们很有可能会带着更多的人和更多的枪回来. 我们没有任何人拥有购买重型武器的许可证，所以我们需要一个外人来为我们做这件事.@p9 我们需要的是: x5 LS-45 激光步枪s x5 精英突击步枪 x3 制导火箭发射器 别让他们发现你把这些给我们否则他们可能会更早袭击我们.

English: Impurities of Sperrylite are in the latest haul of Sathylite and it's a pain in the ass to remove. It's fine when it's a large chunk of the stuff, we can crack that off and sell it. When it's tiny nodules like this, we have to use acids to remove it.@p9 What we need you to bring us here is: x250 Sulfur x20 Bottles of Chemicals You can get the chemicals from Chemmix Industrial or Chromium-Sierra Sciences. We'll mix the stuff ourselves here.
Chinese (simplified): 在最新一批的星晶石中发现了晶石的杂质去除起来很麻烦. 如果是大块的东西还没问题，我们可以把它挖出来来卖了. 当它是像这样的小结节时，我们必须用酸来去除它.@p9 我们需要你给我们弄来这些东西: x250 硫磺 x20 瓶化学品 你可以从这些工厂弄来化学品：Chemmix工业或者Chromium-Sierra Sciences. 我们会自己来搅拌.

English: We've been meaning to run a test on a different extraction method. We can't get the parts from Polaris since we'd be an industrial entity, but as a private citizen you can get the parts we need without Polaris' restrictions.@p9 What I need from you is: x1 Advanced Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直想用另一种提取方法进行测试. 我们无法从极星获得零件，因为我们是一个工业实体， 但是作为一个普通公民，你可以不受极星的限制得到我们需要的零件.@p9 我需要你做的是: x1 先进Auto-Mining Device 买下来或者自己做，然后带给我. 我知道这是一个小漏洞，一些勘探者利用这个漏洞来通过极星的垄断开采.
我已经带来了你要的自动采矿机.

English: Our feedline computers are completely overloaded. We've had to shut down the drilling in the west tunnel in order to keep the rest of the site operational. We need a complete replacement of our Control System. Repairs won't do it this time.@p9 What I need is: x1 Advanced CPU Extender for a Base These things are so big that you'll need 4 Transportation Boosters to even carry it. We can't unload it from your ship, so you're on your own.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的馈线计算机完全超载了. 我们不得不关闭西部隧道的施工进度，以保持其他地方的运作. 我们需要一个完整的替换组件我们的控制系统。这次修理不起作用了.@p9 我需要的是: x1 CPU扩展器 T4 (基地) 这些东西太大了，你需要4 运输增强器 来搬运它. 我们不能把它从你的船上卸下来，所以你只能靠自己了.

English: Welcome to one of the Miravella Mining Company's operations. We do the hard job of mining Pyrestrum for use in plasma generators, coils and weapons.\nNow that the official greeting is over with: We're not equipped to have visitors, so would you kindly uhhh... go away? We have enough problems to deal with.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Miravella矿业公司的运营之一. 我们辛苦地开采Pyrestrum用于等离子发生器，线圈和武器.\n现在正式的问候结束了:我们没有接待访客的设备，所以你能不能……消失吗?我们有很多问题要处理.

English: Gods yes, we need help. We've had four guys sent to Andromedical with chemical burns after one of them did a stupid stunt with a shale barrel. What I really need is someone to fill in for our courier who took the four idiots away. You'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books. Is that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 天啦，我们需要帮忙。我们已经有四个人被送去了安德罗医疗中心他们中有一个人用页岩桶做了愚蠢的特技. 我真正需要的是有人代替带走那四个白痴的信使. 你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作. 这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payoutsover 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. I don't have the cash on me for larger payoutsover 100k， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: I hope you've got Transportation Boosters on hand, because we need supplies in huge numbers and we can't risk unloading ships. What we need is mining equipment. We melt our drills daily, and unlike those civilian mining operations I don't have time to tell you where to get the parts!@p9 What I need you to get is: x12 Mining Equipment Yeah, 12 of 'em. You'll need a full set of Transportation Boosters to lug those big boys out here. But I don't skimp on pay, so it'll be worth it.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你已经装备了一台运输增强器，因为我们需要大量的补给但是我们不能冒险卸船. 我们需要的是 采矿设备. 我们每天都有钻头融化， 不像那些民用采矿作业，我没有时间告诉你在哪能找到零件!@p9 我要你弄到的是: x12 采矿设备 Yeah， 12 of 'em. 你需要一整套运输增强器才能把这些大块头拖到这里来. 但我从不吝啬薪水，所以这是值得的.

English: I hope you've got Transportation Boosters on hand, because we need supplies in huge numbers and we can't risk unloading ships. What we need is mining equipment. We melt our drills daily, and unlike those civilian mining operations I don't have time to tell you where to get the parts!@p9 What I need you to get is: x14 Mining Equipment Doesn't matter what they're for. I just need them for repairs.
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你已经装备了一台运输增强器，因为我们需要大量的补给但是我们不能冒险卸船. 我们需要的是 采矿设备. 我们每天都有钻头融化， 不像那些民用采矿作业，我没有时间告诉你在哪能找到零件!@p9 我要你弄到的是: x14 采矿设备 它们的用途并不重要. 我只是需要它们来修理.

English: We've got corrosive dust kicked up by the drills inside the drill housing where we couldn't see it and now the frame is both rusted all to hell and too radioactive for anyone to get close enough to repair it.@p9 What I need you to get is: x16 Mining Equipment This is for a complete replacement, so you're going to be carrying the bulk of the parts. That will require FOUR Transportation Boosters on your armor.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在采矿室里发现了钻头产生的腐蚀性灰尘，在我们看不到的地方，现在这个框架已经生锈了，而且放射性太强，任何人都无法靠近来修复它.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x16 采矿设备 This is for a complete 替换组件，所以你要帮运一个超大体积的货物. 你需要装备4套的运输增强器在你的装甲上.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: Pyrestrum's an ore mix of Erestrum and Sulfur. The reaction between the two make the dust thrown up by the drills radioactive and corrosive. There ain't no worse combination for a work site.@p9 What I need to combat these two problems is: x20 Radiation Shielding x50 Oxygen Bottles The shielding to keep the radiation out of the personnel areas and the compressed air to clean the dust off everything.
Chinese (simplified): Pyrestrum是锷和硫磺的混合矿石. 两者之间的反应使钻头的灰尘抛起放射性和腐蚀性. 没有比这更糟糕的组合了.@p9 我需要处理这两个问题是: x20 辐射屏蔽器 x50 氧气瓶 使辐射远离人员区域的屏蔽并让压缩空气清洁一切灰尘.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We're getting beam diffusion in one of the drills and the techs have found that the reaction chamber is filled with Pyrestrum dust and it's obstructing the beam, but we can't don't have the materials to repressurize the chamber or protection for the work crew to do the work.@p9 What I need you to get is: x100 Bottles of Helium x3 Heavy Armor x3 Radiation Shielding Boosters Don't act tough, you'll need Transportation Boosters on your armor if you want to carry all those things.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在钻头上使用了束流扩散技术，人员发现反应室里充满了Pyrestrum粉尘它阻碍了束流，但我们不能没有重新增压舱室的材料或者保护工作人员保护措施的情况下工作.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x100 瓶氦气 x3 重型装甲 x3 辐射屏蔽器 Boosters 不要硬来，你需要运输增强器在你的装甲上如果你想携带全部的东西.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We're almost at the end of the work day. I need something to reward the boys, and the rig needs a top-up of water if you can manage that too. You'll need Transportation Boosters to carry the stuff, so i'll pay extra.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x50 Water Containers x50 Ration Packs x250 Bottles of Beer
Chinese (simplified): 今天的工作快结束了. 我需要点东西来奖励这些孩子们，如果你也能做到的话，钻井平台需要加满水. 你将需要 运输增强器来搬东西， 我也会支付额外的报酬.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x50 水容器 x50 包装食品 x250 瓶啤酒

English: We've lost another walkway between sites and with it one of the crew. He'll live, but he'll out of commission for the rest of the season! We can't risk that again, so i'm sending you to get corrosion-resistant materials to armor up the rest of the site.@p9 It'll be costly, but worth it in the long run. x1000 Platinum Plates You WILL need Four Transportation Boosters as well in order to carry all those plates. That's 32 tonnes of platinum and it's going to be heavy.
Chinese (simplified): 我们失去了另一条连接地点的通讯，其中一名工作人员也失去了通讯. 他会活下来，但在这个赛季剩下的时间里，他将不能参加比赛! 我们不能再冒这样的险了，所以我派你去弄些耐腐蚀的材料来加固剩下的部分.@p9 这将是昂贵的，但从长远来看是值得的. x1000 铂金板 你会需要Four 运输增强器用来装载这些金属板. 这可是32吨的铂金，而且会很重.

English: We must've hit a patch of near-pure Erestrum metal in the current deposit. That can sometimes be a problem since the heat of the drill will melt it easily and it can flow into the electronics. Erestrum is a strong conductor, and that's exactly what happened. The motors and power coils melted into slag.@p9 We need a complete replacement of the extractor system now: x1 Advanced Upgrade Kit x20 Power Coils x50 Advanced Electronics x150 Motors You'll need at least Three Transportation Boosters to carry that order, so you'll be compensated accordingly.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一定是碰到了一块接近纯的埃雷斯托姆金属. 这有时会是一个问题，因为钻头的热量会融化它很容易，它可以流入电子元件. 锷是一个强导体，这就是事实. 能把马达和能源线圈融化成渣.@p9 能把马达和能源线圈融化成渣: x1 先进升级工具包 x20 能源线圈 x50 先进电子元件 x150 马达 You'll need at least Three 运输增强器来帮运这些东西，所以你会得到相应的补偿.

English: We've been meaning to run a test on a different extraction method. We can't get the parts from Polaris since we'd be an industrial entity, but as a private citizen you can get the parts we need without Polaris' restrictions.@p9 What I need from you is: x1 Advanced Auto-Mining Device Buy it or construct it yourself and bring it to me. It's a little loophole I know a few prospectors use out in the field to get past Polaris monopoly on mining.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直想用另一种提取方法进行测试. 我们无法从极星获得零件，因为我们是一个工业实体， 但是作为一个普通公民，你可以不受极星的限制得到我们需要的零件.@p9 我需要你做的是: x1 先进Auto-Mining Device 买下来或者自己做，然后带给我. 我知道这是一个小漏洞，一些勘探者利用这个漏洞来通过极星的垄断开采.
我已经带来了你要的自动采矿机.

English: We've been having trouble with pirates and raiders the last few weeks. We were able to drive them off last time, but there's a good chance they'll be back with more men and more guns next time. We don't have anyone with a license to buy heavy weapons, so we need an outsider to do it for us.@p9 What we need is: x5 LS-45 Laser Rifles x5 Elite Assault Rifles x3 Guided Rocket Launchers Make sure they don't catch onto you bringing these to us or they might hit us earlier.
Chinese (simplified): 过去几周我们一直被海盗和袭击者骚扰。上次我们把他们赶走了，但下次他们很有可能会带着更多的人和更多的枪回来. 我们没有任何人拥有购买重型武器的许可证，所以我们需要一个外人来为我们做这件事.@p9 我们需要的是: x5 LS-45 激光步枪s x5 精英突击步枪 x3 制导火箭发射器 别让他们发现你把这些给我们否则他们可能会更早袭击我们.

English: Ahoy! What business do you have here at Salzach Mining?\nWe're here extracting salt from seawater. Doesn't look or sound like an exciting job, but it's always in demand so we make a fair amount of coin.
Chinese (simplified): 喂! !你来萨尔扎克矿业有什么事?\n我们在这从海水中提取盐分。无论怎么看或者听上去都不像是一份令人兴奋的工作，但它总是有需求，所以我们赚了不少钱.

English: I don't need any help with the rig, but i'm not above getting help with supplies if you've got a ship.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 我对这个钻井平台不感兴趣，但如果你有船的话，我不会不屑于找人帮忙.\n你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作.\n这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of materials too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批材料也带上。这是我告诉过你我可能会给你的奖金.

English: Salt's a problem to mine. It gets everywhere and rusts machinery, so we always need replacement parts. Which is what I need you to get:\nx1 Mining Equipment\nP3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too if you can find a factory.
Chinese (simplified): 盐对我来说是个问题. 它到处都是，使机器生锈，所以我们总是需要替换组件零件.这些是你需要弄到的东西:\nx1 采矿设备\nP3 和 NLP 工厂应该会生产和出售它们，如果你找到工厂.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: Salt's a problem to mine. It gets everywhere and rusts machinery, so we always need replacement parts. Which is what I need you to get:\nx2 Mining Equipment\nP3 and NLP factories make 'em so should sell 'em too if you can find a factory.
Chinese (simplified): 盐对我来说是个问题. 它到处都是，使机器生锈，所以我们总是需要替换组件零件.这些是你需要弄到的东西:\nx2 采矿设备\nP3 和 NLP 工厂应该会生产和出售它们，如果你找到工厂.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: We had a large granite rock get jammed in the excavator's axle that overstrained the motors and sheared off several struts and bent several frame parts. I need some new motors and parts. Not expensive, but hard to get sent out here.@p9 That's why I need you to go and get me: x50 Motors x500 Mechanical Components x100 Steel Plates I'll pay well for the parts if they're good quality.
Chinese (simplified): 有一块巨大的花岗岩卡在了挖掘机的车轴上，导致马达过度紧张，折断了几个支柱，弯曲了几个车架部件. 我需要一些新的马达和零件. 不贵，但很难送到这里来.@p9 所以我才需要你去帮我弄来: x50 马达 x500 机械元件 x100 铁板 如果零件质量好，我愿意出高价.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: Our computer systems are outdated and we need a set of new computers and the wiring to connect them up. Everything we've got is at least 10 years out of date and it causes trouble whenever one of those modern haulers comes to pick up a shipment.@p9 Shouldn't be a problem for you to get: x45 Computers x150 Electronics x300 Optical Fiber So we can upgrade our computers.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的计算机系统已经过时了，我们需要一套新的计算机和连接它们的线路. 我们所有的东西都至少过时10年了，每当那些现代化的搬运工来取货时，就会带来麻烦.@p9 对你来说应该不是问题: x45 计算机 x150 电子元件 x300 光纤 所以我们可以升级我们的计算机.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: When we were swinging the excavator head around last week, we overburdened the communication array on the top and we've been restricted to bouncing com signals off the local stations to reach orbit.@p9 What I need you to get is: x10 Communication Equipment x10 Computers The only place you can get those Communication Equipment is Arriake Technology. It's an Electronics factory under Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 上周，当我们转动挖掘机的头部时，我们使顶部的通信阵列负担过重，我们只能从当地空间站反射通信信号以进入轨道.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x10 通信设备 x10 计算机 The only place you can get those 通信设备 is Arriake Technology. 这是一个电子元件工厂隶属于 极星.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We're running low on food and it's time for me to order supplies. Those guys overcharge us for delivery every time, so i'm assigning the job to you and at least i'll know the money is going somewhere worthwhile.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x50 Cheeseburgers x50 Canned Meat x50 Berry Juice
Chinese (simplified): 我们库存的食物不够了，是时候订购补给了. 那些家伙每次送货都要多收我们的钱，所以我把这个工作分配给你，至少我知道钱花得值了.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x50 芝士汉堡 x50 肉罐头 x50 草莓汁

English: This site is pretty open and we'll be getting a couple of youngsters on board in a few weeks for training in the business but we've no place to put them. Even when I was starting out I had a place to sleep, so i'd like to have more than a tent waiting for when they arrive.@p9 It'll be costly, but worth it to give them some proper housing units. x5 Prefab Housing Modules Should do it. The only place that produces them are the P3 Factories under Polaris. They're pretty bulky though.
Chinese (simplified): 这个站点是开放的，我们将在几周内让几个年轻人上船进行业务培训，但我们没有地方安置他们. 即使在我刚开始工作的时候，我也有地方睡觉，所以当他们到来的时候，我希望有一个比帐篷更大的地方.@p9 虽然有点昂贵，但值得为他们提供一些合适的住房. x5 预制房屋模块 可以搞定它. 唯一能生产它们的地方就是P3 工厂 属于极星. 不过它们相当笨重.

English: I've brought you those prefab housing modules
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你要的那些预制房屋模块

English: Every now and then, the excavator picks up a big chunk of granite that gets wedged somewhere important and I have to send one of the boys up to pull it out. The last one was too heavy to lift, so we all had to climb up their with drills and break it apart.@p9 I'd rather that didn't happen again, so I need you to get me: x1 Transportation Booster x1 Medium Armor x3 Handheld Laser Drills Which should make it easier to carry the pieces and failing that, easier to break it into smaller pieces.
Chinese (simplified): 每隔一段时间，挖掘机就会捡起一大块嵌在重要地方的花岗岩，我就得派一个工人上去把它拔出来. 最后一个太重型举不起来，所以我们都不得不爬上去用钻头把它拆开.@p9 我不希望这种事再发生，所以我需要你帮我: x1 运输增强器 x1 中型装甲 x3 手持激光钻头 怎样才能更容易地把它们弄成碎片呢?如果做不到这一点，那么把它们分成小块就更容易了.
我已经带来了你想要的东西

English: While this isn't an exciting job, it's still fraught with aches and injuries, so we're always in need of medical supplies. Some of them we can get easily, others are harder or require special licensing to purchase.@p9 Do you think you can get us: x50 Bandages x50 Antibiotic Ointment x10 Ablative Spray That's all we need. We mostly have to deal with salt burns and the occasional broke toe.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然这不是一份令人兴奋的工作，但它仍然充满了疼痛和伤害，所以我们总是需要医疗用品. 其中一些我们可以很容易获得，另一些则比较难，或者需要特殊许可才能购买.@p9 你能给我们弄来: x50 绷带 x50 抗生素软膏 x10 烧伤喷雾 这就是我们需要的. 我们大多要处理的是盐烧伤和偶尔的脚趾骨折.
我已经补充了你的医疗用品

English: The last couple of weeks have been wetter than usual and it's causing more than enough problems since it's soaking into the rocksalt and turning the ground into a quagmire of salty mud We need something to get rid of the water.@p9 That's where you come into it: x1 Water Extractor x10 Promethium Hydrocells x75 Plastic Tubes Are what I need to pump out the excess water. Shouldn't be too hard for you.
Chinese (simplified): 过去的几周比平时更潮湿，这造成了更多的问题，因为它渗透到岩石盐，把地面变成了咸湿泥泞的泥潭 我们得找个东西把水弄走.@p9 这就是你要弄来得: x1 水提取器 x10 融合电池 x75 塑料管 我需要一些泵来泵出多余的水. 对你来说应该不会太难.

English: I've brought the pump and pipes you wanted
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你想要的泵和管道

English: What can we do for you here? This is a privately-owned digsite. We dig for gold here.\nIf you're raiders, you're out of luck. Just because we mine gold here, doesn't mean we're rich.
Chinese (simplified): 我们能为您做些什么? 这是一个私人站点. 我们在这里挖金子.\n如果你是掠袭者，那你就不走运了. 我们在这里开采黄金，并不意味着我们富有.

English: Yeah, we're always needing help in getting supplies out here. Not so much in the hard labor department. If you're looking for a job, we're in need of a fast, cheap courier.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 是啊，我们这里总是需要人帮忙运送物资. 在劳动部门就没这么多了. 如果你在找工作，我们需要一份快速的， 便宜的 快递员 \n你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作.\n这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. There's not many of us on this rig, so we're always needing replacement parts since there's not enough time to repair some of the larger devices.@p9 Right now we need a new Separator that can identify and separate the gold from rock and other minerals: x5 Mining Equipment x15 Computers x1 Optronics You should be able to find the parts at Polaris' P-3, Chromium-Sierra and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们在这个平台上的人不多，所以我们总是需要替换组件的零件，因为没有足够的时间来修理一些更大的设备.@p9 现在我们需要一种新的分离器，它可以从岩石和其他矿物中识别和分离黄金: x5 采矿设备 x15 计算机 x1 光电设备 你应该能在以下工厂找到零件极星' P-3， Chromium-Sierra 和 NLP 工厂.

English: Millenia of technological advancement in mining techniques and sometimes the oldest methods are still the best when it comes to separating the gold from the rubble and tailings. Water is still the best for gold mining, even here.@p9 What we need is: x7 Mining Equipment x20 Water Containers You can get the Mining Equipment from Polaris' P-3 and NLP factories. but you'll probably need at least 2 Transportation Boosters to even carry it here.
Chinese (simplified): 数千年来采矿技术的进步，有时最古老的方法仍然是从碎石和尾矿中分离黄金的最好方法. 水仍然是开采黄金的最佳选择，即使在这里.@p9 我们需要的是: x7 采矿设备 x20 水容器 你可以从以下设施买到采矿设备极星' P-3 和 NLP 工厂. but you'll probably need at least 2 运输增强器把它搬到这里.

English: We're having trouble with separating the Pyrite from the Gold in this latest digsite. I've just checked the tailings and there's gold in it along with the pyrite, which means the optical sensors are failing to tell the difference.@p9 It's a long shot, but I think: x30 Flux Coils x60 Energy Regulators x300 Titanium Ingots Should work as a sufficiently powerful electromagnet to pull out the iron pyrite from the gold.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个最新的站点上，我们很难把黄铁矿和黄金分开. 我刚检查了尾矿里面有金和黄铁矿，这意味着光学传感器无法分辨.@p9 希望不大，但我觉得: x30 Flux Coil通量线圈 x60 能量调节器 x300 钛锭 能不能作为一个足够强大的电磁铁把黄铁矿从金中抽出来.
我已经带来了你要的电磁铁组件

English: The conveyor's slipped it's track and ripped out the supporting struts, so we're using a backup that really should've been scrapped years ago. We can't get a ship to bring replacements out here without an excessive payment. Just because we mine gold doesn't mean we're rich.@p9 What I need you to get me is: x5 Spare Parts x50 Zascosium Alloy x50 Motors You can find those Spare Parts at Polaris' P-3 and Hostile Apparatus' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 传送带滑出了轨道还扯掉了支撑杆，所以我们用的是一套多年前就该废弃的备用设备. 我们不可能不付一大笔钱就弄到一艘船把替代设备运过来. 我们开采黄金并不意味着我们富有.@p9 我要你帮我弄到的是: x5 备用零件 x50 铡合金 x50 马达 你可以在这些工厂找到备用零件极星' P-3和 （Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司的工厂' .
我已经带来了the 替换组件 parts

English: I need you to get me some mobility boosters and armor to put them in. The boys here need the added mobility to get around the rig when something goes wrong. Gods know it happens every day, and we're too slow to stop things from getting worse.@p9 What I need you to get is: x3 Mobility Boosters x3 Medium Armor You can make the armor. Though it's probably easier to buy it if you don't have a spare set lying around.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要你给我弄些机动助推器和装甲把它们装进去。这里的工人们需要额外的机动性以便在出问题时绕过钻井平台. 天知道这种事每天都在发生，而我们却来不及阻止事情变得更糟.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x3 机动强化器 x3 中型装甲 你可以做盔甲. 不过，如果你周围没有备用的盔甲，可能去买更容易.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We need food here. We're not rich, despite all the gold and we're so busy we forget to eat half the time, so our reserves go bad before we get to them. We need something that'll last.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x20 Canned Vegetables x20 Ration Packs x20 Canned Meat
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要食物。我们并不富裕，尽管有那么多黄金而且我们太忙了，有一半时间都忘了吃饭，所以我们的储备还没来得及吃就坏了. 我们需要能持久的东西.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x20 蔬菜罐头 x20 包装食品 x20 肉罐头

English: Right now I just need some standard repair materials, nothing major. Wiring and electrical parts mainly. x75 Glass Plates x125 Advanced Electronics x150 Optical Fiber Shouldn't be hard for you to get.
Chinese (simplified): 现在我只需要一些标准的维修材料，没什么大不了的. 主要是电线和电器部件. x75 玻璃板 x125 先进电子元件 x150 光纤 对你来说应该不难搞到.
我已经带来了你要的那些补给品

English: Fuel costs to keep the generators running are putting a dent in our productivity. We need a replacement, but the standard solar panels used in civilian construction don't provide enough juice to run our systems. We need the industrial grade solar cells if we want to see a better return.@p9 What we'll need it: x30 Solar Cells x10 High-Output Capacitors Solaris-AMP Manufacturing make the Solar Cells, but they won't ship out such a small order to a place like this.
Chinese (simplified): 维持发电机运转的燃料费用降低了我们的生产力. 我们需要替换组件，但是民用建筑中使用的标准太阳能电池板不能提供足够的能量来运行我们的系统. 如果我们想看到更好的回报，我们需要工业级的太阳能电池.@p9 以下是我们需要的: x30 太阳能电池 x10 高输出电容器 Solaris-AMP Manufacturing可以生存太阳能电池，但他们不会把这么小的订单送到这样的地方.

English: I need medical supplies. We're short on painkillers and I can't get the licensing required to purchase more. x10 Health Pack x10 Trauma Kits x24 Narcotics I don't need to know where you get that last item, just as long as the quality is good.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要医疗用品。我们缺少止痛药，我无法获得购买更多所需的许可. x10 保健医药包 x10 创伤医疗包 x24 麻醉剂 我不需要知道你在哪里买到最后一件东西，只要质量好就行了.

English: We've been having trouble with pirates and raiders the last few weeks. We were able to drive them off last time, but there's a good chance they'll be back with more men and more guns next time. We don't have anyone with a license to buy heavy weapons, so we need an outsider to do it for us.@p9 What we need is: x5 Advanced Pulse Rifles x5 Heavy Sniper Rifles x3 Plasma Cannons Make sure they don't catch onto you bringing these to us or they might hit us earlier.
Chinese (simplified): 过去几周我们一直被海盗和袭击者骚扰。上次我们把他们赶走了，但下次他们很有可能会带着更多的人和更多的枪回来. 我们没有任何人拥有购买重型武器的许可证，所以我们需要一个外人来为我们做这件事.@p9 我们需要的是: x5 先进脉冲步枪 x5 重型狙击步枪 x3 等离子加农炮 别让他们发现你把这些给我们否则他们可能会更早袭击我们.

English: This is one of the platinum mines set up by M.A Corp.\nWhat we pull out of the ground here is Sperrylite. It's toxic stuff that's hell to process. You're not one of our regular transports, so what are you after here?
Chinese (simplified): 这是M.A公司建立的铂矿之一.\n我们从地里挖出来的是砷铂矿. 这是一种很难消化的有毒物质. 你不是我们的常客，你来这里干什么?

English: We've had two guys sent to Andromedical after they got a strong whiff of dust out of the excavation. What I need is a freighter to replace the one that took them away.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 我们派了两个人去安德洛医疗中心因为他们在挖掘现场闻到了一股浓烈的灰尘味. 我需要一艘货轮来取代带走他们的那艘.\n你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作.\n这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. I don't have the cash on me for larger payouts over 100k, so I'll have to wire the money into your account.@p9 It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of ore too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 我身上没钱支付10万以上的大额支出， 所以我得把钱打到你的账户上.@p9 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批矿石也拿去. 这是我说好会加入的额外奖励.

English: You may regret offering your help once you hear what we need. There's not many of us on this rig, so we're always needing replacement parts since there's not enough time to repair some of the larger devices.@p9 We've got a problem keeping the drills cool as they work at cracking the ore, which is some of the hardest in the business: x5 Mining Equipment x5 Coolant You should be able to find the parts at Polaris' P-3, Thermal Interactions and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你听到我们需要什么，你可能会后悔提供帮助的. 我们在这个平台上的人不多，所以我们总是需要替换组件的零件，因为没有足够的时间来修理一些更大的设备.@p9 我们遇到了一个问题，在钻头工作时，他们要保持低温，这是工作中最麻烦的: x5 采矿设备 x5 冷却剂 你应该能在以下工厂找到零件极星' P-3， Thermal Interactions 和 NLP 工厂.

English: We've overburdened the drill by drilling through the thickest part of the deposit and the drill's building heat faster than we can cool it. It's too late to reposition the drill, so we're stuck with this course. What we can do is fix the overheating problem.@p9 All we need is: x7 Mining Equipment x10 Heat Exchangers You can get the equipment from Polaris' P-3, Thermal Interactions and NLP factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们钻头正在钻穿过沉积物最厚的部分，这使钻头不堪重负，钻头的散热速度快于我们冷却它的速度. 现在重新部署钻头已经太迟了，所以我们只能坚持这处钻孔. 我们可以做的是解决过热问题.@p9 All we need is: x7 采矿设备 x10 热交换器 你可以从以下企业获得装备极星' P-3， Thermal Interactions 和 NLP 工厂.

English: Our drills need servicing and that means replacement lenses and a fresh set of power coils each. We also need to improve energy conductance, but that's a job for another time. One issue at a time.@p9 To conduct the servicing i'll need: x3 Laser Upgrade Kits x10 Power Coils x25 High-Output Capacitors You should have no trouble getting your hands on any of these parts.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的钻头需要维修，这意味着需要替换镜头和一套全新的能源线圈. 我们还需要提高能量电导， 但那是以后的事了. 一次一个问题.@p9 要进修维修我们需要: x3 激光升级工具包s x10 能源线圈 x25 高输出电容器 你应该能毫不费力地拿到这些零件.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件 parts

English: We've hit a snag with the robotic arms that sort the sperrylite from the rock off the conveyors. Sperrylite is very heavy and it seems a chunk larger than normal was just too much for the arms and they've burst the valves on the hydraulics.@p9 I need replacement parts: x10 Spare Parts x4 Robotics You can find those Spare Parts at Polaris' P-3 and both at Hostile Apparatus' factories.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的机械臂上遇到了障碍，它从岩石中分离出了一块砷铂矿. 这块砷铂矿非常沉重，它似乎比正常的尺寸要大得多，以至于弄坏了机械臂的液压阀.@p9 我需要替换组件: x10 备用零件 x4 机械设备 你可以在这些工厂找到备用零件极星' P-3 and both at （Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司' 工厂.
我已经带来了the new 机械设备

English: We've got a survey team coming next week and we're expected to have everything set up so they can evaluate the quality of the ore around here. We don't have any of the things they need and we can't get any of them in a hurry.@p9 That's where you come in. I need: x2 Optronics x5 Scientific Equipment x10 Bottles of Xenon Gas It's outside my area of expertise on where you can get those, so i'll pay 75% above market price for them.
Chinese (simplified): 下周我们会有一个勘探队来，我们希望一切都准备就绪，这样他们就可以评估这里的矿石质量. 我们没有他们需要的任何东西，而且我们也不能从他们那得到任何东西.@p9 这就是你的作用.我需要 x2 光电设备 x5 科研设备 x10 氙气瓶 Gas 至于你可以从哪里得到这些已经在我的专业范围之外， 所以我愿意出市场价的75%.

English: I've got the things you need to set up a lab
Chinese (simplified): 我弄到了你需要的建立实验室的物资

English: We need food here. We're not rich, despite all the platinum and we're so busy we forget to eat half the time, so our reserves go bad before we get to them. We need something that'll last.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x20 Canned Vegetables x20 Ration Packs x20 Canned Meat
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里需要食物. 尽管有那么多白金但是我们并不富裕，而且我们太忙了，有一半时间都忘了吃饭， 所以我们的储备在我们吃之前就坏了. 我们需要能持久的东西.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x20 蔬菜罐头 x20 包装食品 x20 肉罐头

English: Right now I just need some standard repair materials, nothing major. Just parts we need for reinforcing the older hulls and electricals. x25 Advanced Electronics x250 Neodymium Ingots x500 Sathium Ingots Shouldn't be hard for you to get.
Chinese (simplified): 现在我只需要一些标准的维修材料，没什么大不了的. 只是加固旧船体和电力系统所需的零件. x25 先进电子元件 x250 钕锭 x500 钑锭 对你来说应该不难搞到.
我已经带来了你要的那些补给品

English: We were checking the cables running to the drills yesterday and noticed a number of them are badly corroded. Something in the atmosphere seems to be eating through cables. We need a stronger replacement that's corrosion resistant.@p9 I'm thinking that it might be worth getting: x40 Superconductors x160 Titanium Plates Arriake Technology and Solaris-AMP Manufacturing make superconducting cables, but they won't ship out such a small order to a place like this.
Chinese (simplified): 我们昨天检查了从运行中到钻头是的电缆，发现其中一些已经严重腐蚀. 大气中似乎有什么东西在侵蚀电缆. 我们需要一个更强的替换组件，它是耐腐蚀的.@p9 我觉得它可能值得一买: x40 超导体 x160 钛板 Arriake Technology and Solaris-AMP Manufacturing制造超导电缆，但他们不会把这么小的订单送到这样的地方.

English: I need medical supplies. We're short on painkillers and I can't get the licensing required to purchase more. x10 Decontamination Kits x10 Detox Kits x24 Narcotics I don't need to know where you get that last item, just as long as the quality is good.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要医疗用品。我们缺少止痛药，我无法获得购买更多所需的许可. x10 去污医药包 x10 解毒医疗包 x24 麻醉剂 我不需要知道你在哪里买到最后一件东西，只要质量好就行了.

English: We've been having trouble with pirates and raiders the last few weeks. We were able to drive them off last time, but there's a good chance they'll be back with more men and more guns next time. We don't have anyone with a license to buy heavy weapons, so we need an outsider to do it for us.@p9 What we need is: x5 Elite Assault Rifles x5 Advanced Submachine Guns x5 Advanced Miniguns Make sure they don't catch onto you bringing these to us or they might hit us earlier.
Chinese (simplified): 过去几周我们一直被海盗和袭击者骚扰。上次我们把他们赶走了，但下次他们很有可能会带着更多的人和更多的枪回来. 我们没有任何人拥有购买重型武器的许可证，所以我们需要一个外人来为我们做这件事.@p9 我们需要的是: x5 精英突击步枪 x5 先进冲锋枪 x5 先进迷你火神炮 别让他们发现你把这些给我们否则他们可能会更早袭击我们.

English: I hope you're not here to pick up our latest sulfur shipment. We haven't even half-filled it.\nNo? Well then what do you need with us in this hellhole?
Chinese (simplified): 我希望你不是来取我们刚生产出来的硫磺存货的. 我们还没装满一半呢.\n没有?那么你为什么要和我们一起呆在这个鬼地方?

English: I don't need any help with the rig, but i'm not above getting help with supplies if you've got a ship.\nYou'll be paid of course. I might throw in a bonus for good work. But you'll be working off the books.\nIs that good for you?
Chinese (simplified): 我对这个钻井平台不感兴趣，但如果你有船的话，我不会不屑于找人帮忙.\n你当然会得到报酬的. 我可能会给工作表现好的人一笔奖金. 但你得私下工作.\n这对你有好处吗?

English: Alright, everything seems to be in order. As agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits. It's more than you'd pay for the goods at a trade station, but still a good deal for me since there's no exorbitant shipping fees. Take this shipment of materials too. This is that bonus I told you I might throw in.
Chinese (simplified): 好了，一切都安排妥当了. 为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点. 这比你在贸易站买东西要实惠多了，但对我来说还是很划算的，因为没有过高的运费. 把这批材料也带上。这是我告诉过你我可能会给你的奖金.

English: As you can see, we operate a excavator rig to pull up surface sulfur. The issue we've got right now is that we've thrown a bucket, so there's an empty slot in the chain:\nx1 Mining Equipment\nfrom P3 or NLP factories should fix the problem.
Chinese (simplified): 如你所见，我们使用挖掘机从地面挖掘硫磺. 现在的问题是，我们有一个铲斗掉了，所以链上有一个空槽:\nx1 采矿设备\n来自 P3或者NLP 工厂 可以解决问题.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: The excavator we run here digs up sulfur from the surface rock, where there's been recent volcanic activity. Problem is that we need: x2 Mining Equipment from P3 or NLP factories to fix a broken drive train on the excavator's left side.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在这里用挖掘机从地表岩石中挖出硫磺，那里最近有火山活动. 问题是我们需要: x2 采矿设备 来自 P3或者NLP 工厂来修理坏了的传动系统 on the excavator's left side.
我已经带来了the 采矿设备

English: We had a large granite rock get jammed in the excavator's axle that overstrained the motors and sheared off several struts and bent several frame parts. I need some new motors and parts. Not expensive, but hard to get sent out here.@p9 That's why I need you to go and get me: x50 Motors x500 Mechanical Components x100 Titanium Plates I'll pay well for the parts if they're good quality.
Chinese (simplified): 有一块巨大的花岗岩卡在了挖掘机的车轴上，导致马达过度紧张，折断了几个支柱，弯曲了几个车架部件. 我需要一些新的马达和零件. 不贵，但很难送到这里来.@p9 所以我才需要你去帮我弄来: x50 马达 x500 机械元件 x100 钛板 如果零件质量好，我愿意出高价.
我已经带来了你要的替换组件设备

English: Our computer systems are outdated and we need a set of new computers and the wiring to connect them up. Everything we've got is at least 10 years out of date and it causes trouble whenever one of those modern haulers comes to pick up a shipment.@p9 Shouldn't be a problem for you to get: x45 Computers x150 Electronics x300 Optical Fiber So we can upgrade our computers.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的计算机系统已经过时了，我们需要一套新的计算机和连接它们的线路. 我们所有的东西都至少过时10年了，每当那些现代化的搬运工来取货时，就会带来麻烦.@p9 对你来说应该不是问题: x45 计算机 x150 电子元件 x300 光纤 所以我们可以升级我们的计算机.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: When we were swinging the excavator head around last week, we overburdened the communication array on the top and we've been restricted to bouncing com signals off the local stations to reach orbit.@p9 What I need you to get is: x10 Communication Equipment x10 Computers The only place you can get those Communication Equipment is Arriake Technology. It's an Electronics factory under Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 上周，当我们转动挖掘机的头部时，我们使顶部的通信阵列负担过重，我们只能从当地空间站反射通信信号以进入轨道.@p9 我要你弄到的是: x10 通信设备 x10 计算机 The only place you can get those 通信设备 is Arriake Technology. 这是一个电子元件工厂隶属于 极星.
我已经带来了你所要求的项目

English: We're running low on food and it's time for me to order supplies. Those guys overcharge us for delivery every time, so i'm assigning the job to you and at least i'll know the money is going somewhere worthwhile.@p9 Here's the list of what I need you to get: x250 Flour x300 Meat x500 Vegetables
Chinese (simplified): 我们库存的食物不够了，是时候订购补给了. 那些家伙每次送货都要多收我们的钱，所以我把这个工作分配给你，至少我知道钱花得值了.@p9 以下是我需要你得到的东西的清单: x250 Flour x300 Meat x500 Vegetables

English: We've got pretty sparse quarters here and it'd be nice to have something to do in our downtime. We've got some extra expenses from the company, so i'd like some nice furniture for me and the crew.@p9 Should be an easy job for you. x10 Luxury Goods x3 Tribal Furnishings x1 Foreign World Poster You should be able to buy them all from Luxury Goods Merchants on some Trade stations.
Chinese (simplified): 我们这里的房屋非常稀疏，如果能在休息时间做点什么就好了. 我们从公司那里得到了一些额外的费用，所以我想为我和工作人员买一些漂亮的家具.@p9 对你来说应该很简单吧. x10 Luxury Goods x3 部落家具 x1 Foreign World Poster 你应该从以下公司买到Luxury Goods Merchants 在贸易站.

English: Every now and then, the excavator picks up a big chunk of granite that gets wedged somewhere important and I have to send one of the boys up to pull it out.
