English: In order to get that guy out of here, I had to use all my spare Advanced Large Thrusters to get him spaceworthy.\nI need replacements... I think 5 Advanced Large Thrusters will do it.\nThink you can resupply me?
Chinese (simplified): 为了让那家伙离开这里，我不得不动用我所有多余的先进先进大型推进器让他恢复太空飞行能力。\n我需要替代设备... 我认为 5 先进性大推进器 就够了。\n你可以给我带来吗？

English: When that guy crash landed onto the pad, he'd taken some serious damage to put him down here. The lifter on the pad took the brunt of the landing and was badly damaged. In order to reach the underside of the ship, I had to use the robotic arms to tilt the ship.@p9 Those arms weren't designed to lift an entire ship, so they're completely ruined and I need a complete replacement set. I need 4 Robotics that you can get from Hostile Apparatus Robotics. Don't worry about the cost, i'll pay you back and bill the crap out of that lunatic.
Chinese (simplified): 当那个家伙撞到停机坪上时，他受了重伤并且摔在这里。 停机坪上的升降机在着陆时首当其冲，受损严重。 为了到达船底，我不得不使用机械臂倾斜飞船。@p9 那些臂不是设计用来举起整艘船的，所以它们已经完全损坏了，我需要一套完整的替换组件。 我需要4个机械设备你可以从（Hostile Apparatus）敌意装置公司机械设备采购。 不用担心费用，我会还给你，然后把那个疯子弄走。

English: When that guy crash landed onto the pad, he'd taken some serious damage to put him down here. He wasn't going anywhere without a shield generator, so I fitted him with one I had in storage. Turns out that was the last one I had.@p9 I have no idea where the other one I had was, but now i'm short an emergency shield generator. Think you can get me a Light Shield Generator to replace the emergency-use one? I'll pay 25,000 credits for the help.
Chinese (simplified): 当那个家伙撞到停机坪上时，他受了重伤并且摔在这里。 没有护盾发生器他哪儿也去不了，所以我给他装了一个我备用的。 原来这是我最后一个。@p9 我不知道我的另一个在哪里，但现在我缺少紧急盾牌发生器。 我想你能帮我弄到轻型护盾发电机替换应急用的吗？ 我会支付 25，000 信用点 用来感谢你的帮助。

English: I've got a shield generator for you
Chinese (simplified): 我为你准备了一个护盾发生器

English: When that guy crash landed onto the pad, he'd taken some serious damage to put him down here. Seems he got shot down by pirates and they were hanging around for him to leave.\nHe ordered some anti-shield weaponry for his ship and I fitted it.@p9\nBut now i'm down a Pair of Laser Cannons and can't get any more for at least six months. Think you can help me out with restocking?
Chinese (simplified): 当那个家伙撞到停机坪上时，他受了重伤并且摔在这里。 看来他被海盗击落了，他们在附近逗留等他离开。\n他为他的船订购了一些反盾武器，我安装了它。@p9 \n但现在我打了一个一对激光炮而且不能 至少六个月。 觉得你能帮我补货吗？

English: <color=#ffffff>Everything's back in ship-shape!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Pad's clean and ready for regular customers and the stores have all been restocked, so I don't need anything more.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks for your help!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>一切都恢复了原状！</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Pad 干净整洁，已为常客做好准备，商店已全部补货，所以我不再需要任何东西了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>谢谢你的帮助！</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Watch your step there, buddy.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You're gonna get squashed or toasted by a ship if you're not careful. Are you here to load or unload cargo or for something else?</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Or does your ship need repairs or fuel?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>注意你的步伐，伙计。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你不小心，你会被船压扁或烤焦。 您是来这里装卸货物还是为了其他目的？</color>\n<color=#66ccff>还是您的船需要修理或加油？</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You can't use this bay. We're not handling any services until we clean up the mess here.</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>A freighter cracked one of our fuel tanks open and spilled starship fuel all over the pad, so it's all hands on deck to get the mess cleaned up.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你不能使用这个船坞。 在我们收拾这里的烂摊子之前，我们不会处理任何服务。</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>一艘货轮打开了我们的一个燃料槽，把星际飞船的燃料洒在了整个停机坪上，所以大家都在甲板上把烂摊子收拾干净。</color>

English: Thanks for your help with this mess.\nHere's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits for the materials and manpower.\nI'll include a shipment of fuel as thanks too.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您对这个烂摊子的帮助.\n这里是我的报酬 {MoneyCounter} 信用点对于材料和人力.\n我也会提供一批燃料作为感谢.

English: <color=#ffffff>Okay, the Spaceport's open for business again.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>I still need to replace the parts and supplies that were used, so I still need some help here if you're willing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>好的，太空港又开始营业了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>我还需要更换用过的零件和耗材，所以如果您愿意我这里还需要一些帮助。</color>

English: We've got fuel on the ground and we need something that can soak it up that's not too expensive. A few of the hands suggested dumping Boron on it, but we don't have a supply of it.@p9\nSalt should do the same job, minus the neutron absorption. So I need you to get me 750 Salt that I can use to contain the fuel spill.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的地板上洒满了燃料，我们需要一些能吸收燃料的东西，而且不太贵。 一些人建议将硼倒在上面，但我们没有供应。@p9 \n盐应该做同样的工作，减去中子吸收。 所以我需要你给我弄来 750 盐 我可以用来控制燃油泄漏。

English: That assclown who smashed the fuel tank barrelled out of here at top speed and left the system. I'm going to make sure he gets billed for all the damages, but the name he gave on the station registry was fake.@p9\nI trust you know how to hack a satellite?\nI want you to go find a Security Satellite and pull the logs from it until you find a Warp Signatures Report and bring it back to me. I'll pay you 80,000 credits for it and tack the payment on top of his debt!
Chinese (simplified): 那个砸坏油箱的小丑以最快的速度冲出这里，离开了星系。 我会确保他得到所有损失的账单，但他在电台登记处给出的名字是假的。@p9 \n我相信 你知道如何破解卫星吗？\n我要你去找一个安全卫星 并从中提取日志，直到找到 跃迁签名报告 并将其带回 我要付给你 80，000 信用点 还债！

English: I've got freighter in orbit that wants down for a refit. We're still cleaning up this mess, which should be done by the time he needs to come down. But he's requesting an upgrade to his guns to deal with pirates.@p9 We don't stock the materials for fitting heavy weapons, so if you can manage it, I need you to bring me a Large Upgrade Kit so I can refit his ventral gun. I'll pay above market price for it.
Chinese (simplified): 我有一艘货轮在轨道上，需要进行改装。 我们仍在清理这个烂摊子，应该在他需要的时候完成 下来。 但是他要求升级他的枪来对付海盗。@p9 我们不储备用于装配重型武器的材料，所以如果你能管理好，我需要你 给我一个大型升级工具我可以改装他的舰炮。 我会支付高于市场价格的价格。

English: I've got that ugprade kit you wanted

The fuel that leaked out when that freighter hit the tanks flowed through the grates on the floor into the basement level where we store our replacement parts. All our spare thruster components are completely ruined...@p9 We'll need a complete replacement of not only the thruster components but the heat exchangers used to mount them in older ships. We're talking 25 of both Thruster Components and Heat Exchangers. Thank you can find both?
Chinese (simplified): 当那艘货船撞击油箱时泄漏的燃料流经地板上的格栅，流入我们存放备件的地下室。 我们所有的备用推进器组件都完全毁了...@p9 我们需要彻底更换不仅是推进器组件，还有用于在旧船上安装它们的热交换器。 我们说的是 25个推进器组件和热交换器。 你能帮忙找到这两个吗？

English: We didn't notice it at the time, but the bastard who smashed the tanks must've hit the work arms on his way out too. They're completely non-responsive and the nanolathes aren't firing properly.@p9 If you're up to help, I need you to source 2 Industrial Multitools and 2 Robotics to repair and replace the parts that he broke. I'll be adding the repair bill to that dude when I catch up to him. Don't worry about the cost, you'll be compensated.
Chinese (simplified): 当时我们并没有注意到，但是那个砸燃料槽的混蛋在出去的路上肯定也撞到了工作臂。 他们完全没有响应，并且纳米车床无法正常启动。@p9 如果您愿意提供帮助，我需要您提供资源 2 个工业多功能枪(小飞船)和 2 个机械设备 来修理和更换他损坏的零件。 当我抓到他时，我会把修理费加给那个家伙。 不用担心费用，你会得到补偿的。
我已经带来了the 替换组件 parts

English: <color=#ffffff>Everything's back in ship-shape!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Pad's clean and ready for regular customers and the stores have all been restocked, so I don't need anything more.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thanks for your help!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>一切都恢复了原状！</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Pad 干净整洁，已为常客做好准备，商店已全部补货，所以我不再需要任何东西了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>谢谢你的帮助！</color>

English: Ah, A Customer! Welcome to Imperial Arms. We don't discriminate here, we provide standardized Imperial weapons at discount prices! Just as long as you know that these weapons, while very effective have a limited lifespan. Now then, what would you like?
Chinese (simplified): 啊，顾客！ 欢迎帝国军火。 我们这里不歧视，我们提供标准化的改进武器，折扣价！ 只要您知道这些武器虽然非常有效，但具有 有限的使用寿命。 那么，你想要什么？

English: What? Did you think that all zirax go into the military? Ha! While the military is considered the most honorable position in the Zirax Empire, many work the civilian sector or go into trade, exploration, law, even teaching!@p9 Just because you've only ever seen zirax soldiers doesn't mean that's all there is to our race. If anything, you've likely seen the worst the Empire has to offer.@p9 It saddens me greatly to see the state the empire is in... Divided by a civil war over the imperial throne. With one side backing the rightful heir: Empress Xylessia, and the other side backing her younger brother Prince Kantrix. Things will only end in tears...
Chinese (simplified): 什么？ 你以为所有的兹瑞克斯都参军了吗？ 哈！ 虽然军队被认为是兹瑞克帝国中最光荣的职位，但许多人在文职部门或 从事贸易、探索、法律，甚至教学！@p9 仅仅因为你只见过兹瑞克斯士兵并不意味着这就是我们种族的全部 . 如果有的话，你可能已经看到了帝国所能提供的最糟糕的情况。@p9 看到帝国所处的状态让我非常难过...... 除以争夺皇位的内战。 一方面支持合法继承人：西莱西亚皇后，另一方面支持她的弟弟 Kantrix王子. 事情只会以眼泪收场...

English: Have you seen the Imperial capital on Xanthos? It's quite a sight.\nThough, it's probably fair to say that Xanthos is the capital since most of the homeworld's surface is given over to city as far as the eye can see.
Chinese (simplified): 您在Xanthos上见过帝都吗？ 这是一个相当壮观的景象。\n不过，可以公平地说，Xanthos 是首都，因为远在轨道上肉眼就可以看到。

English: Zirax Imperial weapons are some of the best available.\nThey're engineered to be disposable so they cannot be used against the empire, which makes them bad for long-term use but perfect for the cloned troops that the military use these days.@p9\nBefore the War of Silence there were no cloned troops, no clone technology, no ReLife-ing. Just... people.
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯帝国的武器是最好的。\n它们被设计成一次性的，所以它们不能用来对付帝国，这使得 它们不适合长期使用，但非常适合现在军队使用的克隆部队。@p9 \n在战争之前 of Silence没有克隆军队，没有克隆技术，没有重生系统。 只是……人。

English: While we don't discriminate when buying or selling to customers, we aren't allowed to hire any non-zirax staff, and certainly not any Terrans. You DO know your kind are listed as an Enemy Race, right? Do you know what would happen if I hired one of your kind? I'd lose my job!@p9 I do have a freelance contract available though. There's no rules against hiring Terrans for that though. It might improve your reputation with the empire if you're interested.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然我们在向客户进行买卖时不存在歧视，但我们不得雇用任何非兹瑞克斯员工，当然也不得雇用任何人族。 你知道你的种族被列为 敌人种族，对吗？ 你知道如果我雇佣你的一个会发生什么吗？ 我会失业！@p9 我确实有一份自由职业者合同。 不过，没有规定禁止为此雇佣人类。 如果你有兴趣，这可能会提高你在帝国中的声誉。

English: I found one of those Large Upgrade Kits...

I get open contracts from my military suppliers all the time, and most of the time they're small things, mostly to do with checking the status of the market or finding out if something illegal has gotten out of imperial hands.@p9 This time it's a bit odd. They want to see if anyone can provide Surveillance Data. I don't understand why, since the only way to obtain it would be to hack a military satellite.@p9 I have a feeling this has to do with the internal troubles within the empire. I don't expect you to complete it, especially since it'll be both difficult and illegal. The payment on the contract however is for 100,000 credits. So it's up to you...
Chinese (simplified): 我一直从我的军事供应商那里得到公开的合同，而且大多数时候它们都是小事，主要是为了检查市场状况或查明是否有非法的东西离开了帝国。 hands.@p9 这次有点奇怪。 他们想看看是否有人可以提供 监测数据。 我不明白 为什么，因为获得它的唯一方法是破解 军用卫星.@p9 我觉得这与 帝国内部的纷争。 我不希望你完成它，尤其是因为它既困难又非法。 然而，合同上的付款是 100，000 信用点。 所以这取决于你......

English: I get open contracts from my military suppliers all the time, and most of the time they're small things, mostly to do with checking the status of the market or finding out if something illegal has gotten out of imperial hands.@p9 This current contract seems to be for some new hacking software that's recently hit the black market that Epsilon want to get their hands on.@p9 Seems they want both the Fortify and Overclock Hacking Software. I'm not sure where you could get it from, certainly not from around here. The contract's for an untraceable wire transfer of 120,000 credits though. So they're serious about it.
Chinese (simplified): 我一直从我的军事供应商那里得到公开的合同，而且大多数时候它们都是小事，主要是为了检查市场状况或查明是否有非法的东西离开了帝国。 hands.@p9 目前的合同似乎是针对最近进入黑市的一些新的黑客软件，Epsilon 想要他们的手。@p9 似乎他们想要两个 强化和超频黑客软件。 我不知道你可以从哪里得到它，当然不是从这里得到。 合同是针对无法追踪的120，000 信用点。 所以他们是认真的。

English: Ah, yes.\nYou've proven you Terrans aren't anywhere as hostile as the Kriel, and I hope the Empire appreciates your assistance on this.\nI'll post a commendation for 500 Reputation for you.
Chinese (simplified): 啊，是的。\n你已经证明你们人族不像克里尔人那样充满敌意，我希望帝国 感谢您在这方面的帮助。\n我会为 500 声望给你。

English: <color=#ffffff>You've taken my one contract job, and you're well aware we can't hire any non-zirax staff.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你接受了我的一份合同工作，而且你很清楚我们不能雇用任何非兹瑞克斯员工。</color>

English: I get open contracts from my military suppliers all the time, and most of the time they're small things, mostly to do with checking the status of the market or finding out if something illegal has gotten out of imperial hands.@p9\nRight, well the technology that's put into imperial turrets cannot be reproduced, but Rados are always worried that someone's gotten their hands on Zirax weapons technology.\nIf you find a Large Upgrade Kit anywhere, the kind that no one sells, you bring it back to me.
Chinese (simplified): 我总是从我的军事供应商那里得到公开的合同，而且大多数时候它们都是小事，主要是为了检查市场状况或查明帝国是否有非法物品.@p9 \n对，好吧，帝国炮塔中的技术无法复制，但拉多斯总是担心有人得到了兹瑞克斯武器技术。\n如果你在任何地方找到一个大型升级工具，那种没有人卖，你拿回来给我。

English: Hail, traveller.\nWelcome to the Brewery of the Clan! One of the few pleasures we can still share with the rest of the galaxy!\nMy wares are well known and favored among the Trade Guild and Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): 嗨，旅行者。欢迎来到家族的啤酒厂！ 我们仍然可以与银河系其他人分享的少数乐趣之一！\n我的商品在 贸易公会和极星中广为人知深受喜爱.

English: I give you my thanks for your gift, traveller.\nPlease take these {MoneyCounter} Credits to cover the costs. I was planning on buying some from the Polaris' Trade Station on my next visit there, though they always overcharge me, so this is preferrable.\nPlease take some of my products as a gift! At least I know they will be put to good use.
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>旅行者，我把我的谢谢送给你作为礼物。\n请拿这些{MoneyCounter}信用点来支付费用。我打算下次去极星贸易站的时候买一些，不过他们总是多收我钱，所以这个更好。\n请带一些我的产品作为礼物.</color>

English: At this time, no. I'm afraid that my supply of ingredients is running low and is made worse by the lack of contact with my suppliers at Grocer's Grove. I fear something bad may have happened...@p9 There's nothing I can do about that situation, but I would ask you a favor, traveller.@w4 Are you able to help me by supplying me with some Purified Water? The well that i've used for many cycles has recently run dry and i'm in the middle of digging a new one. I need only 350 Bottles of Purified Water to fill the brewing vats. You will be paid for your help, traveller.
Chinese (simplified): 目前没有。 我担心我的原料供应量不足，并且由于与我的供应商Grocer's Grove杂货店的小树林缺乏联系而变得更糟。 我担心可能发生了不好的事情。 ..@p9 对于这种情况我无能为力，但我想请你帮个忙，旅行者。@w4 是您可以帮我提供一些 纯净水? 我用了很多次的井最近干涸了，我正在挖一个新的。 我只需要350 瓶纯净水 装满酿造桶。你会得到报酬，旅行者。

English: Not any better. I'm still needing vital ingredients for my next batch of brew and i've had no messengers from the local Traders that my supplies have arrived. Would you be willing to help me again?@p9 I need a supply of 50 Mushrooms, 100 Herbal Leaves and 100 Berries to form the base. It's a far cry from what's needed, but i'll worry about the next stage when I get to it.
Chinese (simplified): 好不了多少。 我的下一批啤酒仍然需要重要的原料，而且我没有来自当地的信使 Traders 我的补给品已经到了。 你愿意再帮我一次吗？@p9 我需要补给50 个蘑菇，100 个草药叶 和 100 个浆果 形成基础。 这与需要的相去甚远，但当我到达时我会担心下一阶段。

English: I'll see what I can do

There's still been no word from my suppliers. I won't be able to complete this brew in time for next year. I suspect that this is the work of TOP Brewery in an attempt to keep my wares from reaching the galactic market.@p9 You possess a ship, do you not, traveller? Can you use it to find the nearest Grocer's Grove store and purchase from them the supplies I cannot obtain for myself. Namely, I need 150 Sugarcane in order to facilitate the brewing process. This will be the last thing I ask of you, my friend.
Chinese (simplified): 我的供应商仍然没有任何消息。 明年我将无法及时完成此酿造。 我怀疑这是 TOP Brewery 试图阻止我的商品进入银河市场的操作。@p9 你有一艘船，不是吗，旅行者？ 你能用它找到最近的Grocer's Grove 存储并从他们那里购买我自己无法获得的用品。 即 ， 我需要150 甘蔗 以促进酿造过程。 这将是我对你的最后一件事，我的朋友。

English: I'll see what I can do

Praise be to the spirits, my friend! You have done so much for me, and it's only fair that I return the favor. So here is the few {MoneyCounter} Credits I can offer you my chief is just as pleased with your generosity.@p9 We have together brought together a suitable reward that you will surely use well, since it is of less use to us. I have received gifts from the other villagers for they too receive a share of my wares. It is only fair that you receive a share in the rewards for all that you have done for me.
Chinese (simplified): 赞美灵魂，我的朋友！ 你为我做了这么多，我回报你是公平的。所以这里是我可以提供的少数{MoneyCounter}信用点，我的酋长也对你的慷慨感到高兴。@p9 我们共同准备了一个合适的奖励，你肯定会很好地使用它，因为它对我们用处不大。 我从其他村民那里收到了礼物，他们也分享了我的商品。你为我所做的事情也应该得到奖励的一部分，这是公平的。

English: <color=#aaff00>Indeed it is.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>My brew is on it's way to being ready in time for sale next cycle and the plans of TOP Brewery have been thwarted.</color>\n<color=#aaff00>And it is thanks to you, traveller.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#aaff00>确实如此。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>我的啤酒已经准备好下个周期的销售，而 TOP Brewery 的计划已经受阻。</color>\n<color=#aaff00>谢谢你，旅行者。</color>

English: Welcome to the factory floor of our brewery. I assure you we are NOT a distillery and I can't tell you how much I hate it when people call us one.\nThat's not to say that TOP doesn't have a distillery, because we do. But this isn't it. We stock their products though.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们啤酒厂的车间。 我向你保证，我们不是一家酿酒厂，当人们称我们为酿酒厂时，我无法告诉你我有多讨厌它。\n这并不是说 TOP不是一个酿酒厂，我们确实生产啤酒。 但事实并非如此。不过我们有他们的产品。

English: Welcome to the factory floor of our brewery. I assure you we are NOT a distillery and I can't tell you how much I hate it when people call us one. That's not to say that TOP doesn't have a distillery, because we do. But this isn't it. We stock their products though.@p9 None of it matters at this point anyway. Raiders got into the factory and took everything! Machines, Tanks, Booze, EVERYTHING! We don't even know how they got in!
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们啤酒厂的车间。 我向你保证，我们不是一家酿酒厂，当人们称我们为酿酒厂时，我无法告诉你我有多讨厌它。 这并不是说 TOP不是一个酿酒厂，我们确实生产啤酒。 但事实并非如此。不过我们有他们的产品。@p9 无论如何，这都无关紧要。 突袭者进入工厂并带走了一切！ 机器、容器、酒，所有东西！ 我们甚至不知道他们是怎么进来的！

English: <color=#ffffff>You've helped us with the most dire of our problems, but we still have dozens more that we need to fix before we can get back to full operation.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're still serious about offering a hand in getting this place operational again, I won't look a gift horse in the mouth.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>您已经帮助我们解决了最严重的问题，但在我们恢复全面运营之前，我们还有很多问题需要解决。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你仍然认真地想帮助这个地方重新运营，我不会挑剔别人送我的礼物。</color>

English: Thanks for all your help...\nIt's not much but we keep an emergency fund for this kind of thing, so please accept this payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits and i'll forward a request for {RepCounter} Reputation for your account with Polaris.@p9\nPlease, take this 12-pack of beer as an extra thank you from the staff here. You've really pulled our butts out of the fire!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的帮助...\n虽然不多，但是我们为这种事情准备了应急基金，所以请收下这笔款项 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 我会转发给高层 为您的帐户添加 极星< {RepCounter} color=#ffbb00>信誉.@p9 \n 请收下 12 箱啤酒 作为这里工作人员的额外感谢。 你真的把我们的屁股从火中拉了出来！

English: There's no sign of those bandits nearby, but no warp signatures have been detected leaving the system, which means they're still somewhere on this planet.@p9\nWhat I need from you is to find one of the old Exploration Satellites near the system's star and get me the Exploration Raw Data from the surveillance relay of the planets in this system.\nI'll put it to the tech division to find out where they went from it.
Chinese (simplified): 附近没有这些强盗的迹象，但没有检测到离开星系的跃迁特征，这意味着他们仍然在这个星球上的某个地方。@p9 \n 我需要做的是在系统恒星附近找到一颗旧的探索卫星，然后帮我弄到来自本星系行星监视中继的探索原始数据。\n我会把它交给技术部门，看看他们是从哪里来的。

English: We've completely lost our stock of raw sugar that we use in the brewing process. We can't get anything done without more of it... Our suppliers won't have enough this early in the season either.@p9 I'll need you to do a shopping run to all the Grocer's Groves stores you can find and buy up all their Sugarcane. I think we should be able to get by on just 500 Sugarcane.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经完全失去了酿造过程中使用的原糖库存。 没有更多的材料，我们什么都做不了... 我们的供应商在这个季节初期也不会有足够的库存。@p9 我需要你去所有可以找到的 Grocer's Groves 商店采购 并买下他们所有的 甘蔗。 我认为我们应该 只需要 500 甘蔗。

English: I can't believe that those raiders would take even our supply of Hops? What are they planning on doing with it? Opening their own brewery? I can't tell if they're well-coordinated or just plain stupid!@p9 Needless to say, until they're tracked down I need a fresh supply of Hops in order to produce any more Beer. Like everything else, it's only available seasonally so there's no way to get more except MAYBE from a medical ingredient supplier.@p9 That might be our best bet. Head on down to a medical ingredient supplier and bring back 350 Hops. You'll be paid more than double their worth, since we'll have to shut down if we can't produce any more beer.
Chinese (simplified): 我不敢相信那些袭击者会拿走我们的啤酒花供应？他们打算用它做什么？开自己的啤酒厂？ 我不知道他们是沟通好的还是真傻！@p9 这真的没必要，在他们被追查到之前，我需要新鲜的啤酒花供应来生产更多的啤酒。 和其他所有东西一样，它只有季节性供应，所以没有办法获得更多了，也许从一个药材供应商.@p9 可能是我们最好的选择。 直接去找医药成分供应商 并带回 350 啤酒花。你将得到两倍多的报酬，因为如果我们不能生产更多啤酒，我们将不得不关门。

English: <color=#0088ff>I managed to track down some Hops</color>

I have no idea why they did it, but they've ripped out several fermentation vats and took them with them. I'm not sure if it was because they were shiny, or because they had a legitimate reason to take them.@p9 In any case, they need to be replaced and they're not cheap. x50 Plastic Tubes x75 Aluminium Foil x100 Titanium Plates x150 Copper Ingots@p9 That's what i'll need to replace a couple of the vats enough to get us working again. Don't worry about the cost, you'll be paid above market price for the materials I need you to supply.
Chinese (simplified): 我不知道他们为什么这么做，但他们已经拆了几个发酵桶并带走了。 我不确定是不是 因为它们很闪亮，或者因为它们有正当理由带走它们。@p9 无论如何，它们都需要更换，而且它们并不便宜。 x50塑料 x75铝管 x100钛板 x150铜锭@p9 这就是我需要足以更换几个大桶的材料，好让我们再次工作。 不用担心成本，您将获得你提供的材料的市场价格的报酬。

English: The computer systems we had installed into the factory have been either sabotaged or stolen. If I had to make a guess, i'd guess that these raiders were hired to disrupt our production and not out to steal from us. I'm not sure what company would want to put us out of commission though.@p9 In either case, the computer systems need replacing with: x40 Computers x40 Advanced Electronics x1 Optronics You'll be paid for your help in this trying time.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在工厂安装的计算机系统要么被破坏，要么被盗。 如果让我猜的话，我猜这些入侵者是为了破坏我们的生产而被雇佣的，而不是为了从我们这里偷东西。 我不确定哪家公司想要这么做@p9 不管如何，计算机系统都需要替换为： x40 计算机 x40先进电子元件 x1光电设备 您在这段艰难时期进行的帮助将会获得补偿。
<color=#0088ff>我已经带来了新的电脑设备</color>

English: You've really helped us out here!\nWe should be back up to speed in a couple of days and it'll be like it never happened.\nThose raiders will wish it never happened when PolSec catches up to them...
Chinese (simplified): 您真的帮了我们大忙！\n我们应该会在几天后恢复生产，就像从未发生过一样。\n掠夺者会希望在极星追上他们这件事永远不会发生......

English: You're not supposed to be in here!\nYou're not with one of our clients... Who are you? \nI'm Dell Kellum and this is MY shipyard. Now what are you here for?
Chinese (simplified): 你不应该在这里！\n你没有和我们的一位客户在一起......你是谁 ? \n我是 Dell Kellum，这是我的造船厂。 现在你来干什么？

English: Yeah, we definitely need supplies. Those clowns sent in reserves of ammunition and weapon upgrades and we don't need any of those things here. What we need are raw materials. Plates, components, and a few specific devices.@p9 Since none of those have turned up, we're operating at half speed until they do turn up. You've got a ship right? You wanna help? I'll pay.
Chinese (simplified): 是的，我们肯定需要补给。 那些小丑送来的弹药储备和武器升级，我们这里不需要这些东西。 我们需要的是原材料。 板、组件和一些特定设备。@p9 由于这些都没有出现，我们只能以一半的速度生产，直到材料送到为止。 你有船吧？ 你想帮忙吗？ 我会付钱的。

English: Alright, let me sign for your delivery.\nAs agreed on, here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits.@p9\nLooks like I was right to gamble on you for this. None of my people have turned up with supplies either, so there's plenty more work to go around.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧，我来签收.\n为达成共识， 这里是我的支付的{MoneyCounter} 信用点.@p9 \n看来我把赌注押在你身上是对的。我的人也都没带补给来，所以还有很多工作要做.

English: First thing we need is Radiation Shielding for the ship in the dock. Lots of them, let's start out with 35 of them. It shouldn't be hard to find a factory that produces them. The real challenge will be carrying them to the docks.@p9 You're definitely going to need Transportation Boosters, since the boys aren't allowed to unload ships anymore. We had an incident a few too many times, so it's been ruled out. None of that wireless stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要的第一件设备辐射屏蔽器主要用于码头上的船。 数量很多，让我们从 35 个开始。 找到一家生产它们的工厂应该不难。 真正的挑战是将它们运送到码头。@p9 你肯定需要运输增强器，因为工人们不再被允许卸船了。 我们发生过几次事故，所以这个选项已经排除在外。不许用那些无线物流系统。

English: We've got a ship in the dock that needs specialized thrusters designed for long haul burns in space. That means it needs top-tier thruster components and heat exchangers. I'd estimate 100 Thruster Components and 40 Heat Exchangers to start with.@p9 You're definitely going to need Transportation Boosters, since the boys aren't allowed to unload ships anymore. We had an incident a few too many times, so it's been ruled out. None of that wireless stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 我们的船坞里有一艘船需要专门设计的推进器，用于太空中的长途燃烧。这意味着它需要顶级的推进器组件和热交换器。 我估计需要 100个推进器组件 和 40个热交换器 来开始。@p9 你绝对需要 运输助推器，因为现在不允许男孩们卸载船只了。 我们发生了太多事故，所以已经被禁止了。不要无线的东西。

English: You see that bird we're working on? It needs a new Fusion Reactor. We're tearing out the old generators to make room for it, but the feed lines aren't designed to take the kind of load a Reactor can output.@p9 What I need from you is to get a Reactor Core, 15 Radiation Shielding and 25 Superconductors so we can finish the job and rig up new superconducting cables to distribute the load. Find 'em, bring 'em back here to me. Get paid.@p9 You're definitely going to need Transportation Boosters, since the boys aren't allowed to unload ships anymore. We had an incident a few too many times, so it's been ruled out. None of that wireless stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 你看到我们正在建造的那只大鸟了吗？ 它需要一个新的聚变反应器。我们正在拆除旧的发电机为其腾出空间，但馈线并不是为了承受 反应堆 可以输出的那种负载而设计的。@p9 我需要你做的是得到一个核聚变核心， 15 辐射屏蔽器和 color=#0088ff>25 超导体 这样我们就可以完成工作并安装新的超导电缆来分配负载。 找到他们，把他们带回来给我。你会获得报酬。@p9 你肯定需要运输增强器，因为工人们不再被允许卸船了。 我们发生了太多次事件，所以已经排除了。没有那些无线的东西。

English: We used all our Air Filters on the last job we completed, now we only have thirty or so left. I need you to find a chemical or science factory that sells the things and buy up 250 of the things. You'll be compensated for the costs up to twice their market price.@p9 I need those things yesterday, so snap to it kiddo. Make sure you've got Transportation Boosters on your armor too, since you won't be able to carry them otherwise.
Chinese (simplified): 我们在上次完成的工作中使用了我们所有的空气过滤器，现在我们只 还剩三十左右。 我需要你找到一家出售这些东西的化学或科学工厂，并购买 250 台这玩意。 您将获得最高两倍于市场价格的补偿。@p9 我昨天需要这些东西，所以赶紧收下 小子。 确保你有运输增强器在你的盔甲上也一样，否则你将无法携带它们。
我已经带来了你要的过滤器

English: Got two supply problems that I need solved. The first is Helium. It's used as propellant and as fuel in the Fusion Reactor. I don't need much, just enough to run a test of the thrusters and the reactor.@p9 The second is that someone forgot to order interface tablets for all the living quarters, all the bridge computers, all the terminal interfaces and the client wants only the highest quality ones.@p9 So what I need is 100 Bottles of Helium and 400 Tablets. You'll have to empty out every electronics and science manufacturer in two systems to get enough tablets. But the pay will be good.
Chinese (simplified): 有两个供给问题需要解决。 第一个是氦气。 它在聚变反应堆中用作推进剂和燃料。 不需要太多，只需要测试一下推进器和反应堆即可。@p9 二是有人忘记订购所有生活区的接口平板电脑 ，所有的桥接计算机，所有的终端接口，客户端只想要最高质量的。@p9 所以我需要的是100瓶氦气和400平板电脑. 你必须清空两个星系中的每个电子元件和科学制造商才能获得足够的平板电脑。 但报酬会很不错。

English: I've brought the helium and tablets you ordered
Chinese (simplified): 我带来了你订购的氦气和平板电脑

English: I've got the boys installing a new E-Warfare Suite into that ship and I need the output equipment for them to finish up and enough power coils to amplify the gain. That'll be expensive, but it's a job that pays well.@p9 What I need from you, is to go get 20 Communication Equipment and 20 Power Coils. Arriake Technology's where we usually get them. Make sure you've got Transportation Boosters when you come to deliver the parts.
Chinese (simplified): 我已经让工人们在那艘船上安装了一个新的电子战套件，我需要输出设备来完成他们的工作，并且需要足够的能量线圈来放大增益。 这玩意比较贵，但是回报会很不错。@p9 我需要你，去拿20个通信设备和20个能源线圈。 Arriake Technology 是我们通常获得它们的地方。 确保您有 color>运输增强器当您来交付零件时。

English: The thruster's we'd initially been mounting on the ship we're building ended up burning out half their components when we started them up. They have as many Heat Exchangers as they can take, it's simply that the thruster cones can't support the heat and pressure.@p9 I've got an idea for a fix, but I need replacement parts for the thrusters first and materials to line the cones second. I've determined that I need 100 Thruster Components and 500 Graphite to solve the problem.@p9 You're definitely going to need Transportation Boosters, since the boys aren't allowed to unload ships anymore. We had an incident a few too many times, so it's been ruled out. None of that wireless stuff.
Chinese (simplified): 我们最初安装在我们正在建造的船上的推进器在我们启动时最终烧毁了它们的一半组件。他们有足够的动力。只是推力锥无法承受热量和压力@p9 我有一个解决办法， 但我需要先替换组件用于推进器，然后替换用于排列锥体的材料。 我已经确定我需要 100个推进器组件和500石墨来解决问题。@p9 你肯定需要运输增强器，因为工人们不再被允许卸船了。 我们发生过几次事故，所以这个选项已经排除在外。不许用那些无线物流系统。
我已经为你带来了推进器改装

English: We've just finished loading the new ship here with new navigation equipment. The only problem is that the software is several years out of date and we can't get our hands on up-to-date information. No one wants to sell this stuff due to the civil war in the Zirax Empire.@p9 So what I need you to do isn't exactly 'legal'. I need you to hack a couple of Exploration and Security Satellites for the most recent Navigation and Astronomical Data to load up on the ship's computers.
Chinese (simplified): 我们刚刚在这艘新船上安装了新的导航设备。 唯一的问题是该软件已经过时了好几年，我们无法获得最新信息。 因为 兹瑞克斯帝国的内战，没有人愿意出售这些东西。@p9 所以我需要你做的并不完全是“合法的”。 我需要你破解几个探索和安全卫星以获得最新的导航和天文数据 加载到船上的计算机上。

English: Got two supply problems that I need solved. The first is that we're missing the arms for the Robotic Lifter for transferring cargo between the ship and the dock. They're pretty important to the rich ass who's paying for everything.@p9 The second is significantly worse. The ship doesn't have enough CPU after the balance adjustment in the recent update to the version. We need an aftermarket patch for the extenders to get them into working shape.@p9 So what I need is 4 Robotics, 4 Optronics, 8 Large Optronic Bridges and 4 Large Optronic Matrices. That'll be expensive, but it'll be the client who's footing the bill, so you should get every credit you spent back, with interest.
Chinese (simplified): 有两个需要解决的供应问题。 第一个是我们缺少用于在船和码头之间转移货物的机器人升降机的机械臂 . 它们对于为一切买单的有钱人来说非常重要。@p9 第二个明显更糟。 在最近的版本更新中进行平衡调整后，这艘船没有足够的 CPU。 我们需要一个售后补丁来让扩展器恢复正常工作状态。@p9 那么我需要的是4台机械设备，4台光电设备，8台大型光电桥和4台大型光电矩阵 . 这些东西很昂贵，但要买单的是客户，所以你应该把你花掉的每一分钱都拿回来，包括利息。

English: I've brought the optronics and robotic parts you needed
Chinese (simplified): 我已经带来了你需要的光电设备和机器人零件

English: The ship we're building for our... 'unreasonably' rich client back there is more or less completely unfurnished at this time. We've got more shipments incoming, but it turns out it's not enough for our client. He made it clear that he wants 'more' of everything.@p9 So what I want you to do is find some Luxury Goods to deck out the interior. You should only need 50 boxes or so of luxury goods. Go see Gold Standard's showroom or factory for the stuff, i'll make sure the client is billed double whatever you spend.
Chinese (simplified): 我们正在为我们...“不讲理”的有钱客户建造的船目前或多或少完全没有家具。 我们有 更多的货物正在进货，但事实证明这对我们的客户来说还不够。 他明确表示他想要“更多”的一切。@p9 所以我想让你做的就是找到一些 奢侈品装饰室内。 你应该只需要50盒左右的奢侈品。 去黄金标准的陈列室或工厂看看这些东西，我会确保向客户收费 把你花的钱翻倍。

English: I've brought the luxury goods for the client
Chinese (simplified): 我已经为客户带来了奢侈品

English: <color=#ffffff>We at Lighthalzen Biolabs work on classified research and experiments. We don't get many... or any visitors here in this lab complex.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>That's quite the quandry, since we need samples and materials from the outside. That's the only reason i'm authorizing your entry into this lab.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>Lighthalzen Biolabs 从事专业研究和实验。在这个实验室大楼里，我们没有多少……或任何访客。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>这真是个难题，因为我们需要从外面来的样品和材料。这是我授权你进入这个实验室的唯一原因。</color>

English: Here's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits.\nWe've been after this for some time. We're now one step closer to our initial Quantum Engineering test.\nI hope you'll help us out with that, too.
Chinese (simplified): 这里是我的报酬 {MoneyCounter} 信用点。\n 我们已经坚持量子工程 测试有一段时间了。 现在离我们最初的目标又近了一步。\n我希望你也能帮助我们。

English: We have a number of sample and equipment requests waiting to be handled since our regular supplier began to attract unwanted attention and so had to be reassigned to prevent suspicion.@p9\nWe've been waiting over a month for a new... procurer to be sent to us so we can get back to work on the Quantum Engineering project.\nNow then, are you ready to get to work?
Chinese (simplified): 由于我们的定期供应商开始引起不必要的注意，因此必须重新分配以防止怀疑，这导致我们有许多样品和设备请求等待处理。@p9 \n我们已经等了一个多月了，等待一个新的... /color> 项目。\n那么，你准备好开始工作了吗？

English: We've exhausted our supplies of active legacy virus, so we need new viral samples. They are notoriously hard to acquire though, which is why they're so valuable to us.\nWe currently need 5 Viral Samples to conduct the next phase of testing.
Chinese (simplified): 我们已经用尽了活跃的遗留病毒，因此我们需要新的病毒样本。众所周知，它们很难获得，这就是它们对我们如此有价值的原因。\n我们目前需要 5 个病毒样本进行下一阶段的测试。
我已经带来了你要的那些病毒样本

English: We need research data from the other biolabs, but we work off-grid here with no connection to the outside except to SIGMA. This one will be difficult, since it involves illegally accessing a number of Scientific Satellites for the data.@p9 The data files that I need are titled Anomalous Data and Raw Scientific Data and I need both. You'll be paid for bringing these to me.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要来自其他生物实验室的研究数据，但我们在这里离网工作，除了与 SIGMA 外，与外界没有任何联系。 这个会很困难，因为它涉及非法访问许多科学卫星以获取数据。@p9 我需要的数据文件标题为 异常数据 和 原始科学数据 我两者都需要. 你把这些带给我会得到报酬的。

English: The Quantum Engineering Project will redefine the way we run everything from cities to planets. But it requires a great deal of infrastructure to get set up.\nWhat we need now is 12 Robotics and 70 Superconductors to complete the next section of the assembly. I trust that won't be too difficult for you.
Chinese (simplified): 这个量子工程项目将重新定义我们从城市到行星运行一切的方式。但它需要大量的基础设施来建立。\n我们现在需要的是12个机器人和70个超导体来完成下一部分的组装。我相信这对你不会感到太困难。

English: We require a great deal of infrastructure to complete the current project. Most of these parts will go into the practical assembly. Once we've finished the construction, we'll be able to submit our research and initiate the second stage of research.@p9 For this one however, we need 30 Radiation Shielding to keep The Legacy's radioactivity confined, 40 Heat Exchangers to redistribute the heat away from the construction chamber, and 50 Large Optronic Bridges to form the basis of the unit housing itself. I leave their acquisition to you.
Chinese (simplified): 我们需要大量的基础设施来完成当前的项目。这些部件中的大部分将进入实际组装阶段。 一旦我们完成了构建，我们就可以提交我们的研究并开始第二阶段的研究。@p9 不过，我们需要 30 辐射屏蔽器为了保留遗留者的放射性，40 热交换器将热量重新分配出去，并50 大型光电桥构成单元外壳本身的基础。 我把他们的收购留给你。

English: One of the important parts for the assembly part of the Quantum Engineering Project is the Particle Accelerator. we've completed most of it, but we still need to line the chamber and housing in a dense, durable material.@p9\nSo for this, I need you to supply enough Platinum to complete the current section of the accelerator.\nI would say 1000 Platinum Plates would be enough, but we may need you to bring an additional shipment.
Chinese (simplified): 量子工程项目的组装部分的重要部分之一是粒子加速器。我们已经完成了大部分工作，但我们仍然需要用致密、耐用的材料对腔室和外壳进行衬里。@p9 \n所以为此，我需要你提供足够的 铂金 完成加速器的当前部分。\n我会说1000片铂金板就够了，但我们可能需要你多带一批。
我已经带来了你想要的铂金

English: We don't need any more supplies for the Quantum Assembly Project.\nWe're quite fortunate that things have been so easy.\nNow that the project is complete, we'll move onto the next stage of research. We won't need your help for that though.
Chinese (simplified): 我们不再需要 量子组装项目 的耗材。\n我们很幸运，事情变得如此简单。\n现在项目已经完成，我们将进入下一阶段的研究.不过，我们不需要您的帮助。

English: You're not authorized to be in this lab.\nUnless you have a Science Keycard you're going to need to leave... now. Otherwise i'm calling security.
Chinese (simplified): 您无权进入此实验室。\n除非您有 科学钥匙卡你需要离开......现在。 否则我会打电话给保安。

English: Yes, this Keycard appears to be valid.\nEven though you don't appear to be it's original owner, i'm giving you authorization because we need samples and if you can get one of these cards, then you can get what we need here in this lab.
Chinese (simplified): 是，这张钥匙卡似乎是有效的。\n即使你看起来不是 它是原始所有者，我给你授权，因为我们需要样品，如果你能得到 这些 卡之一，那么你可以在这个实验室得到我们需要的东西。

English: This lab complex is the Lighthalzen Biolab, it's a special research blacksite operated by Polaris Megacorp. We're overseen by SIGMA, with knowledge limited to the highest levels of Polaris' Executives. As to what we research: We seek to better the quality of life across the galaxy.@p9 What better way to improve our understanding of advanced technology than by studying the most advanced beings in the galaxy: The Legacy. In this lab we conduct practical experiments on legacy creatures and technology.@p9 This double-edged sword, this poisoned chalice that is The Legacy is unique in that they ARE their technology. What we aim to do here is separate them from their technology, render it safe and inert for production and use.@p9 It's not the first time this has been done, either. The Perfect Cloning and Re-Life technology in use all across the galaxy today was derived from Legacy technology by the Tal'on Academy of Science some 250 cycles ago.@p9 It was fear over the implications of a functionally immortal Tal'on people and what that represented to their Zirax allies, and where that technology originated that unified the Zirax against them.@p9 Ultimately, it was all for nothing. The mind won't adhere to a cloned body if it doesn't match the mental preconceptions applied to the original. Immortality is still off the table and without the stabilizing influence of the Tal'on, the newly-established empire entered a downward spiral.@p9 That is why we operate out here, with oversight only through SIGMA. We aim to do more than the Tal'on and do it in a way that it'll be accepted by the rest of the galaxy, ignorant of the source of our developments.
Chinese (simplified): 这个实验室综合体是Lighthalzen Biolab，它是一个由极星巨型企业运营的研究黑点的特殊机构 。我们由 SIGMA 监督，知识仅限于极星最高级别的高管。 至于我们的研究：我们寻求改善整个银河系的生活质量。@p9 如果有什么方法，可以不通过研究银河系中的大多数生物来提高我们对先进技术的理解的话，那一定就是：遗留者. 在这个实验室中，我们对传统生物和技术进行实际实验。@p9 这是把双刃剑，它是有毒的圣杯遗迹者的独特之处在于他们和他们的技术是融为一体的。 我们这里的目标是将它们与技术分开，使其安全且惰性地用于生产和使用。@p9 这也不是第一次这样做了。 完美的克隆技术， 今天在整个银河系中使用的重生 技术源自大约 250 个周期之前Tal'on 科学院的遗留者 技术。@p9 这是对永生的恐惧Tal'on 人的可怕永生技术让 兹瑞克斯 产生担忧，并最终让 兹瑞克斯 团结起来反对它们。@p9 最终，这一切都是徒劳的。 如果克隆的身体不符合应用于原始身体的心理先入之见，那么大脑就不会坚持.长生不老变得毫无意义。失去了泰隆的稳定影响，新成立的帝国进入了下行螺旋.@p9 这就是我们在此开展业务的原因，仅通过 SIGMA 进行监督. 我们的目标是比泰隆做得更多，并以一种被银河系其他人接受的方式去做，无知才是我们发展的动力。

English: We're ready to proceed with the Quantum Engineering Project. What we need now are just the quantum processors to complete the construction. We don't have the ability to construct them ourselves, which is what we'll work on once we've verified that we can in fact produce our own Quantum Extenders.@p9 Because you're the one who needs to supply these materials, we'll leave the decision as to what size of Quantum Extender we attempt to create. A larger extender will require significantly more parts than a small one.@p9 If you want to construct a Large Quantum Extender, it will require 4 Large Optronic Matrices and 24 Quantum Processors. If you want to construct a Small Quantum Extender, it will require 4 Small Optronic Matrices and 8 Quantum Processors.@p9 It's unfortunate, but with all the materials we've put into the Quantum Engineering Project, we will only be able to perform the procedure only once. Make sure you have enough space for the device in your inventory
Chinese (simplified): 我们已准备好继续进行量子工程项目。 我们现在需要的只是完成构建的量子处理器。 我们没有能力自己构建它们，这就是我们的一旦我们确认我们实际上可以生产我们自己的 量子扩展器.@p9 因为你是需要提供这些材料的人，所以我们将决定我们尝试创建多大尺寸的量子扩展器。 一个更大的扩展器比一个小的扩展器需要更多的零件。@p9 如果你想构建一个大量子扩展器，它将需要 4 大型光电矩阵 和 24量子处理器. 如果要构建小型量子扩展器，则需要 4 个小型光电矩阵 和 8 个量子处理器.@p9 很不幸，但是我们在量子工程项目中投入了所有材料，我们将 只能执行一次该过程。 确保您的库存中有足够的空间放置设备

English: The procedure is complete! We have succeeded! And it is thanks to your help!@p9 Since you contributed so much help in helping us here at Lighthalzen Labs confirm our theory and produce the first Legacy-derived Quantum Processing Core for organic use, it's only fair that you get to run the practical test on it's performance.@p9 We look forward to seeing how well it will perform compared to it's conventional CPU counterparts! It will surely redefine the limits of ships, cities, even whole planets once we've figured out how to mass-produce them!@p9 For now, we must focus our research on the Quantum Processors themselves. We've proven that it's possible to create safe legacy technology, now we need to devise a way of reproducing the processors used in it's construction instead of relying on salvage.@p9 You've done much! Share a drink with us before you leave! It's time to celebrate!
Chinese (simplified): 程序完成！ 我们成功了！ 感谢你的帮助！@p9 自从你在 Lighthalzen Labs 为我们提供了很多帮助，证实了我们的理论并产生了第一个 Legacy 衍生 color>Quantum Processing Core 用于有机用途，您可以对其性能进行实际测试才公平。@p9 我们期待看到它与传统 CPU 对应物相比的性能如何！ 它肯定会重新定义船舶、城市的界限，一旦我们弄清楚如何大规模生产它们，甚至是整个行星！@p9 现在，我们必须将研究重点放在 量子处理器本身。 我们已经证明可以创建安全的传统技术，现在我们需要设计一种方法来复制其构造中使用的处理器，而不是依赖打捞。@p9 你已经做了很多！离开前与我们一起喝一杯！ 是时候庆祝了！

English: <color=#ffffff>We don't have a large community here, but we live comfortably enough. We also have a number of craftsmen in residence that produce a number of goods in their spare time.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Some of the youths are also looking for work if you know someone who's hiring.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们这里的社区不大，但我们住的很舒服。我们也有一些手工艺人，他们在业余时间生产许多商品。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>一些年轻人也在找工作，如果你认识正在招聘的人.</color>

English: Thank you, for your help in this.\nHere's your payment of {MoneyCounter} Credits for all your help. You'll make many of the residents here very happy.
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的帮助。\n这里是我的报酬{MoneyCounter} 信用点 为您提供所有帮助。 你会让这里的许多居民非常高兴。

English: <color=#ffffff>We can always use a supply of foods and raw materials for regular maintenance. If you're looking for a paying job, I think we may have a few item requests that the freighters never bring.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Does that sound like something you'd be interested in?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>我们一直都有食品供应和原材料的定期补给。 如果您正在寻找一份有报酬的工作，我想我们可能会有一些货机从不带的物品要求。</color>\n<color=#66ccff>这听起来像是您感兴趣的事情吗？</color>

English: As I may have mentioned, we have a number of residents that also craft goods in their spare time, either for entertainment or as an additional source of income.\nA few of them have asked me to put in a request for 50 Leather for a number of projects they're working on. But so far, no traders have brought any with them.\nCan you handle it?
Chinese (simplified): 正如我可能已经提到的，我们有许多居民也在业余时间制作商品，用于娱乐或作为额外收入来源。\n他们中的一些人要求我为他们的一些工作项目提出 50 皮革 的请求。但到目前为止，还没有交易员带来这玩意。\n你能应付吗？
我已经带来了你想要的皮革

English: We have a jeweller that lives here that's been bothering me for some time for a supply of gemstone-quality Diamonds for his personal projects.\nSo now I put the request to you for 75 Raw Diamonds. I had hoped at least one passing trader would have some, but so far none have.\nIs it something you're able to do?
Chinese (simplified): 我们有一位住在这里的珠宝商一直困扰我一段时间，为他的个人项目提供宝石级钻石。\n所以现在我把向您索取 75 颗原钻。我曾希望至少有一位路过的交易员会有一些，但到目前为止还没有。\n你能做到吗？

English: A few of the residents are quite well-off and have asked me to procure a number of luxury items to improve their home life. None of the passing traders have been interested in fulfilling the requests, deeming them too high risk.@p9\nSo I bring the request to you for 15 Luxury Goods. It shouldn't be any difficulty for one as equipped as you are.\nWill you do it?
Chinese (simplified): 一些居民相当富裕，并要求我购买一些奢侈品来改善他们的家庭生活。路过的交易员都没有兴趣满足这些要求，认为它们的风险太高。@p9 \n所以我把这个要求交给你15 件奢侈品。像你这样装备精良的人应该不难。\n你会做吗？

English: We've plenty of parts for regular maintenance on the living quarters, but unfortunately the Solar Panels we use to suppliment our power supplies have been damaged by a week of poor conditions outside that mean we use the generators more often.@p9\nA full replacement isn't possible, so we need to repair each panel with some higher quality components. Specifically, we need 42 Solar Cells. But the company that produces them doesn't ship them to residential locations.\nSo now I ask you to collect the panels from the factory, if you can.
Chinese (simplified): 我们有很多零件可以在生活区进行定期维护，但不幸的是，我们用来补充电源的太阳能电池板由于一周的恶劣条件而损坏，这意味着我们更频繁地使用发电机.@p9 \n完整的替换组件是不可能的，所以我们需要用一些更高质量的组件来修复每个面板。具体来说，我们需要42太阳能电池。但是生产它们的公司不会将它们运送到居民区。\n所以现在我请你从工厂收集面板，如果可以的话.

English: I've got the solar cells you wanted

Like most settlements in potentially hazardous locations, we use air filters to keep the air we breathe clean and clear. Though while we clean the filters regularly, we always need replacements once or twice a cycle.@p9\nOur usual supplier is a merchant that passes through a number of settlement frequently, but this time another station bought up his supply so we may be short this month.\nWhat I need from you is to purchase a set of 100 Filters for me, if you're able.
Chinese (simplified): 像大多数潜在危险地区的定居点一样，我们使用空气过滤器来保持我们呼吸的空气清洁和清洁。虽然我们定期清洁过滤器，但我们一个周期总是需要一到两次备用设备。@p9 \n我们通常的供应商是一个经常经过多次结算的商人，但是这次另一个站买了他的供应，所以我们这个月可能会缺货。\n我需要做的是购买一套100 个过滤器 给我，如果可以的话。
我已经给你带来了一些过滤器

English: <color=#ffffff>I'm afraid I have no more jobs for you.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Thank you for what you've done for us here in this remote location.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恐怕我没有更多的工作给你了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>感谢你在这个偏远的地方为我们所做的一切。</color>

English: Welcome to Pax Purgatory!\nThis is first and foremost a bar. We ain't the classiest joint in town, but we've got food n' drinks at a low price.\nSo what're you havin'?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到 Pax Purgatory!\n 首先这是一个酒吧。 我们不是镇上最经典的餐厅，但我们提供低价的食物和饮料。\n那么你需要什么？

English: We've got people here looking fer jobs all the time.\nIf you've got the creds, ya might consider hiring some of them to crew yer ships.\nEven the most incompetent crewmember can lighten the load on your ship's CPU.
Chinese (simplified): 我们一直都有人在这里找工作。\n如果你有信誉值，你可能会考虑雇佣其中一些人来为你的船只工作.\n即使是最不称职的船员也可以减轻飞船CPU的负担.

English: You ever heard of the Kriel? We had some drunk in here whining about their current name 'Kriel Broodswarm', insisting they're an Empire like the zirax. An empire is ruled by an Emperor or Empress, the Kriel aren't ruled by anyone.@p9 The Kriel are an insect race with a hive mind. They don't have the concept of 'rulers', they have roles. The queen of a Kriel hive no more rules than the workers do. She has a role, a job, that will she will spend her life doing. Just as the workers and soldiers do. That's making broods of more kriel workers and soldiers.@p9 An important role in a hive, sure. But we gave her title of 'queen', because the hive centers around her. But she's more like a factory to a town, than a person. People just seem to have trouble understanding the concept of an alien 'mind' different to their own.
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过 Kriel 吗？ 我们在这里喝醉了，抱怨他们现在的名字 Kriel Broodswarm坚称他们是像齐拉克斯一样的帝国。 帝国由皇帝或皇后统治， Kriel 不受任何人统治。@p9 Kriel 是一个昆虫种族，拥有 蜂巢思维。他们没有“统治者”的概念，他们有角色。克里尔蜂巢的女王没有比工人更多的权力。 她是一个角色，一份工作，她会用她的一生去完成。就像工人和士兵一样。这样会产生更多的 kriel 工人和士兵。@p9 在蜂巢中当然是一个重要角色。但是我们给了她“女王”的称号，因为蜂巢以她为中心。但她更像是一个城镇的工厂，而不是一个人。 人们似乎很难理解与自己不同的外星人“思想”的概念。

English: We get a lot of mining crews in 'ere in the slow months. If there's one thing that ya can sell to them for a good profit, it's Coffee.\nThose mining rigs all run on a steady diet of whiskey, coffee and burgers. Can't say I could stand it m'self.
Chinese (simplified): 在低迷的几个月里，我们有很多采矿人员。如果有一种东西可以卖给他们以获得丰厚的利润，那就是 Coffee.\n这些采矿工人都以威士忌、咖啡和汉堡为主要食物。不能说我自己能忍受。

English: Don't need no more lazy bums to skim a drink off me.\nIf you're interested, I can hook you a line with some... connected patrons looking for quality merchandise.\nThey won't pay top credit, but they'll pass the word on ta' their friends.
Chinese (simplified): 不要再让懒惰的流浪汉在我这里偷偷喝一杯了。\n如果你有兴趣，我可以给你打个电话…… 联系寻找优质商品的顾客。\n他们不会付出最高的信誉，但他们会向他们的朋友宣传。

English: Alright, one of my regulars is lookin' to get into somewhere he's not meant to be, if ya get my meaning.\nHe's after a Zirax Security Keycard and he's willing to pay 48,000 credits for one.
Chinese (simplified): 好吧，如果你明白我的意思的话，我的一个常客正在寻找他不该去的地方。\n他在寻找 Zirax 安全密钥卡并且他愿意支付48，000信用点 一个。

English: I know a collector from outsystem lookin' fer a few 'Antiques' for his art collection. Think you can help 'im out by getting 6 Ancient Relics?\nHe's willing to pay top credit fer something a little more authentic.
Chinese (simplified): 我认识一位来自外部星系的收藏家，他正在为他的艺术收藏品寻找一些“古董”。认为你可以通过获得 6 古代遗迹 来帮助我吗？\n他愿意为更正宗的东西付出最高的信用点。

English: I think I can help you there

It's hard to get good quality materials on the other side of Imperial Space and some of the customers that live out there are willing to pay for top-shelf Leather if you can get it out there.@p9\nThe problem is that the Tal'on are the experts at making REAL leather and them 'zax bastards charge huge tarrifs on Talon-made goods like Leather.\nYou get me 40 Leather and i'll pay you 25,000 credits for the shipment. I'll take it from there.
Chinese (simplified): 在帝国空间的另一边很难买到优质的材料，如果你能买到顶级皮革，一些住在那里的客户愿意为顶级皮革买单。@p9 \n问题在于，Tal'on 是制造真正皮革的专家，那些 zax 混蛋对皮革等 Talon 制造的商品收取巨额关税。\n你给我40皮革我会付钱给你25，000 信用点 用于装运。我会从那里拿走。

English: My guy's gonna be very happy with this.\nHe'll also pass on his recommendations to his business partners in The Syndicate.\nI hope ya like being listed as a stand-up guy in the books of lowlifes.
Chinese (simplified): 我的朋友会很高兴的。\n他还会将他的建议转达给他在的商业伙伴 联合会。\n我希望你喜欢被列为低俗书籍中的独立人物.

English: <color=#ffffff>Don't got no work for you now that the last bit of business is done.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Maybe something'll turn up again later.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>既然最后一件事情已经完成，那就别给你工作了。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>也许以后会再次出现。</color>

English: You wanna know about Chemical Waste Processing?@w2 Well, we do that here. But you need a permit for it, and you'll be in some serious trouble if you're ever caught dumping that stuff anywhere. It's gotten so bad that factories have to file transit orders on everyone that takes a load of the stuff.@p9 What that means is that you can take a shipment of chemical waste from a factory and bring it here and get paid for your trouble. But if you 'lose' a load of chemical waste, you'll find yourself on a blacklist with Polaris or the Trade Federation.@p9 If you do lose a load, to pirates, customs agents, engine trouble, whatever. You'll need to pay a hefty fine before you can do anymore business.@w5 You can only take one shipment at a time, as well. So don't try and load an entire planet's worth of waste on your ship because no self-respecting factory foreman will let you double-load.@p9 You can make a decent job out of shipping chemical waste to any processing plant if you keep at it, and you're helping keep the galaxy clean while you're at it. So yeah... That about covers it.
Chinese (simplified): 您想了解化学废物处理?@w2 好吧，我们在这里干活。但是你需要一个许可证，如果你被抓到在任何地方倾倒这些东西，你就会陷入严重的麻烦之中。情况变得如此糟糕，以至于工厂不得不向每个需要大量货物的人提交运输订单。@p9 这意味着你可以从一个工厂拿走一批化学废物并为你的麻烦得到报酬。但如果你“丢”了一大堆化学废物，你会发现自己被极星或贸易联盟列入黑名单。@p9 如果你 进行了偷东西，海盗，海关特工，工程问题等等。您需要支付 巨额罚款 才能开展更多业务。@w5 您一次也只能取一件货件。所以不要试图在你的船上装载相当于整个星球的废物，因为没有自尊的工厂工头会让你双重装载。@p9 你可以做一份体面的工作，但如果您坚持使用化学废物，则无需将其运送到任何加工厂，并且您在帮助保持银河系清洁。 所以，是的...我就说到这里。

English: <color=#ffffff>You're here about Chemical Waste Processing?@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>What're you after? Information? Permits? Dropping a big load?@w2 heh.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>你来这里是关于化学废物处理的？@w3 </color>\n<color=#ffffff>你在追求什么？信息？许可？丢掉一个大垃圾？@w2 呵呵.</color>

English: I have a shipment of chemical waste (NYI)

<color=#66ccff>I can't seem to access this computer terminal.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>It looks like it's designed to forcibly reopen doors and activate sensors in the event that they jam. Doesn't look like I can use this yet...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#66ccff>我似乎无法访问此计算机终端。</color>\n<color=#66ccff>它的设计似乎是为了在门被卡住时强制重新打开门并激活传感器。看来我还不能用这个……</color>

English: <color=#66ccff>Looks like a computer console for manually opening doors and activating sensors that have been incorrectly tripped.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>I should be able to use it to reset my progress through the mainframe if I get stuck.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#66ccff>看起来像是一个计算机控制台，用于手动打开门和激活错误触发的传感器。</color>\n<color=#66ccff>如果我卡住了，我应该可以使用它重置我在主机中的进度。</color>

English: Looks like the setting has been toggled.\nI hope I didn't break anything...\nThese settings are to debug the story mission in the event that the POI is reset.
Chinese (simplified): 好像设置被切换了。\n希望我没有破坏任何东西...\n这些设置是为了在POI被重置的情况下调试故事任务。

English: Watch where you're goin!@w3\nWe've got live wires all over the place and gods know how much radiation where the shielding is thin in some places.\nIt's not just the environment outside you gotta worry about 'round here!
Chinese (simplified): 注意你要去哪里！@w3 \n我们这里到处都是带电的电线，天知道有些地方的屏蔽层有多薄。\n你要担心的不仅仅是外面的环境！

English: Watch where you're goin!@w3 We've got live wires all over the place and gods know how much radiation where the shielding is thin in some places. It's not just the environment outside you gotta worry about 'round here!@p9 Damn it all!@w2 We've got a coolant leak in Section-9 and i'm short on people to handle the patch job!@w4 You! Yes, you. Terran.@w3 I need you to do a job for me. Shouldn't be too hard and i'll pay you for it. Whaddaya say?
Chinese (simplified): 注意你要去哪里！@w3 我们这里到处都是带电的电线，天知道有些地方的屏蔽层有多薄。 你要担心的不仅仅是外面的环境！@p9 该死的！@w2 我们有一个冷却器第 9 节中的试剂泄漏，我缺少处理修补工作的人！@w4 你！是，你。人族.@w3 我需要你为我做一份工作。不应该太难，我会付钱给你的。怎么说？

English: Damn glad to see that, I am!\nHere, this is out of the repair budget. It's not much, only {MoneyCounter} Credits but it's more than you'd get for that on the market.\nI'll throw in a couple of power cells, just to show you how much you've helped me out!
Chinese (simplified): 我很高兴看到这个！\n这里，这超出了维修预算。不算多，只有 {MoneyCounter} 信用点 但肯定比市场上的价格高。\n我会扔几个电池，只是为了向您展示您对我的帮助有多大！

English: <color=#ffffff>You've helped us with the most dire of our problems, but we still have dozens more that we need to fix before we can get back to full operation.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're still serious about offering a hand in getting this place operational again, I won't look a gift horse in the mouth.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>您已经帮助我们解决了最严重的问题，但在我们恢复全面运营之前，我们还有很多问题需要解决。</color>\n<color=#ffffff>如果你仍然认真地想帮助这个地方重新运营，我不会挑剔别人送我的礼物。</color>

English: Alright then!\nThis bucket o' bolts is far from the latest model and I don't have any up-to-date schematics and work data on the damn thing.@w3 What I need from you is to go find me some Maintenance Data.\nYou can probably pull one of them out of one of 'em old FTL comm satellites around the sun.
Chinese (simplified): 那好吧！\n这个桶形螺栓与最新型号相差甚远，我没有任何最新的原理图和工作数据 该死的东西。@w3 我需要你做的是去找我一些维护数据。 \n您可能可以将其中一颗从太阳周围的旧 FTL 通信卫星中拉出来。

English: Need boots on the ground to help me with this ol' tub.\nSo what I need from you is to find me some volunteers. They don't need to stay on permanantly, just for a few weeks.\nThat's 2 Crew. Terran or Alien, I don't care. But it's probably best if they're the same... species.
Chinese (simplified): 我需要人来帮我弄这破玩意\n所以我需要你做的是给我找一些志愿者。 他们不需要永久留任，只需几个星期。\n比如 2 船员。 人族或外星人，我不在乎。 但如果它们是相同的……物种可能是最好的。

English: Losing charge on capacitor banks 4 through 7 again!\nI keep patching the cables, but there's too much energy loss.@w3 What I really need is a complete replacement with some Superconducting cables.\nThink you can get me 50 or so Superconductors? I'll wire you 200k for 'em.
Chinese (simplified): 电容器组4到7再次失去电荷！\n我一直在修补电缆，但能量损失太大。@w3 我真正需要的是用一些超导电缆彻底替换。\n你觉得你能给我弄到50个左右的超导体吗？我会为它们给你200k。

English: I need a fresh set of capacitors to replace the Capacitor Banks 1 and 2, since they're the oldest. But getting the right parts ain't a walk in the park from those bum merchants.@w3\nWhat I need is 50 new High-Output Capacitors. Think you're up to it?
Chinese (simplified): 我需要一套新的电容器来替换电容器组 1 和 2，因为它们是最旧的。 但是从那些流浪商人那里得到正确的零件可不是一件容易的事。@w3 \n我需要的是50个 全新的 高输出电容。 你觉得你能做到吗？

English: Still got that coolant leak to deal with, and not enough hands to go fetch more coolant and a patch to keep new stuff from going the same way as the ol' stuff.@w4\nWhat I need from you is 10 Coolant and 75 Aluminium Foil.\nIt ain't much, but it's honest work.
Chinese (simplified): 仍然需要处理冷却液泄漏，并且防止新的东西和旧的冷却液走同样的管路我也需要补丁，但是没有足够的人手去取更多的冷却液和补丁。@w4 \n 我需要的是 10 冷却液 和 75 铝箔。\n不算多，但够用。

English: <color=#0088ff>I've brought the new coolant and patch materials</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我带来了新的冷却液和贴片材料</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Nah. It's all good 'ere!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Should be fine for a couple of weeks now, so I don't got much work worth you wastin' your time on.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>啊。 一切都很好！</color>\n<color=#ffffff>几个星期内应该都没问题了，所以我没有太多值得你浪费时间的工作。</color>

English: <color=#ff5c5c>To think this base would fall to you Terrans! Bah!@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Well, you've gotten your reward from me. I will only give it out once and only to the first one to have reached me. If that's not you, then that is between you and your allies.@p9</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>I have nothing more to give.@w2 Leave me be...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff5c5c>没想到这个基地会落到你们人族手里！呸！@w4 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>嗯，你已经从我这里得到了你的奖励。我只会给它一次，并且只给第一个到达我的人。如果那不是你，那就是你和你的盟友之间的事了。@p9 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>我没有什么可以给的了。@w2 让我……</color>

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I know your face, Terran.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>You were responsible for the loss of another Sector Command.@w3 The base's commander has already given you a reward for your skill in combat. I will not do the same.@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Kill me if you wish, but I will never admit defeat like he did!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff5c5c>我知道你的脸，人族。@w4 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>你要为失去另一个星区司令部负责。@w3 因为你的战斗技巧基地的范围已经给你奖励了。我不会这样做的。@w5 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>如果你愿意，可以杀了我，但我永远不会像他那样认输！</color>

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I don't know how you got down here, Terran. But you should not have been able to reach this room...@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>I suspect an enemy let you in here, or else you cheated to reach this room.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>In either case, you will receive no commendation from me.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff5c5c>我不知道你是怎么下来的，人族。但是你应该无法到达这个房间...@w5 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>我怀疑是敌人让你进来的，或者你被骗到了这个房间。@w4 </color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>无论哪种情况，你都不会得到我的表扬。</color>

English: Greetings Terran.@w3 I am Fleet Admiral Kantor Al'Berich, the commander of this base.@w5 I have served the empire for most of my life, as did my father before me, and his before him.@w3 So know that on this day you have bested me and my men in combat, and that you are the first to reach this place in all the empire's history.@p9 This is both a terrible blow to the empire and a black mark on my family's illustrious and decorated history.@w6 I knew it would happen to one of the sector commands eventually, but it brings me much shame for it to be my own command that would be defeated.@p9 You see, I watched your progress from the Command Center and when it became clear that you would reach this place, I retired to my quarters to await your arrival.@w5 I am old, so I know that I cannot beat you in a fight so I surrender myself willingly.@p9 In recognition of your efforts, I would like to give you a ceremonial dagger that was bestown upon me by her Imperial Majesty Xanthia, Empress of the Zirax Empire, and with it the honorary rank that goes with it: Strategos
Chinese (simplified): 问候人类。@w3 我是海军上将坎特·阿尔贝里奇，这个基地的指挥官。@w5 我大半辈子都在为帝国服务，就像我之前的父亲和他之前的父亲一样。@w3 所以要知道，在这一天你击败了我和我的手下战斗，而且你是帝国历史上第一个到达这个地方的人。@p9 这既是对帝国的可怕打击，也是对我家族显赫和装饰历史的耻辱。@w6 我知道它最终会发生在一个星区战斗中，但它让我感到非常羞耻，因为它是在我自己的指挥下被攻破。@p9 你看，我在指挥中心看到了你的进展，当你清楚地知道你会到达这个地方时，我就回到我的宿舍等待你的到来。@w5 我老了，所以我知道我打不过你，所以我心甘情愿地投降。@p9 为了表彰你的努力，我想给你一把她赠予我的仪式匕首Zanthia 皇帝陛下，兹皇后瑞克斯帝国，以及随之而来的荣誉等级：战略家

English: You obtained the Class rank of Strategos! Bonus: +10% damage with Minigun Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Cannon Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Gatling Guns - Only affects the ship you are piloting -
Chinese (simplified): 你获得了战略家阶级！ 奖励： 机枪炮塔伤害增加+10% 奖励： 机炮炮塔伤害增加+10% 奖励： 加特林炮伤害增加+10% - 仅影响你驾驶的飞船 -

English: <color=#ffffff>You do not have sufficient funds to place a bet.</color>

Chinese (simplified): CommunicationCommons/SparkNET/DEBUG/backdoor@w2 启用调试模式+命令提示符 通过Core01访问后门/Port0000001 (Not Detected) 仅限经过身份验证的用户! 请输入 21 个字符的访问代码. 核心处理速度： {CoreSpeed}.0
黑客软件:流量攻击 (循环相邻节点)

English: Hacking Software: Overclock (Increases User Capture Rate by 15%)
Chinese (simplified): 黑客软件:超频 (增加15%的用户占领速度)

English: Hacking Software: Fortify (Reduces Security Capture Rate by 15%)
Chinese (simplified): 黑客软件:加固 (减少15%的安保占领速度)

English: < Security Capture Rate: {SecurityCapture}% >\n< User Capture Rate: {PlayerCapture}% >

English: Welcome to a new galaxy of gaming {PlayerName}!\nWhere would you like to begin this adventure?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到全新的游戏星系 {PlayerName}!\n你想从哪里开始这段冒险?

English: WARNING! This is a debug option in the event your Main Class data has been wiped. You must choose your previous Main Class to re-set your class. There will be no confirmation and if you choose the wrong class you will recieve no missions and no skill bonuses so DON'T SCREW IT UP. There's no console command to fix or change it if you do. You will be permanently broken. This will also reset your sub-class display level, but not your stats. You will need to choose your sub-class again.
Chinese (simplified): 警告! 这是为了主要职业数据被清空而做的Debug选项. 你必须重新选择 之前的 主要职业 来对职业进行重置. 这一行为不提供确认选项，并且如果你选择了错误的职业，将不会有任何对应的加成和任务 别搞砸了. 如果真的发生了，任何指令都救不了你. 你这个存档就算是废了. 这一操作同样会重置你副职业的显示等级，但是数值依然还在. 你需要重新选择副职业.
解锁黑客职业：等级3 (黑客大师)

English: <color=#00ffff>This is where you will find the abilities and functions of any special class you may have unlocked, Commander.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>If you have achieved the skill or achievement threshold for any hidden classes, they can be unlocked here if they weren't activated at the source.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#00ffff>你可以在这里找到你所有已解锁职业的能力和功能，指挥官.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>如果你达到了某些隐藏职业的阈值但是没有直接解锁，则可以在这里进行解锁.</color>

English: The Hacker Class is awarded by successfully hacking secure computer systems either in communication stations or communication satellites. As you gain experience, you increase the amount of money retrieved from Datavaults and receive a bonus to the speed at which you take control of secure systems. Level 1 - Gray Hat: +1 Capture each stage, +2500 hacked credits Level 2 - Black Hat: +2 Capture each stage, +5000 hacked credits Level 3 - Master Hacker: +3 Capture each stage, +10000 hacked credits
Chinese (simplified): 记住 黑客职业 是通过入侵通信站点或卫星的安全计算机获得的奖励. 随着你获取经验的增加，从数据金库中获取的信用点会增加，同时也会伴随控制安全系统的速度上升. 等级1 - 灰帽子： +1 每阶段占领数，+2500 黑入后获取的信用点 等级2 - 黑帽子： +2 每阶段占领数，+5000 黑入后获取的信用点 等级 3 - 黑客大师： +3 每阶段占领数，+10000 黑入后获取的信用点

English: The Courier Class is awarded by Galactic Shipping Services for returning 50 or more undelivered cargo to a GIN Console.\nFor your tireless efforts in returning lost property to the shipping service you are awarded the tital of Honorary Courier and will receive an additional 2000 credits for every future package you deliver.
Chinese (simplified): 记住 信使职业是由 星系运输服务 为在GIN终端归还了50个以上包裹的人颁发的.\n由于您为将丢失的财产归还给运输服务所做的不懈努力，您将获得荣誉快递员的称号，并将在未来每次递送包裹时获得额外的 2000 信用点 .

English: The Strategos Class can only be awarded by defeating a Fleet Admiral of the Zirax Imperial Navy in command of an Imperial Sector Command. It is awarded symbolically by handing over an imperial dagger bestowed upon the admiral by Empress Xanthia when first given his command.Bonus: +10% damage with Minigun Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Cannon Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Gatling Guns - Only affects the ship you are piloting -
Chinese (simplified): 记住 战略家职业 只能由. It is awarded symbolically by handing over an imperial dagger bestowed upon the admiral by Empress Xanthia when first given his command.Bonus: +10% damage with Minigun Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Cannon Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Gatling Guns - Only affects the ship you are piloting -

Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的协助。我会联系我的人，他们很快就会来接我。

The sun shines during the day.
I think I'll leave you here.

Actually, now that you mention it...

English: @d0Navigational data can be used to upgrade the distance you can make warp jumps while piloting any capital vessel.\nA maximum of <color=#00ff00>50</color> may be turned in.\nYou currently have a <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> light year increase to your base warp range. English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Navigational Data:</color> A data pad containing various star charts and navigational maps. Allows a pilot to safely calculate longer warp jumps.\nIncreases the range a pilot may warp by 1 light year while piloting any warp capable capital vessel. May have a higher effect on more advanced warp drives. A maximum of 50 navigational data may be turned in. Excess may be sold.\nCan be obtained rarely in loot, missions, or bought from traders.

English: You have a bad rep here. Get out.
Chinese (simplified): 你在这里名声不好。出去。

English: Fine. Don't mind if I do. Leave, that is.
Chinese (simplified): 好的，如果我这样做，请不要介意。就是说，离开。

English: Welcome. Please, browse around.\nWatch out for pirate activity on your scanners, there's been an increase of attacks lately. Something is driving them to take on bigger and bigger targets.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎。请浏览。\n注意你的扫描器上的海盗活动，最近攻击有所增加。有什么东西驱使他们接受越来越大的目标。
我发现了这些强盗的标志。

English: You are no longer an enemy of the Free Colonists.
Chinese (simplified): 你不再是自由殖民者的敌人了。

English: How do I use the Salvage License?

Laying about the yard are Salvaged Vessels. Each one has a Core Lock mechanism attached to the top of the hull that prevents unauthorized access to the salvage.
Simply purchase a Salvage License and then use the switch on the Core Lock to overload the Core Lock, allowing you to claim the vessel for yourself.
@p9You may then either place your own core on the vessel to remove whole blocks and devices, or leave it coreless and use the salvage mode of a handheld or ship mounted multitool.
Each Salvage License is single use and allows one core lock to be removed.
Attempting to salvage a locked vessel or removing the core lock by force will be met with deadly force.
Chinese (simplified):
船厂里到处都是打捞上来的船只。每艘船都有一个附加在船体顶部的核心锁机制，以防止未经授权的人进入打捞。
只需购买打捞许可证，然后使用开关让核心锁过载，你自己就可以认领这艘船了。
@p9 然后你可以把你自己的核心放在船上用来移除整个模块和设备，或者让它没有核心，来使用手持或船上安装的多功能打捞模式。
每个打捞许可证是一次性使用，并允许一个核心锁被移除。
试图打捞被锁的船只或用武力拆除核心锁将会遭到致命的打击。

English: Please help us! Our ship's life support systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Life Support Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Chinese (simplified): 请帮助我们！ 我们飞船的生命维持系统受损，我们需要<color=#00ff00>生命维持维修套件</color>。\n您可以在大型或高级建造机中的“装饰”选项卡下创建一个套件。 一旦你有了工具包，请和我说话。

English:
I understand. You can craft a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab of the constructor.
Or you can sometimes find a kit in an old wreck or buy one from a trader.

Once you have a kit, place it in your personal inventory then speak to me again.

我明白。 您可以在大型或高级建造机中的装饰选项卡下制作套件。
有时您可以在旧残骸中找到套件或从商人处购买。

一旦您有了套件，请将其放置 在你的个人背包中，然后再和我说话。
